T16n2959u_001:295: yataścobhayatantrayorapi kriyātantrasya devānatiricya nānye devā upalabhyante,
T16n2959u_001:296: ataḥ tantrasya dvāveva bhedau sambhāvyete na tu trayaścatvāro vā |
T16n2959u_001:302: sampuṭatantre - hāsadarśanapāṇyāptiḥ sa tu tantre vyavasthitaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:308: śāntipādenāpi triyānavyavasthāyā metat kriyācaryāyogamahāyogānuttaramahāyoganāmakeṣu pañcasu bhāgeṣu vyabhajyata |
T16n2959u_001:310: yathā ca - kriyātantraṁ caryātantraṁ mahāyogatantraṁ yogatantraṁ mahānuttaratantraṁ ca |
T16n2959u_001:311: vajrajñānasamuccayatantre cāpi pañcātmikā saṁkhyā'bhihitā yathā - kriyātantracaryātantrobhayatantrakalpatantrayogatantrāṇi ca |
T16n2959u_001:312: kāhṇapādo'pi yogaratnamālāyāṁ sarvamantranayasiddhau pañcavidhakriyācaryāyogayogottarayogānuttarabhedena ityabhidhāya pañcabhedān pratyāpādayat
T16n2959u_001:314: paṇḍita-alaṁkalaśenāpi pratyapādi-bhagavatā buddhena nirdiṣṭaṁ samagra-tantraṁ pañcabhāgeṣu vibhaktam-tannāmāni ca kriyātantra-caryātantra-yogatantrānuttaratantrānuttaramātṛyogatantrāṇi
T16n2959u_001:315: bodhipathapradīpasya svavṛttau dīpaṅkaraśrījñānenāpi kriyācaryākalpobhaya-yoga-mahāyogānuttarayogatantra-nāmakeṣu saptasu bhāgeṣvetad vibhaktam
T16n2959u_001:316: bhoṭadeśīyañyiṅmāsampradāye'pi kriyā-caryā-yogānuttarākhyaṁ bhedacatuṣṭayaṁ pratipādya punaḥ anuttarayogatantrasyānuyogātiyogamahāyogākhyaṁ bhedatrayamabhidhāya bhedasaptakamidaṁ svatantrayānatvenābhimataṁ punaḥ śrāvakayānapāramitāyānābhyāṁ saha yānanavakaṁ tatra vyavasthāpitam |
T16n2959u_001:317: bustonamahodayaḥ-kriyā-caryāyogatantrānuttarayogatantrāṇāṁ granthānāṁ pitṛtantraṁ mātṛtantramadvayatantrañceti bhedatrayaṁ vidhāya tantragranthān samagrān saptabhāgeṣu vibhajya sūcipatraṁ niramāsīt |
T16n2959u_001:318: tantradeśanāyāḥ prayojanam - bhagavān buddho na kevalaṁ mānavajāterevāpi tu prāṇimātrasya hitamutthānaṁ ca cakāṁkṣa |
T16n2959u_001:319: vinayapiṭake bauddhabhikṣūn pratyuktiḥ-‘caratha bhikkhave cārikaṁ bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ’ (1-21_ ato'gre bauddhavidhvadbhiriyameva pravṛtiranvakāri sattvānāṁ saṁgrahāya mārgadarśanāya nānāmatāni pratipādya tāni cānuśīlitāni |
T16n2959u_001:324: (16-72/72) arthāt vineyajanānanugrahītuṁ dānaṁ deyaṁ tataśca madhura-madhuravacobhiśśiṣyābhilābhiṣiṇī deśanā pradīyet,
T16n2959u_001:325: punaḥ svayamapi tadevānusaraṇīyam yādṛśā vineyajanāḥ samāyānti,
T16n2959u_001:327: catuḥśatake'pi vyāhṛtam - nānyayā bhāṣayā mlecchaḥ śakyo grāhayituṁ yathā |
T16n2959u_001:331: bhāṣā-vidhi-vidhānāni tu sādhyasyāvāptisādhanāni upāyāśca na ca caramaṁ lakṣyam |
T16n2959u_001:332: kālacakra-vimalaprabhāṭīkāyāmapi - yena yena prakāreṇa sattvānāṁ paripācanam |
T16n2959u_001:333: tena tena prakāreṇa kuryād dharmasya deśanām ||
T16n2959u_001:339: 24_ pāramitānayasyāpekṣayā mantranaye samupadiṣṭopāyānāṁ vaiśiṣṭyamadvayavajraṁ itthanniradeśi - ekārthatve'pyasamohāt bahūpāyādaduṣkarāt |
T16n2959u_001:343: 21) tantrabhedaprayojanāni vineyajanānāṁ buddhistarānurūpā caturvidhā deśanā kriyate tantrāṇāṁ,
T16n2959u_001:344: yathā ca - yadyapi kriyāditantracatuṣṭayasya bhedataḥ phalabuddhatve,
T16n2959u_001:347: śūnyatādarśane devayogabhāvanādiṣu ca nāsti kimapyantaraṁ paraṁ ca caturvidharāgapariśodhanaṁ jāticatuṣṭayaṁ kleśacatuṣṭayaṁ pudgalacatuṣṭayaṁ vāsanācāturvidhyaṁ yāma-yugābhiṣekacāturvidhyaṁ cāśritya vidvadbhistantrāṇi bhāgacatuṣṭaye vibhājitāni |
T16n2959u_001:349: caturdhā ca rāgasya mārgīkaraṇaṁ vidhīyate ataḥ caturṣu bhāgeṣu tantraṁ vyabhajyata |
T16n2959u_001:350: yathā ca sampuṭatantre buddhena pratyapādi - hāsadarśanapāṇyāptiḥ sa tu tantre vyavasthitaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:355: buddhena vajajñānasammuccaye tantrāṇāṁ caturvidha-vibhāgasyaitadeva tathyaṁ hetutvena vyāhriyata |
T16n2959u_001:356: 2. caturvarṇasaṁskāraṁ tanmanovṛttiṁ ca dhyāyatā buddhena caturbhāgeṣu tad vibhajya deśanā'nuṣṭhitā |
T16n2959u_001:357: yathā ca (ka) subāhuparipṛcchāsūtre nigaditaṁ guhyamantrasya caryāṇāṁ kramaśo'nuṣṭhānena sādhakaḥ kleśavinirmukto jāyate |
T16n2959u_001:358: brāhmaṇajātiḥ evaṁvidhāni bāhyācaraṇāni sevituṁ sātiśayaṁ prerayati tapo duścaryāśca parihātumabhidhatte evaṁ cedameva mokṣamuktyormārgaṁ manyate
T16n2959u_001:359: teneva anye sādhakā jātayaśca-itthaṁ caryāḥ svīkurvate tān anugrahītuṁ buddhaḥ kriyātantraṁ dideśa |
T16n2959u_001:360: (kha) ye duṣkarīṁ tapasyāṁ na cikīrṣanti nāpi ca loke jugupsitāścaryāścikīrṣanti evaṁ vaiśyavargīyavineyajanebhyaḥ buddhaścaryātantramupādiśat
T16n2959u_001:361: ete yogatantrasya paddhatyanusāram - ādhyātmikapaddhatiṁ na prāpnuvanti kriyātantrasya ca bāhyavidhibhyo dūretiṣṭhāsanti |
T16n2959u_001:364: ete ca cintane yogatantrasyaiva caryāyāñca kriyātantrasyaiva sādhanānuṣṭhānina ubhayatantriṇaḥ ucyante |
T16n2959u_001:365: (ga) kṣatriyāḥ ye'pi vā narā tapasyādiduṣkarīcaryāṁ na cikīrṣanti,
T16n2959u_001:367: tebhyaśca taduccasajjānurūpamevābhiṣekādividhiṁ nirūpya buddhena yogatantram ādeśi |
T16n2959u_001:369: (gha) śūdrā ye'pi vā narā peyāpeyayorgabhyāgamyayoḥ śubhāśubhayośca bhedamakṛtvā nirvikalpataḥ pañcāmṛtaṁ pañcamahāmāṁsaṁ ca bhakṣayatumarhanti sāmānyataśca ye sādhakā viṣṭhāmūtrādīni dugdhavad niḥsaṅkocaṁ grahītuṁ śaknuvanti,
T16n2959u_001:384: ye pudgalā mandendriyā bāhyasnānādyabhilāṣiṇasteṣāṁ kṛte citralikhitāyāṁ dravyanirmitāyāṁ vā mūrtau devatāyā bhāvanaṁ pūjanaṁ ca kriyātantre nirdiṣṭam |
T16n2959u_001:386: taduttamasādhakānāṁ kṛte jñānādevāvāhanapūrvakaṁ tasya ca bhāvyamānasamayadeve vilayanaṁ devayogabhāvanāyai yogatantraṁ,
T16n2959u_001:389: 5. caturvāsanānāṁ kṣayāyāpi caturvidhatantrāṇāṁ deśanā kṛtā yathā ca kāalcakratantre - prajñātantraṁ hi pūrvāt punaraparamukhādeva yogānuviddhaṁ savyāsyād yogatantraṁ gadati jinapatirvāmavaktrāt kriyādyam |
T16n2959u_001:390: yogācāraṁ hi pūrvāt punaraparamukhānmadhyamaṁ vai samastaṁ sūtrāntaṁ savyavaktrād gadati sitamukhāt śuddhavaibhāṣikaṁ ca ||
T16n2959u_001:391: (5/48) nidrābhaṅge sati nindāvasanayā bāhyajagatyabhiniveśasya prahāṇāya vāmamukhena kriyātantraṁ,
T16n2959u_001:392: dakṣiṇamukhena svapravāsanayā prabhāvite citte ābhāsamātrasyābhiniveśaṁ prahātuṁ caryātantram abhimukhena atinidrāvāsanayā bāhyavikalpebhyaḥ dūribhūya prakaṭitābhiniveśānāṁ prāhāṇāya yogatantraṁ,
T16n2959u_001:393: pṛṣṭhamukhena vāsanāvaśāt sarvasūkṣmavikalpābhiniveśavāsanājanyadharmābhiniveśaprahāṇāya prahāṇārtham anuttaratantraṁ ca deśitam |
T16n2959u_001:394: 6. yasmin tantre jalaghaṭabhiṣekavidhānamātraṁ tatkriyātantraṁ yatra ca vajraghaṇṭā''darśadharmadeśanānujñādyabhikṣekavidhānaṁ taccaryātantraṁ,
T16n2959u_001:398: yathā satyatretādvāparakaliyugeṣu kramaśaḥ kriyā-caryā-yogānuttarayogatantrāṇāṁ deśanā bhagavatā vidhīyate |
T16n2959u_001:404: 9. bauddhānāṁ vaibhāṣikādicatuḥ siddhāntavādinaḥ anugrahītumapi tantrāṇāṁ catvāro vibhāgāḥ akriyanta |
T16n2959u_001:405: yathā vaibhāṣikeṣu bāhyārthasattā manyate tānanugrahītuṁ pratyakṣataḥ paṭacitre nyaste jñānadevamāvāhya tadhṛdaye mantraṁ sannyasya svayaṁ ca snānādikriyātaḥ śuddhībhūya siddhiḥkāmyate atastebhyaḥ kriyātantraṁ vartate |
T16n2959u_001:408: yasmiṁśca svayaṁ samayadevaṁ bhāvayitvā svasammukhaṁ jñānasattvamāvāhya tadhṛdaye mantraṁ sannyasya īṣṭadevaṁ mitrasamaṁ matvā siddhimavāptuṁ vidhiḥ pratyapādyata |
T16n2959u_001:409: vijñānavādino bāhyārthaṁ na mattvā ābhyantarikagrāhyagrāhakādvayasvasaṁvedyaṁ paramārthaṁ svīkurvanti,
T16n2959u_001:410: teṣāṁ darśana-cintanānurūpaṁ svasaṁvedyasvarūpadevaṁ bhāvayitvā tasmin jñānadevaṁ vilīya mantrāvṛttimanu jñānadevaṁ visarjayanti yaśca yogatantrasya vidhirucyate |
T16n2959u_001:411: mādhyamikāḥ saṁvṛtau viṣayaviṣayiṇoḥ dvaitabhāvasthitiṁ svīkṛtya paramārthātmikāṁ kāṁcidapi sattāṁ na manyante |
T16n2959u_001:412: ataḥ svayaṁ samayadevaṁ bhāvanāviṣayībhūtaṁ vidhāya tasmin jñānadevaṁ vilīya vinā visarjanameva tiṣṭhanti yaccānuttarayogatantrasya vidhurudyate
T16n2959u_001:413: itthaṁ-devabhāvanāyāḥ vibhinnacaturvidhibhirapi tantraśāstraṁ caturṣu bhāgeṣu vibhajyate,
T16n2959u_001:416: tantraśāstrāṇāṁ tripiṭakatvavicāraḥ kiṁ bhagavadbuddhenopadiṣṭāni sarvāṇi vacanāni tripiṭake saṁgṛhītāni?
T16n2959u_001:417: sūtrālaṅkāre etaduttaramittham - piṭakatrayaṁ dvayaṁ vā saṁgṛhṇataḥ kāraṇairnavabhiriṣṭam |
T16n2959u_001:423: viṣāye'smin viduṣāṁ matavaibhinnyaṁ yathā ca abhidharmakośe vasubandhunā nyagādi - dharmaskandhasahasrāṇi yānyaśītiṁ jagau muniḥ |
T16n2959u_001:430: ityetad vicārayiṣyate yena ca buddhena vihitānām aśītisahasradharmaskandhānāṁ pravacanāśayasya pratītirbhavet piṭakavyavasthāpi varṇitā syāt
T16n2959u_001:435: kiñcitskandhānām ekaikā gāthā ekaikaḥ dharmaskandha eva |
T16n2959u_001:437: svamataṁ pradarśayatā vasubandhunābhidhīyate - pratyekaṁ dharmaskandhaḥ ekaikasya caritasya vineyajanānāṁ pratipakṣāyānuvarṇitaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:439: kaścidrāgacaritaḥ anyaśca dveṣacaritastarhi kaścinmohacaritaḥ kaścicca mānacaritaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:441: mahāyānibhiścaturaśītisahasramitā dharmaskandhā manyante te ca tattvasākṣātkārāyopadiṣṭā ityabhimanyate |
T16n2959u_001:442: cīnībhāṣāyāmāmanūdite “kṛto ṛṇa” sūtre mahāyāninaḥ anantadharmaskandhā babhūvurityeṣā vārtā samuktā,
T16n2959u_001:443: anyaccedamapi yad devadattasya pañcasahasragajānāṁ bhāropamapramāṇavantaḥ sūtragranthā kaṇṭhasthā āsan |
T16n2959u_001:445: vajrayāne'pi rāgasya damanāya ekaviṁśatisahasramitāni vinayapiṭakāni dveṣasya ca damanāya ekaviṁśatisahasrasūtrapiṭakāni mohasya pratipakṣe ekaviṁśatisahasrābhidharmapiṭakāi sāmānyarūpeṇa ca sarvāvaraṇakṣayāyaikaviṁśatisahasrāṇi caturthapiṭakānyarthāt caturaśītisahasramitadharmaskandhāḥ buddhena deśitā manyante |
T16n2959u_001:447: maṅjuśrīmūlakalpe'pi - yo hīmaṁ sūtravaraṁ mukhyaṁ dharmakośaṁ jinorjitam |
T16n2959u_001:448: pratikṣeptāro bhuvi martyā vā avīcau narakāntakau ||
T16n2959u_001:449: (54/75) punastatraiva - yatra tatra gatiryāti kumatistatra jāyate |
T16n2959u_001:457: (2/4) ataścaturthapiṭakaṁ sūtrāntaṁ bhavituṁ śakyam yato hi vidvadbhiranyairapi tantraṁ sūtrāntapiṭakasya vidyādharapiṭakasyānto matam |
T16n2959u_001:458: śraddhāvarmaṇā'pi mantrayānaṁ tripiṭake ca sammelitam api tu vidyādharapiṭakaṁ cedamucyate |
T16n2959u_001:459: yataścedaṁ mahāyāni-piṭakam viśiṣṭaṁ sthānamādadhāti vidyādharapadaprāptyai naike upāyā samupabṛṁhitāścātra |
T16n2959u_001:461: yathā ca vinayapiṭakadhārako vinayadharaḥ sūtrapiṭakadhārakāśca sūtradharādayaḥ kathyante tathaiva ca tantrapiṭakadhārako vidyādharo manyate
T16n2959u_001:463: abhayākaraguptena subāhuparipṛcchāsūtraṁ samuddharatā prāvoci devāsurāṇāṁ hitāya guhyamantraḥ vidyāmantrādiṣu naikeṣu bhedopabhedeṣu pañcalakṣato'pyadhikāni vidyādharapiṭakāni samupādiśyanta tathā cedaṁ caturthapiṭakam cocyate |
T16n2959u_001:464: śāntipādo vaipulyasūtreṣu tantropadeśena teṣāṁ sūtrapiṭakāntargatatvaṁ manute,
T16n2959u_001:465: vakti ca yat dvādaśāṅgapravacanadharmeṣu deśitatvādetāni sūtrāṇi ca santi |
T16n2959u_001:466: yogaratnamālāyāmapi - “avadānaśatakatridaṇḍakamālādikaṁsūtrāntamiti anabhigambhīrāṇi sūtrāṇi sūtrāntāni ekagāthā-caturgāthā upadhāriṇī ṣaṇmukhī bhadracaryā lalitavistaradaśabhūmikādīni’ ityādi, kathitam |
T16n2959u_001:467: śāntipādo'bhidhatte yat sāmānyato vayaṁ buddhaśikṣāḥ śīlasamādhiprajñākhyaskandhatraye vibhajya tripiṭakaṁ vyākhyāmastarhi tantrāṇyapi piṭakatraye abhidheyadṛṣṭyā sammilitāni bhavanti |
T16n2959u_001:468: yathā ca tantreṣu yatra samaya-saṁvarāṇāṁ nirdeśaḥ vinayapiṭake,
T16n2959u_001:469: dharmāṇāṁ svalakṣaṇāni sāmānyalakṣaṇāni ca yatra pratipāditāni,
T16n2959u_001:473: raṅjuṅ dorje etaccaturthapiṭakaṁ manyate etasmin piṭakatrayasya viṣayasamāveśatvāt |
T16n2959u_001:475: punarapi buddhaguhyamate gambhīrārthasya saṁkṣepeṇa varṇitatvādetat sūtrapiṭake'pi saṁgrahītuṁ śakyate |
T16n2959u_001:476: tantravargīkaraṇamabhidhānadiśā abhidhānadṛṣṭyā vidvadbhistantrāṇāṁ vargīkaraṇamitthaṁ vyadhāyi-bustonamahodayena mūlatantrottaratantrottarottaratantrasaṁgrahatantrottarikatantravyākhyātantrasabhāgīyatantrāṇāṁ nāmnā tantrāṇi saptabhāgeṣu vyabhajyanta |
T16n2959u_001:483: śākyasodanamacemo mahodayena tantrasya mūlatantrasaṁgrahatantra-vyākhyātantrottaratantra uttarottaratantraprabhṛtayaḥ ye pañca bhedā vyadhīyanta,
T16n2959u_001:490: (ka) mūlavistāratantraṁ tattantramucyate yadupadeśaḥ svayaṁ buddhena vineyajanahitāya cakre |
T16n2959u_001:505: khasaḍubaje ityanena yogatantra uttaratantrasya sthāne sabhāgatantraṁ parigaṇyate |
T16n2959u_001:508: buddhatvāvāptervibhinnā adhvānaḥ bhagavatā buddhena nānāvidhavineyajanebhyaḥ svādhyāśayābhirucisāmarthyānusāraṁ vividhopāyā vibhinnā dharmā upādiśyanta |
T16n2959u_001:509: buddhaḥ yacchiṣyebhyo yadupāyaṁ mārgañca dideśa svayaṁ buddho'pi tadeva mārgamanusṛtya buddhatvāvāptiṁ svīcakāra,
T16n2959u_001:510: yena ca vineyajanāstanmārgaṁ niṣṭhayā samarpitabhāvena cānuśīlayantu |
T16n2959u_001:511: nāstyatra saṁśītileśo yat śrāvakayānimahāyānivajrayāninaśca svasvavibhimārgānurūpameva buddhatvaṁ svīkurvanti evaṁ ca svatantraikavyavasthāṁ pratipādayanti |
T16n2959u_001:513: yathā'bhidharmakośe pratyekabuddha-samyaksambuddhaprādurbhāvaviṣaye samuktam - buddhatvamapakarṣe tu śatād yāvattadudbhavaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:516: prayatate sa cāntimajanmani śrutāgamamantareṇa svātantryeṇa bodhiṁ labhate |
T16n2959u_001:517: svayaṁ mokṣasādhitattvādayaṁ pratyekabuddho yo hi parasmai dharmaṁ na diśati |
T16n2959u_001:520: śuśrūṣā yasya yasyārthe yatra yatra yathā yathā |
T16n2959u_001:521: sa so'rthaḥ khyātyaśabdo'pi tasya tasya tathā tathā ||
T16n2959u_001:524: (2.6-8) bodhisattvasambandhe'bhidharmakośasya caturthakośasthāne karmanirdeśe coktam - bodhisattvaḥ kuto yāvadyato lakṣaṇakarmakṛt |
T16n2959u_001:527: sa ca niyato bodhisattvastadanu jambūdvīpe puruṣabhāvamākṣipati |
T16n2959u_001:529: ekāsanasthaḥ prayogamārgataḥ aśaikṣamārgāntaṁ sarvajñānāni sākṣātkṛtya buddho jāyate |
T16n2959u_001:530: evaṁ śrāvakayānīyābhidharmakoṣānusāraṁ neyaṁ mānyatā yat buddho naikakalpapūrvameva bodhimupalebhe tathā siddhārthasya punaḥ saṁsāre janma-gṛhatyāgābhiniṣkramaṇatapasyābodhilābhādikaṁ līlātvena mahāyānimānyatānusāreṇa na svīkriyate'pi tu asaṁkhyakalpeṣu sambhāradvayaṁ saṁcitya vaiśākhapaurṇamāsyāṁ yāmacatuṣṭaye prayoga-darśanabhāvanāmārgaṁ ca sākṣātkṛtya uṣasi tena buddhatvamavāptam iti manyate |
T16n2959u_001:531: 2. mahāyānam mahāyānibhirmahāyānottaratantre pratipādyānurūpaṁ buddhasya bodhagayāyāṁ bodhiprāptirneyārthamātraṁ manyate,
T16n2959u_001:532: nītārthe ca buddhaḥ pūrvata eva labdhabordhirmanyate |
T16n2959u_001:533: vajrayānibhirnāmasaṅgītau pratipāditānurūpam ahetuka ādibuddha iva no manyate tathaiva pāramitāyānibhirnābhidhīyate'pi tu bodhicittamutpādya kramaśaḥ mahāyānamanuśīlya tryasaṁkhyakalpānāmanantaraṁ buddhatvamavāpi iti manyate |
T16n2959u_001:534: śrāvakayānibhiḥ svānuśīlanamārgeṇa mahāyānibhiśca svamārgamanuśīlya bodhiravāpyateti manyate |
T16n2959u_001:535: yathā ca viśeṣastave buddhaṁ sambodhyābhāṇibhavatā yanmārgamanugamya buddhatvamavāpyate sa eva mārgaḥ svīyaśiṣyebhyo'pi nirdiśyate |
T16n2959u_001:536: tantradeśanāyā bhedāḥ mahāyānaṁ pāramitāyānaya-mantranayākhyetibhāgadvaye vibhajyate mantranayasya ca punaḥ kriyācaryāyogānuttarayogatantraprabhṛtayaścatvāro bhedā bhavanti |
T16n2959u_001:537: mantrayānasya bhedacatuṣṭaye'sminnapi buddhasya bodhi-prāptividhau dharmacakrasya ca vidhau bhinnatvaṁ varīvarti |
T16n2959u_001:538: kriyātantram kriyātantrānusāraṁ tathāgatasarvapuṣpanirdeśasammukhaṁ bodhicittamutpādya mantracaryā śākyamuninā samanuṣṭhīyate |
T16n2959u_001:539: anantakalpeṣu mantramanusandhāya puṇyajñāne saṁcinvatā tathāgatena pūrṇakaśyape loke samāgamāvadhau brāhmaṇaputrasya gurutvāvāptiṁ yāvat puṇyaṁ saṁcīyate tadanu ca tata eva mṛtyumupalabhya tuṣitaloke śvetaketurūpeṇāvatīrya devayonijānāṁ dharmopadeśaḥ kriyate |
T16n2959u_001:540: tataśca manuṣyaloke utpadya manuṣyayonijānāṁ kalyāṇāya mārgo nirdiśyate |
T16n2959u_001:542: buddhalīlāsu prāyeṇa sarvamateṣu sāmyaṁ dṛśyate - māreṇa bahudhā vighnā anekākārayojitāḥ |
T16n2959u_001:545: tadā māraparājayākhyasamādhau samāhito bhagavān nijakāyavākcittaiḥ mahāyamārikrodharājamutpādyācakathat - vajrapāṇe! tvaṁ bhairavakāyaṁ sandhārya māranāgāsurādīn vināśaya |
T16n2959u_001:546: kriyātantrānusāreṇa bhagavato prathamadharmacakrapravartanānantare kāśītaḥ śrāvastī gatvā tatra prātihāryyaṁ prādarśi,
T16n2959u_001:549: tatra ca māsatrayaṁ sthitvā uposathamakārṣīt yathāsamayaṁ tataḥ akaniṣṭha-tuṣita-brahmalokādīnupagamya tantramadiśat tasmānmāsatrayānantaraṁ bhūmilokamāgatya magadhaśrāvastyādiṣu kriyātantraṁ didiśe |
T16n2959u_001:550: yathā - suvarṇaprabhāsasūtraṁ gṛdhrakūṭe tathāgatagarbheḥ sāgara-taṭe sarvadharmaguṇavyūharājanāmadhāriṇī ca veṇuvane samupādiśyata |
T16n2959u_001:551: itthaṁ kriyātantrasya dhāraṇīkalpamantrasūtrāṇi vyākhyātantrāṇi ca buddhena devamanuṣyalokayoḥ pātrāṇāṁ yogyatānurūpaṁ samupadiṣṭāni tathā vibhinnakuladevasambaddhatantrāṇāṁ deśanā tatrāvibhūrya vihitā |
T16n2959u_001:552: yathā hi tathāgatakulasyākaniṣṭhabhuvane tathāgatena padmakulasyāvalokiteśvareṇa potalake vajrakulasya vajrapāṇinā'lakāvatyāṁ maṇikulasambaddhatantrasya maṇibhadravaiśravaṇamunibhyāmalakāvatyāṁ puṣṭikulasya pañcakaharitābhyāṁ kapilavastuni tathāgataśraddhālubhirbhūtapiśācairvidyāmantraṁ vidhividhānaṁ ca tathāgatāya samarpitam |
T16n2959u_001:553: tadanu taiste samadhiṣṭhāpitāstathā'nena lokakulaṁ loke pracāritamabhūt |
T16n2959u_001:555: caryātantram - caryātantrānusāraṁ buddhena sarvaprathamaṁ tathāgata-puṣpābhāsasya sammukhaṁ bodhicittamudapādi mantranayasya caryāṅkartuṁ tathāgatād bhaviṣyavāṇīṁ prāpya mantra-mārgānusāreṇa puṇyaṁ jñānasaṁbhāraśca samacīyata |
T16n2959u_001:556: yatra ca kriyātantre uddho bhagavataśatāṣṭadhāraṇīprabhūteḥ sādhanāmāvṛttiṁ cākārṣīt tatraiva caryātantramanurudhya - ‘mahāvairocanābhisambodhi-vyākṛtādhiṣṭhānavaipulyasūtrendrarājanāmadharmaparyāyākhye granthe vajrapāṇiḥ bhagavantaṁ vairocanaṁ jñānāya bodhaye ca mūlaniṣṭhapadayorviṣaye pṛcchati tadā sa vakti-heturbodhicittamasti mūlā ca karuṇā paryantaścopāyastatraiva bodhicittaṁ spaṣṭayannabhidadhāti samyag yathāvat svacittasya jñānameva bodhiridameva ca bodhicittamapi |
T16n2959u_001:558: bodhaye sarvajñatāyai ca svacittaṁ pūrṇataḥ nirīkṣasva - itthaṁ pratipādayan saḥ bodhicittasya sākṣātkārāya prābalyena prerayati |
T16n2959u_001:559: tadvadeva vajraśekharamahāguhyayogatantre cāpyabhihitaṁ - bhagavān buddhaḥ purā kāle bodhicittaṁ gṛhītvā bodhisattvo babhūva,
T16n2959u_001:560: tadanu ca sambhāradvayaṁ saṁcitya prajñā-pūrṇatāṁ labdhvā paṭalābhiṣekamavāpya akaniṣṭhamanomayasthāne avasthitaḥ san paṁcābhisambodhibhyaḥ buddhatvaṁ lebhe akaniṣṭhabhuvane ca vairocanasāmānyamahāyānatantraṁ caryātantraṁ vajrapāṇi-abhiṣekamūlamantraṁ ca samupādiśat |
T16n2959u_001:562: tadanu ca manuṣyaloke samutpadya mahāyānīva sāranāthādikṣetreṣu dharmacakraṁ prāvartata |
T16n2959u_001:564: caryātantreṣu bodhicittotpādasya prakriyā kriyātantrasadṛśī bodhiprāptiśca yogatantrānusāriṇī manyate |
T16n2959u_001:566: caryātantramānyatayā akaniṣṭhabhuvane caryātantraṁ satatamavatiṣṭhate kāmadhātāvapi buddhaśāsanāntaṁ tiṣṭhati |
T16n2959u_001:567: yogatantram - tathāgatatattvasaṅgrahasya prathamaparicchede vajradhātumaṇḍalavidhau ‘ atha sarvārthasiddhibodhisattvamahāsattvasarvatathāgatapracoditaḥ samānastata āsphāna samādhito vyutthāya’ ityetatprabhṛtivacobhirbuddhatva-saṁprāptiviṣaye vistareṇa nirūpitam |
T16n2959u_001:568: tatraiva ca pañcābhisambodhibhirbuddhatvaprāptyanantaraṁ sarvatathāgataiḥ buddhaḥ abhiṣekadharma-pravacanābhyāmanujñāpitaḥ tasya ca nirmāṇakāyaḥ sumeruparvataṁ gatvā mūlatantrottaratantratrilokavijayaprabhṛtīni yogatantrāṇyupādiśat |
T16n2959u_001:569: tataḥ paranirvāṇavaśavartini paramādyatantramupādiśat ānandavane ca caryātantraṁ samupadiśya nirmāṇakāyasyāvāsaṁ saṁgṛhya akaniṣṭhabhuvane sthitastathāgataḥ vairocane samāhitaḥ punastato neyārthe dvādaśalīlāḥ pradarśayan jambudvīpe samudbhūya naikayānāni samupādideśa |
T16n2959u_001:570: tathyamidamāśritya śākyamitrācāryeṇa avoci śuddhodanasya putreṇa siddhārthena uruvelā-nadyāstaṭe tapasyāmācaratā tatraiva vipākakāyamapahāya sūkṣmakāyād akaniṣṭhabhuvanamupalabhya tatraiva pañcābhisambodhibhiḥ bodhimavāpya sumeruparvate-yogatantramupadiśya punaḥ vipākakāyaṁ praviśya bodhagayāyāṁ buddhatvamalambhi |
T16n2959u_001:571: bhoṭasya paravartī ratnabhadro'nuvādako hevajravyākhyākārāścāpi tathyamidaṁ svīkurvanti |
T16n2959u_001:572: ānandagarbhānusāreṇa buddhaḥ asaṁkhyakalpapūrvamevābhisambhodhiṁ lebhe ata evānandagarbhaḥ śākyakulotpannaṁ siddhārthaṁ bodhisattvarūpeṇa na manute śākyamitramataṁ cāpi khaṇḍayate |
T16n2959u_001:573: anenācāryeṇa ‘buddhaḥ pūrvamakaniṣṭhabhuvane bodhiṁ prāpa’ iti manyate tadanu ca śākyakule samutpannasya buddhatvāvāptiḥ nirmāṇakāyasya līlā neyārthā ca svīkriyate |
T16n2959u_001:576: paraṁ ca buddhatvasamprāptiviṣaye prāyaḥ sampuṭatantramanukṛtya sāmānyānuttaratantrasya pakṣaḥ pratipādayituṁ śakyate'smābhiḥ |
T16n2959u_001:577: etadanusāraṁ buddhaḥ ekasminneva kāle kvacid bodhicittamutpādayan kvacicca devalokataścaṁkramaṇaṁ vidadhānaḥ anyacca kutracit dharmacakraṁ pravartayan vyutthānaṁ ca kurvāṇo dṛśyate |
T16n2959u_001:578: ataḥ etatsarvaṁ kiñcidviśiṣṭakrame vyavasthāyācāntargataṁ vyaktīkartuṁ na śakyate |
T16n2959u_001:579: pitṛtantram - pitṛtantra - guhyasamājasya deśanāviṣaye'pi naikaṁ matamatāntaraṁ parilakṣyate |
T16n2959u_001:580: teṣu ca ekaṁ dvayaṁ vā matamatra pratipādyate-ānandagarbheṇa guhyasamājapaṁjikāyāmucyate-buddhaḥ vaiṣṇavādimahārāgiṇa upadaśati bhoṭīyo mahān siddhācāryaḥ ‘bustonaḥ’ api manute yat - buddho vaiṣṇavantre'pyabhiniviṣṭān anugrahītuṁ paranirvāṇavaśavartini loke guhyasamājaṁ samupadideśa
T16n2959u_001:581: śrīvajramālāmahāyogatantraṭīkāgambhīrārthadīpikāyām alaṁkalaśapaṇḍitena kathyate - yadā siddhārtho nairañjanānadyāstaṭe ākāśaspharaṇanāmasamādhimeva bodhiṁ mattvā samāhitāvasthāyāmāsīt tamālokya akaniṣṭharatnasambhavakṣetrasukhāvatīprabhṛtiśuddha kṣetrebhyaḥ tathāgata āgatya tasya (siddhārtharūpasya)
T16n2959u_001:582: mithyādhyāna-viṣayakaṁ spaṣṭayati tadānīntena ‘oṁ sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittapraṇāmena vajrasandhānaṁ karomi’ ityevaṁ kathite sati tathāgate tam abhyaṣiṁcat dhyānatrayaśatakula-bhedapaṁcakramādīṁścopādiśat |
T16n2959u_001:584: siddhārthaḥ tattathāgatopadiṣṭamārgamanusṛtya bodhiṁ samavāpa tataśca sūkṣmakāyena tuṣitalokaṁ prāpya svakāyamahābhūtebhyo ratnavimānaṁ nirmame eva ca svapaṁcaskandhān pañcatathāgateṣu parivartyaṁ kāmukānāṁ rāgasya mārgīkaraṇāya guhyasamājamahātantrapañcaviṁśaśatakaṁ samupadidiśe punaśca pañcakāṣāyika-prāṇibhyaḥ (āyurdṛṣṭikleśakālamārgibhyaḥ)
T16n2959u_001:585: anucarāṇāṁ nivedanena aṣṭādaśaparicchedayuktasaṁgrahaguhyasamājatantraṁ samadiśat tacca kramaśo guhyasamājasya saṁgrahakartṛvajrapāṇi - mañjuśrīprabhṛtīnāṁ paramparayā jambudvīpe prāsarat |
T16n2959u_001:586: bhoṭaparamparayā manyate yad guhyasamājaṁ svayaṁ buddhaḥ oḍiyānadehīyaṁ rājānaṁ indrabhūtimadeśayat |
T16n2959u_001:587: tadabhimataṁ yad ākāśamārgeṇa gacchantaṁ bhagavad-buddhamavalokya rājā svamantrigaṇebhyastadviṣaye ajijñāsata tadā śākyamuneḥ śrāvako'yam ityajānāt
T16n2959u_001:588: tatprabhāvitaḥ san nṛpo bhojanārthaṁ bhagavatsahita-śrāvakānāmantritavān samāgateṣu ca teṣu rājā ātmānam anugrahītuṁ buddhaṁ samprārthayat |
T16n2959u_001:589: buddhena gṛhasthāśramatyāgāya samabhihitaḥ rājā samavocat kāmaguṇādīn parihāya tvahaṁ mokṣaṁ na kāmaye yadyasyāmeva sāṁsārikatāyāṁ sambhavaṁ cedanugrāhyo'yaṁ janaḥ itthaṁ rājño vacanānusāraṁ tadrājānaṁ tantrasya yogyatāpātraṁ buddhdhvā śrāvakānantarhitya svayaṁ buddhena guhyasamāje prakaṭībhūya indrabhūtiḥ pravrājitaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:591: tadanu parvataśreṣṭhe devadevīnāṁ nivāsasya pradhānakendre alakāvatīprāsāde vajrapāṇeḥ saṁśrutya bodhisattvairguhyasamājo lipibaddho'kāri |
T16n2959u_001:592: tacca svayaṁbhūprāsādagandholāyāṁ saṁsthāpya ḍākiṇīśvarābhiratyādīn abhiṣekātparaṁ samupadiśya tato'gre āgantukasiddhānāṁ saṁgrahakartṝṇāñca nāmāni ghoṣitāni |
T16n2959u_001:593: mātṛtantram - ācāryakāmadhenunā hevajrasya padoddhāraṇanāmaṭīkāyāṁ pratipādyate yad mātṛtantre pradhānībhūtahevajratantrasya deśanā tathāgatasya nirmāṇakāyadvārā dvātriṁśadvarṣaparyanta (32)
T16n2959u_001:594: jambūdvīpe nivāsakāle hevajrasya saṁgrahakartṛbodhisattvavajragarbhāya magadhe vihitā |
T16n2959u_001:595: tatraiva ca ‘ekasmin kāle mayā śrutam’ ityasya vyākhyāyāṁ suspaṣṭaṁ vyalekhi-yat na kayācit paramparayā etasyopadeśo'pi tu svayaṁ buddhena vajragarbhāya kṛtaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:596: bustono'pi sāmānyatantravyavasthāyāṁ hevajrasya bṛhaṭṭīkāyāḥ vyākhyātantravajramālāyāśca vacanamuddharan akathayat yat cakrasaṁvaradeśanānantaraṁ nirmāṇakāyadvārā magadhe caturmāranāśakāle jambūdvīpe hevajratantrasya deśanā jātā |
T16n2959u_001:597: hevajratantrasya prāyaḥ samagravyākhyāgrantheṣu ṭīkāgrantheṣu ca kutra deśanā kṛtā,
T16n2959u_001:599: advayatantram - advayatantre'pi kālacakramāyājālaprabhṛtīni naikāni tantrāṇi samāhitāni |
T16n2959u_001:600: teṣu cātra kālacakrasya deśanāviṣaye paramādyatantre evaṁ pratipāditam - gṛdhrakūṭe yathāśāstraṁ prajñāpāramitānaye tathā mantranaye proktā,
T16n2959u_001:602: (se.ṭī. p.3) nāḍapādenāpi sekoddeśaṭīkāyām kālacakrasya deśanā dhānyakaṭake (amarāvatyāṁ)
T16n2959u_001:604: nāmasaṅgītiṭippaṇyāmamṛtakaṇikāyāmapi kathitam - “iha khalu śrīdhānyakaṭake mahācaityasthāne - nānātantraśravaṇārthibhiradhyeṣitaḥ śrīśākyasiṁho nāma buddho bhagavān caitrapūrṇimāyāṁ śrīdharmadhātuvāgīśvaramaṇḍalaṁ tadupari śrīmān nakṣatramaṇḍalamādibuddhaṁ visphārya tasminneva dine buddhābhiṣekaṁ dattvā devādibhyaḥ sarvamantranītibṛhallabhutantrabhedena deśitavān” asyābhiprāyaḥ - vaiśākhapūrṇimāyāṁ buddhatvaṁ samupalabhya mahāyānimatena ṛṣipattana-mṛgadāvākhye prathamadharmacakrapravarttanasya dvādaśavarṣānantaraṁ māghapūrṇimāyāṁ bhagavān buddhaḥ gṛdhrakūṭe pāramitāyānaṁ dideśa,
T16n2959u_001:606: mūlakālacakratantrasya deśanāyai savinayaṁ prārthayitā śambhaladeśīyo rājā sucandrastantraṁ saṁgṛhya ṣaṣṭisahasramitaślokeṣu vyākhyāyya samupadiṣṭavān
T16n2959u_001:607: tadanu caitatparamparāyāṁ ṣaḍdharmarājaiḥ śatavarṣaparyantaṁ śāsadbhiridaṁ pracāritam tataśca tatsaṁkṣepāya ṛṣimunibhirmañjuśrīkīrtimanurudhya buddhasya mahāparinirvāṇasya ṣaṭśatavarṣānantaram (600)
T16n2959u_001:608: mūlatantraṁ saṁgṛhya puṣpamālānāmakacchandasā triṁśatsahastrapadyeṣu saṁgṛhya prācāryyata |
T16n2959u_001:609: vinayabhedena tantradeśanā mañjuśrīrmāyājāla-vyākhyātantre pratyapādayat-mantrāṇāṁ prādhānyena akaniṣṭhabhuvana-sumeruparvatajambūdvīpānīti trīṇi kathāvastūni santi |
T16n2959u_001:612: itthantantrasya deśanāviṣaye yadā'smābhirvicāryyate tadā spaṣṭībhavati yat tantrasya tattvadarśanaṁ sādhanāvidhiśca atyantaṁ gūḍho rahasyātmakaśca varīvarti |
T16n2959u_001:613: yathā ca yogaśāstre sūkṣmaprāṇacittādikaṁ niyantrya parakāyapraveśo rahasyātmako vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:614: sampūrṇabrahmāṇḍaṁ sūkṣmaprāṇacittādikaṁ niyantrya parakāyapraveśo rahasyātmako vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:615: sampūrṇabrahmāṇḍaṁ nijacittasya vistāramātraṁ cittasya ca svarūpamātraṁ vartate |
T16n2959u_001:628: svātantryeṇa tattvataḥ samagradharmeṣu cet pārthakyaṁ syāttarhi paracittajñāna-parakāyapraveśādīnāṁ kathaṁ sambhāvyatā syāt |
T16n2959u_001:629: punastatraiva tantradeśanāviṣaye padmavajreṇāpyabhāṇi - sraṣṭā tantrasya hṛdvajro vaktā sa eva deśakaḥ | 25 |
T16n2959u_001:634: ato ‘bustona’ itihāsakāro'pi likhati-itthaṁ buddhena dharmadeśanāvyākhyāyāṁ deśayitṛ-śrotṛsaṁgrāhakāṇāṁ pṛthak-pṛthak nirdeśastebhya eva kṛto ye ca evaṁvidhavyavasthāyāmabhiniviṣṭāḥ santuṣṭā vā bhavanti |
T16n2959u_001:636: śāsturanucarasya saṁgrahakartuśca rūpeṇa prakaṭībhūya pratyapādīt nānyathā pṛthak-pṛthak santatīnāṁ tantrāṇāṁ ca mānyatā sambhāvyate |
T16n2959u_001:639: idamapyuktantatraivabuddho na kadāpi parinirvāṇaṁ labhate na ca dharmasyānto jāyate |
T16n2959u_001:640: sārāṁśaḥ - uparyuktadharmapravacanasambaddhatatyānāmalokanena suspaṣṭamidaṁ yat tantrasya sampūrṇadharmacakrapravartanasya paramparāyāḥ śākyamuninā saha sākṣātsambandhaṁ saṁsthāpya vyākhyāvidhānamaśakyam |
T16n2959u_001:644: yeṣāmitthaṁ sādhanācintanaṁ ca varīvarti yairhi sādhāraṇāsādharaṇāḥ sarvavidhsiddhayo'vāptāsteṣāmapīyameva mānyatā |
T16n2959u_001:645: ataḥ etad rahasyātmakatathyasya svalpajñānena buddhipradhānakalpanayā śuṣkatarkavitarkaiścāmānyatvaṁ pratipādayitumaśakyam |
T16n2959u_001:646: evaṁ rahasyātmakavṛttaṁ tantreṣu eva nāpi tu pāramitānayagrantheṣvapi samupalabhyate |
T16n2959u_001:647: yathā ca candrakīrtiḥ mādhyamikāvatāre pratyapādīt - prathamapramuditā bhūmimavāpya sādhakaḥ buddhānāmekasmāt kṣetrāt kṣetrāntaraṁ pragatya naikatathāgatān sākṣākṛtya taddharmaṁ śṛṇoti,
T16n2959u_001:649: pāramitāyāmeva na śrāvakayānīyagrantheṣvapi buddhadvārā ṛddhiprātihāryapradarśanasya trāyastriṁśādilokagamanasya ca sampratyapi (dīrghanikāye)
T16n2959u_001:651: ataśca saṁkṣepeṇa vaktuṁ śakyate yogyasādhakebhyo buddhena arvācīnatantrāṇāṁ deśanā kriyamāṇā syāt,
T16n2959u_001:652: kartuṁ śakyate cāpi ata eva tantrasya viśiṣṭaitihāsikaḥ kramaḥ na kartuṁ pāryyate |
T16n2959u_001:653: yato'dyāpi yaiḥ kriyātantrasya pātratā dhāryate tairbodhisattvebhyaḥ śrāvaṁ śrāvaṁ tatpratipādayituṁ śakyate |
T16n2959u_001:654: itthamadyatanaviduṣāmiyaṁ dṛṣṭiḥ svīkartumaśakyā yat pūrvaṁ mantrasya punaḥ dhāraṇyāḥ devopāsanāyāḥ kriyāyāścaryāyāḥ yogasya anuttarayogasya paścācca siddhānāṁ sāhityaṁ vikāsatāṁ prāpnot |
T16n2959u_001:655: tattvadarśanam - atra hi praśnaḥ samudeti tathyasyāsya pratītiḥ kathaṁ syāt ?
T16n2959u_001:656: hevajratantre viṣaye'smin buddhaḥ avocat - poṣadhaṁ dīyate prathamaṁ tadanu śikṣāpadaṁ daśam |
T16n2959u_001:657: vaibhāṣyaṁ tatra deśeta sūtrāntaṁ vai punastathā ||
T16n2959u_001:658: yogācāraṁ tataḥ paścāt tadanu madhyamakaṁ diśet |
T16n2959u_001:660: gṛhṇīyāt sādaraṁ śiṣyaḥ sidhyate nātra saṁśayaḥ ||
T16n2959u_001:661: (2/8/9-10) abhiprāyaśca-uposathādārabhya śikṣāpadatrayamanuśīlya krameṇa vaibhāṣika-sautrāntika-mādhyamikān punaśca mantranayaṁ praviśya kriyācaryāyogādīni vimṛśyānte anuttarahevajratantraṁ praviśyādvayajñānaṁ prāptavyaṁ bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:662: idameva kāraṇaṁ yad bauddhadarśanasya caramamuddeśyamadvayajñānasya yuganaddhasya ca prāptirbhavati |
T16n2959u_001:663: buddhavacanānāmayameva sāraḥ yathā hi caryāgītikośasya vyākhyāyāṁ caturdevīparipṛcchāmahāyogatantramuddhṛtyoktam - caturaśītisāhasre,
T16n2959u_001:669: kuḍālapādo'tra acintyakramopadeśe - yasya svabhāvo notpattirvināśo naiva dṛśyate |
T16n2959u_001:672: (gu. a. si., pṛ. 196) vaibhāṣikaḥ sautrāntikagotrīyo vineyajano bodhipathapradīpe pratipāditapaddhatyā - virataḥ pāpakarmabhyo bhavasaukhyāt parāṅmukhaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:674: (ślo. kā. 4) madhyamapuruṣo bhūtvā kevalamātmanirvāṇāvāptau śīlasamādhī-vitarkayuktavipaśyanāṁ ca bhāvayati |
T16n2959u_001:676: abhidharmakośe'pi - yatra bhinne na tad buddhiranyāpohe dhiyā ca tat |
T16n2959u_001:679: (6/4) etadeva pramāṇavārtike cāpi - arthakriyāsamarthaṁ yat tadatra paramārthasat |
T16n2959u_001:682: yaccārthakriyākāri tadeva vāstavikaṁ pāramārthikaṁ ca bhavati,
T16n2959u_001:686: sarvasya yaḥ kṣayaṁ kāṅkṣeduttamaḥ puruṣastu saḥ ||
T16n2959u_001:688: tattvadṛṣṭau vijñānavādinaḥ- ‘cittamātraṁ bho jinaputrā yaduta traidhātukam’ (daśabhūmisūtraṁ, pṛ. 32)
T16n2959u_001:689: etadvacanānusāreṇa cittamātraṁ svīkurvāṇā bāhyārthasattā na manyante |
T16n2959u_001:690: mādhyamikāḥ paramārthe cittasattāmapi nāṅgīkurvanti sarvavastūni ca dharmaśūnyaniḥsvabhāvāni pratītyasamutpannāni ca manyante |
T16n2959u_001:691: yathā ca nāgārjunaḥ - apratītyasamutpanno dharmaḥkaścinna vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:693: (mū. mā. kā. 24/19) tataśca yadā vajrayānamavalokyate tadā jñāyate yad mādhyamikānāṁ niḥsvabhāvatā vijñānavādināñca cittamātrataiva catuṣkoṭivinirmuktaniṣprapañcaprajñopāyātmakādvayatattvaṁ jāyate |
T16n2959u_001:703: paraṁ ca mādhyamikamate cittamapi dharme vartate |
T16n2959u_001:705: yathā ca mahāmāyātantraṭīkāguṇavatyāmapi ratnākāra-śāntipādena cittamacitam iti vyākhyāyatā cittaṁ ca tadacittaṁ ceti cittācittam |
T16n2959u_001:713: vyākhyāne nigadya vajrayāṇopari nirdiṣṭādvayatattvaṁ traikālikamajātamaniruddhaṁ cābhimatam |
T16n2959u_001:721: 1. arhatvaṁ 2. pratyekabuddhatvaṁ 3. buddhatvaṁ ca paraṁ ca mahāyāninaikayānaṁ svīkriyate yad buddhatvaṁ prāpayati |
T16n2959u_001:722: saddharmapuṇḍarīke'pi - upāyakauśalya mameva rūpaṁ yat trīṇi yānānyupadarśayāmi |
T16n2959u_001:723: ekaṁ hi yānaṁ hi nayaśca eka ekā ceyaṁ deśanā nāyakānām ||
T16n2959u_001:724: (2/69) itthaṁ buddhena svopāyakauśalyena yathāyogyasamāgatapātrāṇāmāśayānurūpaṁ deśanā akāri |
T16n2959u_001:728: yathā hi caryāgītikoṣe - caturaśītisāhasre dharmaskandhe mahāmuneḥ |
T16n2959u_001:731: (pṛ. 22) ataḥ arhatvaṁ prāpnuvanto yathā śrāvakayāninaḥ - dīpo yathā nirvṛtimabhyupeto naivāvaniṁ gacchati nāntarikṣam |
T16n2959u_001:732: diśaṁ na kāṁcid vidiśaṁ na kāṁcit snehakṣayāt kevalameti śāntim ||
T16n2959u_001:733: evaṁ kṛtī nirvṛtimabhyupeto naivāvaniṁ gaccati nāntarikṣam |
T16n2959u_001:734: diśaṁ na cāṁcid vidiśaṁ na kāṁcit kleśakṣayāt kevalameti śāntim ||
T16n2959u_001:738: yathā ca saddharmapuṇḍarīke - tathaiva śrāvakāḥ sarve prāptanirvāṇasaṁjñitaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:740: (5/74) upāya eṣa buddhānāṁ vadanti yadimaṁ nayam |
T16n2959u_001:742: (5/74-75) evaṁ śrāvakayānibhiryat paramapadamavagamyate taccaramaṁ lakṣyaṁ nāsti,
T16n2959u_001:746: punastatraiva - tryadhvajñānamanantaṁ ca ṣaṭ ca pāramitāḥ śubhāḥ |
T16n2959u_001:749: avidyāvāsanāyā anāsravakarmaṇaḥ mṛtyusaṁkramaṇasya ca balena navaṁ janma gṛhītvā mahāyānaṁ praviśya buddhatvaṁ labhante |
T16n2959u_001:750: mahāyāne kena pathā praveṣṭavyamasmin viṣaye taibbatācāryāṇāṁ matāni nimnāni - 1. saṁbhāramārgeṇa praveṣṭumuktiḥ keṣāṁcid viduṣām |
T16n2959u_001:752: 2. apare ācāryā vadanti - arhaddvārā kleśāvaraṇasya samūlanāśena saṁsāre punarjanma na grahītavyaṁ bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:753: ataḥ sukhāvatīprabhṛtibuddhakṣetre saṁbhūya tata eva kramaśaḥ bodhisattvasādhanāmanuśīlya buddhatvaṁ labhyeta |
T16n2959u_001:754: 3. aparairācāryairarhaddvārā kleśāvarasya kṣayena mahāyāne prathamapramuditābhūmiṁ praviśya bhāvanāmārgeṇa jñeyāvaraṇānāṁ kramaśaḥ kṣayena buddhatvāvāptiḥ svīkriyate |
T16n2959u_001:755: 4. anye ācāryāḥ bodhisattveṣu saptamabhūmiparyantaṁ kleśāvaraṇasya sūkṣmavāsanayā,
T16n2959u_001:758: yatra ca dūraṁgamābhūmeḥ prāptyanantaraṁ bodhisattvaiḥ prajñayā śrāvakāṇāmākarṣakatvaprasaṅgaḥ carcito'sti |
T16n2959u_001:759: mahāyāniṣvapi keṣāṁcid viduṣāṁ matamidam - pāramitānayenāpi ante mantranayaḥ (vajrayānam)
T16n2959u_001:763: yathā cādvayavajrasaṁgrahe - ‘mahāyānaṁ ca dvividhaṁ pāramitānayo mantranayaśceti (pṛ. 14)
T16n2959u_001:769: ubhayanayāntaraṁ spaṣṭayatā bhoṭadeśasya mahāsiddhācāryasumatikīrticoṅkhāpāmahodayena mahāmantrakrame pratyapādi - 1. nayadvayasya caramalakṣyaṁ
T16n2959u_001:773: 2. sarvadharmāṇāṁ niṁsvabhāvatāyāḥ svīkṛtyā śūnyatāyāmapi bhedāsattvena śūnyatā'pi tadubhayasya bhedarekhā bhavitumaśakyā |
T16n2959u_001:777: 5. pāramitānayo rāgarahitānāṁ tantranayaśca rāgayuktānāṁ pātrāṇāmanugrahāyopadiṣṭaḥ ityapi mantumaśakyaṁ yato hi pāramitānaye'pi evaṁ niyamo'sti
T16n2959u_001:778: yathā ca bodhicaryāvatāraḥ - evaṁ buddhvā parārtheṣu bhavet satatamutthitaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:780: (5/84) etadatiricya pāramitānayānupālakā bahavo gṛhasthā api bhavituṁ śaknuvanti naitadeva,
T16n2959u_001:783: tatraiva mantranaye'pi īdṛśā aneke mahāpuruṣāḥ ye bhikṣavaḥ eva nāpi tu siddhapuruṣā apyāsan |
T16n2959u_001:784: atra vicāraṇīyaṁ hi tantre rāgamārgīkaraṇaṁ vivecitaṁ paraṁ pāramitānaye rāgādīni prāṇināṁ hitāyoktāni |
T16n2959u_001:787: 6. mahāsukhaṁ saṁcāryya viṣayaśūnyatāyāṁ dāḍhyārpteḥ sīmā rekhā'pi svīkartumaśakyā,
T16n2959u_001:789: yataḥ kāyapraśrabdhiṁ prāpya kāye sukhaṁ saṁcarate sa ca yathecchaṁ cittaprasrabdhisamāpatyā svaviṣayesthairyyaṁ labdhumarhati |
T16n2959u_001:790: ata ubhayatra sukhānubhūtyā sīmārekhāṅkanaṁ kiyatsaṁbhavamidaṁ vicāraṇīyaṁ vartate |
T16n2959u_001:791: kecit tantre avikāritāyāḥ anakṣarasukhasya ca viṣaye kathayanti |
T16n2959u_001:792: pāramitānaye tu sthitiriyaṁ praśrabdhikāliko prayāsādinirbharā ca tiṣṭhati |
T16n2959u_001:793: punaścātra mahāsukhābhiprāyaḥ raktaśvetabodhicittasyārdrībhāvatayā nāḍīvāyutilakādīnāṁ prakriyayā samutpannasukhena gṛhyeta tarhi kevalamanuttaratantrasya vaiśiṣṭyamidaṁ syāt kriyādyanyasāmānyatantrāṇāṁ tu na syāt |
T16n2959u_001:794: itthaṁ nayadvayena prāpte lakṣye lo'pi bhedo nāsti,
T16n2959u_001:795: tatprāptau mārge ca śūnyatādarśanacittotpādapāramitāsambharaṇādīnāṁ bhedenāntaraṁ na kartuṁ pāryate |
T16n2959u_001:796: niṣkarṣaḥ paraṁ cātra vicāraṇīyamidam - ubhayanayasya mukhyoddeśyaṁ parārthavidhānam,
T16n2959u_001:797: yadā ca parārthaviṣaye vicintyate tadedaṁ kāryaṁ rūpakāyena saṁbhāvyate dharmakāyena cāsambhāvyam |
T16n2959u_001:798: śāstreṣu dharmakāyaprāptiḥ svārthasampatyā rūpakāyasya ca prāptiḥ parārthasampatyābhihitā |
T16n2959u_001:800: śrāvakayānivaibhāṣika-sautrāntikāstu buddhasya rūpakāyaṁ karma-vipākaṁ manyante nirvāṇamapi bhāgadvaye vibhajanti |
T16n2959u_001:801: buddhatvaprāptyanantaramapi skandhasantateḥ avicchinnarūpeṇa vidyamānatāvasthā sopadhiśeṣanirvāṇatvena skandha-santateḥ (pañcaskandhānāṁ)
T16n2959u_001:803: evaṁ rūpakāyanirodhamanu prāṇināṁ sākṣāt kalyāṇaṁ na sambhāvyate |
T16n2959u_001:805: kalyāṇannivṛttāḥ syuratha vā tatparārthasampattiḥ kṣīyeta ityapi nābhimatam |
T16n2959u_001:806: śrāvakayānamate buddhopadeśa eva dharmakāyatvena manyate yo hi tannirūpadhiśeṣanirvāṇānantaraṁ parārthaṁ sampādayate |
T16n2959u_001:807: yathā ca mahāparinirvāṇāvasthāyām ānandādiśiṣyairmahāparinirvāṇaprāptāvatyantaduḥkhānubhūtau prakaṭitāyāṁ satyāṁ buddhena svīyāntimopadeśarūpeṇāvoci - mayā evaṁ kimapi tathyaṁ svajīvane tava - sammukhaṁ na gopitam |
T16n2959u_001:808: mattannirāvaraṇacaritrameva tava śāstṛpathapradarśakaṁ cāsti tadeva dharmakāyaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:810: bhagavato buddhasya sa upadeśaḥ adya pañcāśaduttarasahasradvayavarṣāntaramapi (2500)
T16n2959u_001:815: itthaṁ śrāvakayānimatānusāraṁ buddhena manuṣyarūpeṇa avatīryya prāṇināṁ pratyakṣakalyāṇavidhānaṁ na sambhāvyate tathāpi pravacanarūpidharmakāyenādyāpi sa duḥkhamuktyai janān sanmārgamārohayati |
T16n2959u_001:816: śrāvakayāninaḥ rūpakāyena lakṣyaprāptiṁ na manyante buddhasya rūpakāyaṁ ca duḥkhasatyaṁ manyante |
T16n2959u_001:817: yadyapi śrāvakayānino buddhakāyaṁ duḥkhaskandhamāsravaṁ ca svīkurvanti tathāpi tat dvātriṁśallaṣaṇaiścaturaśīti-anuvyañjanaiḥ suśobhitamabhimatam
T16n2959u_001:819: yathā sāmānyaprāṇināṁ surūpatā tatpuṇyakarmaphalaṁ manyate sa eva kramo buddhena sahāpi |
T16n2959u_001:821: gotravyākhyāprasaṅge vārteyaṁ suspaṣṭā yadasminnaye buddho mahāparinirvāṇānantaramapi nirmāṇakāyasaṁbhogakāyayoḥ rūpeṇāvirbhūya satataṁ sattvahitaṁ vidadhāti |
T16n2959u_001:823: idandṛsyate yat prajñāpakṣasya pūrṇataḥ pratipādanaṁ pāramitāyāne'pyasti paraṁ ca vineyajanādhyāśayānurūpaṁ yāvad bhavaḥ sthāsyati tāvat prāṇimātrahitena vidyamānarūpakāyasyopādānakārakaṁ kiṁ syāt ?
T16n2959u_001:824: yad dvātriṁśallakṣaṇaiścaturaśītyanuvyañjanaiśca suśobhitaḥ nirmāṇakāyaḥ akaniṣṭhabhuvane ca sthitaḥ saṁbhogakāyo vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:825: yathā ca vayaṁ śūnyatājñāpikāṁ prajñāṁ dharmakāyasyopādānakāraṇaṁ mattvā vicāryya tad bhāvayāmaḥ tathaiva rūpakāyasya hetubhūtadevakāyasya bhāvanāvidhiḥ pāramitānaye'pi nākathyata |
T16n2959u_001:828: itthaṁ svīkṛtau satyā punaḥ praśnaḥ - yatphalaṁ prāptavyamasti,
T16n2959u_001:830: yadi bhāvanīyantarhi kiṁ manuṣya-janmane manuṣyarūpaṁ bhāvayitavyaṁ ?
T16n2959u_001:832: naivam, yataḥ pāramitānayena dānādipuṇyārjanādapi lakṣaṇānuvyañjanāni siddhyanti paramatra cirakālo'pekṣyate |
T16n2959u_001:833: vajrayāne tu phalabhāvanayā rūpakāyaḥ śīghraṁ siddhyati |
T16n2959u_001:837: (10/65) itthamavacchinnatayā sattvānāṁ sammukhaṁ prakaṭānāya rūpakāyasyaiko'vicchinnaḥ āśrayaḥ upādānaṁ ca nūnamapekṣyate |
T16n2959u_001:838: atastadarthantatsvarūpabhāvanāyā āvaśyakatvaṁ sambhāvyate pāramitānaye dharmakāyaheturhi prajñā rūpakāyahetustu puṇyam |
T16n2959u_001:839: yathā āryanāgārjuno ratnāvalyām - buddhānāṁ rūpakāyastu puṇyasaṁbhārato bhavet |
T16n2959u_001:841: (3/13) etadanusāreṇa dharmakāyasya hetuḥ jñānasaṁbhāraḥ rūpakāyasya ca hetuḥ puṇyasaṁbhāro vartate |
T16n2959u_001:844: yathā copari nirdiṣṭaṁ darśanaṁ catuṣkoṭiniṣprapañcād nānyad sambhavam |
T16n2959u_001:845: paraṁ ca rūpakāyahetusambhandhaḥ pāramitānaye - yasya yasyātra yo heturlakṣaṇasya prasādhakaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:853: tato'pyagre utkṛṣṭāvasthāṁ prāptuṁ buddhakṣetrasya pariśuddhivyavasthā vyadhīyata |
T16n2959u_001:858: (1/68) etad vyākhyāyamāno haribhadro'bravīt - evaṁ viśuddhakṣetrasya rūpabhūmiḥ svarṇanirmitā |
T16n2959u_001:860: atra bodhisattvā devadevīnāṁ rūpeṇa bhāvyante tathā ca sarve dharmā māyopamā manyante |
T16n2959u_001:861: paraṁ ca vajrayānimate yāvat sādhako maṇḍalayuktavimānasya trayodaśabhirupabhogavastubhistathā lakṣaṇānulakṣaṇairyuktaphalarūpisambhogakāyasya mārgāvasthāyāmeva bhāvanāṁ na kurute tāvat dānaśīlādimātreṇa rūpakāyaprāptiraśakyā |
T16n2959u_001:862: prekṣaṇīyamadhunā yad vajrayānasya svarūpakāyasya mārgīkaraṇa-prakriyā kā ?
T16n2959u_001:863: pāramitānayamantranayayorbheda-vicārāraṇāyāmidaṁ suspaṣṭaṁ devakāyasya prāptyai rūpakāyasya viśiṣṭamupādānaṁ bhavet |
T16n2959u_001:864: yathā hi dharmakāyasyopādānahetubhūtā śūnyatā bhāvyate tathaiva rūpakāyasyopādānāyāpi sūkṣmamantrayānasyārambhaḥ ‘oṁ svabhāvaśuddhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvaśuddho'ham’ tathā ca ‘oṁ śūnyatājñānavajrasvabhāvātmako'ham’ ityetābhyāṁ jāyate |
T16n2959u_001:865: arthāt sarvadharmasvabhāvaśūnyatāṁ bhāvayitvā tacchūnyatābhāvanayā catuṣkoṭiniṣprapañcanijacitena sūkṣmaprāṇacittena vā sāmarasyaṁ niṣpadyate
T16n2959u_001:866: yathā dīpadīpālokayoḥ puṣpasya tadūgandhasya ca pārthakyamaśakyam,
T16n2959u_001:872: atra svayam iṣṭadevaḥ saptāvayavayukto vajradharaḥ tadanu ca svabhāvataḥ niṣprapañcasvabhāvaśūnyatā bhāvayitavyā yaddhi vajrayāne utpattikrama-niṣpannakrama-bhāvanayā saṁjñitam |
T16n2959u_001:873: arthāt saṁkṣepataḥ vajrayāne kāyavākcittanāmakatrivajrakāyasvarūpasya samarasatā ekākāratā cittamasti |
T16n2959u_001:878: (100) yāvat buddhasya jñānamasīmitaṁ tāvadeva buddhasya rūpamapi,
T16n2959u_001:879: yāvat paryantaṁ buddhasya jñānaṁ vyāptaṁ tāvatparyantaṁ kāyasyāpi vyāptiḥ |
T16n2959u_001:880: sūkṣmaprāṇānāṁ cittasyāthavā nijacittasya svīkṛtiṁ binā sarvasattvānāṁ hitātmakaṁ yaduddeśyamasmākantanna setsyati |
T16n2959u_001:881: pāramitāyāṁ sarvadharmasya niḥsvabhāvatvam asyaiva ca pratipādanantatra vidhīyate |
T16n2959u_001:882: tasyāmavasthāyām ‘na grāhyo na ca grāhakaḥ’ ityādivākhyānāṁ sāhāyyena kimapi hastagataṁ na bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:883: evamanubhūyate yad vayaṁ kvacit sarvaśūnyākāśe avasthitāḥ smaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:884: pratikāryasya pratyayeṣu vicāreṇa itthamanubhūyate yad vayaṁ kutracit śūnyākāśaparyantaṁ prasṛtasya sikatāmayasthalasya (registānasya)
T16n2959u_001:893: yadyapi vijñānavādinaḥ advaye mādhyamikāścāpyadvaye viṣayaviṣayyekākāratārūpaśūnyatāyāṁ sthitāḥ,
T16n2959u_001:894: paraṁ ca vijñānavādinaścittasattāmabhiniveśena sākaṁ svīkurvanti mādhyamikānāṁ pratikṣaṇaṁ tathāgataskandhagatiprabhṛtīnāṁ parīkṣaṇe vyatyeti
T16n2959u_001:895: tathā hi mādhyamikakārikā-gatāgataparīkṣāyām- gataṁ na gamyate tāvadagataṁ naiva gamyate |
T16n2959u_001:897: (2/1) ityetadanusārantu kimapi gamanāgamanādikaṁ na budhyate akarmaṇyatā cānubhūyate vā ato mahallakṣyabhūtaparārthahetave divyaśaktijñānacakṣuḥprabhṛtiprāptyarthaṁ catuṣkoṭiniṣprapañcaṁ prāṇacitte nijacitte bodhicitte vā mahāmudrāyāṁ sampannacitte'rthāt ābhāsaśūnyādvayarūpe samāhitirāvaśyikī pratīyate |
T16n2959u_001:898: atrābhāsaśūnyatārthe na jñānaśūnyatāmātram apitu caturthābhiṣekavelāyāṁ saṁketitaḥ paramārthaprabhāsvaraḥ arthāt evaṁ rūpaḥ saptāvayavairyukto vajradharaḥ saṁbhogakāya eva mahāmudrā'thavābhāsaśūnyo vartate |
T16n2959u_001:899: vajrayānasyaitadeva darśanaṁ sādhanāyāḥ pramukhaṁ tattvaṁ cāsti |
T16n2959u_001:900: vajrayāne svayaṁ devatvenotpādayitṛvidhiṣu bījalakṣaṇāyudhādyālambanāyā bhāvanāyā vibhinnavidhayo vartante,
T16n2959u_001:905: vajrayānasādhanāsvarūpam bodhisattvayānasya bhedadvayaṁ–—pāramitānayo guhyamantranayaścārthāt mahāyānasya dhārādvayī vartate |
T16n2959u_001:907: mantranayasya svarūpābodhanāt pūrvamidamāvaśyakaṁ yattattattvadarśanaṁ sādhanāpakṣaśca budhyeta |
T16n2959u_001:909: sādhanāsambandhe pāramitānayasya kiñcid mūlabhūtānyantarāṇi pratipādayiṣyante'tra yataḥ sāmānyatantrasādhanāvidhirvivecitaḥ syāt |
T16n2959u_001:911: tibbatīyamahāsiddhācāryeṇa śākyapaṇḍitena kathitam—śūnyatā niṣprapañcā bhavituṁ śaknoti |
T16n2959u_001:912: niṣprapañcato vyāvṛttā satī śūnyatā sadasatoḥ śāśvato ucchedapakṣe vā patiṣyati |
T16n2959u_001:913: atredaṁ bodhyaṁ yat—śūnyatā niṣprapañcā tvastyeva paraṁ ca yatra śūnyatā niṣprapañcamātraṁ tatraiva mantranaye iyaṁ prajñopāyādvayamayī vartate
T16n2959u_001:914: hevajre yathā— nāsti bhāvako na bhāvo'sti,
T16n2959u_001:922: mantranaye tu viśuddhasamatābhāvanayā sarvadeva-devīśca vīravīrāṅganāśca māyopamā matvā nānā pūjārcanā kriyate |
T16n2959u_001:923: yatra pāramitānaye śrameṇa śamathaḥ vipaśyanā ca bhāvyate tatra mantranaye upāyakuśalatayā saha sanimitta-(utpattikrama-)
T16n2959u_001:925: dvārā prāṇāyāmena vāyuṁ niyantrya vajrajāpādeḥ saralo vidhiranuṣṭhīyate |
T16n2959u_001:926: pāramitānaye samādhiḥ pṛṣṭhalabdhasthitiśca kramaśaḥ bhāvyate yatra cātrādvayajñānena sarvadharmasamabhāvād yugapad bhāvanayā vividhaṁ puṇyaṁ saṁcīyate |
T16n2959u_001:927: pāramitānaye sādhanādvārā sādhyāptiḥ kāmyate tadatra mantranaye upāyakauśalena sanimittanirnimittayogābhyāṁ prāṇāyāmato vāyuṁ niyantrya vajrajapādeḥ saralavidhiḥ svīkriyate |
T16n2959u_001:928: pāramitānaye sādhayanā sādhyāptiḥ paraṁ ca mantranaye sādhyasvādhanayoradvayatattvataiva |
T16n2959u_001:931: tatraiva cāyaṁ sādhakaḥ ekāsane eva bodhiprāptimabhilaṣati,
T16n2959u_001:935: ata eva trinayapradīpe mantrayānaṁ pāramitānayāpekṣayā caturvidhavaiśiṣṭyena viśiṣṭamabhihitam |
T16n2959u_001:937: 1. asaṁmohaḥ— pāramitāsādhakaḥ prāṇikalyāṇāya hastapādaṁ śarīrāṇi ca pradadāti |
T16n2959u_001:939: atra khaḍgāṁjanavṛṣṭiprabhṛtayo'neke upāyāssanti yaiśca prāṇihitaṁ vidhātu śakyam |
T16n2959u_001:940: 2. upāyabahulatā— yatra ca pāramitānaye samayasaṁvaratapasyopavāsaprabhṛtayaḥ naike duṣkaraniyamāstatraivātra tantre nānāśayarucisāmarthyānusāraṁ śāntaraudrabībhatsabhayānakaprabhṛtyupāyānāṁ sāhāyyamupādātuṁ śakyate |
T16n2959u_001:941: 3. aduṣkaracaryā— yatra pāramitānaye kleśāstyājyāstatraiva tantre kleśān nāpahāya bodhaye tad mārgīkaraṇaṁ kriyate |
T16n2959u_001:942: yathā ca hevajratantre— yena yena hi badhyante jantavo raudrakarmaṇā |
T16n2959u_001:948: (4/16) 4. tīkṣṇendriyatā— advayatattvaṁ sa eva jñātuṁ prabhavati yaśca pūrvasaṁskārayuktaḥ vastusthityavagamane tīvrabuddhiśca syāt |
T16n2959u_001:949: yadyapi tīvrabuddheḥ naikeṣu kṣetreṣu svasvapṛthak svarūpaṁ bhavati paraṁ cātra vastusatyatāvagamanatīvrataivottamā manyate |
T16n2959u_001:950: pāramitāvādinaḥ samagratābhāvaboddhumasamarthāstenaiva naikamārgeṣu prajñopāyādvayatattvasya vivecanaṁ nopalabhyate |
T16n2959u_001:951: yatra ca pāramitāsādhakaḥ ṣaṭsu daśasu vā pāramitāsu ekaikāṁ bhāvayati tatraiva tantrasādhakāya sampūrṇabrahmāṇḍamaṇḍalaṁ devatādvayabodhicittamāste tacca sarvamātmasannihitamātmasthaṁ ca vidyate,
T16n2959u_001:954: anaṅgavajro'bhidyatte— śrīmatā vajrasattvena ye'pi cānye nidarśitāḥ |
T16n2959u_001:957: yaḥ sādhakaḥ bāhyaśārīrikamudrā-vidhānena kāyasiddhiṁ vāgdvārā mantrāvṛtyā vāksiddhiṁ cittena ca devabhāvanāvidhānena cittaguṇāṁśca prāpnoti evaṁ cābhyantaradhyānabhāvanāpekṣayā bāhyaśuddhyādiśubhācaraṇāni prabalatayā kurute sa kriyātantravānucyate |
T16n2959u_001:958: seratogapāmahodayena tantracatuṣṭayasvarūpaṁ kramaśaḥ spaṣṭayatoktam— upalabhyadevīṁ mudrāṁ vā samālokya rāgaṁ samutpādya tadrāgamārgīkaraṇaṁ kurvat tattvadhyānasthiteḥ prakriyaiva kriyātantrasya svarūpam |
T16n2959u_001:959: (kha) upalabhyadevyā īkṣaṇena saha hāsādiprakriyāṁ vidadhānaḥ sukhānubhūtyā niṣprapañcasvarūpasya sādhanāṁ vyadadhat kāyavākcaryādiśuddherābhyantaracittayogasya ca samānarūpeṇa anuśīlakaḥ sādhakaśca caryātantravān nigadyate |
T16n2959u_001:960: (ga) upalabhyadevyā pāṇigrahaṇaṁ vidhāya sukhaṁ saṁcārayan sukharūpaviṣayajñānāt viṣayaśūnyatāyāḥ sākṣātkāre prayatnaśīlo yogī yogatantravān ucyate |
T16n2959u_001:961: (gha) samāpattiyoge sthitvā'dvayatattvaṁ sākṣātkṛtya bāhyapeyāpeya-gamyāgamya-śubhāśubhaprabhṛteḥ sampādanaṁ binā caryākārakaḥ sādhako'nuttaratantravān kathyate |
T16n2959u_001:967: svarūpaṁ pratipādayatā'voci—darśanahāsyapāṇyāptiprabhṛtiṣvekasya sukhasya mārgīkaraṇaṁ vidhāya tatsadṛśarāgasya pariśodhanāya viśiṣṭaprajñopāyajñānaṁ bhāvayitvā dvāratrayasya (kāyavākcittarūpasya)
T16n2959u_001:968: vāsanāhetave vikalpa-bādhakasahetucittasya kriyācaryādikatantrāṇāmabhiṣekātprāptaḥ saṁvaraḥ śīlañca kriyāditantrāṇāṁ saṁvarasvarūpaṁ vartate
T16n2959u_001:969: caturṇāntantrāṇāṁ maṇḍalaṁ likhan tathāgataḥ kathayāmāsa—kriyātantramaṇḍale dakṣiṇatastārādevīṁ rāgamudrāyāṁ,
T16n2959u_001:970: vāmataśca dharmadānamudrāyāṁ padmakulasyāmoghapāśaṁ vilokya lekhanīyam kriyātantravajroṣṇīṣe'pi kathitaṁ-pitṛdevo mātṛdevīṁ prati mātṛdevī ca pitṛdevaṁ pratyavekṣate iti śvetavarṇeṣu likhet |
T16n2959u_001:971: vairocanābhisamayatantre caryātantravidhiṁ spaṣṭayatā vyalekhi-dakṣiṇataḥ buddhaḥlocanasmitamudrāyāmavatiṣṭhate asya nikhilaṁ śarīraṁ kāntimayam
T16n2959u_001:973: yogatantramaṇḍasambandhe vajraśekharaḥ prāvocat—vajradevī vajraśabdaṁ kurvatī bhagavataḥ hastamāliṅgayantīti dṛṣṭvā likhet |
T16n2959u_001:974: anuttaratantramaṇḍale pitaraṁ mātaraṁ ca yuganaddhasamāpattisvarūpaṁ likhet |
T16n2959u_001:976: tathā ca guhyasamāje— tathāgatamahābhāsāṁ locanāṁ vā vibhāvayet |
T16n2959u_001:978: (7/13) etena suspaṣṭaṁ tantracatuṣṭaye sādhakaiḥ rāgaṁ mārgīkurvadbhiḥ advayatattvaṁ sāksātkartumiṣyate |
T16n2959u_001:979: sampuṭatantre'pi— hāsadarśanapāṇyāptiḥ sa tu tantre vyavasthitaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:982: (16-3-49) etadvyākhyāyamāno bustonaḥ lilekha—kāmadhātau rāgasya catvāro bhedaḥ— trāyaṁstriṁśasyādhaḥ samāpattidvārā,
T16n2959u_001:985: nirmāṇaratau hāsena ca paranirmitavaśavartini mudrādarśanamātreṇa santoṣaḥ sukhaṁ cānubhūyate vineyajanaiḥ |
T16n2959u_001:987: atasteṣā vineyajanānāṁ rūpadhāturāgānmuktyai buddhena pāramitānaya upadiśyate |
T16n2959u_001:989: etattathāvalokanena tantre ekasya niścitarāgasya mārgīkaraṇaṁ bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:990: paraṁ cāsya kṛte niścitameva rūpavatīmudrāṁ saṁsevya sādhanā nānivāryyā yataśca strīpuruṣayoḥ śukraśoṇitobhayarūpatvāt kāryakāraṇayoḥ santaterekatvācca
T16n2959u_001:993: paraṁ ca lalanā śoṇitavāhakanāḍīṁ rasanā śukravāhakanāḍīṁ melanaṁ madhyamānāḍīṁ ca prajvālya śukra-sravaṇaṁ vidhātuṁ śakyam |
T16n2959u_001:995: etasmācca kālpanikenaikena mārgeṇa rāgasya mārgīkaraṇamadvayatattvaṁ ca sākṣātkṛtaṁ bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:997: rūpavatīmudrāṁ saṁsevya samāpatyā'dvayatattvasya sākṣātkārāyedamaparihāryaṁ yat prathamaṁ dharmaśūnyatāṁ manomayarūpeṇa yāvad asaṅkucitaḥ san antaḥ sūkṣmacetanayā jānīyāt,
T16n2959u_001:998: śūnyatāyāṁ ca yadā cittasyātmasātkaraṇaṁ bhavet tadaivātisūkṣmaśūnyādvayatattvamahāsukhasya sādhanāṁ vidadhyāt |
T16n2959u_001:1001: sādhakasya paripakvadaśāyāṁ etadācarettu etatsatyatāṁ tathyaṁ ca ko'pi nāvaroddhuṁ śaknoti |
T16n2959u_001:1005: paraṁ ca ta eva mudrādikaṁ saṁsevya caryā vidadhati tarhi te'pi truṭiṁ vidadhati |
T16n2959u_001:1007: yo hi dharmāvalambināṁ mahān doṣa iti |
T16n2959u_001:1008: kula-vicāraḥ— sāmānyakulasya sambandhe bhārataratnabhūṣitaḥ pī. vī. kāṇe mahodayaḥ dharmaśāstrasyetihāse bauddhabauddhetarobhayakulayorvarṇanamakārṣīt
T16n2959u_001:1009: bauddhaśāstreṣu mantrayānādatiriktānyamateṣu kulaśabdasya sthāne gotraśabdaḥ prāyujyata |
T16n2959u_001:1010: pāramitānayaśrāvakayānīyagrantheṣu gotraśadārthe eva tantre kulaśabdasya prayuktatvāt |
T16n2959u_001:1011: mahāyānottaratantre maitreyanāthaḥ akathayat— gotraṁ kulaṁ vā tacchaktiḥ yā hi samyaksambodhiṁ prāpayati |
T16n2959u_001:1012: tenocyate—same jīvā ekasmin dine nūnaṁ nirvāṇaṁ labhante sarvajīveṣu gotrasya vidyamānatvāt |
T16n2959u_001:1016: (ma. 31/28) gotrāstitva eva jīvo buddho bhavitumarhati nānyathā |
T16n2959u_001:1017: gotrasya dvau pramukhau bhedau— 1. prakṛtisthaṁ gotram,
T16n2959u_001:1019: yathā— gotraṁ tad dvividhaṁ jñeyaṁ nidhānaphalavṛkṣavat |
T16n2959u_001:1024: cittasya yā'sau prakṛtiḥ prabhāsvarā na jātu sā dyauriva yāti vikriyām |
T16n2959u_001:1028: (ma. u. 1-64) arthādidaṁ gotraṁ karmakleśādyabhimukhaṁ na bhavati,
T16n2959u_001:1029: paraṁ cāsya svarūpamāgantukaḥ hetuvikṛtaṁ na kartuṁ pārayati |
T16n2959u_001:1030: idamādita eva gaganavat prabhāsvara-svarūpaṁ yasya ca notpattirna nāśaśca |
T16n2959u_001:1033: nāgarjunaḥ— pṛthivyantarhitaṁ toyaṁ yathā tiṣṭhati nirmalam |
T16n2959u_001:1037: yathā— agniḥśaucaṁ yathā vastraṁ malinaṁ vividhairmalaiḥ |
T16n2959u_001:1038: agnimadhye yathā kṣiptaṁ dagdhaṁ na vastratā ||
T16n2959u_001:1039: (se. ṭī. pṛ. 66) jñānasādhanābhyāṁ yathā yathā sādhakaḥ āgantuka-kleśān prajahāti tathā tathā tatra prabhāsvarabuṇo vikasati |
T16n2959u_001:1040: antataḥ sādhanāsādhayu caikībhūtau tathā bhavataḥ yathā śuklapakṣīyaścandraḥ kṛṣṇatvaśuddhyā pūrṇatāṁ prāpnoti |
T16n2959u_001:1042: maitreyanāthenāpi śarīriṣu sthitagotrasya guṇān upamayā spaṣṭayatā etatsvarūpaṁ vyāhṛtam— jinagarbhavyavasthānamityevaṁ daśadhoditam |
T16n2959u_001:1044: buddhaḥ kupadme madhumakṣikāsu tuṣeṣu sārāṇyaśucau suvarṇam |
T16n2959u_001:1046: jaghanyanārījaṭhare nṛpatvaṁ yathā bhavenmṛtsu ca ratnabimbam |
T16n2959u_001:1047: āgantukakleśamalāvṛteṣu sattveṣu tadvat sthta eṣa dhātuḥ ||
T16n2959u_001:1049: aśucau suvarṇam bhūmau nidhiḥ kukhādyena kṛṣiḥ praklinnavastrāveṣṭitamaṇirdevamūrtirvā strīgarbhe cakravartī rājā ca cavatiṣṭhate tathaiva sattvānāmanādiprabhāsvaracitte tathāgatānāṁ guṇo dhāturūpeṇa tiṣṭhati |
T16n2959u_001:1053: prathamāt prathamaḥ kāyo dvitīyād dvau tu paścimau ||
T16n2959u_001:1056: yataḥ sarvaguṇāḥ prathamagotre eva tu tiṣṭhanti |
T16n2959u_001:1059: abhisamayālaṅkāre cāpi— dharmadhātorasambhedād gotrabhedo na yujyate |
T16n2959u_001:1062: yathā suvarṇarajatalauhādīnāṁ kalaśeṣu pārthakyaṁ tanmūlyaṁ sthānaṁ cāpi pṛthak bhavituṁ śaknoti paraṁ ca tatra sthitākāśadhātau ko'pi bhedaḥ na bhavituṁ śaknoti tathaiva sattvānāṁ svabhāvabhirucīnāṁ kāraṇena śrāvakayāninaḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ bodhisattvāśca kathyante svasāmarthyānurūpaṁ paramapadaṁ prāpyate |
T16n2959u_001:1067: samyaksambuddhatvaṁ ceti pṛthak-svatantrapadatrayaṁ svīkriyate kintu nedamucittam |
T16n2959u_001:1068: mahāyāninastu arhat-pratyekabuddhākhyaṁ viśrāmapadasthalatvena nirdhārayanti yāvat samyaksambodhirna labhyate tāvat nirvāṇaṁ na kathayituṁ śakyate,
T16n2959u_001:1069: yataśca prathamagotraṁ dvitīyagotraṁ ca candra-candrikāsadṛśaṁ vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:1072: (ma. u. ta. 1/13) gotrasya pariśuddhireva sādhakaṁ saṁbhāra-prayoga-darśana-bhāvanāśaikṣaṇikākhyapaṁcamārgeṣu vibhajate |
T16n2959u_001:1076: (ma. u. ta. 1/47) etadaśuddhāvasthā hi sattvadhātuḥ aśuddhaśuddhāvasthā ca bodhisattvasya prathamabhūmito bhāvanāmārgaparyantaṁ pariśuddhāvasthā tu tathāgatatvam |
T16n2959u_001:1077: asmābhiḥ kathayituṁ śakyaṁ yat kleśajñeyāvaraṇasamanvitaḥ pṛghatjanaḥ aśuddhaḥ kleśena sadgrāhyadhāraṇayā ca śuddhaḥ jñeyāvaraṇena aśuddhaḥ evaṁ ca darśanabhāvanāmārgau śuddhāśuddhau,
T16n2959u_001:1079: sāratastu vaktuṁ śakyate sādhakaḥ svasvayogatānurūpaṁ sādhanāmanuṣṭhāya paramapadaṁ samavāpnoti |
T16n2959u_001:1081: kulaṁ yatra phalantatraiva mārgācaraṇe mārgo heturvāpi vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:1084: paraṁ ca buddhisatarānusāreṇa naike bhedā vidhātuṁ śakyāḥ |
T16n2959u_001:1085: loke eva manuṣyasya buddhau varṇasaṁsthānādibhedena naike bhedā dṛśyante tathaiva tantragrantheṣu vyāvṛttyanusāreṇānekakulavṛttāni carcitāni
T16n2959u_001:1086: yathā hi— (ka) sādhakeṣu kleśānāṁ nyūnādhikavāsanayā tantragrantheṣu tattatkleśānāṁ mārgīkaraṇavidhiḥ nyarūpi |
T16n2959u_001:1088: mohapradhānāya vairocanakulasya ca rūpaṁ dhārayitvā mayā tanmārgaḥ pratyapādi |
T16n2959u_001:1089: (kha) sādhakānāṁ varṇānurūpaṁ hevajratantre kuladevaḥ evaṁ nyarūpyata— yo hi yogī bhavet kṛṣṇaḥ,
T16n2959u_001:1091: yo hi yogī mahāgauro vairocanaḥ kuladevatā ||
T16n2959u_001:1094: yo hi yogī mahāpiṅgo ratneśaḥ kuladevatā ||
T16n2959u_001:1097: śvetagauro hi yo yogī tasya vajrasattvakulaṁ bhavet ||
T16n2959u_001:1098: (2-11-5-7) (ga) śarīravartilakṣaṇānusāramapi sādhakaḥ kena kulena sambaddhaḥ kīdṛksaṁskāranidhiḥ,
T16n2959u_001:1105: (2/11/3-4) buddhistarānusāramapi sādhakaḥ vibhinnakuliko manyate— anekākārabuddhitvāt pudgalāḥ pañca saṁmatāḥ |
T16n2959u_001:1109: evaṁ sādhakānāṁ vibhinnāśayasāmarthyānusāramapi kulasyāsaṁkhyā bhedāḥ— guhyasamāje cāpi— tattvaṁ pañcakulaṁ proktaṁ,
T16n2959u_001:1111: adhidevo rahasyaṁ ca paramaṁ śatadhā kulam ||
T16n2959u_001:1112: (18/36) punaḥ pañcakulānāṁ vistareṇa agaṇitā kulabhedā jāyante |
T16n2959u_001:1113: hevajratantre cāpi— ekameva mahācittaṁ pañcarūpeṇa saṁsthitam |
T16n2959u_001:1124: saṁkṣepatastu kāyavākcitteṣu antataḥ kāyasyaiva cittatvāt cittasyaiva kāyatvācca prabhāsvaro nijacitte mahācitte ca samāviśati |
T16n2959u_001:1126: sahajasiddhau kulaṁ sādhanāpakṣatvenāṅgīkṛtya varṇitam— kulāni bhajate loke pañcasaṁkhyākṛtālayam |
T16n2959u_001:1134: etasmād hetoḥ bodhicaryāvatāre bodhicittasya dīkṣāvāptyanantaraṁ sādhakaṁ svātmānaṁ buddhakulaprasūtaṁ manyate,
T16n2959u_001:1135: evaṁ ca buddhasya bhāvyuttarādhikāriṇaṁ matvā svadurlabhaṁ mānavajīvanaṁ dhanyaṁ manute |
T16n2959u_001:1136: yathā— adya me saphalaṁ janma sulabdho mānuṣo bhavaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:1138: (3/25) sampuṭodbhavatantre sādhakaḥ abhiṣekaṁ samupalabhya saharṣaṁ svodgārān prakaṭayan vakti— prāptābhiṣeko manujaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ praharṣitaḥ
T16n2959u_001:1143: (2/1-2) itthamatra tantrasāmānyasādhanāṁ vicāryya mānavaprakṛtyanurūpaṁ kulaṁ nirdhāryya sādhanā vidheyā |
T16n2959u_001:1145: dvitīyaḥ paricchedaḥ kriyātantram kriyātantrābhyudayaḥ kriyātantrasya deśanāprasaṅge kathitaṁ bhagavāṁstathāgataḥ śrāvastyā māsatrayāya trāyastriṁśalloke dharmopadeśena svamātaram anugrahītuṁ jagāma,
T16n2959u_001:1147: punaśca jambūdvīpaṁ parāvṛtya magadhaśrāvastyādivibhinnasthāneṣu nānāvidhābhirucivineyajanebhyaḥ tantramupadideśa |
T16n2959u_001:1148: eteṣu ca kriyātantraṁ mañjuśrītantrāvalokiteśvaratantravajrapāṇitantrācalatantravidyādevītantroṣṇīṣatantrākhyeṣu ṣaṭsu bhāgeṣu vyabhāji |
T16n2959u_001:1150: mañjuśriyā sambaddhatantram mañjuśrīmūlakalpasya deśanā tathāgatena śuddhāvāsaloke kṛtā-“ekasmin samaye bhagavān śuddhāvāsopari gaganapratiṣṭhite acintyasāścaryādbhutabodhisattvasaṁnipātamaṇḍalamāle viharati sma“ ityādiprakaraṇe vistṛtavivaraṇaṁ draṣṭuṁ śakyate |
T16n2959u_001:1155: 2. āryāvalokiteśvarapadmajālamūlatantrarājaṁ bhagavān himālayasya mahāvane āyuṣmadmahākaśyapa-gayākaśyapa-ānandakumāra-śāriputramaudgalyāyanasubhūtiprabhṛtīn naikāṁśca bhikṣūn śrāmaṇerān nāgadevāsurakinnaragandharvādīn samupādiśat |
T16n2959u_001:1158: 5. āryamukhadeśaka-vidyāmantrahṛdayanāmadhāraṇī bhagavatā tathāgatena śrāvastyā veṇuvane bhikṣusaṁghena maitreyādibodhisattvaiśca sākaṁ viharatā'valokiteśvarādiṛṣīṇāṁ vidyādharādīnāṁ ca nivedanena samupādeśi |
T16n2959u_001:1159: 6. āryasamantabhadranāmadhāraṇī rājagirau bhagavatā'ṣṭasahasrabhikṣusaṁghenāsaṁkhyabodhisattvaiḥ śuddhāvāsakulasya devaiśca paripūrṇāyāṁ sabhāyāṁ pravacanaṁ vidadhatā avalokiteśvaraistaddhāraṇīṁ deśayituṁ vinatau samupādiśyata |
T16n2959u_001:1160: 7. āryāmodhapāśakalpaḥ bhagavatā potalāparvate avalokiteśvarasya nivedanena deśitaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:1161: 8. āryāvalokiteśvaranāmadhāraṇī svayamavalokiteśvareṇa maitrīvaśāt padmacandrasūryāsane ekānanacaturbhujābhirāvirbhūya bodhisattvebhyaḥ samupadiṣṭā
T16n2959u_001:1162: 9. bhagavān svayameva padmāvalokiteśvararūpeṇāvirbhūya vajrāsane vajrapāṇaye siṁhanādatantramupadidiśe |
T16n2959u_001:1163: 10. āryāvalokiteśvarāṣṭaśatakaṁ bhagavatā devanāgayakṣagandharvarākṣasāsurakinnaravineyaiśca sākaṁ viharatā brahmādibodhisattvānāṁ samakṣaṁ desitaṁ yatra vibhinnaparyāyeṣu avalokiteśvaraḥ praśaṁsitaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:1165: eteṣu cāryācalanāmadhāraṇī bhagavatā trāyastriṁśaloke daśamabhūmivāsi-bodhisattvasamantabhadrākāśagarbha-sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhi-mañjuśrīpāṇyavalokiteśvaramaitreyaprabhṛtibodhisattvaiḥ samaṁ viharamāṇena maitreyasya nivedanena akāri |
T16n2959u_001:1169: 2. āryavajrapāṇinīlāmbaratrilokavijayanāmatantraṁ sumeruparvatasya dakṣiṇapradeśe alakāvatyāṁ vajrapāṇisahitānantadevāsurebhyo bodhisattvebhyaśca tathāgatabhagavatā samupādeśi |
T16n2959u_001:1172: 5. śrīvajracaṇḍacittaguhyatantrottaratantraṁ bhagavataḥ vajrapāṇeḥ nivedanena bhagavān samupadiṣṭavān |
T16n2959u_001:1174: 7. śrīguhyavajrapāṇyabhideśatantraṁ bhagavatā tathāgatena akaniṣṭhabhuvane alakāvatīprāsāde vīreśvare pṛṣṭavati sati praśnottararūpeṇa samupādiśyata
T16n2959u_001:1175: 8. āryalohatuṇḍanāmadhāraṇī bhagavatā indrasya nivedanena magadhe āmravanasya videhaguhāyāṁ viharatā deśanā samapādi |
T16n2959u_001:1176: 9. āryamekhalānāmadhāraṇī kapilavastuni nyagrodhodyāne kumārarāhulasya nivedanena upādeśi |
T16n2959u_001:1177: 10. āryavajrapāṇihṛdayaṁ bhagavān buddhaḥ śrāvastī-jaitravane ānandādinā vajrapāṇeḥ kiṁ kulamityādi praśne samupādiśat |
T16n2959u_001:1178: vidyādevītantram 1. mahāmāyūrī-vidyārājñī bhagavatā tathāgatena anāthapiṇḍakodyāne viharatā deśitā |
T16n2959u_001:1179: dīkṣāmādāya śārināmakabhikṣoḥ bhikṣusaṁghe praveśasya kiñcitkāla eva gataḥ akasmācca sarpeṇa saḥ daṁṣṭraḥ taṁ mūrcchitaṁ vilokya ānandena bhagavān niveditastadā prāṇimātrasya vibhinnarogebhyo muktaye vidyārājñīmupādiśyata |
T16n2959u_001:1180: 2. mahāmantrānudhāraṇīsūtraṁ bhagavān buddhaḥ śrāvastyā jetṛvane indra trāyastriṁśadevadikpālayakṣādibhirnivedane kṛte sati samupadideśa |
T16n2959u_001:1182: 4. āryajayavatīmahāvidyārājñī bhagavatā rājagiri-videhaparvate nivasatā bhikṣusaṁgha-bhikṣuṇīsaṁgha-śrāmaṇerasaṁghopāsakānāṁ śāsanaṁ prati vighnaṁ vilokya prārthanayā svayaṁvajradharacaṇḍarūpeṇāvirbhūya pūrvābhimukhasahasravajrajvālāḥ prasāryyaṁ bhūtasamūhaṁ tarjayatopādeśi |
T16n2959u_001:1187: eteṣu ca āryamahādaṇḍanāmadhāraṇīṁ bhagavāṁstathāgataḥ rājagireḥ gṛdhrakūṭe āyuṣmato rāhulabhadrasya prārthanayā'diśat |
T16n2959u_001:1188: 2. āryasarva-āntarāyikaviśodhinīnāmadhāraṇī bhagavatā tadā samupādeśi yadā rājagireḥ pūrvasmin brāhmaṇa-nivāsāmravanasya dakṣiṇe ca videhaparvatasya indrākhyakandarāyāṁ bhagavān viharamāṇa āsīt |
T16n2959u_001:1189: sasevakaḥ indrastatropadeśa-grahaṇāya samupāgatastasya ca nivedanena bhagavatā dhāraṇīyaṁ tasmai samupādiśyata |
T16n2959u_001:1190: 3. āryasarva-abhayapradānanāmadhāraṇī cāpi magadhe bhagavatā indrasya vinatyā didiśe |
T16n2959u_001:1191: 4. āryabāhuputrapratisāranāmadhāraṇī śrāvastyāmanāthapiṇḍakena rājñā prasenajitena ākramaṇe kṛte sati tadrakṣaṇaṁ kathaṁ śakyam iti pṛṣṭe sati bhagavateyaṁ dhāriṇī samupādeśi |
T16n2959u_001:1193: bhikṣubhiḥ saha yadā bhagavān viharati sma tadānīm ānando grīṣmakāle māsatrayamupoṣathaṁ sampādya ayodhyātaḥ buddhadarśanāya śrāvastīmupajagāma
T16n2959u_001:1194: bhagavatā ānandaḥ samabhihitaḥ yadadyataḥ pūrvaṁ saptasaptatikoṭimitasamyaksambuddhairapi āryamahādhāraṇī samupadiṣṭā |
T16n2959u_001:1198: 8. āryajvarapraśamanīnāmadhāraṇī ca bhagavatā rājagireḥ śīlākhyaśmaśāne bhikṣusaṁghāyopādiśyata |
T16n2959u_001:1200: 10. āryadraviṇavidyārājatantraṁ buddhaḥ śrāvastyāṁ veṇunirmite prakoṣṭhāṅgaṇe viharan ānandādibhyaḥ samupādiśat |
T16n2959u_001:1201: kriyātantrasya svarūpam kriyātantrasvarūpaṁ tathāgatena jñānasamuccaye evaṁ pratyāpādi - “loke avahelanāvidhātṛcaryāyā bhītaḥ kriyātantrasya sādhakaḥ bāhyaśuddhiṁ prābalyena vidhatte |
T16n2959u_001:1202: asmin jñānasattvasyābhāvaḥ svadehe devakāyasya bhāvanā'bhāvaḥ ativiśiṣṭe'dhvani praveśayogyatā'bhāvo bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:1207: svayaṁ samayadevasya bhāvanāyāmasāmarthyena svadehe devakāyasya bhāvanābhāvo bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:1208: etadabhāve jñānadevamāhūyātmani sa vilīnatvamapi na kartumarhati |
T16n2959u_001:1210: doṣāṇāṁ prahāṇāya vikalpānāśritya snānādikamācaradbhiriṣṭadevasya svāminaḥ rūpeṇātmanaśca sevakasya rūpeṇa bhāvanāṁ vidhāyādhiṣṭhātumiṣyate
T16n2959u_001:1213: seratogapācāryeṇa kriyātantrasya svarūpamitthaṁ nyarūpi - kriyācaryātantrayoḥ sādhakāḥ sampūrṇamārgaṁ sādhanāsthala-svatatvavidyāmantrāvṛtti-agnistha-dhvanistha-dhvanyantaḥstha samādhi-mantrasādhanāpraveśavidhiṣu homābhiṣekākhyeṣu daśasu tattveṣu saṁgṛhya dhyānaṁ kurvanti |
T16n2959u_001:1215: buddhenānuṣṭhitāyāḥ jñānasamuccayavacana-vyākhyāyā udāharaṇaṁ dadatācārya-coṅkhāpāmahodayena vyāhriyate-kriyātantrasya vineyajanā ye ca devayoge ekāgratāyā bibhyati,
T16n2959u_001:1216: ativiśiṣṭācaraṇasya loka-garhaṇatvād evaṁ cārthaṁ vidhātumasamarthāḥ evaṁ cotpattijarābhaṅgādidoṣāṇāṁ kāraṇena sarvadharmasatyatāṁ sattvā sādhanāṁ
T16n2959u_001:1217: evaṁ vikalponmukhasādhakebhyaḥ eva svayaṁ devabhāvanāyāḥ jñānāveśasya cābhāvaḥ pratipāditaḥ,
T16n2959u_001:1218: na tu kriyātantrasya samagrasādhakebhyaḥ evaṁ viśiṣṭasādhakāḥ ye ca svadehadevabhāvanājñānāveśa-rāga-hāsadarśanādimārgeṇacaraṇe kṣamante teṣāṁ kṛte samanujñā vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:1219: itthamatra kriyāyāḥ sāmānyaviśiṣṭasādhakānāṁ starānurūpaṁ svarūpaṁ svīkṛtamasti |
T16n2959u_001:1220: niṣkarṣastu kriyātantrasya tadeva svarūpaṁ yasmin snānādibāhyācaraṇādipavitratām ābhyantaramantrādyāvṛttiṁ prābalyena pratipādya rāgasya staracatuṣṭaye prathamadarśanāvasthāyāḥ mārgīkaraṇavidhiḥ pratyapādyata |
T16n2959u_001:1224: 1. lokottarakulam tathāgatakulam lokottarakule tathāgatakulapadmakulavajrakulākhyāni trīṇi kulāni samāhitāni |
T16n2959u_001:1226: buddhaguhyena kulatrayābhiprāyaṁ spaṣṭayatā kīrtyate-tathāgatakule sarvadharmān samyag vijñāyātīte yathā anantā buddhā bodhisattvā abhuvan tasminneva mārge tadvat pragatya bodhilābhakārakaḥ tathāgatakulasyocyate yathā bhagavān śākyamuniḥ |
T16n2959u_001:1235: yaśca ‘a u ma’ iti tryakṣarasampannaḥ trivajrasadṛśo'sti |
T16n2959u_001:1238: yanmārgabalena sādhakaḥ tatsākṣātkurute tadeva kulasya sādhakaḥ sa manyate |
T16n2959u_001:1239: padmakulam kleśarahitaḥ san ahorātraṁ praharaṣaṭke nissahāyaprāṇino vīkṣya karuṇādravībhūtaḥ san prāṇināmuddhārāya prayatnaśīlaḥ sādhakaḥ padmakulika udyate |
T16n2959u_001:1242: yathā hi bodhicittasamantabhadra—ṣaṭpāramitodbhūtaṁ jñānakrameṇa cādhiṣṭhitacaṇḍacaṇḍīprabhṛtikaṁ vajrakulikaṁ vartate |
T16n2959u_001:1245: pratyekaṁ kulasya granthānāṁ vivaraṇam— 1. pradhānakule trisamayavyūharājatantrādyaneke granthāḥ |
T16n2959u_001:1248: 4. uṣṇīṣakule āryasarvatathāgatasitātapatrā nāma aparājitā pratyaṅgirā mahāvidyārājñīprabhṛtayaḥ granthāḥ |
T16n2959u_001:1253: eteṣu dhāraṇītaḥ yaṁ granthamanukṛtya sādhakaḥ svasādhanāmabhyasyati saḥ tatkulasyaivocyate |
T16n2959u_001:1259: 5. ājñākārikule āryamahālakṣmīsūtrādyaneke mantrāḥ srotāṁsi dhāraṇyaśca santi |
T16n2959u_001:1267: evaṁ ca khasaḍubaje sāmānyatantram ji. navamamādhārīkṛtya samuṭṭaṅkitāḥ |
T16n2959u_001:1268: dhīḥ patrikāyāḥ pañcame'ṅke śrībanārasīlālamohodayena vistṛtaḥ paricayaḥ ādāyi |
T16n2959u_001:1270: lokakulaṁ ca 1. maṇikule āryamaṇibhadrānāmadhāraṇī evaṁ ca āryajambhalajalendrayathālabdhakalpanāmaprabhṛtayaḥ granthāḥ samāviṣṭāḥ |
T16n2959u_001:1275: maṇikulasya padmakule puṣṭeḥ pañcakulasya vā vajrakule cāntarbhāvaḥ anye sarve laukikāḥ devāḥ lokakule sammilanti |
T16n2959u_001:1276: subāhuparipṛcchāṭīkāpiṇḍārthavidhau nirūpitaṁ—ye etattritayakule na saṁgṛhyante te tathāgatenādhiṣṭhitā āvirbhūtāśca na manyante |
T16n2959u_001:1277: tatredamapi kathitaṁ—yadyapīme laukikadevāḥ svalaukikarūpaṁ sandhāryya loke vicaranti,
T16n2959u_001:1278: paraṁ ca tathāgatena damitāḥ santaḥ samaye tiṣṭhanti tatpālayanti ca |
T16n2959u_001:1286: padmakulasya ‘namaḥ ārya-avalokiteśvarāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya mahākāruṇikāya’ ityādita ārabhyante mantrāḥ |
T16n2959u_001:1288: maṇikulasya mantrāḥ oṁ namo maṇibhadrāya mahāyakṣāsenāpataye ityāditaḥ prārabhyate |
T16n2959u_001:1289: pañcakasya puṣṭikulasya ca mantrāḥ namaḥ pañcakāya,
T16n2959u_001:1291: lokakulasya mantrāḥ svādhipateḥ namanena sahārabhyante ataḥ kimapi suniścitaṁ nirdhāraṇamaśakyam |
T16n2959u_001:1293: dhanamaṁgalādeśca kuberagaṇeśau devau manyete tathaivātra prādhānyena śāntikarmasiddhyai tathāgatakulaṁ puṣṭikarmasiddhyarthaṁ padmakulaṁ raudrakarmaṇaḥ tvaritasiddhyai ca vajrakulamabhimanyate |
T16n2959u_001:1296: tathāgatādhipatikulaṁ puṣṭyarthaṁ krodhakulaṁ ca raudrakarmasādhanāyai upayuktammanyate tathaiva padmakulavajrakulādīnyapyavagantavyāni |
T16n2959u_001:1303: jalābhiṣeke bāhyamaṇḍalānāṁ praveśārthaṁ kalaśābhiṣekeṇa dvitīyamaṇḍale praveśāya sarvadevakalaśābhiṣekeṇa tṛtīye śrāvakapratyekabuddhakalaśena caturthebodhisattvakalaśena pañcame buddhakalaśena jinavijayakalasyaica jalābhiṣeko'nuṣṭhīyate |
T16n2959u_001:1305: itthaṁ kriyātantrasya pramukhābhiṣekadvayaprāptyā sākaṁ svasvasamayasavaraṁ pālayet |
T16n2959u_001:1306: tenaiva saha kriyātantrasya vibhinnāmnāyānusāreṇa vajrācāryatvaprāptyai jalapaṭābhiṣekau vidyāmantrasya ca siddhyai yasmin deve sādhakasya puṣpaṁ patet taddevasya mantrajapāya mantravyākaraṇamāvaśyakam |
T16n2959u_001:1307: sādhakasya sādhanāvasare samāgatavighnebhyo rakṣaṇāya snānābhiṣekaḥ aiśvaryasya cābhivṛddhyarthaṁ aṣṭamāṅgalikadravyāṇāmabhiṣekaḥ pradīyate
T16n2959u_001:1309: tathāpi vineyajanārhatāṁ vīkṣya vistārāya evaṁ vidhānamapyapekṣyate |
T16n2959u_001:1310: kuleṣvapi tathāgatakulābhiṣekaprāptyā sarvapradhānakulādhipatīnāṁ kulābhiṣeko'pi prāpta iva mantuṁ śakyate,
T16n2959u_001:1311: tathaiva ca padmakulaṁ vajrakulaṁ cāpi mantavyam |
T16n2959u_001:1313: cittamaṇḍaladehamaṇḍalādīnāṁ v yavasthā tatra na vartate |
T16n2959u_001:1316: 1. kriyātantriṇā yaḥ devaḥ sādhyastasya paṭacitraṁ mūrti sahāyakadravyaṁ ca prati samarpitabhāvanayā samucitadeśaparvatakandarādisādhanāstāneṣu vasantartu-uṣaḥkālaprabhṛtibhirdaśabhiraṅgaiḥ paripūryya sādhanā prārambhaṇīyā |
T16n2959u_001:1320: 1. svatattvabhāvanā tantre praveśāyābhiṣekāvāptyanantarameva tantrasādhanādhikārī jāyate sādhakaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:1322: kriyātantre kalaśābhiṣekaprāptyanantaraṁ sādhako dharmakāyasya prāptibhāg bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:1323: sa dharmakāyasya hetubhūtajñānapuṇyasaṁbhārābhyāṁ ṣaḍdharmairyuktaṁ svatattvaṁ śūnyatāṁ bhāvayati |
T16n2959u_001:1324: ṣaḍdharmayuktaśūnyatābhāvanāvadhau pūrvaṁ sādhakena snānādikaṁ vidhāya śuddhena bhāvyam |
T16n2959u_001:1326: tadanu sveṣṭadevamāhūya svasammukhaṁ saṁsthāpitapaṭe citre mūrtau vā tatpratiṣṭhāpya tatpūjā vidheyā |
T16n2959u_001:1327: tataḥ param iṣṭadevasadṛśamāsanaṁ vidhāya dharmakāyaprāptimārge ṣaḍdharmayuktacatuṣṭkoṭiniṣprapañcaprabhāsvare stheyam |
T16n2959u_001:1336: ite ṣaḍdharmā eva dharmakāyasya prāptimārgāḥ santi |
T16n2959u_001:1346: (kha) akṣaradevaḥ—sādhakena yaḥ iṣṭadevaḥ bhāvanīyastatpūrvaṁ svaśarīraṁ śūnyākāśe parivartya svacittacandramaṇḍale pariṇataṁ vicintanīyam tatsvacittacandramaṇḍale tanmantrabījaṁ nyasya tadekībhūya sthitirevākṣaradevasya bhāvanā vyāhriyate |
T16n2959u_001:1349: (gha) rūpadevaḥ— nabhomaṇḍale svacittaṁ candramaṇḍalasadṛśaṁ bhāvayitvā tanmadhye yasyeṣṭadevasya mantrabījasya nyāsena akṣaradevadhvanidevayorbhāvanāvidhinā cittasyaikāgryamabhūt tadbījamantrāt pañcaraśmipuṁjaḥ sphuritaḥ san tanmin ārādhyadevyaḥ daśāśāsu virājitabuddhasya bodhisattvānāṁ ca pūjārcanaṁ kurvanti,
T16n2959u_001:1351: tadanu prakāśapuñjo-naraka-preta-tiryagmanuṣyaprabhṛtiṣaḍyoniparyantaṁ prasṛtya nikhilaprāṇināṁ pāpān kṣiptvā puṇyasaṁbhāreṇa tatparipūrṇatāṁ
T16n2959u_001:1353: tadanubījamantraṁ sveṣṭadeve pariṇataṁ vicintya ekāgratāṁ kuryāt |
T16n2959u_001:1354: (ṅa) mudrādevaḥ— hastamudrayā svoṣṇīṣalalāṭakaṇṭhādiṣu spṛṣṭeṣu satsu svayaṁ samayamudrayādhiṣṭhito bhavet,
T16n2959u_001:1356: (ca) nimittadevaḥ— sādhakaḥ yamiṣṭadevaṁ svacittamaṇḍalabhinnaṁ mattvā samāhitavān tata upari pṛṣṭhabhūmau sarvabhājanaṁ sattvalokaśca śuddhābhāsaḥ
T16n2959u_001:1357: arthāt sveṣṭadevasya sthānaṁ kāyasāmagrī cāsti evaṁ bhāvanā nimittadevasya bhāvanā samabhidhīyate |
T16n2959u_001:1359: prāṇāyāmaśabdaḥ yadyapyanuttaratantre kriyātantre copalabhyate paraṁ ca vidhestu bhinnatvameva |
T16n2959u_001:1361: apānaṁ ca tad yat prāṇebhyaḥ dīrghatvaṁ pradadāti |
T16n2959u_001:1363: kālacakre lalanāyāṁ rasanāyāṁ ca caladvāyumavarudhya tanmadhyamāyāṁ praveśasya prayāsa eva prāṇāyāma ucyate |
T16n2959u_001:1364: atra prāṇāpānayoḥ śvāsapraśvāsayoḥ niyantraṇaṁ saṁsthāpya tatra vikalpodbhavāvarodho vidhātavyaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:1369: anuttaratantre niṣpannakramasya bhāvanākāle eva prāṇāyāma-bhāvanā kriyate nānyasyāmavasthāyām atra nimittadevasya bhāvanāyāṁ prāṇāyāmo vidhīyate
T16n2959u_001:1372: atra kriyātantre tu kevalaṁ vikalpāvarodhāyedaṁ sampādyate |
T16n2959u_001:1375: anuttaratantre'vasthitoṣṇīṣacakrasthitasya pitṛlabdhaśukrasya nābhicakrasthitamātṛlabdhaśoṇitasya cordhvādhogatibhyāmutpannamahāsukhasya cānubhūtyā mahāśūnyatā sākṣātkriyate |
T16n2959u_001:1376: atra vikalpānavarodhya devabhāvanām ekāgracittena gṛhītvā ālambane sthitvā devābhāsodbhavāya cittavṛtteraikyaṁ vidhīyate |
T16n2959u_001:1380: (ka) dhyānottaratantrasya vyākhyānusāreṇa snānādinā pavitrībhūya svasamakṣamiṣṭadevamāvāhya pūjārcana bodhicittotpādanamityādi pūrvakarmetyucyate
T16n2959u_001:1381: (kha) pradhānabhāvanāyāṁ dhyānottaratantroktimāśritya caturavayavasahitaḥ sādhakaḥ prāṇāyāmena sākaṁ japaṁ kuryāt |
T16n2959u_001:1386: āśrayadevādibhāvanā svasamakṣam iṣṭadevasya suspaṣṭarūpasya paripūrṇarūpasya ca bhāvanākaraṇam āśrayadevaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:1387: āhrayadevasya hṛdaye svacittamaṇḍalasya bhāvanaiva āśritabodhicittamucyate page 73 kriyātantrasya sādhanāpaddhatiḥ kriyātantrasādhanāyāścatvāryaṅgāni
T16n2959u_001:1393: jalābhiṣeke bāhyamaṇḍalānāṁ praveśārthaṁ kalaśābhiṣekeṇa dvitīyamaṇḍale praveśāya sarvadevakalaśābhiṣekeṇa tṛtīye śrāvakapratyekabuddhakalaśena caturthebodhisattvakalaśena pañcame buddhakalaśena jinavijayakalaśaiśca jalābhiṣeko'nuṣṭhīyate |
T16n2959u_001:1395: itthaṁ kriyātantrasya pramukhābhiṣekadvayaprāptyā sākaṁ svasvasamayasavaraṁ pālayet |
T16n2959u_001:1396: tenaiva saha kriyātantrasya pramukhābhiṣekadvayaprāptyā sākaṁ svasvasamayasavaraṁ pālayet |
T16n2959u_001:1397: tenaiva saha kriyātantrasya vibhinnāmnāyānusāreṇa vajrācāryatvaprāptyai jalapaṭābhiṣekau vidyāmantrasya ca siddhyai yasmin deve sādhakasya puṣpaṁ patet taddevasya mantrajapāya mantravyākaraṇamāvaśyakam |
T16n2959u_001:1398: sādhakasya sādhanāvasare samāgatavighnebhyo rakṣaṇāya snānābhiṣekaḥ aiśvaryasya cābhivṛddhyarthaṁ aṣṭamāṅgalikadravyāṇāmabhiṣekaḥ pradīyate
