T16n2959u_001:1479: tadupari sveṣṭadevasya mantrabījasya sahajabhāvena uccaritattvasya bhāvanā dhvanibījamantro nigadyate |
T16n2959u_001:1480: etattritayāvayavānāṁ suspaṣṭatayā bhāvanāṁ vidhāya prāṇāyāmaṁ vidadhyāt |
T16n2959u_001:1481: arthāt vāyumavarodhya svasamakṣaṁ aṅgatrayayuktena ālambane sthirībhūya manasyeva mantrāvṛttirvidhātavyā |
T16n2959u_001:1482: mantrajapāvadhau svasamakṣaṁ bhāviteṣṭadevasya hṛdaye'pi ātmavanmantroccāraṇaṁ bhavati,
T16n2959u_001:1486: jāpaṁ jāpaṁ pariśrāntau satyāṁ viśramāya nirvikalpasvatattve samāhitaḥ syāt |
T16n2959u_001:1487: viśrāmakālamatiricya svasamakṣam iṣṭadevālambane tāvat ekāgramanāḥ tiṣṭhet yāvacca devātmanorabhinnānubhūtirna bhavet |
T16n2959u_001:1489: yairvidvadbhiḥ kriyātantre svadehe devakāyasya bhāvanāvidhiḥ svīkriyate tairūpari varṇitāṅgatrayayuktairbhūtvā svayamapi iṣṭadeve bhāvayitvā prāṇāyāmakāle śvāsāvadhau nijahṛdayasthā'śrayāśritabījamantrādikaṁ sarvaṁ prabhāmayaṁ jātam evaṁ vicintya navadvārāṇi pidhāya mantrabīje manaḥ pravartya japo'nuṣṭhīyate |
T16n2959u_001:1490: śvāsamuktyavadhau praśvāsaḥ svasamakṣaṁ bahiḥ sthiteṣṭadevasya maṇḍale praviṣṭaḥ evaṁ bhāvyate |
T16n2959u_001:1491: 4. dhyānatattvasya bhāvanā dhyānatattva- bhāvanāyāḥ trayo bhedāḥ ( ka )
T16n2959u_001:1498: agnisthadhyānam - svasammukhaṁ bhāviteṣṭadevasya hṛdaya-candra-maṇḍalasya madhye caturdik dīpaśikheva atyantaṁ śāntamavacchinnaṁ bījākṣaraṁ
T16n2959u_001:1499: iti vicārya prāṇāpānau niyamya yathāsādhyaṁ śvāsamavarodhya ālambane cittaikāgyrameva agnisthadhyānamucyate |
T16n2959u_001:1501: ( kha ) dhvanisthadhyānam- iṣṭadevaṁ hṛdayakamalacandramaṇḍale caturdik agnipuñjena sama bījamantramalaṅkṛtamevaṁ kiñcitkṣaṇaṁ manaḥ pravartya paśyet |
T16n2959u_001:1503: evaṁ bhāvayitvā pūrvavat prāṇāyāmaṁ kṛtvā ekāgratvaṁ kuryāt |
T16n2959u_001:1504: atra prāṇāyāmābhiprāyaḥ - sarvacchidreṣu praviṣṭo vāyuḥ prāṇākhyastathā tato nirgato vāyurapānākhyo'rthāt śvāsapraśvāsākhyau vāyū,
T16n2959u_001:1505: tanniyamya sahasā candramaṇḍalād utpadyamānaghaṇṭādhvani- samaṁ mantradhvanisthitireva dhvanisthaṁ dhyānaṁ nigadyate |
T16n2959u_001:1506: ( ga ) dhvanyantaḥ sthaṁ dhyānam - etadadhyānasthityā śabdamantradhvanau vicāryamāṇe sati utpattisthitibhaṁganirodhavirahite nirvikalpasvatattve samāhitattve sati adhiprajñākhyaṁ jñānamutpadyate yacca mokṣasarvajñatayorūpādānaṁ bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:1508: sādhanācaryā subāhuparipṛcchāsūtre varṇitaṁ yad vidhipūrvakaṁ mantrajapānantaraṁ yadi mantrasiddhiḥ cikīrṣyeta tarhi tena sādhanāsiddhicaryā vidheyā |
T16n2959u_001:1509: atredaṁ dhyeyaṁ mantrasādhako yadi bodhicittotpādābhāve mantrajapasaṁkhyāṁ pūrayet tarhi sa śrāvakayāniprabhṛtīnāṁ falaṁ tu lapsyate,
T16n2959u_001:1514: padyakulāt śreṣṭhakarma vajrakulācca tena raudrakarma prāpyate |
T16n2959u_001:1515: punaśca kulānāmāntarikabhedena pradhānakulāt śāntiḥ adhipatikulāt puṣṭiḥ krodha-krodhinīkulāt raudrakarma siddhyati |
T16n2959u_001:1516: svarūpagataḥ kriyātantrī trividhasiddhimavāpnoti-uttamaḥ kriyātantrī vidyādharapadaṁ madhyamaśca abhijñādipañcajñānāni kaniṣṭhaśca kriyātantrī sarvaśāstrāṇāṁ sūkṣmajñānaṁ laghimādikaṁ - rasa- rasāyanatvaritagamanavaśīkaraṇamāraṇādikṣudrasiddhiṁ ca prāpnoti |
T16n2959u_001:1517: āśrayādisiddhyanusāreṇa kriyātantriṇaḥ kramaśaḥ kāyasiddhidravyasiddhisaṁbhogasiddhīnāṁ bhāgino bhavanti |
T16n2959u_001:1518: etat siddhi- prāptyai mantrajapasaṁkhyāpūrto satyāmeva sādhanācaryā vidhātavyā, nānyathā |
T16n2959u_001:1519: sādhanācaryāyā niyamadvayam- sāmānyasādhanāyāṁ kālatraye sveṣṭadevasya savidhi pūjārcanāpāpadeśanābhyarthanāpariṇāmanādikaṁ sampādanīyam |
T16n2959u_001:1521: evaṁ sādhanāyāṁ svasamakṣaṁ sthāpitayā mūrtyā stūpādinā vā ābhāprakaṭīkaraṇam,
T16n2959u_001:1522: sādhanāyāṁ kṣutpipāsādīnāmabhāvaḥ śarīrasfūrtiḥ svapne iṣṭadeva-darśanamityetat sādhanāsiddhilakṣaṇāni |
T16n2959u_001:1525: khecarādiśuddhakṣetraṁ gatvā aṁjanādikaṁ saṁsevya caryāḥ ācaryyeran,
T16n2959u_001:1527: svadehasya sūkṣmatvaṁ vidhāya īśvarasya aṣṭau guṇāḥ prāptavyāḥ |
T16n2959u_001:1528: siddhicaryā kriyātantrasya sādhanāvidheḥ siddhicaryānusāraṁ caryāṁ vidhāya sādhakaḥ yathecchaṁ siddhiṁ labdhumarhati |
T16n2959u_001:1529: uparyuktaṁ yad bodhicittotpādābhāve anayaiva sādhanayā śrāvakapadaṁ lokalokottara-sarvavidhahīnamadhyamādhamasiddhīṁśca prāptuṁ pārayati |
T16n2959u_001:1533: kriyātantrasādhanānusāreṇa buddhatvaprāptyai aṣṭakalpānāṁ kalpatrayasya vā kālo vyatyeti |
T16n2959u_001:1534: sādhakasya tīvraprayāsena ekasmin janmanyapi paramapadaprāptyuktistu mañjuśrīmūlakalpādikriyātantragrantheṣu vihitā'sti |
T16n2959u_001:1535: kriyātantre pañca mārgā daśa bhūmayaśca kriyātantrānusāraṁ pañcamārgāṇāṁ daśabhūmīnāṁ ca vyākhyāvyavasthā ittham - 1. kriyātantrābhiṣekaprāptyanantaraṁ sādhako'haṁ kriyātantrasādhanāyāḥ samyaksambodhiṁ prāpsyāmi 'ityetadakṛtrimābhilāṣotpattimārabhya dhvanyantaḥ sthādhyānabhāvanābalena śūnyatābodhakavipaśyanāyāḥ sākṣātkārapūrvavartimārgaḥ kriyātantrasya saṁbhāramārgaḥ ucayate |
T16n2959u_001:1536: 2. vipaśyanotpādamārabhya śamathavipaśyanāyugalabhāvanayā śūnyatāsākṣātkārapūrvāvasthā mārgaśca prayogamārgaḥ samabhidhīyate |
T16n2959u_001:1537: 3. vipaśyanāsamādhidvārā śūnyatāṁ sākṣātkṛtya bhāvanāmārgeṇa praheyadharmasya mahākleśāvaraṇasya sthūlāṁśapratipakṣotpattimārgaḥ darśanamārgaḥ ( pramuditā bhūmiḥ ) udyate |
T16n2959u_001:1538: 4. bhāvanāmārgeṇa praheyadharmamahākleśāvaraṇasya sthūlāṁśapratipakṣotpattimārabhya sūkṣmātisūkṣmāvaraṇākṣayāt buddhatvaprāpakavajrāsanākhyasamādheḥ pūrvakṣaṇāvasthā bhāvanāmārgaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:1541: kleśāvaraṇasya sthūlamadhyamasūkṣmabhedāḥ tadvadeva madhyamāvaraṇasya sūkṣmāvaraṇasya ca krameṇa trayastrayo bhedāḥ evaṁ navabhedāḥ bhavanti ye ca bhūmi-praheyadharmāḥ nigadyante |
T16n2959u_001:1542: etannavakleśāvaraṇeṣu svabhūmijñeyāvaraṇeṣu ca naṣṭeṣu satsu kramaśaḥ sādhakena uparitanabhūmayo labhyante |
T16n2959u_001:1544: upasaṁhāraḥ jñānasamuccaye kriyātantrasādhakāyoktaṁ - tatra svadehe devakāyasya bhāvanā'bhāvo'sti |
T16n2959u_001:1546: jonaṅ je cuna- prabhṛtayo'tra svadehe devakāyabhāvanā'bhāvaṁ svīkurvanti |
T16n2959u_001:1547: ācārya coṅkhāpāprabhṛtividvadbhiḥ kriyātantre svadehe devakāyabhāvanāpaddhatiḥ svīkṛtā'sti |
T16n2959u_001:1548: etasya ca samarthane naikānyāgamavacāṁsi yuktayaśca prādīyanta |
T16n2959u_001:1549: ācāryakarmāṭhinalas prabhṛtibhiḥ kriyātantrasādhakasya pradhānāpradhāneti staradvayamabhimatam bhaṇitañcāpi pradhānasādhakaḥ svadehe devatāṁ bhāvayati |
T16n2959u_001:1550: aparaśca svasammukhaṁ devatāṁ bhāvayitvā mantraṁ japati |
T16n2959u_001:1551: ayameva caramapakṣaḥ susaṅgataḥ pratīyate yataśca kriyātantrasya naikeṣu prāmāṇikagrantheṣu svadehe devabhāvanāyāḥ sattvam asattvaṁ vobhayaṁ prācuryeṇa labhyate |
T16n2959u_001:1552: ata ekasya viśiṣṭamarthaṁ kṛtvā vyākhyānaṁ kiyaducitamiti duḥśakam |
T16n2959u_001:1553: sāmānyavicāreṇāpi pratīyate pāramitānayasya vacanenānena - buddhāśca bodhisatvāśca sarvatrāvyāhatekṣaṇāḥ |
T16n2959u_001:1555: 'yaḥ sādhako'tyabhilaṣati tatsammukhaṁ sadā śāstā'vatiṣṭhate' etadāśayaṁ yo'tyantamabhiniveśapūrvakaṁ dhārayati,
T16n2959u_001:1556: kriyātantravidhau tatpravartanāya iṣṭadevaṁ svasammukhamāhūya pūjārcanābhāvanāyāḥ vyavasthāvidhānamanucitaṁ na bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:1557: anyataśca svadehe devabhāvanā'tyantābhāvo'pyasvīkāryaḥ yataśca evamabhimatyā pāramitānayād mantranayasya kimapi vaiśiṣṭyaṁ na syāt |
T16n2959u_001:1558: rūpakāyasyopādānakārakābhāvo'pi syāt tataśca atra falasya mārgīkaraṇamapi na syāt |
T16n2959u_001:1559: ārya- asaṁgaracitamaitreyasādhanāyāṁ bhikṣuṇīśrīdevīviracitaikādaśānanasādhanāyāṁ candragomiracitatārāsādhanāyāṁ svadehe devatvaṁ bhāvayituṁ coktam |
T16n2959u_001:1561: ataḥ uparyuktapaddhatyavalokanena pratīyate kriyātantre svadehe- devabhāvanākaraṇākaraṇayoḥ vidhidvayameva prāpyate kasyāpyekasya pakṣasya nyāyasaṅgatipratipādanamapi nocitaṁ pratibhāti |
T16n2959u_001:1566: dīpaṅkaraśrījñānenāpi bodhipathapradīpasya svavṛttau pratipāditaṁ sarvā dhāraṇyaḥ kriyātantre saṁgṛhyante |
T16n2959u_001:1567: ato'yamatra praśnaḥ - prāyaḥ dhāraṇīsaṁgraheṣu sādhanāvidhirna bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:1569: etat samādhayatā buddhaguhyena subāhuparipṛcchāsūtravyākhyāyāmucyete nikhilakriyātantrasādhanāṁ praveśacaryā-prayogacaryā-sādhanāsiddhicaryā-siddhicaryākhyacaturaṅgeṣu saṁgṛhya sādhanā karaṇīyā |
T16n2959u_001:1570: yeṣu grantheṣu samagravidhirna pratipādi- tastatra dhyānottaratantrasusiddhitantrasubāhu paripṛcchāsūtratantrāṇyādhārīkṛtya caryeta |
T16n2959u_001:1574: guhyasāmānyatantra-susiddhitantra-subāhuparipṛcchāsūtradhyānottaratantreṣu kramaśaḥ pūrvavartiguhyasāmānyatantraṁ bṛhatkāyaṁ dhyānottaratantraṁ ca laghukāyagrantharatnam |
T16n2959u_001:1578: etadatiriktaṁ caryātantrasya yogasyānuttarayogatantrasya ca maṇḍalābhiṣekayoḥ prathamadivase sampatsyamānādhivāsamaṇḍalānāṁ vidhirapyualabhyate
T16n2959u_001:1626: ayaṁ ca ekajīvanānantaraṁ bodhipadaprāpako bodhisattvo vartate |
T16n2959u_001:1628: dhyānottaratantraṁ hi mahākriyātantroṣṇīṣatantrasyaikaḥ aṁśaḥ ata evedamuttaratantramucyate |
T16n2959u_001:1630: atra prāṇāyāmo'pi vyamarśi granthaśca tripaṁcāśat ślokeṣu nibaddho'yam |
T16n2959u_001:1632: buddhaguhyena dhyānottaratantrasya subāhuparipṛcchāsūtrasya ca sāragarbhitā vyākhyā vyadhāyi sūtrasya śabdārthayoḥ sāmānyarūparekhā cāpyalekhi
T16n2959u_001:1635: tṛtīyaḥ paricchedaḥ caryātantram caryātantrābhyudayaḥ dīpaṅkaraśrījñānena bodhipathapradīpasya svavṛttau caryātantrasya vairocanābhisambodhitantra-vajrāaṇyabhiṣekatantraprabhṛtīni aṣṭasahasrāṇi tantrāṇi pratyapādyanta |
T16n2959u_001:1639: anyavidvatsu śākyasampradāyasya ḍodgona-chosagyala-fagasapāprabhṛtayaḥ kriyātantre svadehe devakāyabhāvanā'bhāvammanyante |
T16n2959u_001:1647: viśeṣataśca caryātantrāsādhāraṇavairocanābhisaṁbodhitantrasya deśanā bhagavataḥ vairocanasya kusumatalagarbhālaṅkāravyūhākhye buddhatattvaprāptisthāne kṛtā |
T16n2959u_001:1648: etatsambandhe vajrapāṇya-bhiṣekatantrasya nidānaparivarte kathitaṁ yadidaṁ kṣetram anantasaṁsāradhātuṁ nirdiśati |
T16n2959u_001:1653: arthāt bhagavadvairocanena buddhatvātpūrvaṁ bodhisattvānāṁ caryayā pariśodhitaṁ sampūrṇakṣetrameva kusumatalagarbhālaṅkāravyūhakṣetram evocyate
T16n2959u_001:1655: tatkṣetre yathākāśe sūryaprakāśe prasṛte sati ākāśa prakāśābhinnau bhavatastathaivādvayabhāvasthito mahāvairocano buddhaḥ satvebhyaḥ kāyasamatāsthitanāmadharmaparyāyaṁ,
T16n2959u_001:1657: kāyavākcittānāmagādhatvena bhagavato vairocanasya kāyavākcittāni sarvabhūmiṣu praveśārhāṇi |
T16n2959u_001:1658: itthamasminneva kṣetre vajrapāṇinā bhagavān vairocanaḥ pṛṣṭastadāsya tantraśāstrasya saptaskandheṣu caturviṁśatiparivarteṣu ca vibhaṅgaṁ kṛtvā diśyate |
T16n2959u_001:1685: buddhasya pūrvajanmani bodhisatvarūpeṇodbhavakāle brāhyaṇairagnibhedaviṣaye pṛṣṭe sati vedapratipādita-catuścatvāriṁśadagnibhedānāṁ buddhatvasyāvāptyā dvādaśāgniṣu pūrvagamanena homavidhirapi gaṇitaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:1697: mahākarūṇodbhūtyā saha guhyamaṇḍalaṁ praviśya tathāgatādhiṣṭhito vidhiḥ |
T16n2959u_001:1698: tantrasyāsya viṣaye bustonakathanānusāramidamapūrṇam yato'sya nāmnā samuddhṛtānyanekāni vacāṁsi śāstre pratipādyante |
T16n2959u_001:1700: ( 2 ) acalamahākrodharājatantram etad deśanāviṣaye granthe'sminneva kathitaṁ bhagavatā vāyumaṇḍale vibhinnaratnairalaṅkṛtavimāne anantavyūhaiḥ paripūrṇe anantapuṇyebhyaḥ samutpannasiṁhāsane sthitvā vajrapāṇibodhisatvāvalokiteśvaramaitreya-śāriputra-maud-galyāyanādiśrāvakaiḥ paripūrṇaiḥ brahyaviṣṇuprabhṛtibhiḥ saha viharatā mahākarūṇayā preritena satā cittena etat tantramupadiśyate |
T16n2959u_001:1701: ( 3 ) nīlāmbaravajrapātālatantram etaddeśanā bhagavatā saptapātālakramasthita-nāgaloke vajrapāṇinā saha viharatā svapādābhyāṁ prakāśapuñjaṁ saṁsforya nāga-ānanda-upānandādinṛpān nāgāṁścāvarjya taddamanaṁ vidhāya tadabhiṣicya etattantramadiśyata |
T16n2959u_001:1710: ( 4 ) nīlāmbaratrilokavinayatantram tantramidaṁ bhagavatā sumerūparvatasya dakṣiṇa-laṁkāvatītyākhye prāsāde viharatā'nantāsurebhyaḥ devebhyaḥ vajrapāṇiprabhṛtibhyaḥ samupādiśyata |
T16n2959u_001:1716: nidānaparicchedāvalokanāt pratīyate sādhakaḥ śraddhābhaktisādhanānāṁ balena tattvaṁ sākṣātkṛtya tathāgatena saha saralasambandhaṁ sthāpayitumarhati
T16n2959u_001:1717: praśnaṁ kṛtvā tadādhārīkṛtya granthaṁ praṇetuṁ śaknoti |
T16n2959u_001:1720: etena suspaṣṭaṁ bhavati yajjagataḥ kasminnapi koṇe kenāpi sādhakena dhyāna-bhāvanāyāṁ kṛtāyāṁ satyāṁ tathāgataḥ prakaṭībhūya taṁ diśati |
T16n2959u_001:1721: caryātantrasvarūpam bāhyasnānādiśuddhyā saheṣṭadevaṁ bhāvayitvā'bhyantaradhyānasyāpi caryāvidhāyakaḥ sādhakaḥ caryātantravān kathyate |
T16n2959u_001:1722: jñānasamuccaye caryātantrasvarūpaṁ suspaṣṭayatā bhagavatā'bhāṇi-ṣaḍdevatattvānāṁ bhāvanāvidhinā kāyavākcittaśuddhyarthaṁ vibhinnacaryāvidhīnām anuśīlanam kriyātantre varṇitakarmamudrādevyā saha hāsyādikriyābhiḥ sukhānubhūtipūrvakaṁ dhyānaṁ ,
T16n2959u_001:1724: caryātantre prādhānyena svakāyaṁ buddhakāye dṛṣṭvā kāyādhiṣṭhānaṁ tvaritaṁ sādhakaḥ prāpnoti,
T16n2959u_001:1725: mantrarūpeṇa svavacāṁsi bhāvayitvā vāgadhiṣṭhānaṁ nijacite jñānasvarūpaṁ bhāvayitvā cittādhiṣṭhānaṁ ca labhate |
T16n2959u_001:1726: svayamapi devarūpeṇa bhāvanayā svadehaṁ prati abhiniveśamohau kṣīyete,
T16n2959u_001:1728: arthāt falasya mārgarūpeṇa bhāvanayā puṇyadvaya- paripūrtirbhavati |
T16n2959u_001:1729: paṭacitrādāviṣṭadevaṁ bhāvayitvā ārādhanādyapekṣayā svadehaṁ devakāyarūpeṇa parivartya bhāvanākaraṇād drutaṁ sambhāradvayaṁ saṁcīyate |
T16n2959u_001:1736: koṅṭularinapochemahodayasya matānusārametat kāyavāk-cittākhye trikule'pi vibhājayituṁ śakyam |
T16n2959u_001:1737: yathā ca tathāgatakulaṁ hi kāyakulaṁ vidyate,
T16n2959u_001:1741: sāmānyataḥ sarve tathāgatāḥ kulāni ca tattvataḥ abhinnānyeva,
T16n2959u_001:1743: yathā caikaḥ sādhakaḥ bhagavacchākyamuneḥ rūpākṛtī citte samālambya dhyāyate tathā rūpākāraṁ sākṣātkurūte |
T16n2959u_001:1744: evameva siṁhalīyajanāḥ ātmavaddevamūrtiṁ nirmānti tathaiva cīna-jāpāna-tibbatadeśīyā ātmarūpākārarūpeṇaiva |
T16n2959u_001:1746: vajrapāṇyabhiṣekatantre'pi yaḥ kulaputraḥ maṇḍalaṁ praviśya mantracaryāṅkaroti tad vāgatiriktammano nāsti manaso'tiriktā vāgapi na ,
T16n2959u_001:1755: caryātantreṣvapi kriyātantravacchāntipuṣṭiraudrakarmaṇāṁ saṁsiddhyai bhāgatraye kulaṁ vyabhāji |
T16n2959u_001:1757: yathā tathāgatakule vairocanā-calau akṣobhyo vā vajrakule ca vajrapāṇirnīlāmbaraśca svīkṛtāḥ santi |
T16n2959u_001:1759: ataḥ kriyātantramatiricyāsmin kulasya pṛthag bhedā na bhavanti |
T16n2959u_001:1760: kriyātantracaryātantrayoryadyapi pañca kulabhedāḥ kartum sambhāvyante paraṁ ca tantradvayasya sādhakasiddheḥ kulatraye saṁgṛhītattvāt kulasya bhedatraya-meva yujyate |
T16n2959u_001:1761: ḍogonachosajñala fagasapākhyaḥ ācāryaḥ sāmānyacaryātantre tathāgatakula-granthaṁ vairocanābhisambodhitantraṁ,
T16n2959u_001:1764: paṇḍitapuṇyakīrtimatena hayagrīvatantraṁ padyakulasya granthaḥ yo hi tibbatībhāṣāyām anūdito'bhūt |
T16n2959u_001:1765: bustonaḥ kriyātantrasamaṁ caryātantramabhimanyate ataścaryātantraṁ pṛthag vyākhyāyina tena |
T16n2959u_001:1771: 1 . praveśacaryā praveśacaryāyāḥ punaḥ dvau bhedau- bāhyapraveśaḥ abhiṣekavidhirvā,
T16n2959u_001:1776: jñāna-tilake'pyuktaṁ-caryātantrasādhakena kriyātantrasya sarvābhiṣekeṣu vajraghaṇṭānāmābhiṣekāḥ prāptavyāḥ arthāt jalapaṭavajraghaṇṭānāmābhiṣekāḥ prāptavyāḥ bhavanti |
T16n2959u_001:1778: ayamabhiṣekaḥ bhavacakrabījaṁ prakṣālayati prathamapramuditābhūmita ārabhya dharmameghākhyadaśamabhūmiparyantaṁ sādhakaṁ sampreṣya buddhatvaṁ prāpayati |
T16n2959u_001:1779: paṭābhiṣekād dvātriṁśad lakṣaṇānyaśītyanuvyañjanāni labhyante ghaṇṭābhiṣekāt ṣaṣṭibrahyasvarāṅgānāṁ prāptirbhavati vajrābhiṣekācca yathāvadyāvadjñānaprāptimārgasya sopānamudghaṭate |
T16n2959u_001:1781: prapañcamaṇḍale mṛṇmayaṁ niṣprapañce ca cittamaṇḍalaṁ svīkṛtamāste abhiṣekāvāptipūrvaṁ maṇḍalapraveśakāle abhiṣekāvāptyanantaraṁ tāsu tisṛṣvavasthāsu trividhasamayānāṁ saṁvarāṇāñca pālanamāvaśyakam |
T16n2959u_001:1783: atra ca caryātantra-sādhakasya sāmānyato'nivāryarūpeṇa pālanīyānāṁ samayasaṁvarāṇāṁ saṅketamātraṁ nirdiśyate |
T16n2959u_001:1787: abhiṣekaprāptyanantaraṁ sādhakena caryātantrasya yathārthasādhanāyāṁ salakṣaṇanirlakṣaṇarūpa-devayogasya bhāvanā satataṁ karaṇīyā bhavati,
T16n2959u_001:1790: sahaiva ca samayasaṁvarāṇāṁ vināśo mā bhūt,
T16n2959u_001:1802: bāhyabhyantarasnānādinā śuddhībhūya rakṣācakraṁ ca bhāvayitvā sveṣṭadevamāvāhayet |
T16n2959u_001:1808: svadehaṁ ca mantreṇādhiṣṭhāya devarūpeṇa taddhayānaṁ lakṣaṇadeva ucyate |
T16n2959u_001:1811: ( kha ) bāhyaviśeṣasādhanāvidhiḥ vairocanābhisambodhitantre vajrapāṇinā tathāgatavairocanaḥ pṛcchyate- he bhagavan |
T16n2959u_001:1812: yaḥ sādhako devarūpānvitaḥ san devarūpaṁ vāvalambya caryāṅkaroti,
T16n2959u_001:1828: devasyaitadantimarūpadvayasya prayojanam- falasya salakṣaṇarūpatvaṁ nirlakṣaṇarūpatvaṁ ca |
T16n2959u_001:1829: ( 2 ) ābhyantarasāmānyasādhanāvidhiḥ vairocanābhisaṁbodhitantre bodhisattvavajrapāṇinā guhyamantrasya sādhanā kathaṁ kriyeta evaṁ bhagavati pṛṣṭe sati,
T16n2959u_001:1830: bhagavatā etānyeva catvāryaṅgāni pratipādayatā siddhyarthaṁ daśalakṣamitamantrajapo nirdiśyate |
T16n2959u_001:1831: ataḥ pūrvakarmasāmānyavidhiṁ samāpya paramārtha-bodhicittasvarūpeṇa saṁvṛtyābhāsacandramaṇḍalaṁ dhyeyam |
T16n2959u_001:1834: bījākṣaraṁ candramaṇḍalaṁ ca pariṇataṁ sat svadehe devarūpeṇa prakaṭimiti vicāraṇīyam |
T16n2959u_001:1836: iṣṭadevasya hṛdayakamale sthāpitabījākṣare mano nidhāya prāṇāyāmaṁ vidadhyāt |
T16n2959u_001:1837: prāṇāyāmābhiprāyaṁ bodhayitvā vairocanābhisambodhitantre nirūpitaṁ prāṇāśca vāyurapānaṁ ca smṛtirasti |
T16n2959u_001:1838: śarīre vāyupraveśamārgaṁ niyantrya mantre manasa ekāgratvaṁ hi smṛtiyuktaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:1839: yāvanna devābhāsastāvat prāṇāyāmaṁ kurvan mantraṁ japet |
T16n2959u_001:1844: tataśca prakāśasya sfuraṇena saṁharaṇavidhinā ca svārthaparārthasiddhiḥ dhyātavyā |
T16n2959u_001:1845: tadanantaraṁ bījākṣaratvena pariṇatasya pītavarṇasya ekamukhasya bhujayugalasya dhyānamudrāyām uṣṇīṣe pāe ca cakrālaṁkṛtadvātriṁśadlakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanaiḥ paripūrṇa-cīvarāṇi dhārayamāṇasya śvetakamalacandramaṇḍalayorūpari virājamānasya buddhadevasyaiva mama svarūpam,
T16n2959u_001:1847: tadanu hṛdayakamale punaśca candramaṇḍale bījākṣare vairocanasya bhāvanā karaṇīyā |
T16n2959u_001:1848: tataśca tadhṛdayakamale candramaṇḍalabījamantre nyasya prāṇāyāmadvārā mantraṁ japet |
T16n2959u_001:1852: ( ka ) sāmānyam svahṛdayakamale ( svayam iṣṭadevaṁ bhāvanāviṣayībhūtaṁ kṛtvā )
T16n2959u_001:1854: tataśca devadavyoḥ parasparam īkṣaṇaṁ hasanātmakaṁ svarūpaṁ dhyātvā rāga-mārgīkaraṇavidhānena saha viṣaye ( śūnyatāyām )
T16n2959u_001:1856: ( kha ) viśeṣaḥ skandhādiṣu catuṣkoṭivatyā-mādhyamikayuktyā ajātānirūddhādiguṇasahitāṁ catuṣkoṭiniṣprapañcatāṁ buddhvā tattve sthitirapekṣyate
T16n2959u_001:1857: ye ca sattvā etattathyādaparicitā stathā'nenaiva kāraṇena nānāduḥkhāni anubhavanti tān dṛṣṭvā karūṇayā dravībhūtaḥ san anugrahītumicched arthāt yuktibhiḥ vastu-niḥsvabhāvatāṁ pratipādya pravarteta,
T16n2959u_001:1858: tadanu ca tattve yathāsaṁbhavaṁ sthitiḥ antataḥ samādherūtthitiḥ,
T16n2959u_001:1866: paramārthataḥ śūnyatābhāvanā saṁvṛtito devarūpā ca bhāvanaiva dharmakāyasaṁbhogakāyaprāpteḥ pradhānamupādānam |
T16n2959u_001:1871: 3. sādhanāsiddhicaryā mantrajapasya pūrṇatāyāṁ satyāṁ sādhakaḥ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇasiddhīnāṁ prāptyadhikārī bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:1878: samānyasādhanākāle svapna iṣṭadevābhāsaḥ iṣṭadevamaṇḍalasya pūjārcanaṁ svapnādyavekṣaṇamapi sādhanāyāḥ śubhalakṣaṇaṁ manyate |
T16n2959u_001:1879: kramaśaḥ pariṣkṛtyā sākṣād iṣṭadevasya darśanena sāmānyāsāmānyasarvavidhasiddhayaḥ prāpyante |
T16n2959u_001:1881: 4. siddhicaryā siddhicaryayā mṛdvindriyo janaḥ aṣṭakalpeṣu nūnameva samyaksambodhiṁ labhate |
T16n2959u_001:1886: paṇḍitapuṇyakīrti-mahodayenāpi caryātantraṁ samayasaṁvaratantragranthaṁ yāvat kulabhedamātraṁ ca niradhāri |
T16n2959u_001:1890: kriyātantravadeva caryātantramapi kulānusāreṇa tathāgatakulapadyakulavajrakulākhye bhāgatraye vibhajyate |
T16n2959u_001:1891: sādhanāpaddhatau caturañgayuktabhāvanāvidhiḥ yadyapi kriyātantrasamāna eva paraṁ ca caryātantrasya bhāvanāvidhiḥ kriyātantrāpekṣayā bhṛśaṁ pariṣkṛto'sti
T16n2959u_001:1893: yathā ca kriyātantre svadehe devakāyasya bhāvanāyāṁ satyāmasatyāṁ matabhedaḥ kintvatra nirvivādaṁ svadehe devakāyasya bhāvanā-vidherāvaśyakatvaṁ pratyapādi |
T16n2959u_001:1894: svasammukhaṁ ca dhyeya iṣṭadeve jñānadevamāhūya vilīnatvasyāpi paddhatiḥ prākāśi |
T16n2959u_001:1895: sādhaneyameva salakṣaṇadevayoga-nirlakṣaṇadevayogeti nāmnā vijñāyate yā ca kriyātantrāpekṣayā sūkṣmā |
T16n2959u_001:1896: salakṣaṇadevayogasya tātparyantu svayam iṣṭadevaṁ bhāvayitvā pūrvoktacaturavayavayuktaṁ sat mantrajapavidhānam |
T16n2959u_001:1897: atraivaṁ vijñeyaṁ yat sādhakaḥ svayam iṣṭadevarūpeṇa kathaṁ pariṇato bhavet?
T16n2959u_001:1898: yathā asmākaṁ skandhaḥ yaśca pañcamahābhūtairvinirmitaḥ naikatattvānāṁ saṁghātamātraḥ,
T16n2959u_001:1901: paraṁ ca tad hetupratyayānāmupalabdhau niḥsvabhāvatayā'pi ādarśe pratibimbitatattvamiva prabhavati |
T16n2959u_001:1903: yathā śūnyatāsvarūpeṇa vastūni āvirbhavanti tathā ātmanā devatvāvirbhāvena,
T16n2959u_001:1904: gurūpradattābhiṣekeṇa ca iṣṭadevaśaktyadhiṣṭhānādinā pratītyasamutpannavidhinā sādhakaḥ iṣṭadevatvena prakaṭībhavati |
T16n2959u_001:1905: ataḥ etat sthiteḥ pūrva iṣṭadevaḥ evaṁ bhāvanīyo yadahameveṣṭadevaḥ,
T16n2959u_001:1907: evam iṣṭadevabhāvanayā mantrajapakāryameva atra salakṣaṇayogaḥ ucyate |
T16n2959u_001:1910: viśleṣaṇena yathā rūpādidharmāṇāṁ kā'pi sattā na tiṣṭhati tathaiveṣṭadevakāyasattā'pi na tathā ca svacittaṁ kālatrayarahitaṁ sarvalakṣaṇeṣu nirvikalpasthitiṁ prāpnoti,
T16n2959u_001:1913: kecid vidvāṁsaḥ śūnyatābodhānantaraṁ kṛtadevabhāvanāṁ nirlakṣaṇabhāvanāṁ tadabhāvaṁ tadabhāvaṁ ca salakṣaṇa-bhāvanāṁ manvate |
T16n2959u_001:1914: yathā śūnyatāsākṣātkaraṇānantaraṁ tacchūnyatābodhake citte prabala-prajñotpatyā sahaiva dānasampādanam,
T16n2959u_001:1918: yathā bodhicittamutpādya tatkṣaṇameva śūnyatāyāṁ samāhitatve sati samāhitāvasthāyāṁ bodhicittapravāhāstitvamurarīkriyate tathaivātrāpi śūnyatājñānasya pravāhe devabhāvanā,
T16n2959u_001:1920: evaṁ vidhā vyavasthā pāramitānaye tu sambhāvyate paraṁ ca tantreṣu na saṁbhāvyate |
T16n2959u_001:1921: gurūvarācārya-chulaṭhimo'pi prajñopāyasya yuganaddhasvarūpaṁ spaṣṭayan kathayāmāsa- 'yathā kasyāścin-māturekākiputrasya mṛtyau atyantaṁ duḥkhamanubhūyate,
T16n2959u_001:1922: tathāpi sā tadanubhavavedanādinā saha sarvāmapi dinacaryāṁ sampādayati tadvadeva śūnyatāpreritadānādisampādanam pāramitānayasya prajñopāyādvayāvasthocyate
T16n2959u_001:1923: ataḥ pāramitānayānusāreṇa evaṁ vyākhyā nūnammānyā paraṁ ca vajrayānānusāreṇa amānyaiva |
T16n2959u_001:1929: evaṁ ca tadāśritā nirālambakarūṇā ca advayabhāve tathaiva avatiṣṭhete yathā ca dīpakālokau |
T16n2959u_001:1930: tathāgatakāyastasya ca niḥ- svabhāvatā'rthāt prajñopāyādvayabhāvanaiva nirlakṣaṇadevabhāvanā'sti |
T16n2959u_001:1933: paraṁ ca yogatantrānuttaratantrayoḥ pañcābhisambodhibhiḥ prāṇāyāmena caitat sūkṣmaprāṇacittopāyena samutpādya bhāvyate |
T16n2959u_001:1935: caturthaḥ paricchedaḥ yogatantram yogatantrasyābhyudayaḥ 1.tattvasaṁgrahaḥ- padyavajratathāgatena tattvasaṁgrahasya tantrārthāvatārākhyaṭīkāyāṁ yogatantradeśanāvidhiṁ spaṣṭayatā samullikhyate - sāmānyato bhagavān svaparārthahetubodhi-cittotpādadvārā āvaraṇānāṁ kṣayāt puṇyasaṁbhārajñānasaṁbhārābhyāṁ paripūrṇatayā vajrakāyaṁ prāpyākāśavat sarvatattveṣu vyāpto nirālambanirvikalpasvarūpeṇāvatiṣṭhate |
T16n2959u_001:1936: īdṛśa-sthitāvapi bodhicaryāsaṁpādanakālikasaṁskārāṇāmarthāt-prāṇināṁ hitāya kṛtāyāḥ pratijñāyāḥ vaśībhūtaḥ san sambhoganirmāṇakāyatvenāvirbhūya satvahitaṁ vidadhāti |
T16n2959u_001:1937: tena sattvānāmadhyādeśānusāraṁ kramaśaḥ yugapadubhayarūpeṇa dharmaḥ diśyate |
T16n2959u_001:1945: mahāyogatantratattvasaṁgrahasya deśanāṁ tathāgataḥ saṁbhogakāyadvārā devaloke cakre tataśca kramaśo jambudvīpe cakāra |
T16n2959u_001:1950: etadādau tattvārthaṁ spaṣṭayatā'nena tattvasaṁgrahasya tāni saptatriṁśat tattvāṅgāni gaṇitāni |
T16n2959u_001:1990: buddhaguhyakathanaṁ yat - etāni saptatriṁśat tattvāni punaḥ hṛdayamudrāmantreṣu vidyātattveṣu ca saṁgrahītuṁ śakyante |
T16n2959u_001:2029: tadanu viśeṣeṇa tatpadaprāptyupāyena sākaṁ laukikalokottarasiddhīnāṁ prāptimārgo'pi samavarṇyata |
T16n2959u_001:2031: yadā tathāgatakula-mātraṁ prayujyate tadānīṁ vairocanakulikabodhisattvebhya eva bhavati na tu catuḥ kulabodhi-sattvebhyaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:2032: tantrasyāsya prathamāṅge tathāgatakulānāṁ sambaddhamārgaḥ pratipāditaḥ tathaiva dvitīye'ṅge vajrakulamarthāt akṣobhyakulaṁ tṛtīye ca padyakulaṁ caturthe ca sarvaprāṇihetusiddhidaṁ ratnakulaṁ pratyapādyata |
T16n2959u_001:2034: prāṇināmartha-sampattikartṛ ratnakulaṁ kāryasampādakaṁ karmakulaṁ arthāt amoghasiddhiḥ |
T16n2959u_001:2040: yat yogatantrasya ye sādhakāḥ ābhyantarayogasya sādhanāyāma-sāmarthyaṁ budhyante tebhyaḥ japapūjādibāhyacaryā vihitāḥ |
T16n2959u_001:2041: mūlatantrasya caturaṅgeṣu yallaukikasiddhiprāptimārgasya vyavasthā'spaṣṭā'pūrṇā ca tadapi spaṣṭīkṛtyātra pūritam |
T16n2959u_001:2042: atra yogatantrasyopavibhāga uttaratantrasambandhe praśno'yaṁ samudbhavati kiṁ yogatantrasya ekaḥ pakṣaḥ kriyātantraṁ kathayiṣyate |
T16n2959u_001:2044: etaduttaramapyasti- yat sāmānyacatustantrāṇāṁ sthūlaprasthānātmako bhedo'sti paraṁ caitad mithaḥ virodhābhāso'śakyaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:2045: yathā guhyasamājasya vineyajanaṁ spaṣṭayatā candrakīrtimahodayenocyate- yaḥ sādhakaḥ utpattikramapūrṇatāprāptyanantaraṁ sādhāraṇasiddhiṁ labdhuṁ na prayasati niṣpannakramaṁ bhāvayan paramapadāvāptyai caiva prayatate īdṛśaḥ sādhakaḥ ratnasadṛśaṁ yogyatāpātramucyate |
T16n2959u_001:2046: yena sādhakena utpattikrame dākṣyam upalabhya sādhāraṇasiddhiprāptyai prayasyate sa adhamapuṇḍarīkaḥ ākhyāyyate |
T16n2959u_001:2047: yathā cātra pradhānagaṇasādhakau samupalabdhau stastathaiva yogatantre cāpi sthitiḥ |
T16n2959u_001:2049: tantrasya bhāgacatuṣṭaye ekasmā eva sādhakāya vairocanādeḥ paramapadaprāptimārgo varṇito'sti vibhinnacaturvidhasādhakānāṁ sādhyamārgo vā varṇito'sti?
T16n2959u_001:2050: etasya suspaṣṭamuttaraṁ paramādyatantre itthaṁ varṇitaṁ - pañcatathāgatasādhanā- vidhāyakeṣu yasmin trividhaṁ ( kāmamohakrodhākhyaṁ )
T16n2959u_001:2051: samānarūpeṇa vidyate tebhyo mahārāgibhyaśca prathamabhāgo'rthāt dharmadhātumaṇḍalam,
T16n2959u_001:2056: ācāryakunagā ñiṅapo mahodayo'pi sāmānyalaghutantre prāyastādṛśīmeva vārtām acakathat-sādhakaḥ svayaṁ kimapi nirṇayaṅkartumasamarthaḥ san yathā yathā gurūnupalabhya teṣāmupadeśānanusaran kadācidrāgayuktamadhvānaṁ kvaciddveṣayuktamapi bāhyaśuddhiprabhṛtimapi dharmaṁ matvā caryāḥ sampādayati tadyathāvanmārge praveśayituṁ buddhena yogatantramupadidiśe |
T16n2959u_001:2057: yathā ca ( 1 ) yogatantrasya prathamabhāge rāgiṇāmanugrahāya devānāṁ varṇābharaṇaparidhānāni lohitavarṇatvena darśayatā prādhānyena rāgibhyaḥ sādhanāvidhiḥ pratyapādi |
T16n2959u_001:2060: ( 3 ) sakalajagadvineyabhāge mohapradhānasādhakānugrahāya devānāṁ śvetaśāntasvabhāvaparidhānābhūṣaṇādīnāṁ śvetatvaṁ pradarśitam |
T16n2959u_001:2061: ( 4 ) caturthabhāge samānarūpeṇa doṣatrayayuktasādhakāya devānāṁ varṇo'pi citra-vicitravarṇasvabhāve ābharaṇaparidhānānyapi naikaprakārakāṇyadarśyanta
T16n2959u_001:2064: ādarśajñānasamatāġyānapratyavekṣaṇajñānakṛtyānuṣṭhānajñāneṣu ca bodhicittadānapāramitāprajñāpāramitā-vīryapāramitānāṁ prādhānyaṁ kramaśaḥ bhāgacatuṣṭaye sahaiva saṁyojya vyākhyāyi |
T16n2959u_001:2065: kulānusāreṇa 1 . prathamabhāgīyā devāstathāgatasya candramaṇḍalahṛdayādutpannāḥ 2. dvitīyabhāgasya devāḥ vajrakulikāḥ |
T16n2959u_001:2067: bhāgasyāsya sarvadevāḥ avalokiteśvarasya cittavajreṇa nirmīyante sarvadevānāñcāyudhāni padyavajramālāpadyavajrapaṭaprabhṛtīni bhavanti |
T16n2959u_001:2070: yadyapi devāḥ svayaṁ krodharūpā bhinnarūpā vā na bhavanti yataśca paramapadāvasthā paramaśāntasyaiva bhavati,
T16n2959u_001:2072: yathā ca tattvasaṁgrahe- aho mahopāyamahaṁ buddhānāṁ karūṇātmanām |
T16n2959u_001:2075: nāyametadabhiprāyaḥ yad ekena kenacitsādhakena bhāgacatuṣṭayasya sādhanānuṣṭhānenaiva viśuddhapadamavāpsyate paraṁ ca pratyekaṁ bhāge kvacidekasādhanāpaddhatyanuśīlanenāpi paramapadaṁ prāptuṁ śakyate |
T16n2959u_001:2077: tattvasaṁgrahasya pratyekaṁ bhāge uttamamadhyamamandaprakṛtika-sādhakebhyastathaiva vistṛtā madhyamā saṁkṣiptā ca sādhanāpaddhatirūpadiṣṭā |
T16n2959u_001:2078: ānandagarbhaḥ tattvāloke avarṇayat-yaḥ sādhakaḥ padyakulasya vistareṇa sādhanāṁ cikīrṣati ,
T16n2959u_001:2086: tattvasaṁgrahe karmamudrādicaturvidhamudrāḥ caturbhiḥ kulaiḥ saha saṁyojya vyākhyātāḥ |
T16n2959u_001:2089: vāg dharmamudrā amitābhakulaṁ cāste kṛtyaṁ ( karma )
T16n2959u_001:2092: anyathā tu buddho guhyatantrārthāvatāre kathayati-kāyaṁ binā cittamasambhavam |
T16n2959u_001:2093: cittaṁ ca binā vāgapi na sambhavā |
T16n2959u_001:2094: ataḥ sarvakuleṣu catasro mudrāḥ sannihitāḥ santi |
T16n2959u_001:2095: sāratastu kathayituṁ yujyate tattvasaṁgrahasyaikasya bhāgasya tadekasya vāṅgasya bhāgacatuṣṭayasya sādhanāmanuṣṭhāya bodhiḥ prāptuṁ śakyā |
T16n2959u_001:2096: tenaiva vidvadbhistattvasaṁgrahasya bhāgacatuṣṭayaṁ pṛthak kṛtvā svātantryeṇa ṭīkā akriyanta |
T16n2959u_001:2097: eteṣu vajradhātubhāge buddhaguhyasya tantrārthāvatāraḥ trailokyavijaye ānandagarbhasya vṛttiḥ bhāgacatuṣṭaye ca saṁkṣepavistarātmavistarecchukānāṁ kṛte sampūrṇagranthaṁ bhāgatraye vibhajya saṁskaraṇadvaye tattvālokākhyavyākhyāḥ kṛtāḥ santi |
T16n2959u_001:2098: tattvālokavyākhyā tattvasaṁgrahasya sarvaviśālā suspaṣṭā ca ṭīkā manyate |
T16n2959u_001:2099: 2. vajraśekharatantram bustonādividuṣāṁ mate vajraśekharatantraṁ yogatantrasya vyākhyātantramatra ca mūlataḥ catvāro mukhyāḥ paricchedāḥ santi
T16n2959u_001:2117: ityādipraśnāḥ ekadaiva saṁkṣepeṇa pṛṣṭāḥ punaśca vistareṇa pṛṣṭāḥ |
T16n2959u_001:2119: etaduttare kathitaṁ sarvadikṣu vyāptatvāt dharmadhātoranantatvād vajradharasyāpyānantyam |
T16n2959u_001:2122: evaṁ vākyāvekṣaṇāt prathamapaṭalamuttaratantram uttaratantrasya deśanāśailyāmupadiṣṭaṁ vyākhyātantraṁ vā pratīyate |
T16n2959u_001:2124: atrāpi 'atha rājā vajradharaḥ ' ityataḥ granthaḥ samārabhyata |
T16n2959u_001:2125: etenedamapi siddhaṁ - tattvasaṁgrahasya deśanā-nantaraṁ tanmaṇḍale idamapyupadiṣṭam |
T16n2959u_001:2128: evaṁ pratīyate vajraśekharasya prathamapaṭalamuttaratantrarūpeṇa avaśiṣṭaśca bhāgaḥ vyākhyātantratvenopādeśi |
T16n2959u_001:2129: 3. trilokavijayamahākalpaḥ vajrapāṇirākāśamārgādavatīrya sāṣṭāṅgaṁ bhagavantaṁ vandate lokasthitakrūradurātmanāṁ samayasaṁvarayoḥ sthāpanavidhimupadeṣṭaṁ yadā nivedayate tadā bhagavān sumerūgiri-maṇi-ratnāgrākhye prāsāde trilokavijayamahākalpasya deśanāvadhau anantadeva-nāga-yakṣa-gandharva-kinnara-bhūta-piśācādibhiḥ saha viharan kathayati-asmin triloka-vijayamahākalpe vajrahuṅkāranāmakalpa-tathāgatakalpa-vajramahācakravidhivistāra-karmamaṇḍalavidhi-vajrapāṇikalpa-avalokiteśvarakalpa-gaganagarbhakalpa-gaganakośa-kalpa-karmaprasarakalpa- vidyāmantramahākalpa-karmasamūhakalpa-karmadūtīkalpa-sevakakalpa-karmavajrasamūhamātṛkalpa-karmavajrīdūtīkalpa-karmasevakakalpākhyāḥ vibhāgāḥ santi |
T16n2959u_001:2131: tadanu granthe'smin vajrapāṇinā bhagavān pṛṣṭaḥ tathāgataḥ kathamutpadyate?
T16n2959u_001:2134: 4. sarvadurgatipariśodhanakalpaḥ tantrasyāsya deśanā tathāgatena devasthānake nandanāmakavane cakre |
T16n2959u_001:2135: 5. paramādyatantram paramādyatantraṁ kāmadhātoḥ paranimittavaśavartini devarājaprāsāde bodhisattva-avalokiteśvara-vajrapāṇi-mañjuśrī-ākāśagarbhaprabhṛtibhyaḥ samupadiṣṭam |
T16n2959u_001:2137: 6. vajragarbhālaṅkāratantram tantrasyāsya deśanā sarvatathāgatairadhiṣṭhitānantabuddhānāṁ prādurbhāvasthāne vairocana-hṛdayaprabhāsvaravimāna-tathāgatasthāne vajragarbhālaṅkāre anantabodhisattvamahāsattvapariṣadi kṛtā |
T16n2959u_001:2139: dravyasādhanopāyikā-vāksādhanopāyikā-mantrasādhanopāyikā-sarvābhāsa-uṣṇīṣasādhanopāyikā-kleśavajrasādhanopāyikā-sarvatathāgatamuṣṭisādhano-pāyikā-sarvatathāgatoṣṇīṣasādhanopāyikā-śvetacchatrasādhanopāyikā-sarvoṣṇīṣa-sādha-nopāyikā-mañjuśrīsādhanopāyikā-jagadīśvarasādhanopāyikā-vajradharasādhanopāyikā-maitreyasādhanopāyikā-ākāśagarbhasādhanopāyikā-samantabhadrasādhanopāyikā-sāgara-matisādhanopāyikā-ratnasaṁbhavasādhanopāyikāprabhṛtayaḥ imā buddhasya bodhisatvānāṁ ca sādhanopāyikāḥ santi |
T16n2959u_001:2148: 8. āryaguhyamaṇitilakatantram etattantraṁ bhagavatā akaniṣṭhabhuvane devarājagṛhe nivasatā bodhisattvavajrapāṇi-avalokiteśvara-ākāśagarbha-vajramuṣṭiprabhṛtibhiḥ navanavati ( 99 )
T16n2959u_001:2151: 9. pañcaviṁśatiprajñāpāramitāmukham etaddeśanāṁ bhagavān sumerūparvate devadevaputrāsuravāyudevagarūḍanāgayakṣakinnara-rākṣasavidyādhara-bhūtavināyakapiśācaprabhṛtibhistathānantamātṛsamūhena ca sākaṁ viharan vyadadhāt |
T16n2959u_001:2153: tadānīṁ vajrapāṇiṁ guhyādhipatināmnā sambodhayan ' om bodhicittavajraprajñāpāramitāmukha hū,
T16n2959u_001:2154: om samanta-bhadracaryāprajñāpāramitāmukha hū aom-akṣareṇa prārabhamāṇaḥ prajñāpāramitāṁ pañcaviṁśati-viśeṣaṇairalaṅkṛtya tanmukhamarthād muktidvāraṁ pratipādyādiśat |
T16n2959u_001:2158: yogatantrasya svarūpam gambhīrārthaparamārthasatye udārārthasaṁvṛtisatye'rthāt gaṁbhīrodārābhāsaśūnyādvaya-svarūpe pratiṣṭhāpanena yogatantramidamucyate
T16n2959u_001:2161: iṣṭadevasya karmamudrayā kṛtyāni ca mudrayitvā dhyānabhāvanayā tathatāṁ paramapāṁ ca sādhakaḥ prāpnoti |
T16n2959u_001:2166: vidyādevībhiḥ saha maṇḍalasthaḥ san maṇḍalatattvādidaśatattvānuśīlakaḥ ubhayatantrī yogatantrī vā nigadyate |
T16n2959u_001:2183: tathāgata-dharmakulaṁ tathāgatakarmakulaṁ ca evaṁ pañca bhavanti |
T16n2959u_001:2184: pratyekaṁ pañcānāṁ pañcaviṁśatikulānāṁ punaḥ hṛdayamudrāmantravidyāmantrakulabhedena vibhāge kṛte sati śataṁ kulāni jāyante |
T16n2959u_001:2185: hṛdayamudrāmantrādikaṁ spaṣṭayatā tattvasaṁgrahe nigaditaṁ - manīṣitavidhānaistu sidhyate tu manīṣitam |
T16n2959u_001:2195: anatikrama [ ṇīyo ] hi durbhedyo guhya eva ca |
T16n2959u_001:2205: vajraśekharatantre'pi kathitaṁ- viṣamayaprāṇibhyaḥ pāpibhyaśca rakṣaṇatvāt mudreyamucyate |
T16n2959u_001:2213: padyakarapo kathayāmāsa- hṛdayaṁ hi kāyamudrā kāyasya kendraṁ hṛdayaṁ vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:2221: mantro manaso doṣaṁ nivārayati ata eva mantro'yam |
T16n2959u_001:2224: 'hṛdaya' mahāmudrāpradhānasya kāyamaṇḍalatvaṁ mudrāsamayamudrāpradhānasya dhāraṇīmaṇḍalaṁ guhyamantradharmamudrāpradhānasya dharmamaṇḍalatvaṁ vidyākarmamudrāpradhānasya ca karmamaṇḍalatvamucyate |
T16n2959u_001:2225: dhāraṇīmaṇḍalasyābhiprāyo hi devīdhāraṇīnāmāyudharūpeṇa maṇḍalanyāsaḥ karmamaṇḍalatathāgatātiriktamanucaradevīnāṁ nyāsaśca vidhīyate |
T16n2959u_001:2229: etaddvayamarthāt prajñopāyau akṣaratattve vilīya smṛtisaṁprajanyābhyāṁ yuktena cittaṁ dūṣaṇatayā rakṣituṁ śakyate |
T16n2959u_001:2230: ataḥ ekasmin mantrakula eva sarvakulāni sammilanti |
T16n2959u_001:2233: jñānaśrīviracite dvayāntanivāraṇe cāpi kathitaṁ - purūṣadevo guhyamantraḥ strīdevaśca vidyāmantro'sti |
T16n2959u_001:2234: yanmantraḥ pitari mātari cobhayoḥ prayujyate sa dhāraṇīmantro nigadyate |
T16n2959u_001:2238: tathāgatānāṁ dānapāramitāsvarūpaṁ sattvānāṁ mano'bhilāṣapūrakaṁ samatājñānaṁ ratnasambhava ratnakulaṁ vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:2241: yogatantre'pi prajñā mātṛtantramupāyo hi pitṛtantraṁ cāsti |
T16n2959u_001:2244: daśatattvāni nirūpayati prādhānyenedaṁ ata idaṁ pitṛtantram |
T16n2959u_001:2247: itthaṁ yogatantre'pi mātṛpitṛtantrākhyeti bhāgadvayaṁ kartuṁ śakyate |
T16n2959u_001:2251: anuttaratantre vāyoḥ avadhūtyāṁ praveśānantaram utthāpanavidhinā yuganaddhakāye prakaṭanameva ābhāsaśūnyatā cāsti |
T16n2959u_001:2252: sārāṁśastu yogatantre kriyācaryātantrayorapekṣayā vistareṇa suspaṣṭarūpeṇa ca pañcābhisambodhibhāvanayā tathāgata-kula- krodhakulavajrakulapadyakulādīnāṁ svātantryeṇa sādhanāvidhirūpādiśyata |
T16n2959u_001:2253: yogatantrasya sādhanāpaddhatiḥ yogatantrasādhanāyai sarvaprathamaṁ pañcakuleṣu kasyāpyekakulasya maṇḍalaṁ praviśya abhiṣeko labhyeta |
T16n2959u_001:2254: abhiṣekasamaye yasmin deve puṣpaṁ patet sa eva sveṣṭadevo niścetavyaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:2255: abhiṣekasamaye sarvaprathamaṁ karmakalaśasya jalena snānīyam tadanu iṣṭadeva-kalaśenābhiṣeko labhyeta |
T16n2959u_001:2256: tadā dvitīyacaraṇe tathāgatapañcakulānāṁ paṭābhiṣekaṁ tṛtīya-caraṇe vajrābhiṣekaṁ caturthacaraṇe ca ghaṇṭābhiṣakaṁ dattvā sādhakena puṣpaṁ pātitaṁ yadupari patet tadiṣṭadevakulānusāraṁ nāmābhiṣeko dīyate |
T16n2959u_001:2259: evaṁ yogatantre sādhakena ekādaśābhiṣekāḥ prāptavyā bhavanti |
T16n2959u_001:2261: yaḥ sādhakaḥ tathāgatakulasaṁvaraṁ na grahītuṁ pārayati,
T16n2959u_001:2262: bodhisatvasaṁvaramātraṁ ca grahītuṁ pārayati tasmai pañcaśiṣyābhiṣeka eva dīyate |
T16n2959u_001:2263: ye sādhakā bodhisatvasaṁvaraṁ tathāgatakulasaṁgrahaṁ ca grahītuṁ samarthāstebhyaḥ vajrācāryābhiṣeko'pi pradeyaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:2265: yogatantrasya tridhyānacaturyogānāṁ vā sādhanā caturmudrābhiḥ mudrayate |
T16n2959u_001:2266: ato'tra pūrvaṁ tridhyānasya mudrācatuṣṭayasya svarūpaparicayaḥ sāmānyena prastūyate |
T16n2959u_001:2268: tridhyānavidhiṁ spaṣṭayatā bhāratīya-upādhyāyakumārakalaśena vajradhātumaṇḍalārthabhāvanāpiṇḍārthākhyagranthe'tisaṁkṣepeṇa tridhyānabhāvanāyāstattvaṁ svarūpaṁ ca vivecitam |
T16n2959u_001:2273: 1. ādiyogaḥ ādau nairātmyaṁ bhāvayitvā kramaśaḥ kṛkāṭikā ( kāṣṭham )
T16n2959u_001:2281: sādhako yadā parahitāya sādhanāmācarati tadā tenānyamudrābhāvanam,
T16n2959u_001:2296: pañcābhiṣekaḥ pratyekamaṇḍalaśuddhyadhiṣṭhānaṁ pratyekamaṇḍaladvārā ātmādhiṣṭhānaṁ ceti dvinavatyuttarapañcaśataṁ yogānāṁ sādhanā karaṇīyā bhavati
T16n2959u_001:2302: tathāgatapraveśaḥ vajradhātuṁ dhyātvā pañcatathāgatairadhiṣṭhānaṁ caturdikṣu vajranyāsaḥ,
T16n2959u_001:2314: tad-vandanaṁ tadupadeśaḥ pañcābhisambodhiśca ( 1 . pratyavekṣā akṣobhyasvarūpaṁ 2 . bodhicittamutpādya dānapāramitāratnasambhavaḥ 3 . vajrāviddhāmitābhaḥ 4 . prajñāpāramitā-sarvatathāgatakāyādi-paramāṇuvadavasthitiḥ,
T16n2959u_001:2364: 2. maṇḍalarājāgradhyānam vajrasadṛśadhyānasya pūrvāṅgaṁ sampūrayituṁ hetufalaprajñaptyā maṇḍalarājāgradhyānā-vasthā bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:2366: 3. karmarājāgradhyānam atra prāṇināṁ karma-prādhānyaṁ vartate arthāt ekādaśabhūmi-samantaprabhāyāṁ buddhabhūmau vā buddhakṛtyameva karmarājāgradhyānamasti
T16n2959u_001:2368: yataśca tattvasaṁgrahasya prathamabhāge-vajradhātumaṇḍalaṭīkāyāṁ tridhyānaṁ vyākhyāyamānena tena kṛkāṭikā-pariśodhanāya kṛkāṭikāmadhye sravyamāṇa- 'hrīḥ ' akṣarasya vivecanam aṣṭadalapāde vistareṇa pa-prathamataḥ ṣoḍaśaparyantaṁ yogadhyānāntargataṁ ṣoḍaśataḥ ūnaviṁśaparyantaṁ ( 16-19 )
T16n2959u_001:2373: tatraivā-bhyantararūpeṇa saptatriṁśadbodhipakṣānanuśīlya daśabhūmiprāptirādiyogatvena buddhatvā-vāptirvajrāsanākhyasamādhyavasthā maṇḍalarājāgratvena buddhatvaprāptyagrimakṛtyāni ca karmarājāgratvena varṇitāni |
T16n2959u_001:2374: vajraśekharākhyagranthānusāraṁ tridhyānasyādiyoge svayaṁ sādhakaḥ akaniṣṭhabhuvane pañcābhisambodhidvārā bodhiṁ labheta evaṁ dhyāyet |
T16n2959u_001:2376: dvitīyadhyānaṁ pārṣadasya ātmā-naścābhinnatāṁ matvā prāṇināṁ hitasādhanaṁ karmarājāgradhyānamucyate |
T16n2959u_001:2377: jñeyakośe'pi kathitaṁ - yogatantrasyottamena sādhakena akaniṣṭhabhuvane buddhatvama-vāptuṁ madhye sumerūparvatādiṁ samupagamya anucarebhyo yogatantropadeśaḥ ante ca vineyajana-pātratānurūpaṁ tān vibhinnakuleṣu praveśya tadanugraha-vidhiḥ yā kriyate ,
T16n2959u_001:2384: caturyogaḥ ye ca sādhakā īdṛg bhāvanāmanuṣṭhātumasamarthāste caturyogadvārā yogatantraṁ sādhayanti |
T16n2959u_001:2386: yatkule sādhako'bhiṣekaṁ prāpnot tatkulasya devabhāvanā yogo'sti tatra jñānadevamāvāhya vilīnatvamanuyogaḥ ucyate |
T16n2959u_001:2387: iṣṭadevasya bhājanalokasya sampūrṇasattvalokasya ca svabhāve bhāvanāvidhānaṁ sarvayogaḥ,
T16n2959u_001:2389: caturmudrāḥ tridhyānena caturyogena vā kayācitpaddhatyā vā yogatantraṁ sādhayet taccaturmudrābhiḥ saṁmudraya bhāvayet |
T16n2959u_001:2390: mudrābhirmudritakaraṇābhiprāyabodhanaviṣaye paramādyatantre kathitaṁ-yo yayā mudrayā mudrayiṣyate saḥ tatsvabhāva eva syāt |
T16n2959u_001:2391: samayamudrayā mudrite samayadeve jñānamudrayā''vāhito vilīnaśca deva eva jñānadeva ucyate |
T16n2959u_001:2393: yathā ca sūtrālaṅkāre rāgapañcendriyaparāvṛttyā paramavibhūtiprāptiḥ pratyapādyata |
T16n2959u_001:2397: cittasamayamudrāyogena kliṣṭamanasaḥ bhrāntinirākaraṇaṁ tathā samatājñāna mutpadyate |
T16n2959u_001:2398: ( 3 ) vāgdharmamudrāyogena manovijñānāgantukamalaṁ kṣīyate pratyavekṣaṇajñānaṁ ca prādurbhavati |
T16n2959u_001:2401: yogatantrasādhakaḥ caturmudrābhiḥ mudrito bhūtvā iṣṭadevaṁ sādhayati |
T16n2959u_001:2403: pariśodhanaṁ pariśodhyaṁ falaprāptividhiṁ ca pratipādayatā yogatantravarṇitamudrācatuṣṭayasvarūpaṁ nirūpayiṣyate |
T16n2959u_001:2411: mudrābhedāḥ mudrāyāḥ svarūpagatāścatvāro bhedāḥ- yathā mahāmudrā dharmamudrā samayamudrā karmamudrāśca |
T16n2959u_001:2413: yathā ca pṛthakjanakāyaḥ vākcittaṁ karma-mohakrodhau mātsaryaṁ kṣiti-agni-jala-dhātavaśca |
T16n2959u_001:2415: samayamudrayā ca cittaṁ karmamudrayā ca karma pariśodhyate |
T16n2959u_001:2418: mahāmudrā vairocanādidevānāṁ kāyaḥ evaṁ rūpākṛtiḥ lākṣaṇikamudrā'sti |
T16n2959u_001:2420: tatkāle svayaṁ vairocanādidevānāṁ rūpabhāvanā'vasthitiḥ ābhyantaradharmamudrā vartate |
T16n2959u_001:2422: svayaṁ vairocanaṁ bhāvayitvā jihvākṛkāṭikādau hrīḥ ityakṣaranyāsena lakṣitā bāhyadharmamudrā'sti tatprakāśyamānavacanānāmakṣararūpeṇodayaḥ ābhyantaradharmamudrā kathyate |
T16n2959u_001:2425: tenaiva ca sākaṁ svayaṁ vairocane bhāvitacittasya jñānarūpeṇodayaḥ samayamudrā'bhidhīyate |
T16n2959u_001:2440: devakṛkāṭikāyāṁ 'hrī' ityakṣareṇa padyajihvayoḥ pañcāgravajraṁ bhāvayitvā mantroccāraṇaṁ dharmamudrāyā mudritavidhiḥ kīrtyate |
T16n2959u_001:2441: dharmākṣaravajraṁ nābhiṁ parito niviṣṭam evaṁ bhāvanaṁ siddhihetuḥ |
T16n2959u_001:2442: gambhīrodārādvayatattvastho bhūtvā jihvāṁ tālau pravartya nāsāgre sūkṣmavajraṁ bhāvayitvā tadekāgratvaṁ dharmamudrādhipatyaprāptividhiḥ kathyate
T16n2959u_001:2444: vairocanarūpeṇātmanaṁ parivartya śvāsapraśvāsābhyāṁ saha kumbhake'dvayatattvadhyānamātmanaḥ iṣṭadevāhaṅkāreṇa saha tattvasamāhitireva samayamudrāyāḥ mudritattvamucyate |
T16n2959u_001:2445: samādhyanantaraṁ tattvajñānaṁ pañcāgrabhāvanāviṣayībhūtaṁ vidhāya triḥ mantroccāraṇaṁ samayamudrāsiddhiheturabhidhīyate |
T16n2959u_001:2448: vākyaṁ binā kāyaścittañca binā kāyo'pi na sambhāvyate |
T16n2959u_001:2449: ato yathā mudrācatuṣṭasya sva-svamudritā vidhayastathaiva ekaikā mudrā'pi caturmudrābhirmudraṇīyā |
T16n2959u_001:2459: yogatantrasya sādhanāvidhiviśeṣaḥ yogatantrasya sādhanāviṣaye ānandagarbheṇācāryeṇa sādhakasya samīpe anivārya-rūpeṇa yogyatāsādhyanirdhāraṇa-sādhyopādānakāraka-sādhanopāyādiṣu kiṁ kimapekṣyate,
T16n2959u_001:2460: etadvarṇayatā sādhanāpaddhatiḥ spaṣṭīkriyate - 1. sādhakayogyatā sa eva sādhako,
T16n2959u_001:2462: etadubhayavidhacittasya spaṣṭīkaraṇaṁ bodhicaryāvatāre itthaṁ pratyapādi-prāṇimātre bodhilābhecchā praṇidhānacittaṁ,
T16n2959u_001:2464: etadubhayavidhicitta-samanvitasādhakasya tantraśāstraṁ pratyanavacchinnā śraddhā tathāgatapada-prāptyai pratipāditaśikṣāmanuṣṭhātuṁ lālasā mārgadarśakagurūṁ śāstāraṁ ca prati dradiṣṭho viśvāsaścāpekṣyate |
T16n2959u_001:2465: vajreśvareṇāpyavoci gṛhasthenāpi tatsarvaśīlāni pālanīyāni yāni pravrajitebhyo'parihāryāṇi santi |
T16n2959u_001:2466: 2 . sādhya-nirdhāraṇam sarvāvaraṇarahitaḥ guṇapūrṇaḥ kāyacatuṣṭasampanno vairocana eva yogatantrasya sādhyo'sti |
T16n2959u_001:2467: ānandagarbheṇa tattvasaṁgrahasya koṣālaṅkārākhyaṭīkāyāṁ samabhāṇi- tathāgatavajraskandhātmakavairocano laghuvairocano dharmadhātumayamādyantarahitaṁ nirāvaraṇatattvaṁ mahāvairocano'sti |
T16n2959u_001:2470: sevāyāḥ punaḥ upāyaprajñe'tha vā salakṣaṇanirlakṣaṇākhyau bheau kriyete |
T16n2959u_001:2471: 5. upāyo'tha vā salakṣaṇayogaḥ tridhyānaṁ caturvidhayogo vā caturmudrābhirmudritaḥ kulamaṇḍalabhāvanā sthūla-salakṣaṇayogabhāvanocyate |
T16n2959u_001:2473: sūkṣmasalakṣaṇayogasya bhāvanāyāṁ tridhyāne caturyogeṣu vā kenāpyekena vidhineṣṭadevo bhāvyate |
T16n2959u_001:2474: jihvāṁ tālau pravartya iṣṭadevavarṇasadṛśaṁ tilopamasūkṣmasvarūpaṁ nābhimadhye dhyāyyate |
T16n2959u_001:2475: praśvāsena saha sūkṣmavajraṁ śanaiḥ nābhikṣetrādutthāpya ghrāṇachidrād bahirniṣkāsanakāle upariśvāsaṁ nirodhya smṛtisaṁprajanyasamanvitāḥ sādhakāścittaṁ tadvajrasvarūpasthaṁ vidhāya yathāsaṁbhavaṁ dhyāyanti |
T16n2959u_001:2484: kāye vāyusaṁcārapravāheṇa samarasatāgamanena vāyvāśritacitte'pi sahasā sthairyyamāyāti yā ca cittaprasrabdhirūcyate |
T16n2959u_001:2485: tatpaścād yathecchaṁ cittānukūlyārhatāyai sādhakaḥ pratidivasamabhyāsena viśiṣṭadhyānotpādanāya praśvāsakāle nāsikāgre anantasūkṣmavajrāṇi saṁsfārya trilokaṁ vyāpnoti |
T16n2959u_001:2486: śvāsāvadhau ca punaḥ nābhikṣetre saṁhṛtya sthairyyaṁ vidhātuṁ śaknoti |
T16n2959u_001:2487: dhyāne'smin viṣaye tattva-saṁgrahe'pi - sūkṣmavajrasukhasparśanimittaṁ jāyate yadā |

T16n2959u_001:3716: tataḥ kulikavaṁśīyeṣu 25 rājasu kecana samāgatāḥ kecana samāgantāra āsan |
T16n2959u_001:3717: teṣu sarvaprathamaṁ mañjughoṣakīrtinā'pi kālacakrīyamūlatantrasyaiva pracāraḥ kṛtaḥ yathā sūryarathādibhirṛṣimunibhirnivedane kṛte bṛhanmūlakālacakratantrasya saṁgrahaḥ sragdharācchandasi 3000 ślokeṣu kṛtastathā svīyavaṁśīyena kulikapuṇḍarīkena ( 12000 )

T16n2959u_001:3732: kālacakramatānusāraṁ bhoṭadeśīyaviduṣāṁ matamasti yad rājñaḥ sudivyasya samaye mlecchadharmaḥ āvirbhaviṣyati kramaśaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:3733: antimaḥ krodhacakrī mlecchān samūlaṁ vināśya saddharmasya pracāraṁ kariṣyati tathā punaḥ kṛtayugaḥ samāgamiṣyati |
T16n2959u_001:3734: jyotiṣā cāryāṇāṁ matānusāraṁ buddhasya parinirvāṇam adyato 2867 varṣebhyaḥ pūrvameva jātamiti |
T16n2959u_001:3735: sucandreṇa mūlatantrasya saṁgrahaḥ 2866 varṣapūrvameva kṛto'sya parinirvāṇaṁ 2864 varṣapūrvameva jātam |
T16n2959u_001:3736: kulikamañjukīrtinā saṁgrahatantrasya punaḥ saṁkṣepaḥ 2264 varṣapūrvameva kṛtastathā mlecchānāṁ samayaḥ 1363 varṣapūrvamevāsīt |

T16n2959u_001:3738: kālacakrasya āryadeśīyaparamparā bustonānusāraṁ kālacakrasyāryāvarte pracāraḥ rājatrayasya śāsanakāle śambhaladeśata āmantritena cilupaṇḍitena kṛtaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:3739: nīlagranthe goelocāvā mahodayenoktaṁ yat sāmānyataḥ vajrayānasya ( janasāmānye )
T16n2959u_001:3740: pracāraḥ prasāraśca pūrvadigvāsino rājñaḥ prakāśacandrasya samaye jātaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:3742: tadanantaram ācāryanāgārjunena tacchiṣyaiśca guhyasamājapitṛtantrādīnāṁ dakṣiṇabhārate vyākhyānaṁ kṛtam |
T16n2959u_001:3745: tataḥ śambhalataḥ kālacakramānīya cilupādādibhirasya pracāraḥ kṛtaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:3746: ācāryacilupādo'yaṁ tasmin kāle pūrvakālikavartamānapañcaprānteṣu aoḍiviśe samutpannaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:3747: tripiṭikācāryacilupaṇḍito'yaṁ ratnagiri-vihāra-vikramaśilā-nālandā-diṣu upalabdhān samastagranthān adhītyaikasminneva jīvane sambodhisiddhidātryāḥ viśeṣabodhisattvavṛtteḥ ( kālacakrasya )
T16n2959u_001:3748: pracāraprasārayoricchāṁ vidhāyeṣṭadevāt bhaviṣya-vāṇīṁ prāpya ratnavyāpāribhiḥ sahaiva nivartya madhyadeśe ( āryāvarte )
T16n2959u_001:3750: keṣāṁcidanyeṣāṁ viduṣāṁ matānusāraṁ cilupaṇḍitaḥ kasyacid yoginaḥ putraḥ svayaṁ pitrā saha śambhaladeśamagāt |
T16n2959u_001:3751: tatraivāvalokiteśvarasya nirmāṇakāyasyaikasya rūpavato bhikṣoḥ darśanaṁ cakāra |
T16n2959u_001:3753: tadanantaramayaṁ kālacakrasya sampūrṇavyākhyāṁ vimalaprabhāṁ kaṇṭhasthīkṛtya tato nivṛtya ca kaṭakarājasabhāyāmuṣitvā vimalaprabhāṁ lipibaddhāṁ cakāra |
T16n2959u_001:3754: asya pramukhāstrayaḥ śiṣyā āsan yeṣvekaḥ siddhiprāpto jinākaraguptaḥ,
T16n2959u_001:3755: dvitīyaḥ prakāṇḍavidvān piṇḍa ācāryastathā tṛtīyaḥ kālacakra-parijñātā āsīt |
T16n2959u_001:3756: vidvān piṇḍācāryaḥ vārendrasthāna utpannaṁ mahākālapādaṁ śiṣyaṁ cakāra |
T16n2959u_001:3759: avalokiteśvareṇa asmai mārganirdeśaṁ vidhāya śambhale'bhiṣiktiṁ ca vidhāya sampūrṇatayā tasyāsmā upadeśaḥ kṛta iti |
T16n2959u_001:3761: ācārya koṅaṭularinapoche mahodayenāpyuktaṁ yat mahākālapādaḥ ( mañjuvajraḥ )
T16n2959u_001:3762: ācāryaḥ cilupaṇḍitaḥ piṇḍa ācāryaśca ete trayaḥ śambhalaṁ jagmuḥ |
T16n2959u_001:3763: tataḥ ebhiḥ kālacakraṁ pṛthak pṛthak āmantritam |
T16n2959u_001:3770: tadaiva nālandāṁ jagāma tathā tatra tenoktaṁ yat - yo janaḥ kālacakrīyaṁ kūṭākṣaraṁ ( acintyalokadhātupratīkātmakākṣaraṁ )
T16n2959u_001:3771: ādibuddhaṁ na jñāsyati sa nāmasaṁgītiṁ samyaktayā boddhuṁ na samartha iti |
T16n2959u_001:3772: itthamukte sati tatratyairācāryaiḥ saha tasya śāstrārtho jātaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:3773: śāstrārthe parājitā naike vidvāṁso'sya śiṣyāḥ saṁjātāḥ |
T16n2959u_001:3777: tibbate kālacakrasya vibhinnaparamparāḥ gaṇayatā ācārya koṅṭularinapoche mahodayenābhihitaṁ yat sarvaprathamaṁ kālacakrasya pracāraḥ praṇḍitaśrībharabodhinā gyījolocāvāmahodayena mūla-vṛttyoranuvādena kṛtaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:3779: camī buddhikīrtinā bhāratīyācārya-kālapādataḥ kālacakraṁ śrutvā mahāvṛttivimalaprabhāyā anuvādaḥ kṛtaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:3780: gyalo āditaḥ paramparitam āmnāyamamuñjanāḥ camī āmnāyaṁ kathayanti |
T16n2959u_001:3782: nepālīyapaṇḍitasamantaśrītaḥ adhyayanaṁ kṛtvā mūla-mahāvṛttyoranuvādaṁ vidhāya yasya pracāraḥ kṛtaḥ sa ' ra ' āmnāya ityucyate |
T16n2959u_001:3783: ḍo locāvā śerapa ḍagāsa mahodayena ( prajñākīrtinā )
T16n2959u_001:3785: ḍotona ākāśakuṭāditaḥ paramparito'yam āmnāya ḍo āmnāya ityucyate |
T16n2959u_001:3790: tibbate kālacakrasyāneke anuvādāstathā teṣāṁ paramaparāḥ pracahalitā āsan |
T16n2959u_001:3794: paramparāsvāsvaneke siddhācāryā abhavan teṣu bustona ( mahāratnasiddhaḥ )
T16n2959u_001:3797: nīlagranthe ḍo paramparāyāḥ gaṇanā nimnaprakārā vidyate-kulikarājñaḥ ārabhya mahākālapādakaniṣṭhakālapāda-somanātha-tibbatīya-ratnarakṣita ākāśakuṭādayaśca
T16n2959u_001:3798: ' ra ' āmnāye kulirāġyaḥ cilupaṇḍita-piṇḍopāda-mahākālapāda-kaniṣṭhakālapāda- nepālīya samantaśrī-taibbata ra chotarajñānādayaśca |
T16n2959u_001:3799: bustonena ra ḍo āmnāyayorgaṇanā itthaṁ kṛtā - ' ra ' āmnāye-śākyamuni-sucandra-sūryeśvara-tejasvi somadatta-sūryeśvara-viśvamūrti-yaśaḥ ( yaśaḥ
T16n2959u_001:3804: anuttaratantrasya svarūpaṁ bhedaśca bhoṭadeśīyācāryairyathā spaṣṭarūpeṇa pitṛtantra-mātṛtantra-advayatantrāṇāṁ svatantra-rūpeṇa bhedān kṛtvā vyākhyā kṛtā,
T16n2959u_001:3805: bhāratīyācāryaistathā nātisfuṭā vihitā kintu tattulyaśabdasya prayoga upalabhyate |
T16n2959u_001:3806: yathā vajrapañjare uktaṁ yat prajñāpāramitāmahāmudrāyogaḥ sādhanopāyāśca yasmin tantre upadiṣṭāḥ tad yoginītantraṁ ( mātṛtantram ) vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:3807: buddhakapāle yogatantrasya saṁkhyā ṣaṭkoṭistathā yoginītantrasya saṁkhyā 16 koṭiścā-bhihitā buddhakapālasya anuttarayoginītantrarājatvamabhihitam
T16n2959u_001:3809: guhyatattvaprakāśe utpattikramaniṣpannakramayorbhāvanā-prādhānyād anuttaratantrotpattibhūtaṁ pradhānapitṛtantraṁ niṣpannakramapradhānamātṛtantram iti bhedadvayamuktam |
T16n2959u_001:3812: tatraivoktaṁ yat purūśavineyajanānāṁ kṛte pitṛtantrasya tathā strīvineyajanānāṁ kṛte mātṛtantrasya deśanā jātā |
T16n2959u_001:3815: te kathayanti yad yatrodāragambhīratattvānāṁ pramukharūpeṇopadeśo jātaḥ tat prajñātantramasti |
T16n2959u_001:3816: yasya vineyajanaḥ svamatavādī purūṣaśca syāt tat pitṛdevapradhānopāyatantraṁ,
T16n2959u_001:3817: yasya ca vineyajanaḥ strīparamatavādī syāt tat mātṛdevapradhānaṁ prajñātantraṁ vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:3818: yatra skandhāyatanādeḥ pariśuddhyā devabhāvanā-prakriyā pratipāditā tad upāyatantraṁ yatra ca bodhicittaṁ viśuddhaṁ devarūpe prakaṭitaṁ dṛśyate,
T16n2959u_001:3820: evameva yatra devānāṁ lokānurūpo nirdeśo jātaḥ tad upāyatantraṁ tad viparīto yatra nirdeśo jātaḥ tat prajñātantramasti |
T16n2959u_001:3821: bustonena pitṛ-mātṛtantrayoḥ svalpāntaramitthaṁ prakalpitam- 1. anuttarayogāvatārānusāraṁ yatropāyaḥ savistaraḥ pratipāditaḥ syāt tat pitṛtantraṁ yatra ca savistaraṁ gambhīrārthasya pratipādanaṁ jātaṁ tat mātṛtantramasti |
T16n2959u_001:3822: 2. guhyatattvaprakāśānusāram utpattikramasya prādhānyena pratipādayitṛ tantraṁ pitṛtantraṁ vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:3824: 3. vimalaprabhānusāraṁ bhūtān kramaśo layīkṛtya vajrabhūmi-vidhānamaṇḍalā-derbhāvanāvidhiḥ upāyaśca yatrābhihitaḥ tat pitṛtantraṁ,
T16n2959u_001:3825: bhūtādārabhya sumerūparvataparyantam udgacchataḥ sādhakasya vimānamaṇḍalabhāvanāvidheśca pratipādayitṛ tantraṁ prajñātantram nigadyate |
T16n2959u_001:3826: 4. samānānana-bhujayuto yuganaddhakāya upāyaḥ pitṛtantrasya devaḥ yatra mātāpitṛdevayorānanabhujādiḥ bhinno bhūtvā yuganaddhakāyarūpaḥ syāt sa mātṛtantradevo'bhihitaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:3827: yatra pradhānamātṛ-pitṛyuganaddhakāyasya bhujānanādiḥ samānaḥ kintu anucaradevānāṁ yuganaddhakāyeṣu ānanabhujādirbhinnaḥ syāt sa ca advayatantrasya devo'sti |
T16n2959u_001:3828: 5. vajrapañjarānusāraṁ yatra tathāgataḥ vajraḍākinīrūpaḥ syāttathā'nucareṣu mātṛdevīnāṁ prādhānyaṁ bhavet tad mātṛtantram ityucyate devaḥpañcatathāgatakuleṣu prakaṭībhūto'nucareṣu ca pitṛdevānāṁ prādhānyaṁ bhavettadā tat pitṛtantramasti |
T16n2959u_001:3829: 6. yatrāsana-siṁhāsane ratnanirmite syātām tadupari ratnālaṅkāracakrā-dibhirvibhūṣitaḥ krodha-pratyālīdamudrayoḥ prakaṭito deva eva upāyatantrasya devo vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:3830: yatra śavāsanaṁ kapālāsthibhiralaṅkārairratnīkṛtaṁ hasteṣu kartarī-kapāla-khaḍga-ḍamarūkādi-dhārayitā vyāghragajacarmaparidhāno nirvastro nagnaśca devo devaprajñāmātṛtantrayordevo'bhihitaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:3831: 7. yanmaṇḍalamabhitaḥ śmaśānaṁ syāt tat mātṛtantraṁ tadabhāvaśca pitṛtantram |
T16n2959u_001:3832: 8. niṣpannakramikaprajñāpāramitāyā udāramahopāyābhyāṁ saha yatra yogi varṇitaḥ tat mātṛtantraṁ,
T16n2959u_001:3833: yatra ca svādhiṣṭhānābhisambodhikramayoḥ prādhānyena nirūpaṇaṁ tat pitṛtantramasti |
T16n2959u_001:3834: 9. nāḍīvāyvoryatra prādhānyena nirūpaṇaṁ tat mātṛtantram yatra ca vāyoḥ prādhānyena nirūpaṇaṁ tat pitṛtantramasti |
T16n2959u_001:3835: 10 . guhyasamājānusāraṁ yatra sādhakasya pañcaskandhaviśuddhapañcatathāgateṣu pariṇatasya prakriyopadiṣṭā tat pitṛtantram yatra ca pañcadhātūn pariśodhya pañcadevītvena nirūpaṇasya prakriyā varṇitā tat mātṛtantramasti |
T16n2959u_001:3838: 12. vajrasattva-cakradharābhyāṁ bhaṭṭārikāṇāṁ samūha upadiṣṭaṁ tantraṁ pitṛtantram yatra ca harūka-vajraḍākinībhyāmupadiṣṭaṁ tantraṁ tanmātṛtantramabhidhīyate
T16n2959u_001:3839: 13. śāstṛ-vajradhara-anucara-buddha-bodhisatvānāṁ madhye vineyajanairnivedane kṛte kṛtopadeśaḥ pitṛtantraṁ tathā mātṛdevībhirnivedane kṛte upadiṣṭaṁ tantram mātṛtantram ityucyate |
T16n2959u_001:3840: 14. vineyajanānāśritya yatra purūṣasamūhasya prādhānyaṁ tat pitṛtantram yatra ca strīsamūhasya prādhānyaṁ tat mātṛtantramabhidhīyate |
T16n2959u_001:3841: ime bhedā vyāptirūpatvena svīkartuṁ na śakyante,
T16n2959u_001:3842: kevalaṁ tatpradhānāṅgeṣu pradhānarūpatvena nyūnādhikabhāvād bhedāḥ kṛtāḥ santi |
T16n2959u_001:3843: bhoṭadeśīyo vidvān padyakarapo niṣpannakramasya sādhanādhāreṇānuttaratantrasya bhedatrayaṁ vyadadhāt |
T16n2959u_001:3844: pañcakramānusāraṁ yatra niṣpannakramasya bhāvanā kriyate tat pitṛtantraṁ caturmudrābhiryatra niṣpannakramasya bhāvanā syāt tat mātṛtantram |
T16n2959u_001:3847: khasaḍuba je ādyācāryairanuttaratantrasya pitṛ-mātṛbhedena vibhāgadvayaṁ kṛtam,
T16n2959u_001:3848: tathā guhyasamāja-kṛṣṇayamāritantra-vairocanamāyājāla-anuttaramāyājāla-vajrasattvamāyā-jālādayaḥ pitṛtantre samāyātāstathā ca mātṛtantre cakrasaṁvara-hevajra-kālacakra-mahāmudrātilaka-mahāmāyā-buddhakapālādayaḥ samāyāntīti svīkṛtam |
T16n2959u_001:3850: prajñātantre-cakasaṁvara-mahāmāyā-buddhaka- pālādīnām upāyatantre ca guhyasamāja- vajramālā-kṛṣṇayamāritantrādīnāṁ samāveśaḥ kṛtaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:3852: asya matānusāraṁ pitṛtantra-guhyasamāja-mātṛtantrādayaḥ sarve cakrasaṁvarāntargatā eva santi |
T16n2959u_001:3853: advayatantrasya punarapi ābhyantarodāra-gambhīrārthavistāranāmadvayena bhedadvayaṁ vidhāya prathame hevajrasya dvitīye kālacakrasya gaṇanā kṛtā
T16n2959u_001:3854: karmāyonatanagyāchomahodayena neyārthamātre pitṛ-mātṛ-avayatantrākhyaṁ bhedatrayaṁ vidhāya nītārthe samastānuttaratantrāṇi advaya-tantrāṇyeva iti svīkṛtam |
T16n2959u_001:3855: teṣāṁ matamasti yad upāye pitṛdevotpattikramasya mantravidheśca prādhānyaṁ bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:3856: mātṛtantre mātṛdevyā utpattikrameṇa mantravidhinā ca sahānekamahattvapūrṇopāyānāṁ gambhīratā bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:3858: ācāryaseratogapāmahodayānāṁ matānusāraṁ pitṛ-mātṛtantrayorabheda eva advayatantram vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:3862: yato hi buddhasya rūpakāyasyedamupādānakārakaṁ bījatulyaṁ ca |
T16n2959u_001:3864: dvitīyatantraṁ mātṛtantramabhidhīyate yato hīdaṁ mātṛsadṛśaṁ prajñātantraṁ pradhānataḥ paramārthasatyenābhinnamahāsukhajñānafale dharmakāyasyopādānamasti prajñopāyayoḥ prajñāpakṣo'sti |
T16n2959u_001:3866: prajñāpāramitāyāḥ vibhinnopāyeṣu militeṣu vibhinnaprakārāṇāṁ falānāṁ devakāyasya ( upāyasya )
T16n2959u_001:3867: mātṛsadṛśamahāsukhaśūnyatā'bhinnatve sati yuganaddhatvamupalabhyate loke'pi pitṛvat putrakulaṁ nirdhāritaṁ bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:3868: sārāṁśaḥ pūrṇaprakaraṇasya sārāṁśo'yamāsti yat-bhoṭācāryeranuttaratantramidaṁ pitṛ-mātṛ-advayatantratvena svīkṛtam etannāmatantram |
T16n2959u_001:3869: bhāratīyācāryāṇāṁ matānusāraṁ tantramidam itthaṁ spaṣṭarūpeṇa tridhā vibhajya vyākhyātaṁ syāditi na kutrāpi pratīyate |
T16n2959u_001:3871: atastantradvayasyādhāraṁ svīkṛtya bhoṭadeśīyācāryaiḥ pitṛ-mātṛ-advayarūpeṇa bhedāḥ kṛtāḥ iti pratīyate |
T16n2959u_001:3873: kālacakre samāgataṁ praġyopāyatantradvayamapi svatantratantratvena svīkartuṁ na śakyate,
T16n2959u_001:3874: yato hi kevalaṁ prajñāyāṁ pratipāditāyām upāyahīnatvād yuganaddhakāyasya prāptirasambhavā |
T16n2959u_001:3876: yaiśca guhyasamājādiḥ pitṛtantrīyagrantho'bhihitasteṣāmapi matānusāraṁ tatrāpi prajñopāyadvayasyābhinnarūpeṇa vyākhyā sādhanāpaddhatiścāyāti
T16n2959u_001:3883: yathā- hekāreṇa mahākalpā vajraṁ prajñā ca gaṇyate |
T16n2959u_001:3889: sādhanā'vasare mātṛtantrīyasādhakāḥ mahāsukhaṁ śūnyatāṁ vādhikaṁ sādhayanti |
T16n2959u_001:3890: yathā-vajrapañjarasya 13 tame paricchede uktaṁ yat prajñāpāramitopāyo yoginitantramastīti |
T16n2959u_001:3893: arthāt mātṛtantre caṇḍālyāderbhāvanāṁ pradhānarūpeṇa kṛtvā uṣṇīṣakamalāt śukrasya adhaḥ kṣaraṇe jāte punaścordhvagatau caturānandasya catuḥśūnyatāyāśca sākṣātkāraṁ vidhāya mahāsukhaśūnyatāyāṁ dārdyamupalabhya mahāsukhajñānasyādhārabhūtena pañcaraśmiyutena vāyunā saṁvṛtimāyākāye utthāpitasya prakriyā mātṛtantre hevajre vā pradhānarūpena nirdiṣṭā vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:3897: pitṛtantraguhyasamājādau ḍākārṇavatantrānusāraṁ yogināṁ kṛte prabhāsvaramāyākāyādisiddhibhiḥ yuganaddhakāyasya prāptividhirabhihitaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:3898: arthāt prabhāsvarasyodayasthāne hṛdayakamale kramaśo vāyurvilīnatāmupagacchannanulomakrame pratilomakrame ca catuḥśūnyatāyāḥ bodhaṁ kṛtvā ālokālokābhāsopalabdhyanantaraṁ prabhāsvarasya sākṣātkāraṁ karoti tathā ca prabhāsvarasyādhārabhūtena pañcaraśmiyutena vāyunā saṁvṛtimāyākāye utthāpanaṁ jāyate |
T16n2959u_001:3900: tadutpannakramasambaddhā vyākhyā pañcakrame nāgārjunena savistaraṁ kṛtā |
T16n2959u_001:3902: yadyapi tantratrayametad advayatattvameva pratipādayate tathā ca bhāvaniṣpattau sarvatra advayasya samānatayā kintu sādhanāvidhau sūkṣmaprāṇa-vāyu-tilakayogānāṁ prādhānyamevaṁ prabhāsvara-mayākāya-mahāsukhasvarūpe tathā māyākāyasya sādhanābhedād etad granthatraye sūkṣmāntaramavalokyate |
T16n2959u_001:3903: anuttaratantrasya kramadvayam pāramitānaye paramārthasatyaṁ-saṁvṛtisatyaṁ cāvirodhi mithaḥ saṁvṛtisatyaṁ svasvarūpānusāraṁ paramārthasatyaṁ puṣṇāti |
T16n2959u_001:3904: yato hi saṁvṛttisatyam ucchedasya niṣedhaṁ karoti,
T16n2959u_001:3906: athavā paramārthasatyaṁ svabhāvasattāyāḥ niṣedhaṁ kṛtvā sāpekṣatām arthāt saṁvṛtisatyaṁ bodhayati tathā'nyataḥ saṁvṛtisatyasyāśrayeṇaiva paramārthasya bodho bhavati ataḥ satyadvayam agni-taduṣṇatātulyaṁ dhamadharmirūpeṇāsti |
T16n2959u_001:3907: pāramitānaye'sya satyadvayasya yat sthānamasti tadeva sthānaṁ vajrayāne kramadvayasyāsti |
T16n2959u_001:3908: hevajratantre uktam- kramadvayaṁ samāśritya vajriṇāṁ dharmadeśnā |
T16n2959u_001:3914: vajrapañjare kramadvayasya prayojanaṁ spaṣṭīkurvan bhagavānavocad yathā-sāmānyavikalpa-prahāṇārthamutpattikramasya tathā śuddhavikalpasyāthavā praṇītadevarūpaṁ pratyabhiniveśa-prahāṇārthaṁ utpannakramasya bhāvanā kriyate |
T16n2959u_001:3918: sāmānyataḥ kalpanayā āśrayāśritamaṇḍalasyārthāt ādarśe pratibimbitarūpavat niḥsvabhāvadevadevīnimaṇḍalasya bhāvanākaraṇamutpattikramo'sti |
T16n2959u_001:3920: dagapoṭaśīnamagyalenāpi kathitaṁ yat tattvotpattivadāsanāyudhabījādibhiḥ devākāre'pi mukha-bhujādeḥ kalpanāṁ kṛtvā devatāmaṇḍalayorbhāvanākaraṇamutpattikramaḥ
T16n2959u_001:3921: tathā mṛtyukāle bhūtānāṁ saṁhārakramavad utpattikramīyadevānāṁ varṇa-saṁsthānādikaṁ bindau parivartitaṁ vidhāya bindumapi kramaśaḥ nāde nādamapi niruddhya niṣprapañcagaganavadadvaye sthitakaraṇaṁ niṣpannakramo'sti |
T16n2959u_001:3923: tadeva tattvārūpeṇādhimucyate bhāvyate yasmin yoge sa utpanna- kramaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:3924: tatraitad vacamapi uddhṛtamasti- śrutaṁ sahajamityuktaṁ dvidhā bhedena bheditam |
T16n2959u_001:3930: guhyasamājasya ṭīkā pradīpodyatane utpattiniṣpannakramayorneyārthanītārthatvaṁ nirdiśya prathamaḥ kalpitaḥ sa ca dvitīyaniṣpannakramasya sādhanatvenābhihitaḥ
T16n2959u_001:3931: kalpitasādhanāniṣpannakramau spaṣṭaṁ kurvatā ācāryacoṅkhāpāmahodayenoktaṁ yat yadyapi sādhanādvayaṁ sva-sva upāyakramasyāśrayamādāya devakāye niṣpadyate kintu kalpitasādhanāyāḥ ( utpattikrame )
T16n2959u_001:3932: sādhakaḥ svara-vyañjanākṣaraiḥ sūryacandrāyudhādiṣu pariṇato bhūtvā svayam iṣṭadevaṁ kalpanayā niṣpādayati |
T16n2959u_001:3934: śvetaraktavāyuṁ ca avadhūtīnāḍyāṁ praveśya- tathā''loka-ālokābhāsalabdhajñānādīnāmabhimukhe saṁjāte sūkṣmaprāṇacittena māyākāye utthāpito bhavati
T16n2959u_001:3936: vajrayānabhūmimārgavyavasthāyām ācāryaseratogapā mahodayaḥ saṁkṣepeṇa vakti yat yo hi sādhako bhāvanābalena vāyuṁ madhyamānāḍyāṁ praveśayituṁ na śaknoti tathā svakāryaniṣpannakramasantateḥ paripakvatārthaṁ janma-mṛtyu-antarābhavasadṛśabuddhyādibhi ( vikalpādibhi)
T16n2959u_001:3937: nūtanāṁ prajñaptiṁ kṛtvā bhāvanāṁ karoti sa utpattikramo'sti |
T16n2959u_001:3939: bhāvanābalena vāyormadhyamāyāṁ praveśānantaraṁ tatraiva tasya sthitivilīnatābhyām udbhūtaḥ śaikṣikasantatiyogo niṣpannakramo vartate |
T16n2959u_001:3941: kramadvayabhāvanāyāṁ sādhakāḥ sampūrṇa-brahyāṇḍaṁ devī-devatārūpeṇa pariṇāmya bhāvayanti |
T16n2959u_001:3943: 'pañcabuddhātmakaḥ sarvatrayo'yam' tatraiva - narā vajradharākārā yoṣito vajrayoṣitaḥ ' sarvasattvānāṁ kāya-vāk-cittavyavahārāttrikulaguhyamādiḥ samāyātaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:3948: tatraiva sarvabhūtānāṁ devīrūpatvena kalpanā kṛtā vidyate - pṛthivī locanākhyātā abdhāturmāmakī smṛtā |
T16n2959u_001:3953: itthaṁ sampūrṇasthāvarajaṅgamātmakaṁ jagat deva-devyoḥ pariṇatībhūya bhāvanākaraṇena sāmānyavastūni prati ātmadhāraṇasya athavā sāmānyavikalpasya prahāṇaṁ jāyate |
T16n2959u_001:3955: punardeva-devīrūpe'bhiniveśaḥ syāccet so'pi pūrvavat bandhanāya kṣamate |
T16n2959u_001:3956: asyāṁ sthitau bandhanaṁ lauhaśṛṅkhalayā svarṇaśṛṅkhalayā vā bhavet,
T16n2959u_001:3959: niṣpannakramasya bhāvanāvidhiṁ spaṣṭayatā pañcakrame'bhihitam- piṇḍagrahākrameṇaiva tathā caivānubhedataḥ |
T16n2959u_001:3962: bhūtakoṭiṁ viśed yogī piṇḍagrāha iti smṛtaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:3963: sthāvaraṁ jaṅgamaṁ caiva pūrvaṁ kṛtvā prabhāsvaram |
T16n2959u_001:3966: arthāt sampūrṇasthāvarajaṅgamātmakasya jagataḥ prabhāsvare vilīnatayā tattve sthitireva sāmānyaniṣpannakramavidhirityucyate |
T16n2959u_001:3967: yathā-saṁvṛtisatyasyāśrayaṁ binā paramārthasatyasya sākṣātkāratvaṁ na sambhāvyate |
T16n2959u_001:3973: āryadevenāpi caryāmelāpakapradīpe uktaṁ yat- ādikārmikatattvānāṁ tadarthe ( niṣpannakrame)
T16n2959u_001:3974: praveśārthaṁ bhagavān buddha upāyakauśalatvenotpattikramaṁ sopānamiva pratipāditavān |
T16n2959u_001:3975: pūrvaprapañcayuktayogaṁ bhāvayitvā sāmānyavikalpasya pariśodhanaṁ kriyate punaśca vikalpitarūpasya viśleṣaṇaṁ vidhāya nirvikalpabhāvanayā'bhiniveśasya parihāraṁ kṛtvā bodhiḥ labhyate |
T16n2959u_001:3976: kramadvayasya bhāvanāṁ vicārayatā dagapo daśīnamagyalamahodayena sāmānyatantranāmake granthe kathitaṁ yat,
T16n2959u_001:3977: nāgārjunasyādhikā anuyāyina utpattikrame buddhatva lābhānantaraṁ niṣpannakramasya bhāvanāṁ kurvanti |
T16n2959u_001:3978: tatraiva padyavajra-ajitacandrādayaḥ prathamayāme utpattikramasya tathā dvitīyayāme niṣpannakramasya bhāvanāṁ kartuṁ kathayanti |
T16n2959u_001:3979: bhoṭideśīyaviduṣāṁ matamasti yad yathā pakṣiṇāṁ uḍḍayanārthaṁ pakṣadvayasyāvaśyakatā bhavati tadvad utpatti-niṣpattikramayorbhāvanā yugapat kriyate |
T16n2959u_001:3981: atā eṣāṁ matena kramadvayasya yugapad bhāvanā karaṇīyā |
T16n2959u_001:3982: hevajre'pi idameva vākyamuktam- utpannakramayogo'yaṁ sukhaṁ mahāsukhaṁ matam |
T16n2959u_001:3985: dehābhāve kutaḥ saukhyaṁ vaktuṁ ( cāpi ) na śakyate |
T16n2959u_001:3991: paraṁ ca asyāḥ paddhatyā anukaraṇaṁ sa eva sādhakaḥ kartuṁ śaknoti yaḥ paripakvastīvrendriyasampannaśca syāt |
T16n2959u_001:3993: yathā vajragarbhavyākhyātantre buddhenoktam - anantavikalpajālairbaddhānāṁ sattvānāṁ trijagadduḥkhato nivṛttyarthaṁ tadabhirūciyogyatayoranusāraṁ śāstreṣu kramadvayāntargatānekopāyānāṁ ( vidhīnāṁ )
T16n2959u_001:3996: yathā karṣaṇakhananādibhiḥ kṣetraṁ samṛddhaṁ kriyate tadvat sādhake paripakve jāte sa niṣpannakramabhāvanārthaṁ preryate yadā sādhako vāstavikaniṣpannakramayoge ārūdo bhavati tadā sa vikalpena prajñaptanirmitotpattikramabhāvanāṁ tyajet |
T16n2959u_001:3999: yadā sādhako'kṛtrimayoge sthātuṁ śaknoti tadā tena kṛtrimadhyānabhāvanā tyaktavyā |
T16n2959u_001:4000: yathā-nadīpāre kṛte nāvaḥ āvaśyakatā na bhavati nāvaṁ tatraiva janāstyajanti tadvat niṣpannakameṇākṛtrimabhāve sthite sati kṛtrimadevayogabhāvanā tyajyate |
T16n2959u_001:4008: vasantatilake'pītthamevoktam- kṛtrimaṁ maṇḍalaṁ tyaktvā kṛtrimaṁ homakarma ca |
T16n2959u_001:4009: kṛtrimāṁ bhāvanāṁ cāpi kṛtrimaṁ japameva ca |
T16n2959u_001:4014: yathā pārārthibhiḥ kaiścit kolo vā suprayujyate |
T16n2959u_001:4017: ḍākārṇavatantre maṇḍalādi karma yacca kṛtrimacittena nirmīyatet tad bāhyacaryetyabhidhīyate |
T16n2959u_001:4020: guhyasamājottaratantre'pi sevopasevādicaturvajrayogaiḥ sāmānyasiddhestathā pratyāhāradhyānādi ṣaḍañgayogairasāmānyasiddherūpalabdhirabhihitā- ebhirvajracatuṣkeṇa sevāsāmānyasādhanam |
T16n2959u_001:4026: hevajrasya vyākhyātantre vajragarbhatantre bhagavān vakti yad yathā kodravabījataḥ śalifalasyotpattirna jāyate tadvat vikalpabījata utpannaṁ falamapi savikalpaṁ syāt bhagavān sampuṭatantre vakti- vikalpo hi mahāmohaḥ saṁsārodadhipātakaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:4029: asya vyākhyāṁ kurvan bustonamahodayo vakti yat parityājyo hi vikalpaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:4030: ayaṁ dvidhā bhavati- 1. sāmānyāvadhāraṇā yā ca durvikalpetyucyate,
T16n2959u_001:4033: dvitīyaḥ prathamasya pratiṣedhaḥ bhadravikalpaśca niṣpannakrama-nirvikalpajñānena tyajyate |
T16n2959u_001:4036: yadi tyājyastarhi yuganaddhacakradharasya prāptiḥ katham bhavet?
T16n2959u_001:4037: yato hi prajñopāyādvayasya bhāvanāṁ kṛtvā falāvasthāyāṁ yuganaddhasya prāptirbhavet |
T16n2959u_001:4042: hevajre'pi vajragarbheṇa praśne kṛte sati yat niṣpattikramabhāvanayaiva mahāsukhasya prāptiḥ syāccet tarhi utpattikramasya kimāvaśyakatvam iti
T16n2959u_001:4045: ata utpattikramaṁ binā nāsti sambhavo niṣpannakramasya |
T16n2959u_001:4046: punarapyatra praśnaḥ samāpatati yat kiṁ tarhi bandhanavat utpattistyājyetyabhihitam |
T16n2959u_001:4049: tantrasya sādhakaiḥ nūtanasaṁsāropalabdhivat sthāvarajaṅgamātmakaṁ jagat svarūpaṁ parivartya deva-devīnāṁ bhāvanālokasyāpi maṇḍalasvarūpabhāvānāṁ karaṇīyā bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:4051: tantraśāstrasyeyamevaikā mahattvapūrṇaviśeṣatā vidyate yad atra vikalpasya vikalpena prahāṇaṁ rāgasya rāgeṇa nāśaḥ kriyate |
T16n2959u_001:4052: hevajratantre uktam - yenaiva viṣakhaṇḍena mriyante sarvajantavaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:4059: karṇe toyaṁ yathā viṣṭaṁ pratitoyena kṛṣyate ||
T16n2959u_001:4065: etad vyākhyāyamānaḥ koṅaṭularinapoche vakti sāmānyavikalpasya nirodhārthaṁ devayogo'tyantamahattvamāvahati |
T16n2959u_001:4066: yathā kamapi śatruṁ prati ayamasmākaṁ mitramityavabudhya paunaḥ punyena vicāre kṛte śatrutā kṣīyate |
T16n2959u_001:4067: pramāṇavārtike'pyuktam - tasmād bhūtamabhūtaṁ vā yad yadevāti bhāvyate |
T16n2959u_001:4075: pāramitānaye ca taddhetu-samudaya-satyādeḥ nirodhasya prayāsaḥ kriyate |
T16n2959u_001:4076: kāryāvarodhāt svayaṁ kāraṇamavarūdhyate tadvad rāgamapi jānīyāt |
T16n2959u_001:4077: pāramitānayavad rāgasya pratyakṣā'nupasthitau pāramārthikayuktibhiḥ rāgasya śūnyatāyāṁ pratipādanena punaḥ rāgasyotpattinirodhe mahān prayāsaḥ karaṇīyo bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:4079: etadrāge utpanne sāmānyacaitasiko rāgaḥ svasminneva līyate |
T16n2959u_001:4080: asyāmavasthāyāṁ sasamprajanyaṁ niṣprapañcaśūnyatāyāṁ praviśecced rāgo rāgo na bhūtvā mahārāge śūnyatāsvarūpaṁ mahāsukhaṁ jāyate |
T16n2959u_001:4081: idameva kāraṇamasti yat tantrasādhakān rāgānusāraṁ catuḥstareṣu vibhajya bhagavān buddhaḥ sampuṭatantre kriyā-caryā-yoga-anuttarayogaiḥ rāgamārgīkaraṇaṁ deśitavān |
T16n2959u_001:4085: yadi punarvayaṁ tasminneva bhadravikalpe'bhiniveśaṁ kuryāma tadapyucitaṁ nāsti |
T16n2959u_001:4086: ataḥ paramārthaṁ pratipādayatā nāgārjunena tathāgatacaturāryasatyāni viślaṣya śūnyatā pratipāditā,
T16n2959u_001:4087: tadvat sāmānyaniṣpannakrame svamataṁ vivṛṇvatā vikalpa-prahāṇe svakīyābhimataṁ prakaṭitam iti pratīyate |
T16n2959u_001:4088: anyathā rūpakāye upādānahetorūtpattikramasya sthitireva na bhavet,
T16n2959u_001:4089: avasthāyāmasyāṁ niṣpannakramasya sthitirapi kevalaṁ niṣedhātmikā na bhūtvā mahāsukhasvarūpā paryudāsavidhirūpā jāyatām |
T16n2959u_001:4090: karmajaprāṇavāyoḥ avadhūtyāṁ kṛte praveśe yacca sūkṣmavāyunā jñānakāye utthāpanaṁ bhavati tad viśiṣṭotpattikramasyaiva rūpamityabhidhīyate,
T16n2959u_001:4092: saṁkṣepataḥ spaṣṭarūpeṇāsmābhirvaktuṁ śakyate yat sthūlamanomayadevarūpaṁ kriyā- caryāditantreṣu nihitaṁ tena tattulyarūpameva tyājyamasti na sampūrṇotpattikramastyājyaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:4093: dagapo ṭaśīnamagyalamahodayenāpi idamevoktaṁ yad viśiṣṭaniṣpannakramasyotpattau satyāmutpattikramasya yaśca niṣedho jātaḥ tattadanantaraṁ vikapena niyatabhāvanāyā niṣedho jātaḥ na khalvābhāsasvarūpadevacakrasya |
T16n2959u_001:4094: pañcakrame'pi nāgārjunena svādhiṣṭhānakrame kathitam- svādhiṣṭhānakramo yena sādhakena na labhyate |
T16n2959u_001:4100: arthādutpattikrame samāgatena vidhinā kalpanayā vā prajñaptiṁ kṛtvā devabhāvanā avaśyameva parityājyā,
T16n2959u_001:4101: kintvatroktasya svādhiṣṭhānakramasya devabhāvanā na parityājyā yato hi yad bodhaṁ binā sambodheḥ prāptirevāsambhavī |
T16n2959u_001:4105: yathā nāgārjunenoktam- utpattikrama eko'yam utpannakrama ityapi |
T16n2959u_001:4108: vāyoravadhūtīnāḍyāṁ praveśa-sthiti-utthāpanādibhirūrbhūtakāya evātra rūpakāyo'sti yaścotpattikramasya falamasti |
T16n2959u_001:4109: ato'tra kāryameva kāraṇatvena nāma dattamiti pratīyate |
T16n2959u_001:4110: avadhūtyāṁ vāyupraveśena utthāpitarūpakalpanayā ca prajñaptarūpaṁ na sat prabhāsvarūpakāyo'sti |
T16n2959u_001:4113: rūpo'yaṁ prabhāsvareṇa saha tadvat sthīyate yathā vṛkṣastacchāyā ca |
T16n2959u_001:4118: māyeva samvṛte satyaṁ kāyasambhoga eva saḥ ||
T16n2959u_001:4120: ataḥ sambhogakāyasya hetubhūtāṁ rūpadevatāṁ māyāvad matvā sādhakairmantramudrāmaṇḍalādīnāṁ māyāvadācaraṇaṁ sadā karaṇīyam |
T16n2959u_001:4125: arthāt yāvadavadhūtyāṁ prāṇavayoḥ praveśasthityoranantaraṁ sūkṣmaprāṇacittaṁ devakāye utthāpitaṁ na syāt tāvadeva vikalpena nirmāya utpattikramasya bhāvanā karaṇīyā |
T16n2959u_001:4126: sthitimimāmupalabhya paścāt punarvistāre maṇḍala-vimānādi-utattikramasya bhāvanākaraṇaṁ nirarthakamevāsti |
T16n2959u_001:4127: aparataḥ sūkṣmaprāṇavāyordevakāyasya yuganaddhakāye utthāpana meva niṣpannakramo vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:4128: ato'smābhirvaktuṁ śakyate yad asyā avasthāyāḥ prāptyanantaraṁ punarvistāre maṇḍala-vimānādi-utpattikramasya bhāvanākaraṇaṁ nirarthakamasti |
T16n2959u_001:4131: yadasyā avasthāyāḥ prāptyanantaraṁ utpattikramasya bhāvanā tadvat tyājyā yathā nadīpāraṅgato yātrī nāvaṁ parityajati |
T16n2959u_001:4133: asya pūrṇaprasaṅgasyābhiprāyo'yamasti yad upāyasvarūpataḥ kṛtā kṛtrimadevabhāvanaiva tyājyā,
T16n2959u_001:4135: yathā vasantatilakasya ṭīkāyāṁ rahasyadīpikāyām uktam- upeye sati he heyāstānupāyān pracakṣate |
T16n2959u_001:4136: utpattikrama iti nāmnaivedaṁ jñāyate yad iyaṁ kalpita-prajñapta-buddhayā ca navanirmitā bhāvanā vidyate,
T16n2959u_001:4141: yato hi kevalaśūnyatāyāṁ sthitirapi eko'nto'sti punaśca tatraiva vikalpena devabhāvanāyāmabhiniveśaḥ syāttadā tadapi duḥkhasya kāraṇaṁ bhaviṣyati,
T16n2959u_001:4144: vāstavikatayā'saṁspṛṣṭā tiṣṭhati yā ca kaṣṭapradaiva vartate yathā mārgāvasthāyāṁ śūnyatāṁ ( tathatāṁ )
T16n2959u_001:4146: tadvat falāvasthāyāmapi nirvikalpamātre sthīyeta cet prāṇināṁ hitaṁ kathaṁ sambhavet |
T16n2959u_001:4147: ato yuganaddhaśca syād akṛtrimaśca syādasya samyagjñānamanivāryamasti |
T16n2959u_001:4148: idaṁ tadaiva sambhavaṁ syāt yadā jñānakāyayorabhinnatāyāmarthāt sādhakaḥ advayatattvataḥ kāye utthāpito bhavet |
T16n2959u_001:4149: asmāmavasthāyāṁ vikalpasya kāpi sattā na tiṣṭhati |
T16n2959u_001:4150: vikalpastu tatraiva sambhavo yatra viṣayiviṣayayorvyāpāraḥ syāt |
T16n2959u_001:4151: ato mantranayasyeyameva viśeṣatā vidyate yat yatra kāya eva manaḥ,
T16n2959u_001:4152: manaścaiva kāyo'sti kāya eva vāk cāste viṣaya-viṣayyādeḥ pṛthak-pṛthak sattā nāsti |
T16n2959u_001:4153: sādhako yāvadasyāḥ sthiteḥ samyagbodhaṁ nopalabheta tāvadasya darśanasya vāstavikatāṁ nāvagacchet |
T16n2959u_001:4154: ata eva vasantatilake kathitam - nirvikalpānna buddhatvaṁ savikalpācca no tathā |
T16n2959u_001:4157: sfuṭatvena mantranayasyopāsanāyām utpattikramaniṣpannakramayoḥ samaprādhānyabhāvena upayogitā vartate |
T16n2959u_001:4158: pitṛtantre sāmānyotpattikramaḥ anuttaratantra utpattikramasya sāmānyavidhiḥ anuttaratantrāntargatānāṁ-pitṛtantra-mātṛtantra-advayatantrāṇāṁ bhedenotpattikramasya bhāvanāyāṁ keṣāṁcinnāmnāṁ bhinnatā samāgatā |
T16n2959u_001:4166: nāmāni dattāni tatraiva- sevāvidhānaṁ prathamaṁ dvitīyamupasādhanam |
T16n2959u_001:4171: samājottaratantre'bhihitaṁ yat - sāmānyottamabhedena sevā tu dvividhā bhavet |
T16n2959u_001:4174: catussādhanānāṁ vyākhyāṁ kurvatā candrakīrtinā ' sevyate mumukṣubhirabhyasyata iti sevā |
T16n2959u_001:4175: kiṁ tat ? pariśuddhadevatāmūrtiḥ sā jñānāmṛtenaiva ṣaḍṅgayogenaiva kartavyā niṣpādyā' iti uktvā sevāyāḥ niṣpannakramasya bhāvanāvidhiḥ spaṣṭīkṛtaḥ
T16n2959u_001:4176: utpattikrame sevāyā abhiprāyastathatāyām evaṁ bodhicitte samāhitirityabhihitam |
T16n2959u_001:4179: asya vyākhyāṁ kurvatā candrakīrtinoktam - 'sevyate ālambyata iti sevā tathatā saiva samayaḥ bhūbhāgādīnāṁ saṁyojanaṁ niṣpādanaṁ sevāsamayasaṁyogaṁ prathamāṅgam' asya bhāvaṁ sforayatā pradīpodyotanaṭīkāyāṁ bhavyakīrtinoktam- śūnyatābhāvanā jñānabhūmeḥ tathā paramārthamaṇḍalasya bhāvanaiva sevā vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:4181: ācāryabodhiśreṣṭhavacanamuddhṛtyoktaṁ yat tattvaṁ hi bodhistadbhāvanākaraṇaṁ sevā vartate |
T16n2959u_001:4183: ācāryadagapoṭaśīnamagyalamahodayenāpi sevāṁ spaṣṭayoktaṁ yat sarvaśūnyatāyāṁ tatparivartya- bhāvanākaraṇādārabhya vimāna-āsanādiṁ yāvad bhāvanākaraṇaṁ sevetyabhidhīyate |
T16n2959u_001:4185: ' asya vyākhyāyāṁ pradīpodyotane uktam ' śūnyatālambanaṁ sūryādyālambanamupasādhanam |
T16n2959u_001:4187: śūnyatāyā bhāvanāṁ kurvatā sādhakena sūryamaṇḍala-candramaṇḍalabījākṣarādīnāṁ kramaśo nyāsaṁ vidhāya tatpariṇatyā mahāmudrākāya-niṣpannakaraṇamupasādhanamasti
T16n2959u_001:4188: niṣpannakramasyoccāvasthāyāṁ sūkṣmaprāṇacittena utthāpito yaśca saṁbhogakāyarūpatvenotpadyate sa śuddhaniṣpannajñānakāya ityucyate |
T16n2959u_001:4190: guhyasamājapañjikākṛṣṇayamāritantrādiṣu samāgateṣu caturyogeṣu tṛtīyātiyogaṁ yāvatsādhanā- upasādhanāyāṁ saṁgṛhītā vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:4191: ' upasādhanasiddhyagre vajrāyatanavicāraṇam ' iti mūlatantrasya śābdikamarthaṁ kurvatā pradīpodyotane uktam |
T16n2959u_001:4192: upa samīpe sādhyaṁ niṣpādyate iti kṛtvā,
T16n2959u_001:4193: siddhiḥ mahāmudrāsiddhistasyā agrāādibhūtāḥ praṇavādayo mantrāḥ yasmin tadupasādhanasiddhyagraṁ vinyastasamastamantrākṣaraṁ mahāmudrārūpaṁ yasmin vajravairocanādisaptaparyantāsteṣāmāyatanāni rūpaskandhādayasteṣāṁ tṛtīyavyavasthātikrameṇa nirnīrya kāryakāraṇaparijñānavicāraṇā sādhyate adhiṣṭhānāyārādhyate tena tatsādhanacodanam |
T16n2959u_001:4194: anyagrantheṣu pañcābhisambodhibhya ārabhya āyatanādhiṣṭhānaṁ yāvad yā sādhanā sopasādhanetyucyate |
T16n2959u_001:4195: atrāyatanādhiṣṭhānasyābhiprāyo'sti kāyamaṇḍale bījākṣarasya devatādīnāṁ vā nyāsakaraṇam |
T16n2959u_001:4196: sādhanam guhyasamājasya mūlatantre'bhihitam- sādhane codanaṁ proktaṁ mantrādhipatibhāvanam |
T16n2959u_001:4197: asya vyākhyāṁ kurvatā candrakīrtinoktaṁ yat ' sādhanopasthānāyārthaḥ adhyeṣaṇaṁ sādhanārthaḥ samayaḥ sameti gacchati iti samayaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:4198: samādhisattvo jñānasatvaśca sādhanārthaśca samayaśca tṛtīyam ' mantrādhipatinā aoṁkārādinā kāya-vāk-cittā-nāmādhiṣṭhitārthaṁ trivajraṁ codayitvā svena sahābhinne ekarase caryāsamaye sthitissādhanā vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:4203: mantravajrī arthāt sādhakaḥ svayaṁ sādhanāyāṁ samāgatakramānusāram adhidevavajrapadyābhisamāpatti ' vajradhṛg' ādinā svadehe 32 devān mahāmudrārūpe utpādayati tathā svayamadhidevaśirasi vajradharādestathā svaśarīre nyāsitadevānāṁ śirasi vairocanādestathā svaśarīre nyāsitadevānāṁ śirasi vairocanāderbhāvanāṁ kurvan tebhyo'bhiṣekaṁ prāpya mahāmudrākāyasya siddhirjāteti bhāvanāṁ karoti |
T16n2959u_001:4206: saṁkṣepata imāni sevādicaturyogasādhanāni spaṣṭīkurvatā ācāryadagapokuśīnamagyalamahodayenoktam yat sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṁ parivartanaṁ vidhāya vimāna-āsanaṁ yāvat yo bhāvanāvidhiḥ sa eva sevāyogo'sti |
T16n2959u_001:4207: pradhānadevatāyā bhāvānāṁ kṛtvā āyatanādhiṣṭhānaṁ yāvat yaḥ kramaḥ sa upasevāyogo'sti |
T16n2959u_001:4209: traye abhinnādhiṣṭhānakaraṇaṁ yāvat yo vidhiḥ sa sādhanayogo'sti,
T16n2959u_001:4211: sevādicaturyogeṣu prathame trayaḥ svārthasiddhiyogā antimastu parārthasiddhiyogaḥ ityucyate |
T16n2959u_001:4215: tridhyānaṁ sforayatā ācārya koṅṭulamahodayenoktaṁ yat maṇḍalasya pradhānanirmāturyuganaddhakāyasya anyaddhyānadvayasya niṣpannatāyāḥ pūrvaṁ bhāvanākaraṇādayam 'ādi' rityucyate tathā prajñopāyasyādvayayoge jāte yoga ityucyate |
T16n2959u_001:4216: itthaṁ tridhyānāt pūrvaṁ ādiyogadhyāne vimānamaṇḍalāt pradhānayuganaddhakāyasya bhāvanāṁ yāvat vidhiḥ sammilito bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:4217: yuganaddhakāye bodhicittena mantradevaṁ nyasya maṇḍalasya pariniṣpannatāṁ yāvat yo yogaḥ tad dvitīyamaṇḍalarājagradhyānamityucyate |
T16n2959u_001:4218: tadanantaraṁ devakṣetrapariśuddhiprabhṛtikaṁ devatulya-kṛtyakaraṇaṁ ca antimaṁ karmarājāgradhyānamityucyate |
T16n2959u_001:4219: kṛṣṇayamāritantrānusāram utpattikramasya bhāvanā caturyogavidhinā kriyate - prathamaṁ bhāvayed yogamanuyogaṁ dvitīyakam |
T16n2959u_001:4222: caturyogānāṁ sthitiṁ nirūpayatā tatraivoktam - vajrasattvasya niṣpattiryoga ityabhidhīyate |
T16n2959u_001:4231: kṛṣṇayamāritantrasya pañjikāyāṁ ratnamālāyāṁ yogānuyogātiyogamahāyogān spaṣṭayatā vanaratnenaiṣāṁ savistaraṁ vivecanaṁ kṛtam - yogaḥ saptavidhānuttarapūjāta ārabhya pañcābhidhānena vajratattvasya niṣpattiparyanto vidhireva yoga ityucyate |
T16n2959u_001:4236: vajratantrasya bhāvanākaraṇānantaram anuyogo'yaṁ vārāhīlohitavarṇena saha samāhito'sti |
T16n2959u_001:4237: etādṛśyā bhāvanāyā anantaraṁ tat svahṛdayakamale 'haṁ' akṣareṇa sfuritakaraṇaṁ,
T16n2959u_001:4241: bodhicittena maṇḍalotpattikaraṇaṁ tathā maṇḍale bījākṣarāṇāṁ nyāsakaraṇaṁ yāvad yo vidhiḥ sa anuyogavidhirityucyate |
T16n2959u_001:4243: yathā- 'kṣe' akṣareṇa mohasya kṛṣṇayāreśca tasya 'ma' akṣareṇa kṛṣṇayamāryāderūtthāpanam atiyogo'sti |
T16n2959u_001:4244: mahāyogaḥ vajrasattva-niṣpattiḥ bījākṣara-nyāsaḥ tadbījairiṣṭadevasya prākaṭayam sampūrṇapradhānadevaḥ anucaradevādibhirmaṇḍalasya paripūrṇatā,
T16n2959u_001:4254: kṛṣṇayamāritantrīye saptadaśe paṭale'sya yogacatuṣṭayasya savistaraṁ vyākhyā kṛtā |
T16n2959u_001:4255: saṁkṣepato yogacatuṣṭayaṁ sforayatā ācārya dagapo ṭaśīnamagyalamahodayenoktaṁ yat āśrayavimānabhāvanāta ārabhya hetuvajradharaṁ ( vajrasattvaṁ
T16n2959u_001:4261: atraitadavagamanamatīvāvaśyakamasti yat tantre- maṇḍalapradhānadevatā-anucara-devatā-bījākṣarādayaḥ sarve ekasvabhāvasyārthāt santateḥ bhavanti
T16n2959u_001:4263: ataḥ spaṣṭaśabdeṣu asmābhirvaktuṁ śakyate yat- sampūrṇā devī-devatā,
T16n2959u_001:4266: utpattikramasya catvāryaṅgāni mātṛtantrasya pradhānahevajratantre'ṅgacatuṣṭayairūtpattikramasya bhāvanāvidhirnāsti - prathamaṁ śūnyatābodhiṁ dvitīyaṁ bījasaṁgrahaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:4269: arthāt pitṛtantre samāgatasevādivad atrāpi sarvadharmāḥ śūnyatāprabhāsvarabodhicitte parivartayitavyāḥ ayamutpattikramikabhāvanāyā ādhāro'sti
T16n2959u_001:4272: tad bījākṣarasya yathā herūkārthaṁ ' hū' akṣarasya bhāvanāṁ vidhāya prakāśa-sfuraṇa-saṁharaṇavidheranukaraṇaṁ kṛtvā'trha vā pañcābhisambodhi-kriyayeṣṭadeve utthāpanamathavā'nukaraṇīyameva dvitīyāṅgamasti |
T16n2959u_001:4273: bījākṣarasya sfuraṇasaṁhārayoratha vā pañcābhisambodheḥ paripūrṇatāyāmiṣṭadeva-pratibimbasya paripūrṇabhāvanā bimbaniṣpattināmakaṁ tṛtīyamaṅgamasti
T16n2959u_001:4276: sampuṭatantre'pi kramo'yaṁ samāgataḥ - punarapi śūnyatābodhiṁ dvitīye bījasaṁgraham |
