T16n2959u_001:4300: asya vyākhyāṁ kurvatā candrakīrtinā'nbhihitam yat yaḥ sādhako'dvayatattvamanavagamya svabhinnastathāgato bodhisatvo vāsti iti svīkṛtyābhiniveśavaśāt tatprāptimabhilaṣati tasyāsyābhiniveśasya prahāṇārthamabhihitaṁ yat sa svata eva sarvamasti,
T16n2959u_001:4302: tadatiriktaṁ bāhya- grāhya sādhya-hetu bodhisatva-kṣitigarbhādiṣu kimapi tathāgato nāsti |
T16n2959u_001:4303: yacca tathāgatakulādervidhānamasti tatsarvaṁ vairocanādiṣu eṣu pañcabuddheṣu sannihitaṁ vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:4304: pañcatathāgata-svīyarūpādiḥ pañcaskandha evāsti nānyat kimapi bāhyam |
T16n2959u_001:4305: taddvayaṁ tridhātu-bāhyān kṣiti-jala-pāvakādīṁśca paśyāmastatsarvaṁ vairocanatulyacittasyaiva-vistāro vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:4315: vyāvṛtyanusāraṁ kevalaṁ nāmaiva bhinnaṁ tattvantu ekamevāsti |
T16n2959u_001:4321: arthāt samastaṁ carācaraṁ jagat ātmadevasya rūpamasti |
T16n2959u_001:4325: vajraḍākārṇavatantre'pīdamevoktam- māyājāle yogatrayasya vidhirabhihitaḥ- yogastu trividho jñeyo'dhiṣṭhānaḥ parikalpitaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:4332: tat kalpiteti kathito yogaḥ kalpita ucyate ||
T16n2959u_001:4338: atra varṇitasya adhiṣṭhānayoga-parikalpitayoga-niṣpannakramādināmakasya yoga-trayasya ācāryakoṅṭulamahodayena parikalpita-adhiṣṭhāna-pariniṣpanna iti kramaḥ sthāpitaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:4339: anenaitad yogatraye utpattikrama-niṣpannakrama-vidhidvayaṁ spaṣṭayatoktaṁ yat 1. śūnyatājñānena bījākṣaram āyudhādinotpannamukha-bhujavān devotpattikramaḥ devayoga ityucyate |
T16n2959u_001:4340: hṛdayakamalasthitaṁ bījākṣaraṁ tilakena prakāśasfureṇaṁ saṁharaṇādikaṁ sanimittaniṣpannakramo'sti |
T16n2959u_001:4341: 2. mantraṁ śūnyatāmahāsukhe'dhiṣṭhitaṁ vidhāye tena zhaṭiti rūpeṇa devamaṇḍalasya bhāvanā utpattikramo'sti |
T16n2959u_001:4342: vāyumantrayorabhinnasvarūpe zhaṭiti ca devarūpīyabhāvanāyāḥ parityāgaṁ kṛtvā cittavivekādīnāṁ parīkṣā'karaṇasthitiḥ niṣpannakramo'sti |
T16n2959u_001:4343: 3. mukha-bhujavad yuganaddhamahākāyānāmathavā mukhabhujādīnāṁ parityāgaṁ vidhāya prabhāsvaramahāsukhe sthitiḥ pariniṣpannakramayogo vidyate
T16n2959u_001:4346: vajrasattvaniṣpatteranantaraṁ maṇḍala-rājāgraṁ yāvad yo vidhiḥ sa saṁsthānayoga ityucyate |
T16n2959u_001:4350: yathā- 1 . saṁsthānayogaḥ zhaṭiti devabhāvanā arthāt kāyaviveko'sti |
T16n2959u_001:4354: etatspaṣṭayatā ācāryaseratogapā mahodayenoktaṁ yat śūnyatābhāvanād ārabhya svayaṁ maṇḍalacakre yuganaddharūpakāyaṁ yāvad yā bhāvanā tadādiyogadhyānamasti
T16n2959u_001:4355: samāpattyā bodhicittena maṇḍalaṁ nirmāya tatra mantradevanyāsaṁ kṛtvā devānāmutpattikaraṇaṁ maṇḍalarājāgradhyānamasti |
T16n2959u_001:4364: karmarājāgraḥ upasevāyogo'sti tilakasya pariniṣpannatā tilakayogo'sti tathā mahāsukhasya pariniṣpannatā sūkṣmayogo'sti |
T16n2959u_001:4365: itthaṁ mātṛtantra-pitṛtantra-advayatantreṣu yadyapi kramikavidhīnāṁ kramanāmnoranekabhedā dṛśyante kintu eṣu parasparaṁ virodhābhāso nāsti |
T16n2959u_001:4367: bustonaḥ kathayati yat yaḥ sādhakaḥ saṁkṣepataḥ anuttaratantrīyotpattikramasya- bhāvanāṁ kartumicchati sa hevajre kathitayogacatuṣṭayena yaśca sādhako madhyavistāravidhinā savistaraṁ bhāvanā kartumicchati saḥ guhyasamāje samāgatena prakṛtyātmakena catuḥ sevādyupāyenāthavā kālacakre samāgatena maṇḍalarājāgrādiyogacatuṣṭayena kartuṁ śaknoti tatraiva tenedamapyuktaṁ yad utpattikrame prakāradvayaṁ bhavati ekastu iṣṭadevasya bhāvanākaraṇamaparastu vimānamaṇḍala-mantradevī-devatā anucarādibhissahotpattikramasya bhāvanā |
T16n2959u_001:4368: utattikramikabhāvanāyā anivāryayogyatā vātāvaraṇaṁ ca sādhakānāṁ kṛte sāmānyasāmānyamārgadvayasya samyakpūrvābhyāsa āvaśyakaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:4369: viśeṣato yasyeṣṭadevasya sādhanā karaṇīyā syāt tasyābhiṣekaprāpakāstat samayasaṁvarayośca yathāvatpālakaścet sa evotpattikramīyabhāvanākaraṇasyādhikārī bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:4370: maṇḍalapraveśābhāve samayacyute sati sādhanāyā guhyavidhīnajñātvā yāvatī sādhanā syāt siddhistvasambhavā evāsti |
T16n2959u_001:4371: sthānam ādikārmikaḥ pūrvaṁ śobhanaṁ sthānaṁ gatvā sādhanāṁ kuryāt |
T16n2959u_001:4372: yatra kīdṛśo'i sāṁsāriko vikṣepaḥ sādhanāṁ na dūṣayet prabhāvayed vā |
T16n2959u_001:4373: mahadgurūbhiradhiṣṭhiteṣu sthāneṣu tīrtheṣu ca kṛtā sādhanā viśeṣafalavatī bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:4376: abhidhānottaratantre'pyuktamasti yat- girikandarāsu-parvataśikhareṣu-mahānadītaṭe-sāgarakūle-ekavṛkṣe-pavitrasthāne-śmaśāne-śivālaye-devālaye-stūpe-catuṣpathe ca sādhanākaraṇāt śīghraṁ siddhirlabhyate |
T16n2959u_001:4377: hevajre'pyuktamasti - prathamābhyāsakālasya sthānaṁ vai kalpitaṁ śubham |
T16n2959u_001:4382: ādikārmikaiḥ kutra cinmanoramasthānasyopalabdhirna syāccet tadā sarveṣu parivāreṣu supteṣu gṛhasyaikāntakoṇe'pi sādhanā karaṇīyā |
T16n2959u_001:4383: 2. pitṛtantre viśeṣotpattikramasya bhāvanāvidhiḥ ayaṁ bhāgatraye vibhājayituṁ śakyate ( ka )
T16n2959u_001:4392: vighno na samāpatet tadarthaṁ balividhiḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:4393: hevajre'bhihitaṁ yat nairātmyena satvārthaṁ vighnato rakṣāvidhyarthañca praśne kṛte bhagavānāha- tatra pṛcchati nairātmye satvārthāya mahābalim
T16n2959u_001:4398: tatraivāgre- anena balinā yadi sarvabhūtānāṁ pūjāṁ prakurvanti śubhāya yoginaḥ vaśyābhicāra-puṣṭi-uccāṭana-māraṇādiṣu dakṣatāyai balipūjā varṇitā vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:4399: 2. kasyāpi kāryasya siddhyai janena puṇyavatā bhāvyam |
T16n2959u_001:4402: etadapi satyaṁ yad bhāgayahetuḥ svahaste bhavati,
T16n2959u_001:4405: puṇyasaṁbhāraṁ prakaṭayatā bhagavatā hevajre uktam - prathamaṁ bhāvayenmaitrīṁ dvitīye karūṇāṁ tathā |
T16n2959u_001:4409: jñānasambhāraṁ spaṣṭayatā dagapoṭaśīnamagyala mahodayanoktaṁ yat ' aoṁ ' sarve dharmāḥ svabhāvaśuddhāḥ svabhāvaśuddho'ham ' ityasyoccāraṇena viṣayiviṣayādvaitasya bhāvanā karaṇīyā |
T16n2959u_001:4411: svabhāvasya tātparyaṁ grāhya-grāhakāṇāṁ sarvadharmāṇāṁ prakṛtyā viśuddhatā-śūnyatā-bhāvanāthavā śūnyatā vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:4413: etādṛśīṁ smṛtiṁ kurvan advayasya bhāvanā karaṇīyā |
T16n2959u_001:4414: dīpaṁkaraśrījñānenāpyuktaṁ yat - 'aoṁ svabhāva ' ādi mantraṁ vāratrayamuccārya tadarthasmaraṇena śūnyatā-bodhakaraṇe sāmarthyopalabdhiḥ śūnyatāyāḥ paunaḥ punyasmṛtistatra dṛdatāprāptiḥ tathā - jñānasambhārasya saṁcayaḥ āśrayāśrita-devatā-maṇḍalādiḥ etat sarvaṁ śūnyatāyāḥ vyākṛtarūpamasti
T16n2959u_001:4416: 3. rakṣācakrasya bhāvanā sāmānyarakṣācakrabhāvanāyāṁ sādhako yasmin sthāne sādhanāṁ karoti tatsthānaṁ viśvajareṇa nirmitabhūmiḥ viśvavajreṇa
T16n2959u_001:4418: hevajre uktamasti - refeṇa sūryaṁ vibhāvya tasmin ravau hū bhavaviśvavajram |
T16n2959u_001:4419: tenaiva vajreṇa vibhāvayecca prakārakaṁ pañcarabandhanaṁ ca ||
T16n2959u_001:4421: viśeṣarakṣācakre daśārayutasya cakrasya bhāvanā karaṇīyā tathā pratyaraṁ madhye hayagrīva- yamāntaka-calādidaśakrodhadevānāṁ bhāvanāṁ vidhāya tad vighnanāśasya ājñā dātavyā |
T16n2959u_001:4422: anayā viśeṣatayā asamānyaṁ rakṣacakramidam ājñācakramiti kathayanti janāḥ |
T16n2959u_001:4423: maulotpattikramastu bhāgatraye vibhajyate- utpattikramasya vidhiḥ tasya pariśodhyaḥ japabhāvanayorbhedaśca |
T16n2959u_001:4424: prathame āśrayavimānasyotpattividhiḥ āśrita- devasyotpattividhiḥ - utpattikramasya sampannavidhiśca gaṇyate |
T16n2959u_001:4428: mārgāvasthāyāṁ māyādvyākāyasyāśrayaḥ vimānaṁ nirmāya puṇyaparipakvatāyāḥ sāmarthyaprāptiḥ falā'vasthāyāṁ jñānabhāsamaṇḍalīyasiddheḥ sopānasthāpanamarthāt svayaṁ bodhiprāptyanantaram upabhogasthānasya saṁskāraśca |
T16n2959u_001:4429: āśrayavimānabhāvānāpūrvaṁ om śūnyatājñānavajrasvabhāvātmako'ham ityuccārya sampūrṇaṁ jagat śūnyatāyāṁ parivartitaṁ vidhātavyam |
T16n2959u_001:4431: aom a u ma ebhirakṣarairniṣpanno'sti yaśca kāya-vāk-cittānāṁ bodhakaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:4438: asya svabhāva āgantukamalairvirahitaḥ pariśuddhasvabhāvakaśca 'aham' iti svabhāvaśuddho'sti |
T16n2959u_001:4439: manomayarūpe athavā kalpanāmātreṇa īdṛgavagamanamasyārtho nāsti api tu ābhyantararaticetanasvarūpe sthito bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:4441: yathā bodhicaryāvatāre uktamasti- yadā na bhāvo nābhāvo mateḥ santiṣṭhate puraḥ |
T16n2959u_001:4444: anenedamapi spaṣṭībhavati yat vayamanādikālato bhavacakrapatitā bhūtvā vastūnāṁ samīcīnāṁ sthitimajñātvā ' ahaṁ mamādaḥ ' pratyabhiniveśato'bhyastā bhavāmo'to'smākaṁ śūnyatāyā vajrajñānātmaka-prabhāsvarasya jñānaṁ na bhavet sādhako bhūtvā ātmagrahe āsakto bhavet ataḥ pūrvaṁ mādhyamikakārikāyāṁ samāgatābhiranekayuktibhiḥ śūnyatānairātmyayoḥ arthāt 'nāhaṁ' ' nāsti mama ' ityasya dādryena dhyānabhāvanā'vaśyameva karaṇīyā |
T16n2959u_001:4445: yato hi 'nāhaṁ' 'nāsti mama' bhāvaneyam ahaṁ mama ityanayoḥ sākṣāt pratipakṣarūpā |
T16n2959u_001:4446: ataḥ pūrvaṁ sādhakaiḥ kimapi nāstīti bhāvanā atyāvaśyakī karaṇīyā |
T16n2959u_001:4447: etad bodhe jāte yo'pi vikalpasyāthavā cittasya bāhyo vegaḥ ataḥ so'pi tyājyaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:4449: yadā bhāvanāyā viśleṣaṇaṁ kariṣyāmastadā tat svabhāvo nopalapsyate niḥ svabhāvo nirālambanaśca bhaviṣyati tarhi punarnirālambanasya bodho'pi ālambanā'bhāve niṣedho naśyati |
T16n2959u_001:4450: bodhicaryāvatāre uktamasti- yadā na labhyate bhāvo yo nāstīti prakalpyate |
T16n2959u_001:4454: yathāvad jñātāyāmavasthāyāmasyāṁ tantre samāgatāśrayadevānāṁ bhāvanayā sādhako yuganaddhaprāpteradhikārī bhavet anyathotpattikramaḥ sarvaḥ kālpaniko bhaviṣyati |
T16n2959u_001:4455: idameva kāraṇamasti yat sādhakastantre svabhāvaṁ mudritaṁ karoti tathā prabhāsvarasamprajanyena yukto bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:4456: cittena kāye mudrite sati kāyaścittarūpo jāyate |
T16n2959u_001:4459: hetuṁ falena mudrayitvā sambhogakāye sādhaka utthāpito bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:4461: yathā nāmasaṅgītāvabhihitam ' anādinidhano buddha ādibuddho niranvayaḥ ' tadvat tantraśāstreṣu yatra svayaṁ hevajrādidevatāsu utthāpitārikta akṣobhyādinā'bhiṣekaprāptirūktā tat svabhāvataḥ svabhāvasya mudraṇam ucyate |
T16n2959u_001:4463: ato yāvanto rūpakāyadayo vidyante tatsarvaṁ cittāriktaṁ nānyat kiñcit |
T16n2959u_001:4467: rakṣācakravimānamaṇḍalādiḥ kūṭāgārarūpaḥ viśvacakraṁ vajraśca yo parisararūpaḥ te sarve citte utpadyante |
T16n2959u_001:4468: anena siddhyati yat etat sarvaṁ cittajñānāya vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:4470: tatra sarvatraikatvapradarśanaṁ tathā saṁvṛtau etat kathanamasti yat vṛkṣasya yāvanto bhāgāḥ pṛthvīto bahiḥ tāvanto bhāgā ābhyantarīyāḥ santi
T16n2959u_001:4471: pṛthvīgarbhasthite vṛkṣajaḍabhāve tasya bahiḥ nāsti kiñcidastitvaṁ tadvat bahiṣṭhā yāvanto raṁga-rūpa-ākārādayaḥ tatsarvaṁ jaḍatulyacittasyaiva vistāro vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:4472: prāyaḥ samastānuttaratantragrantheṣu utpattikramasya vimānabhāvanā dharmodayena bhūtocchedanaparyāyābhyāṁ kriyate |
T16n2959u_001:4473: dharmodayā'bhyantare bhūtānavilīya viśvapadyaviśvavajrayorūpari vimānabhāvanā'thavā bhūtānāmupari kramaśaḥ sumerostadupari viśvapadyavajrayoḥ tanmadhye vimānasya ca bhāvanā kriyate |
T16n2959u_001:4475: vimānasyotpattiḥ ' bhrū' ādi bījākṣarairvajrabhāvanayā vairocanādisravitavidhinā ca kriyate |
T16n2959u_001:4476: kṛṣṇayamāritantrīyaratnāvalīṭīkāyāṁ vimānamaṇḍalasya bhāvanāvidhirnimnāṅkitaḥ - om śūnyatā jñānavajrasvabhāvātmako'hamiti mantramuccārya ākāśasamaṁ cittaṁ kṛtvā - refeṇa sūryaṁ purato vibhāvya tasmin ravau hūbhavaviśvavajram |
T16n2959u_001:4477: tenaiva vajreṇa vibhāvayet ca prakārakaṁ pañcarabandhanaṁ ca ||
T16n2959u_001:4479: tena bhūmivāḍaṁ ca tadabhyantarāvasthitaviśvavajrasyopari sthitāvakāśatmakākāśe kṛṣṇayaṅkārajavāyumaṇḍalaṁ dhanurākāraṁ kṛṣṇaṁ koṭidvaye calatpatākādvayānvitaṁ tadupari raktaraṁ kāreṇāgnimaṇḍalaṁ trikoṇaṁ raktaṁ koṇeṣu ca refāṅktitam |
T16n2959u_001:4480: tadupari sitavaṁkāreṇa jalamaṇḍalaṁ ghaṇṭāṅkaṁ sitamadhomukhaṁ tadupari pītālaṁkāreṇa caturasraṁ pṛthvīmaṇḍalaṁ pītaṁ koṇeṣu triśūkavajrāṅkitaṁ vibhāvya zhaṭiti vāyumaṇḍalādisarvapariṇāmena kūṭāgāraṁ dvipuraṁ viśvadalakamalasyopari yathāsvaṁ sthitacandrasūryāsanaṁ caturasraṁ aṣṭastambhopaśobhitaṁ catustoraṇabhūṣitam |
T16n2959u_001:4481: hārārdhahāraghaṇṭāpatākādisahitaṁ sarvasampūrṇalakṣaṇaṁ dhyātvā ādi abhidhānottaratantre'pi evameva samāgatam |
T16n2959u_001:4485: padyaṁ vajraṁ tathā khaḍgaṁ utpalaṁ bhāvayed budhaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:4490: samvarodayatantre'pi vimānamaṇḍalādvahiraṣṭaśmaśāna-bhāvanā'bhihitā aṣṭau śmaśānāni santi - vajrapañjaramadhye tu śmaśānāṣṭakabhūṣitam |
T16n2959u_001:4496: hevajrasādhanavajra pradīpaṭippaṇyāṁ sarorūhavajre aṣṭaśmaśānānāṁ sthitirnimnāṅkitā - 1. pūrve caṇḍograṁ nāma mahāśmaśānaḥ śirīṣavṛkṣe gajamukho maharddhikaḥ sitaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:4498: vāsukirnāgarājaḥ pīto garjito megho viśvarṇaḥ sumerūparvatāścamūralamayaḥ sitavajro nāma caityaśvetaḥ 2. dakṣiṇe karaṅkabhīṣaṇaṁ nāma mahāśmaśānaṁ
T16n2959u_001:4500: yamo dikpālo mahiṣārūdaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ padyo nāgasitaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:4506: varūṇo dik patiḥ sitaḥ karkoṭako nāgo raktaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:4518: aiśānyāṁ lakṣmīvanaṁ nāma mahāśmaśānaṁ vaṭavṛkṣe gomukho maharddhikaḥ sitaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:4548: pañcābhisambodhinotpattikramasya bhāvanāvidhiḥ sampuṭatamtrīyanairātmyasādhanāpaṭalānusāraṁ kṛṣṇayamāritantrasya ṭīkāratnāvalyāḥ 17 paṭalānusāraṁ coktaprāyam |
T16n2959u_001:4549: atra tatsvarūpaṁ kathayatā utpattikramasya prakriyā spaṣṭīkariṣyate |
T16n2959u_001:4552: tadanantaramālerarthāt 16 svarāṇāṁ bhāvanāṁ vidhāya tat candre pariṇeyam atra candraḥ śukrabodhakaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:4553: sampuṭatantrakṛṣṇayamāritantrayoḥ svaraṁ dviguṇīkṛtyaikāṁ dakṣiṇataḥ āvartananāmikāṁ dvitīyāṁ vāmato nivartanaṁ ( parikramāṁ )
T16n2959u_001:4555: svaraṁ dviguṇīkṛtya bhāvanākaraṇasyābhiprāyo'yaṁ vidyate yadayaṁ 32 lakṣaṇabodhako'sti hevajre uktamasti- śukrākāro bhaved bhagavān tatsukhaṁ kāminī smṛtam |
T16n2959u_001:4557: ālistu sampūrṇaśarire śukrādiṣu 16 svararūpeṇa sthitā bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:4558: śuklapakṣe śarīrasya vāmata ūrdhvaṁ vistāraṁ labhamānā kramaśaḥ pādāṅguṣṭhe ' a ' rūpe jaṅghāyāṁ 'ā' rūpe urasi ' i ' rūpe yonau ' ī' rūpe nābhau 'u' rūpe hṛdaye 'ūkārādirūpe sthitā'sti |
T16n2959u_001:4559: saṁvarodayatantre uktamasti- tathaiva kṛṣṇapratipadam ārabhya yāvad amāvāsī |
T16n2959u_001:4560: tāvat saṁkramaṇaṁ bhavet vāme candra āliḥ sūkṣmasvabhāvaḥ ||
T16n2959u_001:4562: hevajre'pi tathāgatasya 32 lakṣaṇāni 80 vyañjanāni śukra-raktayorūpe kāye vidyamānāni santīti,
T16n2959u_001:4566: āmnāyamañjaryāmabhihitamasti yat śukrasukhābhyāṁ vyāpṛtāni 16 aṅgāni yeṣāmupari nirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ tatsthānadvaye śuklakṛṣṇapakṣabhedābhyāṁ bhinnatayā svarāṇāṁ dviguṇitā bhāvanā kriyate |
T16n2959u_001:4567: candramaṇḍalopari kālirūpeṇa bhāskaraḥ upavyañjanānāṁ rūpe ḍa dha ya ra la va iti ṣaḍakṣarāṇi saṁmelya 40 vyañjanānāṁ raktavarṇe bhāvanā kriyate
T16n2959u_001:4568: 34 akṣareṣu yāni ṣaḍakṣarāṇi saṁyojyante tatra matabhedo dṛśyate |
T16n2959u_001:4569: kṛṣṇayamāritantrīyaṭīkā-ratnāvalyāṁ'ta da dha va ya la ' sammelyante |
T16n2959u_001:4570: vyañjanāni dviguṇitāni vidhāya 80 nirmāṇasyābhiprāyo hi 80 anuvyañjanānāṁ spaṣṭīkaraṇam |
T16n2959u_001:4572: tadanu candrasūryayormadhye bījākṣareṣu āyudhasya bhāvanā karaṇīyā |
T16n2959u_001:4574: prāyaḥ samastasādhanāsu ekasyaivāyudhasya bhāvanayā raśmisfuraṇasaṁharaṇavidhayoranukaraṇānantaram āyudhavajrasattvasyātha vā yasya kasyāpi bhāvanā kartavyā,
T16n2959u_001:4578: caturgītisaṁcodanena vajrasattvasya bhāvanāṁ yadi kuryāccet pañcābhisambodhinā vajrasattvasya niṣpannatāyai vajrasattve ( mātā-pitroḥ)
T16n2959u_001:4579: tathā tadvajrasattve-yuganaddhakāye antarābhavasattvasadṛśeṣu aoṁ āḥ hū eṣu tri bījākṣareṣu praviśya tadutthāpito vajrasattva eva hetuvajrasattva ityucyate |
T16n2959u_001:4580: hetuvajrasattvasyotpattau pañcābhisambodhinā niṣpannāyāṁ satyāṁ carcikādidevyaḥ gītinā prāṇināṁ hitārthaṁ tadutthāpanāya prerayanti |
T16n2959u_001:4581: carcikādevīnāmabhiprāyo hi buddhaiḥ pūrvaṁ puṇyasañcayakāle maitryādicaturbrahyavihāra-nairātmyabhāvānādeśca balena preritaiḥ bhūtvā prāṇināṁ hitārthamanurāgayuktadevatāyā utpādanamasti |
T16n2959u_001:4582: gītinā samprairya devatotthāpanaṁ jarāyujapariśodhanavidhinā utpattikramasya bhāvanayā kriyate |
T16n2959u_001:4583: hetuvajrasattvasya falavajrasattve āgamanavidheḥ pariśodhanena saha saṁyojayet cet manuṣyajāterjanmagrahaṇārthaṁ kuśalakarma kartavyameva |
T16n2959u_001:4595: maitrī-karūṇādicaturbrahyavihārāṇāṁ rakṣācakrādīnāṁ sthitiśca pūrvakarmāṇi svīkṛtā vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:4597: etadabhyāsenābhyantaracaryāsu caturbhūtairtilakasya bodhicittasya vā vistāro kriyate |
T16n2959u_001:4598: vajrasatvaḥ yuganaddhasya heturyaśca antarābhavasya satvo manyate |
T16n2959u_001:4599: etāni bījākṣarāṇi uṣṇīṣe guhye vā bodhicittarūpeṣu om āḥ hū ityatra praviśya tasmin yuganaddhakāye karūṇāmanurāgaṁ ca janayanti tathā tebhyaḥ pradhānadevasya ( falasya )
T16n2959u_001:4601: itthaṁ punarvilīya bhāvanākaraṇam utpattikramasya vāstavikī sthitirarthāt sattvānāmutpannavidheḥ samyagavabodhanam abhyāsakaraṇaṁ tu hetuvajrasatvafalavajrasatvayormahāsukhasvarūpamavagantuṁ vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:4602: bhūyo bhūyo vilīnatvaṁ samutpādaśca tathā utpattikṣaṇabhaṅgaprakriyā'vabodhanaṁ tathatā'vabodhanaṁ caitatprakriyālakṣyaṁ pratīyate |
T16n2959u_001:4607: utpattikramānusāraṁ sādhakasya mārgā'vabodhaḥ utpattikramikabhāvanānusāram ācāryakoṅṭulamahodayena sādhakānāṁ bhedacatuṣṭayaṁ kṛtam |
T16n2959u_001:4612: 1. ādikarmikasādhakaḥ prārambhe sevādicatuḥsādhanaiḥ sādhanāsamaye ekasmin kṣaṇe sampūrṇasthūladevānāṁ bhāvanākaraṇe'samartho bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:4613: ataḥ kramaśaḥ devamaṇḍalaṁ bhāvayan buddhabimbamiti vajrasattvam vajriṇamiti caturgītisaṁcodanayā abhimatadevatārūpaṁ pradhānaṁ tadevāha ityādi-carcikādyā iti |
T16n2959u_001:4614: pūrvaṁ nairātmyādayo bhāvitāstā eva boddhavyā- iti |
T16n2959u_001:4616: yathetyādi ayamarthaḥ karūnārāgacittena vilīnasyānantaraṁ saṁcodanā tadanu tārakasaṁkrānti-bodhicittaṁ viśediti-boddhavyam |
T16n2959u_001:4618: 2. svalpajñānāveśaḥ- sthūladevamaṇḍalānāṁ bhāvanākaraṇe samartho'pi sādhako'yamāyatanikadevānāmekasmin kṣaṇe'samarthatvāt svalpajñānāveśastarīyaḥ ityucyate |
T16n2959u_001:4619: 3. jñāne svalpādhikāralābhisādhakaḥ- ayam āyatanikadevānāmekasmin kṣaṇe bhāvanākaraṇe yogyatāmāpnoti |
T16n2959u_001:4621: tadanantaraṁ sādhakena utpatti-utpannakramadvayaṁ saṁyojya dhyānaṁ karaṇīyaṁ bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:4622: tadā sādhake sūkṣmatikamadhye maṇḍalānāṁ sfuraṇasaṁharaṇayoḥ sāmarthyamāyāti |
T16n2959u_001:4623: atra sādhakasya prayāsena yāmamadhyāntarayoraikyamāyāti tathāpi sādhako'nantakarmasaṁcaye asaṁkhyarūpeṣvanantakarmasu praveśe ca yogyatāprāptau asamartho bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:4625: 4. jñāne samyagadhikāralābhisādhakaḥ- etasyaikaikasmin kṣaṇe'nantadhyānasya spaṣṭābhāso bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:4629: sādhakasya bhedacatuṣṭayaṁ bhaṭṭāraka-ānandamatinā'pyuktam yat sādhakaiḥ sva svasādhanopāye samāgatotpattikramasya vidhinā bhāvanā karaṇīyeti
T16n2959u_001:4630: eteṣāṁ mate ekasmin kṣaṇe samastamaṇḍalānāṁ bhāvanākaraṇe asamarthasādhaka ādikarmiko'sti |
T16n2959u_001:4631: vimāne tathā tatra nyāsitasthūladevānāṁ bhāvanākaraṇe'samartho'pi sādhaka āyatanadevānāṁ hṛdayādikasya spaṣṭabhāvanākaraṇe samarthasādhako dvitīyaḥ
T16n2959u_001:4633: prathamaḥ sampūrṇamaṇḍalasya kramaśo bhāvanāṁ karoti dvitīyaśca sthūladevasyaikasmin kṣaṇe dhyānaṁ karoti sūkṣmāyatanikadevānāṁ kramaśo bhāvanāṁ karoti ca |
T16n2959u_001:4634: tṛtīyasādhako na kevalaṁ sthūladevānāmapi tu sūkṣmadevānāmapi ekasmin kṣaṇe dhyānaṁ karoti |
T16n2959u_001:4637: asyāmavasthāyāṁ sādhakena ekasmin dine vāramekaṁ sampūrṇotpattividheḥ ( abhisamayasya )
T16n2959u_001:4640: imāmavasthāṁ labdhavato'pi sādhakasya kṛte utpattikramīyāntimapadasya prāptirna bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:4641: caturthasthāne labdhe sati sādhaka utpattikrame pūrṇatāṁ prāpya niṣpannakrame'pi niṣṇāto bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:4642: saṁvarodayatantre'pyuktamasti- utpattiṁ mṛdumadhyo yogī dhyāyād maṇḍalabhāvanā |
T16n2959u_001:4647: arthāt mṛdu madhyendriyadevamaṇḍalayośca kramaśaḥ bhāvanāṁ karoti tathā niṣpannakramasya bhāvanāyāmapi devakāyasya bhāvanāṁ zhaṭiti eva vidadhāti
T16n2959u_001:4648: uktaślokasya vyākhyāṁ kurvatā ācāryaseratogapāmahodayenoktamasti yad ayamekasyaiva sādhakasyotpattikramikabhāvanāyā vikāsakramo vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:4649: prathamacaraṇe sādhakaḥ sthūladevamaṇḍalasya kramaśaḥ bhāvanāṁ karoti sa mṛduḥ vartate dvitīyacaraṇe'rthāt kiñcit abhyāse jāte sthūladevamaṇḍalasyaikasmin kṣaṇe tathā sūkṣmadevamaṇḍalasya kramaśaḥ bhāvanāṁ karoti,
T16n2959u_001:4651: tṛtīyāvasthāyāṁ sthūla-sūkṣmasamastadevamaṇḍalasyaikasmin kṣaṇe bhāvanāṁ karoti tathā niṣpannakramasya sādhako'pi deva-bhāvanāṁ zhaṭiti eva sampādayati |
T16n2959u_001:4652: niṣpannakramasya sāmānyaparicayaḥ niṣpannakramasyādhāro bodhicittam-tantraśāstre bodhicittanijacittatantrasūkṣmaprāṇacittādiṣu nāmaparyāyatvena bodhicitte bodheśca citte mahadantaraṁ bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:4656: bodheścitte samutpanne sati sādhako sādhako bodhisattvo bhavati,
T16n2959u_001:4658: etadvodhicittalakṣaṇaṁ spaṣṭayatā haribhadreṇa kathitam - cittotpādaḥ parārthāya samyaksambodhikāmatā |
T16n2959u_001:4660: parārthakāmanā tadarthaṁ ca samyaksambodhikāmaneti caitasiko dharmaḥ,
T16n2959u_001:4663: ato bodhicittena caitasikena bhavituṁ śakyate na tu cittena |
T16n2959u_001:4664: ataḥ ubhayakāmanā cittasaṁjñayākhyātuṁ śakyā yataśca etat kāmanādvaye yāvat tīvratvaṁ syāt tāvadeva sādhako bodhi-samīpyaṁ prāpsyati,
T16n2959u_001:4666: śāstreṣu bodhicittasya dvau bhedau samākhyātau- 1. saṁvṛtibodhicittam,
T16n2959u_001:4669: tathā hi bodhicaryāvatāre- tad bodhicittaṁ dvividhaṁ vijñātavyaṁ samāsataḥ |
T16n2959u_001:4674: tadarthaṁ ca daśapāramitā-caryā ca prasthānacittaṁ vartate |
T16n2959u_001:4675: etadbhedadvayaṁ tatraivopamayā varṇitamittham- gantukāmasya gantuśca yathā bhedaḥ pratīyate |
T16n2959u_001:4678: vajrayāne yadbodhicittāvadhāraṇā tatra bodhiścittamapi tu bodhicittameva yat sādhanāmūlakaṁ tattvameva nāpi tu sādhyamūlakamapyasti |
T16n2959u_001:4680: ( fala ) asaṁhāryāśraya eva mārgaḥ mārga eva falam avasthāmātraṁ bhedaśca |
T16n2959u_001:4682: guhyasamāje bodhicittasvarūpaviṣaye pratipāditaṁ yat śūnyatākarūṇayorabhinnarūpameva bodhicittamāste |
T16n2959u_001:4688: parañca vajrayāne śūnyatā niṣprapañcatā paryudāsasvarūpaiva pratīyate |
T16n2959u_001:4689: yataśca pitṛtantrīyagrantheṣu ālokādinā tṛtīyena prabhāsvarākhyacaturthajñānena ca krameṇa śūnyatāyāḥ śūnyātiśūnyamahāśūnyasarvaśūnyākhyabhedacatuṣṭayasya sākṣātkāraḥ samamanyata |
T16n2959u_001:4690: prathamālokajñāne śūnyatāsākṣātkāranantaraṁ rāgasambaddhānāṁ catvāriṁśad vikalpānāṁ kṣayaḥ dvitīyālokābhāsajñānena cātiśūnyatābodhe sati triṁśat vikalpānāṁ kṣayaḥ ālokopalabdhijñānena cātiśūnyatābodhakāle mohasambaddhānāṁ saptavikalpānāṁ kṣayo bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:4692: caramaprabhāsvarajñānadvārā sarvaśūnyatābodhe jāta satyeva advayaparamārthaḥ sākṣātkriyate |
T16n2959u_001:4693: aparatastu mātṛtantre pratipāditaṁ yat caturviṣayyānandaiḥ krameṇa śūnyatācatuṣṭayī sākṣātkriyate |
T16n2959u_001:4695: etenedameva suspaṣṭaṁ yat prabhāsvaracitte vikalpātisūkṣmarūpeṣu vilīneṣu satsu prabhāsvarasyādvayāvasthaiva caramāvasthā yā ca paryudāsasvarūpaiva bhavituṁ śakyā,
T16n2959u_001:4697: paraṁ cedamapi nūnaṁ jñeyaṁ yadasya viṣprapañcatāyāṁ pāramitānayavajrayānayoścāntaraṁ na bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:4699: śūnyatā ca rūpaṁ yato hi vāyormadhyamāvasthitau marīcidhūmakhadyotadīpādayaḥ āvirbhavanti |
T16n2959u_001:4702: ataḥ prabhāsvaratvamatra paramārtham viṣayarūpeṇa devakāyasaṁvṛtirūpaṁ ca |
T16n2959u_001:4709: karūṇā pāramitānaye yathā śūnyatā śūnyamātrantathaiva karūṇā karūṇāmātrameva |
T16n2959u_001:4710: buddhakapālatantre pāramitānaya-śūnyatā itthaṁ pratipāditā-jñānābhāve śūnyatā santatirahita-gṛhasthena samānā |
T16n2959u_001:4711: vastutastu śūnyatākarūṇayoradvayabhāvo'pekṣyate yataḥ karūṇā akṣarasukhañca nāmnā paryāyabhūtam |
T16n2959u_001:4712: mahāsukhena karūṇayā vā śūnyatāyāṁ prakaṭitāyāṁ satyāmeva sā prāṇihitaṁ vidadhāti |
T16n2959u_001:4718: vajradeham pitṛtantra-mātṛtantrādvayatantrāṇāṁ niṣpannakramasya bhāvanāvidhiṣu naikāni matamatāntarāṇi paraṁ ca yatra saṁvṛti-svādhiṣṭhānakrama-paramārthaprabhāsvarāṇāmabhinnarūpayuganaddhasya prāptyupāyalakṣyantvatra samānam |
T16n2959u_001:4722: idaṁ kāmadhātāveva sambhāvyate na tu rūpadhātvarūpadhātuṣu |
T16n2959u_001:4724: ataḥ anuttaratantrasya sādhakaḥ kāmadhātusattva eva bhavitumarhati na tu rūpārūpadhātvoḥ yataśca kāmadhātāveva ṣaḍtriṁśat skandhaiḥ ṣaḍdhātubhiśca pūrṇaṁ tatpūrṇatvaṁ sambhāvyate |
T16n2959u_001:4725: saṁvarodayatantre ṣaḍdhātuviṣaye- tvaṅmāṁsakaṁ ca raktaṁ ca mātṛjam iti kathyate |
T16n2959u_001:4735: tatra coṣṇīṣe dvipañcāśad nāḍīnāṁ samūhaḥ kaṇṭhacakre ca ṣoḍaśa hṛdayakamale aṣṭau,
T16n2959u_001:4743: tatraivoktaṁ- nāḍī sthānaṁ ca pīṭhaṁ ca ,
T16n2959u_001:4745: teṣāṁ madhye trayo nāḍyaḥ āśrayanti ca sarvagāḥ ||
T16n2959u_001:4749: kecana ācāryā avadhūtīnāḍīṁ kālpanikīṁ atisūkṣmāṁ ca manyante |
T16n2959u_001:4750: kvacit sarvaśarīravyāpikāvadhūtī nāḍīti varṇyate kvacitu uṣṇīṣādārabhya pṛṣṭhāsthiparyantaṁ nābhikṣetrāt caturaṅgalamadhaḥ kutracit guhyendriyāgraṁ pādatālaparyantaṁ ca avadhūtī bhavatīti carcitam |
T16n2959u_001:4752: raṅjuṅdorjemahodayasya matantu yathā jñānasya mūlaṁ madhyamā tathaiva bhāvamūlamapimahāprāṇanāḍī |
T16n2959u_001:4753: ucyate ca, caturviṁśatisahasramitāścandrāḥ śukravāhinī nāḍī lalanā ca caturviṁśatisahasramitāḥ sūryāḥ śoṇitavāhinī nāḍī rasanocyate |
T16n2959u_001:4755: hevajre avadhūtītthaṁ varṇitā - avadhūtī madhyadeśe grāhyagrāhakavarjitā |
T16n2959u_001:4757: vikalpān vigalayya madhyamāyāṁ praveśaḥ sthitilābhamātrameva ca madhyanāḍī kathayitumaśakyā?
T16n2959u_001:4759: kiṁ vastutaḥ asmaccharīre sūkṣmarūpeṇa nāḍī sthitā ?
T16n2959u_001:4760: cenmadhyamā nāḍīcakraprabhṛtayaḥ nāḍyaḥ varṇanānurūpāstarhi etadbhāvanāmātram iṣṭadeve svaśarīraṁ pariṇatyanantarameva kriyate ?
T16n2959u_001:4762: parañca saṁvarodayatantra- hevajratantra-sampuṭodbhavatantra-kālacakratantra-vajravārāhīrahasya-tantra-jñānodayatantraprabhṛtiṣu lalanārasanāvadhūtīnāḍīnāṁ svarūpamitthaṁ spaṣṭīkṛtam - rasanālalanānāḍyau avadhūtyā dakṣiṇato rasanā,
T16n2959u_001:4763: vāmataśca lalaneti dve nāḍyau nābhitaḥ caturaṅgulamadhaḥ viśliṣya nābhipradeśe hṛdayāśaya ( gurdā )
T16n2959u_001:4765: ito'gre punaḥ hṛdayasya dakṣiṇato rasanā vāmataśca lalanā sambaddhe bhavataḥ |
T16n2959u_001:4766: tataśca karṇapurasyādhobhāge hṛdayasya mahānāḍītaḥ saṁyukte kaṇṭhacakre sannipatataḥ |
T16n2959u_001:4767: kūkāṭikānāḍīto bhūtvā karṇasyādhobhāgīyachidrato bhūtvā vṛkṣanāḍyā saha mastiṣke satyau mūrdhnaḥ brahyarandhreṇa saṁyukte |
T16n2959u_001:4769: viśeṣataśca nāsikāyāḥ chidradvaye ime nāḍyau ūrdhvaśikhare bhavataḥ |
T16n2959u_001:4770: adhobhāge nāḍītraya-saṁyogena nirmitacatuṣpathena viśliṣya dakṣiṇanāḍī rasanāyāḥ nimnaśikhareṇa strīgarbhaśayastharaktasya srāvaṁ purūṣastriyoḥ malasaṁdhāraṇaṁ tyāgakṛtyaṁ ca sampādayati |
T16n2959u_001:4771: lalanārasanayoḥ svarūpaviṣaye hevajratantra-pañjikāratnāvali sampuṭodayatantra-saṁvarodayatantra prabhṛtiṣu kathitaṁ-lalanā śukravāhinī,
T16n2959u_001:4773: lalanārasane uṣṇīṣacakrādārabhya guhyendriyacakraparyantam avadhūtyā āliṅgite bhavataḥ |
T16n2959u_001:4774: vāyuḥ guhyasamājasya vyākhyātantravajramālāyāḥ dvādaśapaṭale aṣṭottaraikaśataṁ vāyavo varṇitāḥ |
T16n2959u_001:4775: teṣu prāṇāpānodānasamānavyānākhyā vāyupramukhāḥ evaṁ ca nāgakūrmakṛkaradevadattadhanañjayāśca aṅgabhūtā vāyavaḥ ucyante |
T16n2959u_001:4776: kālacakre etādṛśavāyūnāṁ kṛtyānītthaṁ varṇitāni - prāṇo'pānaḥ samānaḥ kamalavasudale mārūtaścāpyudāno |
T16n2959u_001:4777: vyāno nāgaśca kūrmaḥ sakṛkarapavano devadatto dhanañjayaḥ ||
T16n2959u_001:4783: āpāno netyadhastāt sakalarasamsamaṁ neti kāye samānaḥ ||
T16n2959u_001:4791: pratidivasamekaḥ svasthapurūṣaḥ dvisahasrottaraikaśataṣaṭśataṁ śvāsān ucchavāsāṁśca gṛhṇāti |
T16n2959u_001:4792: etanmahāprāṇādevotpannānyavāyūnāṁ sthānabhedaṁ kṛtyabhedaṁ ca suspaṣṭayatā āryadevanāpyabhihitaṁ - apānaśca nābheradhobhāge nāḍītrayasamūhena piṇḍīkṛtasthāne tiṣṭhati |
T16n2959u_001:4793: idaṁ ca malamūtraśukraśoṇitakaṣāyarasādidhātūn visarjayati niḥsaraṇaṁ saṁkalanaṁ ca vidadhāti |
T16n2959u_001:4799: ayaṁ ca mukta- pīta-pārthakyaṁ sampādayati saṅgītaceṣṭāpi anenaiva vāyunā bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:4803: nimnaśloke atisaṁkṣepeṇa etasthānānāṁ varṇanaṁ labhyate - hṛdi prāṇo gude'pānaḥ samāno nābhisaṁsthitaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:4809: pañcakrame'pi vāyunā sūkṣmarūpeṇa jñānaṁ saṁmiśratāṁ gatam |
T16n2959u_001:4812: etatpañcāṅgavāyūnāṁ sthānakṛtyādīni saṁkṣepeṇettham-nāgavāyuḥ dakṣiṇabāhumūlasya nāḍīdalaṁ prāpya saṁcarate |
T16n2959u_001:4821: devadattavāyuḥ hṛdayasya vāmadiśā lalanānāḍyā meṣalagnanāḍyā ca saṁcarati |
T16n2959u_001:4825: etannāḍyā śikharam upajihvāyāḥ madhye romṇaśca sarvachidreṣu tiṣṭhati |
T16n2959u_001:4826: sparśādānaṁ ca mukhyakṛtyam mṛtaśarīre'pi kiñcitkālaṁ tiṣṭhati |
T16n2959u_001:4829: śvāsa-praśvāsakāle evaṁ vihāya caturvāyavaḥ nāsikāyāḥ dakṣiṇe vāme ca pṛthak pṛthak chidrebhyaḥ vahanti |
T16n2959u_001:4830: vyākhyātantravajramālāyāṁ pañcatathāgata-pañcavarṇa-pañcadhātubhiḥ saha etadvarṇanamitthamakāri- nāsāgre sarvapaṁ nāma prāṇāyāmasya kalpanā
T16n2959u_001:4834: adhaśceti caturdhā syād balo ādhyātmikaḥ smṛtaḥ ||
T16n2959u_001:4840: itthamatra pañcapradhānavāyu-pañcāṅgavāyu-varṇanena sākam idaṁ pratyapādi-etatsarvāṇi ekasyaiva pradhānaprāṇavāyoraṅgāni |
T16n2959u_001:4850: yathā ca sarvadharmāṇāṁ svabhāve-viśleṣite sati niḥsvabhāvaśūnyatāprāptiḥ dharmakāyasya lakṣaṇam |
T16n2959u_001:4851: prabhāsvare sthite sati bāhyābhyantaradhūmakhadyotacandrādīnāmābhāsaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṁ prabhāsvarasvarūpatvaṁ saṁbhogakāyaṁ lakṣayati |
T16n2959u_001:4853: 2. niṣprapañcatilakāvasthāyāṁ śukraśoṇitavāyusaṁsargeṇa śukraṁ grāhakatvena śoṇitaṁ ca grāhyatvena samutpadya viṣaya-viṣayibhāvaṁ gṛhṇāti,
T16n2959u_001:4855: yato hi etad svabhāvenādvayaṁ sadapi dvaitaṁ gṛhṇāti |
T16n2959u_001:4856: bandhanakārakaṁ dravyaṁ mantraṁ vāyutilakaṁ ca pariśodhya- pariśodhakarūpeṇa vibhajya bhedaṣaṭkaṁ sampādyate |
T16n2959u_001:4857: avidyāsaṁskāravijñānaiḥ parikalpya vedanāsaṁskārasaṁjñāvijñānāni iti nāmasu parivartya nāmārthobhayagrāhakaṁ pariśodhyādhāramantratilakaṁ vidyate
T16n2959u_001:4860: ālambanapratyayādhipatipratyayasamanantarapratyayeti pratyayatrayeṇa paratantraṁ cittaṁ cañcalaṁ bhavati viṣayānapi gṛhṇāti |
T16n2959u_001:4863: pañcendriyāṇāṁ viṣayarūpeṇa pratibhāsamānaiḥ śabdarūpaskandhādibhiḥ saṁgṛhītaśukraśoṇitaṁ pañcadhātupariśodhyaṁ dravyatilakam |
T16n2959u_001:4869: yathā ca saṁvarodayatantre- pulliramalaye śirasi nakhadantavahāsthitā |
T16n2959u_001:4873: etadatiriktaṁ śarīre yāvatyo nāḍyastāsu kaṇe kaṇe'pi dravyatilakaṁ samāviśati |
T16n2959u_001:4875: yacca nābhikṣetrāccaturaṅgulamadhaḥ lalanārasanayormelanasthāne madhyamānāḍyāḥ adhobhāge'plutā-kārastham ūrdhvoṣṇīṣakamalasthaṁ ca vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:4881: sāratastu madhyamānāḍī- anāhatavāyu-niṣprapañcatilaketi etattrayaṁ kṛtya-vaibhinyāt pṛthak nirūpitam |
T16n2959u_001:4882: tattvatastu etatsarvaṁ nijacittaṁ sahajajñānaṁ prabhāsvarā vā santi |
T16n2959u_001:4893: mahāmurātilake'bhihitaṁ yat prabhāsvaracittena saha pañcaraśmivān vāyurabhinnarūpena tiṣṭhati |
T16n2959u_001:4899: adya vaijñānikānām aṇupadārthaviśleṣaṇāvadhau jñāyate yat te'pi proṭona nyūṭrona-ilekṭronataraṅgeṣu tadapi mahāśūnyatvena prāpnuvanti |
T16n2959u_001:4900: mahāśūnyamidamabhāvātmakaṁ na śakyaṁ yataḥ abhāvāt kadāpi bhāvotpattirna jātā |
T16n2959u_001:4901: ato mahāśūnyacetanā'pīyaṁ sūkṣmavāyorabhinnā'pi yataścaitasyai gatiṁ pradadāti jagaccotpādayati |
T16n2959u_001:4905: naitāvadevāpi tu samyaksambodhirapi asmādeva vāyorūtpanna iti varṇitam |
T16n2959u_001:4913: vasantatilakaṭīkārahasyadīpikāyāmapi ' a ' ityakṣarānuśaṁsāviṣaye samabhi-hitam-akāra ityādi mahārtha iti ādyanutpannatattvasūcakatvāt |
T16n2959u_001:4916: ye ca dehināṁ sādhakānāṁ vā ye mantrā vākyāni pramāṇavādīni vā tata eva jātā utpannā |
T16n2959u_001:4917: evaṁ sarva eva sattvā mantraparāyaṇāḥ svabhāveneti sthitam |
T16n2959u_001:4918: yāvad abhinnasvarūpoktatrayasya vastusthitiḥ samyag na jñāsyate tāvad niṣpannakramasādhanā na sambhāvyate |
T16n2959u_001:4920: pitṛtantrasya niṣpannakramaḥ niṣpannakramabhāvanāyāṁ pitṛtantra-mātṛtantra-advayatantrāṇāṁ bhedena bhāvanāvidhāvapi kācid bhinnatā'valokyate
T16n2959u_001:4921: pitṛtantre vineyajanānāṁ kulabhedenāpi punaḥ sādhanāyāṁ alpādhikā bhedā dṛśyante |
T16n2959u_001:4922: yadyapi pitṛtantrapradhānagranthasya guhyasamājasya naike sādhanā-vidhayaḥ paramparāśca,
T16n2959u_001:4929: etat ślokamādhārīkṛtya ' mantranidhyapti' ityataḥ vāgvivekasya kāyataḥ vajrajāpasādhanāyāḥ ādhārībhūtanirmāṇakāyaḥ gṛhyate |
T16n2959u_001:4930: ataḥ etena kāyavivekaḥ kāyadvārā ca vajrajāpaṁ vidhāya vāgvivekaprāptyā hṛdayasthavajrasatvasya codanena yogi-cittasantatau pravara-ityādicatuḥsiddhayo labhyante |
T16n2959u_001:4936: ācāryanāgārjunaḥ guhyasamājīyavyākhyātantravajramālāyāḥ vacanamudhṛtya nikhilānuttaratantrasya niṣpannakramasādhanāṁ pañcakrameṣu saṁgṛhṇāti
T16n2959u_001:4938: sa tu kāyaviveka-vajrajāpavāgvivekayoḥ kāṁścidaṁśānapi utpattikramāṅgatvena manyate |
T16n2959u_001:4955: candrakīrtiprabhṛtividvāṁsaḥ anuttaratantrasya utpattikrama-niṣpannakrameti dvayaṁ pañcakramasaṁgṛhītammatvā kāyavivekena sahaiva vāgvivekaṁ vajrajāpakramaṁ cāpi cittā-lambanasya cittavivekasyaiva ca pūrvāvasthāmmanyante |
T16n2959u_001:4959: munidatta- abhayākaraguptādimatena cittālambanasādhanāyā ādhāraḥ vajrajāpaḥ ataḥ cittavivekāpekṣayā vajrajāpavāgvivekasyātra prāmukhyam |
T16n2959u_001:4964: mūlatantrasya dvādaśaparicchede ' atha vajracatuṣkoṇe sevākāryā dṛdavrataiḥ ' iti viṣaye uttaratantre varṇitaṁ - sevā ṣaḍaṅgayogena kṛtvā sādhanamuttamam
T16n2959u_001:4968: svarūpataḥ ime ṣaḍyogā api pañcakrame saṁgṛhyante |
T16n2959u_001:4970: vāgviveke prāṇāyāmaḥ prabhāsvare ca dhāraṇāyuganaddhe anusmṛtiḥ samādhiśca |
T16n2959u_001:4973: yathā ca aśaikṣikayuganaddhasya prāptyai śaikṣikayuganaddhasya pūrvasthitirapekṣyate |
T16n2959u_001:4978: etat prāptuṁ mṛtyukālasadṛśaṁ vāyuṁ hṛdayakamalasthe anāhatabindau vilīya upamāprabhāsvaraprāptiṁ kuryāt |
T16n2959u_001:4979: etadarthaṁ prāṇāyāmena vajrajāpena ca hṛdayakamalasya nāḍīgranthirbhedyā |
T16n2959u_001:4984: pañcakramasya kāyavivekādi-bhāvanāvidhinā lakṣaṇabheda-vyutpatti-sādhanāvidhi-bhiḥ avagaterūdagatau parivartanavidhiprabhṛtibhedaiḥ pañcabhāgeṣu vibhajyate |
T16n2959u_001:4985: kāyavivekaḥ vikalpenānutpanno mahāsukhaśūnyasvabhāve manasi samudito devakāya eva kāyavivekaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:4989: yathā ca pañcaskandhamāśritya kāyavivekaviṣaye guhyasamāje mūlatantre pratyapādi - pañcaskandhāḥ samāsena pañcabuddhāḥ prakīrtitāḥ ||
T16n2959u_001:4991: punaḥ skandhasya bāhyābhyantaralaghudīrghākāraśvetaraktaprabhṛtivarṇabhedena ekaskandhasyāpi pañca bhedā bhavanti |
T16n2959u_001:4993: caturdhātusvarūpakāyavivekapratipādanaprasaṅge tatraivoktam - pṛthvī locanā khyātā abdhāturmāmakī smṛtā |
T16n2959u_001:4997: pṛthivīdhātorapi keśāsthiromanakhādibhedān vidhāya devīrūpaṁ bhāvayituṁ saṁkīrtitam |
T16n2959u_001:5003: karṇasya vajrapāṇitvaṁ nāsāyā ākāśagarbhatvaṁ jihvāyā lokeśvaratvaṁ kāyadhātu-sarvāvaraṇaviṣkambhaka-trijñānasamūhasya manaso vā mañjuśrīrityākhyam
T16n2959u_001:5007: arthāt rūpavajri- śabdavajri- gandhavajri-sparśavajriprabhṛtīnāṁ bhāvanaiva viṣayakāyavivekaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5008: itthaṁ skandhadhātvādiṣu pratyekasya pañcabhedaiḥ śataṁ kulāni bhavanti |
T16n2959u_001:5009: ataḥ uttaratantre ' paraṁ śatadhā kulamiti ' pratipāditam |
T16n2959u_001:5011: tatraiva 'tattvaṁ pañcakulaṁ proktaṁ trikulaṁ guhyamucyate ' iti varṇitam |
T16n2959u_001:5013: kāyasyāsya prati kaṇe kaṇe kāyaṁ vā pūrṇataḥ pariṇataṁ kṛtvā vajradhararūpeṇāvalokanameva kāyavivekaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5014: vyutpattiḥ kāyastu samūhabodhakaśśabdaḥ yatra śarīramāṁsāsthirūdhirādinaikadharmāṇāṁ samūhastatraiva cittamapi pūrvaparādikṣaṇānāṁ samūhaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5016: sāmānyakāyadṛṣṭyā uparilikhitadevasamūhasya bhāvanayā sāmānyābhāsaḥ abhiniveśa-kṣayaśca bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:5028: imāḥ sapta sthitayaḥ vairocanasya sapta dharmāsanāni |
T16n2959u_001:5030: samāhitamudrāyāṁ saṁsthitasya nābhau prabhāvitāyāṁ satyāmagniśśānto bhavati,
T16n2959u_001:5032: bhujayoḥ saralatayā vakṣasaśca prasṛtatvena prāṇavāyuradhikṛto bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:5033: kaṇṭhe avanate sati jihvāyāśca tāluṁ pratyabhimukhatvād udānavāyuḥ vaśībhavati |
T16n2959u_001:5034: atra vajrāsanamanuṣṭhāya cittamavadhūtyāḥ adhobhāgasthamaṇicakrasya madhye āyudhe sūkṣmatilake vā ekāgratvena vidadhyāt |
T16n2959u_001:5035: evaṁ karaṇena vāyucittayoḥ praveśa-sāmyena etadabhinnatvena ca sarvavāyavo'pi avadhūteradhobhāgasthe nāḍīcakre saṁgṛhyante |
T16n2959u_001:5036: vāyuśca krameṇa madhyamāyāṁ praviśya lābhaṁ prāpnoti |
T16n2959u_001:5037: pariṇāmataḥ nāsikāyāḥ chidradvayena vāyuḥ samānatayā vahati |
T16n2959u_001:5038: madhyamānāḍyāṁ vāyau sthite sati śvāsa-praśvāsā avarūdhyante |
T16n2959u_001:5040: avagaterūdgatikrame parivartana-vidhiḥ vāyoḥ madhyamāyāṁ praveśasthiti-samutthāpanādinā-om āḥ hū iti tryakṣareṇa svaghoṣasvarūpavajrajāpāśrayaṇena hṛdayasya ūrdhvādhobhāgasthanāḍīcakreṣu śithileṣu satsu uparyyadhaḥ sthitāḥ sarvavāyavaḥ avadhūtau vilīyante |
T16n2959u_001:5044: vāyusvarūpaṁ mantra-niyatārthañca buddhvā prāṇavāyusahita- pramukhavāyūnāṁ madhyamāyāṁ praveśasthitistadutthāpito yoga eva vāgvivekaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5046: guhyanāsikāgre tu dravyatilakabhāvanā ceti sthānabhedena vāgvivekasya bhedatrayam |
T16n2959u_001:5047: sādhanā hṛdayanāsikāyāṁ sūkṣmatilakabhāvanāvadhau hṛdayāṣṭadalanāḍīcakrasya bahiḥ ālokabodhakadvādaśakṣarāṇi śvetavarṇe,
T16n2959u_001:5048: madhye ca mākṣaraṁ hitvā ālokābhāsa-bodhakavyañjanāni raktavarṇe,
T16n2959u_001:5049: ṛ lṛ prabhṛti catuḥsvarān kṛṣṇavarṇe bhāvayet |
T16n2959u_001:5050: sarvākṣarāṇi tilakena vibhūṣya tanmadhye sthitānāhatatilakahṛsvākāre cittasvarūpeṇa avatiṣṭheta |
T16n2959u_001:5053: mantratilakadṛdatāprāptyanantaraṁ mukhanāsikāgre anāhatatilakaṁ bhāvayet prāṇāyāmadvārā vajraṁ japet |
T16n2959u_001:5056: mukhanāsikāgre pūrvavartiprāṇāyāmavidhidvayena yo vāyuḥ hṛdayakamale saṁgrahītumaśakyo'bhavat tasya haṭhayogabalena avadhūtyā adhonāsikāyāṁ sūkṣmatilakālambanaṁ bhāvanaṁ ca vidhāya prāṇāyāmadvārā saṁgrahītuṁ śakyate |
T16n2959u_001:5057: sārāṁśatastu vajrajāpasya pramukhasādhanāyāṁ pañcajñānamayaśvāsan piṇḍarūpeṇa nāsikāyāmavasthāpya prāṇāyāmo vidhīyate |
T16n2959u_001:5061: etat sāhāyyena lalanārasanayoḥ pravahamānaḥ karmavāyurmadhyamāyāṁ praviśati |
T16n2959u_001:5066: hṛdaye anāhatabindau cittasthityā kṣitijalāgniprabhṛtidhātavaḥ kramaśaḥ vilīyanta eva |
T16n2959u_001:5070: avagaterūdgatiparivartanavidhiḥ bāhyābhyantaramudrāvajrajāpādyupāyānāṁ sāhāyyena hṛdayanāḍīcakragranthiṣu samudghaṭitāsu sampūrṇo vyānavāyuḥ hṛdayakamalasthānāhatabindau vilīyate tadā''lokajñānaṁ prakāśate vāgvivekaḥ cittaviveke saṅkramate |
T16n2959u_001:5071: cittavivekaḥ bāhyamudrāyāḥ ābhyantaraprāṇāyāmasya ca balena mūlasahitāḥ same'pi daśavāyavo hṛdayasthānāhatabindau tathaiva tiṣṭhanti yathā ca mṛtyukāle dhātavo vilīyante |
T16n2959u_001:5074: athavā nāḍīcakrasya sarvavikalpavāyūn bhāvanābalena anāhatabindau vilīya tilakadṛdatā mahāsukhe ca cittasthitireva cittavivekaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5076: sādhanā sāmānyāvasthāyām ālokādijñānatrayasyodayaḥ samāpattyavasthāyāṁ suṣuptyavasthāyāmacetanāvasthāyāṁ ca jāyate |
T16n2959u_001:5080: taiḥ pañcakramasya vacanamidamuddhriyate- sarvāsāmeva māyānāṁ strīmāyaiva viśiṣyate |
T16n2959u_001:5083: arthāt cittavivekasyābhyantarasādhanāyāṁ vajrajāpaṁ bāhyamudrāṁ ca saṁsevya ālokādīni sākṣātkaraṇīyāni bhavanti |
T16n2959u_001:5095: etadavagamanamekatra saralantatraivāparastu duṣkaramapi yataśca etatprabhāsvarasvasaṁvedya-jñānānavagamanādeva idamavacchinnaṁ śṛṁkhalābaddhaṁ bhavacakraṁ pracalati |
T16n2959u_001:5097: atraitat sākṣātkārāya sādhanāvasthāyāṁ prakaṭiṣyamāṇa-lakṣaṇānyā-dhārīkṛtya bhedāḥ akāriṣata |
T16n2959u_001:5098: pariśodhyena sākaṁ saṁyojya tadvyākhyānena ca viṣayo'yaṁ suspaṣṭībhavati |
T16n2959u_001:5099: yathā utpādasaṁvittiḥ utpattikramaścāste tathaiva mṛtyuḥ paramārthaśca niṣpannakrame manyate |
T16n2959u_001:5100: yathoktamupari yat sāmānyāvasthāyāṁ ālokādijñānatrayaṁ mṛtyukāle svayameva prakaṭayanti |
T16n2959u_001:5101: tatkathaṁ ? sāmānyataḥ ādau prāṇyutpattiḥ pañcabhūtāśrayeṇa jāyate ante caitbhūtānāṁ visarjanena naśyatyapi |
T16n2959u_001:5102: mṛtyukāle samuditalakṣaṇānāṁ viṣaye sādhakairitthaṁ pratyapādi-kṣityādidhātuṣu vilīneṣu satsu śarīrābhā samāptiṁ yāti,
T16n2959u_001:5103: samānavāyoḥ kṣīṇatayā bhojanam ātmasāt na bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:5105: prāṇavāyau kṣīṇe sati cakṣurdorbalyād viṣayān draṣṭuṁ nārhati |
T16n2959u_001:5109: udānavāyau naṣṭe sati śvāsa-lāghavaṁ praśvāsa-dīrghatvaṁ ca bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:5111: kṣiterjaladhātau vilīnatvāt śarīraṁ pūrvāpekṣayā jīrṇatvamupayāti kaṇṭhaḥ śiraḥ pādau ca śarīramutthāpayitumasamarthā bhaviṣyanti |
T16n2959u_001:5120: tadānīmābhyantaracitte dhūmābhāsaḥ tadanu ca kaṇṭhanāḍīcakra-vināśaḥ agnighātorvāyudhātau layaśca sampatsyate |
T16n2959u_001:5127: tadānīṁ bāhyalakṣaṇaṁ dīrghaśvāsapraśvāsarūpeṇa prakaṭiṣyati bahiśca praśvāso bhūyān śvāsaśca laghurbhaviṣyati |
T16n2959u_001:5130: itthaṁ pañcapradhānavāyubhiḥ saha aṅgavāyurapi vijñāne vileṣyati,
T16n2959u_001:5135: etatkramaḥ svarūpañcettham - ālokajñānam sarvavāyavo hṛdayakamalasthacitte līyante |
T16n2959u_001:5136: tadanu uṣṇīṣasthaṁ pitṛlabdhaṁ śvetaśukraṁ madhyamānāḍīmārgato hṛdayakamalaṁ praviśati |
T16n2959u_001:5137: tadānīṁ citte śaradṛtucandraprakāśena prakīrṇākāśavad ābhāsate dveṣasambaddhāstrastriṁśad vikalpāḥ nirūdhyante |
T16n2959u_001:5140: ālokābhāsajñānam māturlabdhaṁ raktaṁ madhyamānāḍyā mādhyamenādhobhāgataḥ ūrdhvaṁ prati saṁvardhya hṛdayakamalaṁ prāpnoti |
T16n2959u_001:5141: tadā citte sūryaprakāśena vyāptākāśasamaṁ raktaṁ ālokābhāsajñānaṁ samudeti |
T16n2959u_001:5143: tadānīṁ citte raktālokābhāsātiriktaṁ kimapi na bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:5145: idānīṁ rāgasambaddhāḥ sarve'pi catvāriṁśad vikalpāḥ naśyanti |
T16n2959u_001:5147: vilaye sati prabhāsvarasya prabhāsamakṣaṁ kṣaṇamekaṁ sādhakasya citte viṣayasyāspaṣṭaḥ ābhāso jāyate |
T16n2959u_001:5152: prabhāsvaraḥ upari varṇite trijñānasvarūpe tatkrame ca jñānatrayasya sidhau satyāṁ prabhāsvarapadopalabdhimārgaḥ udghaṭate |
T16n2959u_001:5155: ayaṁ mātṛ-prabhāsvaraḥ tena ca kṛtaḥ prabhāsvarapada-sākṣātkāraḥ mātṛvad vartate |
T16n2959u_001:5156: sādhakaḥ svajīvanakāle madhyamānāḍī-sahāyatayā vāyoḥ praveśasthityutthāpanādikaṁ kṛtvā trijñānaṁ prakāśya taddvārā śūnyatāṁ sākṣātkurūte |
T16n2959u_001:5157: sa eva mṛtyukāle udeṣyamāṇalakṣaṇāni krameṇa paricinvan dharmakāyasthaḥ bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:5164: prabhāsvaro'yaṁ viṣaya-viṣayibhedena dvividhaḥ sarvaśūnyatā hi viṣayaprabhāsvaraḥ sarvaśūnyatāyāḥ svaviṣayavidhāyakaṁ jñānaṁ viṣayi-prabhāsvaro vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:5166: mudrāśabdābhiprāyastu hevajratantre- vajreṇa mudrayate'nena mudrā tenābhidhīyate ||
T16n2959u_001:5171: jñānamudrā ca yad jñānamātreṇa nirmitā syāt |
T16n2959u_001:5173: tadupari piṇḍakramasya anubhedana- kramasya ca bhāvanā kriyate |
T16n2959u_001:5174: pañcakrame etat spaṣṭīkriyate- prāptopadeśakaḥ śiṣyo dvidhā yogam athābhyaset |
T16n2959u_001:5178: bhūtakoṭiṁ viśed yogī piṇḍagrāha iti smṛtaḥ ||
T16n2959u_001:5180: sthāvaraṁ jaṅgamaṁ caiva pūrvaṁ kṛtvā prabhāsvaram |
T16n2959u_001:5188: anubhedakrame devabhāvanecchāyāṁ satyāṁ pūrvaṁ bāhyamaṇdalamātmaśarīre vyastadeveṣu tatrāpyekaikaṁ hṛdayasthitacittaprabhāsvare sthāvaraṁ jaṁgame jaṁgamaṁ ca kramaśaḥ svātmani,
T16n2959u_001:5189: ātmānaṁ ca svaprabhāsvare tathaiva līnayate yathā ca uṣṇe ṛjīṣe jalapātanena jalaṁ vilīnaṁ sat ekabindau militvā śuṣyati |
T16n2959u_001:5192: cittavivekasya sādhanayā'nayā śūnyatāyāḥ sāmānyārthabodha eva jāyate |
T16n2959u_001:5195: apagaterūdgatiparivartanam cittavivekaparyantam niṣpannopamāprabhāsvarasya karmavāyunā spandanena sādhakaḥ pratilomālokopalabdhau tadutthāpayati
T16n2959u_001:5197: hṛdayakamalasthamadhyanāḍīsahitasya sampūrṇanāḍīcakrasya granthiṣūdghaṭitāsu satīṣu māyākāye utthāpanāvasthāṁ yāvat sampūrṇaprakriyā cittaviveke māyākāye ca utthāpitā jāyate tadabhyāsakramo hi māyākāya ucyate |
T16n2959u_001:5205: cittavivekānantarameva upalabdhamāyākāyaḥ abhyāsakramasya māyākāyaḥ paryantamāyākāyaśceti nāmnā bhedatrayamapi vidhātuṁ śakyate |
T16n2959u_001:5206: vyutpattiḥ māyākāyādidvādaśopamālakṣitaḥ āsravajñānakāya eva māyākāya ucyate |
T16n2959u_001:5216: 10. vipākakāyo meghasadṛśaḥ māyākāyaśca meghamadhyād āvirbhūtā vidyudiva vartate,
T16n2959u_001:5220: yato hi svajīvanasya pañcaviṁśatipratiśataṁ samayaṁ janaḥ rātrau svapnāvalokane eva yāpayati |
T16n2959u_001:5224: māyākāyasya sādhakaḥ sthūlakāyena sūkṣmakāyaṁ nirmāya vicarati |
T16n2959u_001:5225: iyaṁ tādṛśyeva kriyā yathā ca svapnāvasthāyāṁ sthūlakāyāt sūkṣmakāyasya pṛthak sthitiḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5227: 1. kuśalākuśalavipākāt samutpannasukhaduḥkhavāhako vipākakāyaḥ 2. vibhinnasaṁskāravāsanābhyaḥ prabhāvitaḥ pratibhāsitaḥ svapnakāyaḥ 3. aśuddhāvasthāyāṁ manomayakāyaḥ śuddhāvasthāyāṁ ca jñānakāyaḥ,
T16n2959u_001:5230: svapnakāyo'pi māyākāyasādhanādhāro na bhavitumarhati yato hyayaṁ kālikaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5235: ekastu yasya prāṇeṣu samāpteṣu mṛtyurbhavati sa bhavati dvitīyaśca yaḥ indriyānāśritaḥ manovijñānāśrito'sti, sa prāṇāḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5237: mārge sādhanābalenaiva ayameva māyākāya utthāpito bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:5238: yadā ca karmakleśavaśo'yaṁ jayate tadā bhavacakre vibhinnarūpeṣu āvirbhūya prāṇī saṁsāracakre bhramati |
T16n2959u_001:5240: pañcakrame'pyabhihitam- asvatantraṁ jagatsarvaṁ svatantraṁ naiva jāyate |
T16n2959u_001:5249: sarvahetuḥ prabhāsvaraḥ yaśca mahāśūnyasvarūpaḥ cittasya pañcaraśmivāyoścādvayarūpam |
T16n2959u_001:5251: tāntrikadarśanasya marmatvaṁ cittasya sūkṣmavāyoścābhinnatāyāḥ prakāśito māyākāya etadeva tantrasya rahasyam |
T16n2959u_001:5253: atredaṁ jñeyaṁ kāyasya rūpadvayaṁ sthūlaṁ sūkṣmaṁ ca |
T16n2959u_001:5254: etatpuṣṭistu sādhanāṁ binā sāmānyataḥ sūkṣmakāyo mṛtyukāle bhavati iti vārtayā bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:5255: jīvanakāle māyākāyaṁ sādhayitvā sākṣātkaroti tarhi antarābhave trijñānavilayānantaraṁ saṁbhogakāye utthāpitaḥ san mucyate |
T16n2959u_001:5256: yataḥ antarābhavasya prāṇikāyaḥ sūkṣmaprāṇacittakāya eva bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:5257: aparataśca sādhanābalena sarvavāyuṣu anāhate satsu māyākāyasya sādhanāsiddhyai kāyadvayajñānamāvaśyakam |
T16n2959u_001:5258: atredaṁ vicāraṇīyaṁ yadā sūkṣmakāye sādhakaḥ utthāpito bhavati tadā sthūlakāyāt tasya sambandha-vicchedo bhavati na vā ?
T16n2959u_001:5262: kim na sambhāvyate yāvat samādhibalena sādhakaḥ māyākāye utthāpito bhaviṣyati tāvat sthūlakāyāt pṛthak sa sthāsyati |
T16n2959u_001:5263: samādhibale samāpte sati sa punaḥ sthūlakāye parāvartiṣyate |
T16n2959u_001:5264: vastutaḥ sādhakaḥ yāvat paramārthaprabhāsvaraṁ prathamabhūmiṁ ca na prāpsyati tāvat sūkṣmakāyasyecchānusāraṁ sthūlakāyāt sampūrṇaḥ sambandha-vicchedo bhavediti na pratīyate |
T16n2959u_001:5265: sādhanā sāmānyato māyākāyasādhanāsādhakena caturguṇaiḥ sampannena bhāvyam |
T16n2959u_001:5266: 1. sa utpattikramasya sthūlasūkṣmobhayavidhyoḥ dṛdatāṁ prāpnuyāt 2. tantracatuṣṭayārthajñātā bhavet 3. kāyavākcittavivekānāṁ samyak sādhanāṁ kuryāt 4. yuganaddhakramasya bhāvanābhilāṣī bhavet |
T16n2959u_001:5267: māyākāyasya sādhanā atiguhyatvena rahasyapūrṇatayā ca gurūpadeśaṁ binā na sambhāvyate |
T16n2959u_001:5268: etadarthamadhimuktyā saha - śaiṣīryaṁ nāsti te kāye māsāṁsthirūdhiraṁ na ca |
T16n2959u_001:5271: tathā sarvajñaġyānasaṁdoha evaṁ pañcakromapadiṣṭapaddhatyā gurūṁ saṁstutya māyākāyasya rahasyaṁ khyāpayituṁ saḥ abhyarthanīyaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5273: cittamātreṇa vāyorabhāve cāpi rūpaṁ na sidhyati,
T16n2959u_001:5274: vāyumātre sati citte asatyapi jñānaṁ na sambhāvyate |
T16n2959u_001:5275: bhautikavādivat bhūtebhya eva sarvavastūtpattirna mantuṁ śakyate |
T16n2959u_001:5276: anubhavakṣetre cittasya rūpasvīkṛtiṁ binā nedaṁ sambhāvyate |
T16n2959u_001:5279: ityādipraśnavācakāni cihnāni samutpadyante etadvaiparītye yadi cetanāvādino bhavema tarhi samakṣaṁ yaddṛdavastunaḥ āghātena patāmastasyāpalāpaḥ asambhavaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5280: evaṁ sthitau nāmarūpasyānyonyāśritā sattā'pyabhinnasvarūpā kathaṁ manyeta ?
T16n2959u_001:5282: eteṣu ca parasparasambandhaḥ kathaṁ susthāpitaḥ syāt ?
T16n2959u_001:5283: kiṁ sarvadharmān prabhāsvarasūkṣmaprāṇacittāṁśān matvā vāyucetanayoralpādhikamanupātaṁ svīkuryāma ?
T16n2959u_001:5284: yathā ca bāhyārthavādivaibhāṣikaḥ sūkṣmāṇumapi caturbhūtadhātūnāṁ saṁghātaṁ manyate |
T16n2959u_001:5285: etatsthūlatayā agnijalādisvarūpaṁ bhavati sūkṣmacetanāyāḥ ca sthūlāḥ pañcāśat caitasikāḥ dharmā-maitrīkarūṇākrodhādīni samudbhavanti |
T16n2959u_001:5286: evaṁ ca tadanyonyāśritaṁ bhavatītītthammanyate tadā tu varam,
T16n2959u_001:5287: parañca kevalaṁ śuddhacetanāyāḥ vistāre'bhimate sati sati rāmaśyāmādijanaviśeṣāṇāṁ cittasya kaḥ sambandho bhavitumarhati ?
T16n2959u_001:5288: ekasmin mukte sati sarve kathanna mucyante ?
T16n2959u_001:5289: etat pṛthagastitvamurarī-kriyeta tarhi śāstragrantheṣvāgatāni sarvavastūni prabhāsvarāṇi kathaṁ syuḥ ?
T16n2959u_001:5290: bodhiprāptau jano buddhatvaṁ labhate tarhi sarvajñatvaṁ kasmāt tadjñānaṁ sarvajñeyān kathaṁ vyāpnoti |
T16n2959u_001:5293: cet sarvajñeyeṣu prāṇiṣu ca na vyāpnoti tarhi sarvavineyajanānāmadhyāśayavāsanecchādayaḥ kathaṁ jñātuṁ śakyāḥ yadyetat na sambhāvyate tarhi kimadhyātmaśāstrasya lakṣyam ?
T16n2959u_001:5294: etajjīvanasya śāntirnirdvandvatā caiva lakṣyantarhi kā'vaśyakatā khalvadhyātmaśāstrasya ?
T16n2959u_001:5295: kvacidapi manoramaṇena manaso nirvandvatvaṁ kartuṁ śakyam |
T16n2959u_001:5305: viśeṣasādhanā māyākāyasya viśeṣasādhanāyāḥ ādikarmikamāyākāyaviśuddhamāyākāyayuganaddhamāyākāyākhyāstrayo bhedāḥ ādikarmikasādhaneṣu sarvadharmeṣu viśleṣiteṣu satsu niḥsvabhāvahetunā pratyayena cotpannahetupratyayayorapi vajrakaṇādyutyuktibhiḥ pratipādanenāpi śūnyasya ca siddhirbhavati
T16n2959u_001:5308: evaṁ saṁvṛtau vastūnāṁ pratītyasamutpannasvarūpadharma eva māyākāyo vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:5310: yathā ca bāhyārthābhāve'pi prakaṭitasvapnakāyaḥ pratyayāt prakaṭitā pratiśrutkā,
T16n2959u_001:5312: jale budubudākhyeṣu ābhāsiteṣu niḥsvabhāvamarīciṁ indradhanuṣādikaṁ ca vicārya vastunaḥ kūṭasthatā-sthiratā-prabhṛtayaḥ vicāraṇīyāḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5314: sa ādarśasammukhaṁ vajrasatvasya likhitāṁ viparītāṁ pratikṛtiṁ rakṣati |
T16n2959u_001:5317: pañcakrame cāpi - rūpaṁ ca vedanā caiva saṁjñā saṁskāra eva ca |
T16n2959u_001:5330: viśeṣasya viśuddhamāyākāyasya ca gauṇapramukhau dvau bhedau yaśca tṛtīyacittavivekānantaraṁ prakaṭitayuganaddhakāyasya saṁvṛtyaṁśo māyākāyo viśuddhamāyākāyaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5331: vyavahārabhedena kecid vidvāṁsaḥ prathamam aśuddhaṁ dvitīyaṁ ca viśuddhamāyākāyaṁ manyante |
T16n2959u_001:5332: prathamasya kṛte ādarśe pratibimbitarūpamudāharanti dvitīyaṁ ca nirāvaraṇaskandhaṁ manyante |
T16n2959u_001:5333: etatsādhanā cittavivekenaiva hṛdayasthitānāhatabindau kṣityādidhātūnāṁ saṁhāreṇa sārdhaṁ trijñānasahāyyena sampādyate |
T16n2959u_001:5334: upamāprabhāsvarāt pratilomato māyākāye utthitatattvameva yuganaddhamāyākāyasya sādhanā |
T16n2959u_001:5335: avagaterūdgatiparivartanam bāhyābhyantaropāyānāśritya māyākāyasādhanayā sākaṁ trijñānasahitasahaja-prabhāsvarajñānena sarvaśūnyatāyāḥ pratyakṣīkaraṇāvadhau sādhakasyāvasthā māyākāyāt caturthakramasya paramārthaprabhāsvare parivartate |
T16n2959u_001:5337: prabhāsvaraḥ viṣayimahāsukhajñānādeva viṣayaśūnyatāyāḥ abhinnaḥ satyābhisamayaḥ eva śaikṣikaḥ santatiyogaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5340: tadabhimukhībhavane sati saṁvṛteḥ arthāt aśeṣadvaitābhāsaprapañcasyānto jāyate |
T16n2959u_001:5342: bhedaḥ viṣayiprabhāsvara-viṣayaprabhāsvaropamāprabhāsvaropameyaprabhāsvaraprabhṛtayo naike svarūpagatā bhedā vidhātuṁ śakyante |
T16n2959u_001:5348: sādhanā etatsākṣātkāraḥ vāyuyogena prakṛtisthairyeṇa ca vidhātuṁ śakyate |
T16n2959u_001:5351: yathā ca pāṇḍurogagrastena śaṁkhādayaḥ pītāḥ dṛśyante parañca tadvarṇaḥ śvetaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5354: ācāryaraṅajuṅa dorjemahodayo'pi kathayati prabhāsvarasya sākṣātkāro buddhyā na sambhāvyate- yathā kāṣṭhe agnisthitau satyāṁ kāṣṭhadvayagharṣaṇenāpi tadutpādayituṁ śakyate |
T16n2959u_001:5356: tathaiva lalanārasanayoryogena vāyoravadhūtyāṁ praveśenaiva prabhāsvaraḥ sākṣātkriyate |
T16n2959u_001:5359: 2. saprakṛtisthaprabhāsvarasya sākṣātkārasya dvitīyaḥ prakāraḥ etatsādhanāyāḥ svabhāvitamāyākāyasya śiraso'dhaḥ pādatalādārabhyopari dakṣiṇavāmādisarvadikṣu saṁhāreṇa sākaṁ hṛdayakamale cittasthitikaraṇaṁ piṇḍadhyānamasti |
T16n2959u_001:5360: yathā darpaṇe śvāsapravartane sati tat kramaśaḥ bindau śūnye ca līyate tathaivātra dhyātavyam |
T16n2959u_001:5363: prabhāmayakāyaṁ ca punaḥ pūrvavat saṁgṛhya prabhāsvare sthitikaraṇam anubhedadhyānamucyate |
T16n2959u_001:5364: caturthadevīparipṛcchāvyākhyātantre etad vāyunā sārdhaṁ saṁyojya bhāvanāṁ vidhātuṁ samuktam,
T16n2959u_001:5365: yataśca piṇḍadhyānakāle sarvavāyavo bodhicittaṁ ca hṛdaye saṁgrāhyāni bhavanti,
T16n2959u_001:5369: pratīyate yadābhyāṁ sthitau paramārthaprabhāsvarasyāśrayakāyo'pi avipāka-kāyaḥ san māyākāya eva |
T16n2959u_001:5370: māyākāyaśca vipākakāyaṁ parityajya pṛthagevaṁ na pratīyate |
T16n2959u_001:5371: sa eva kāyaḥ avasthā ca paramārthaprabhāsvaraṁ sākṣātkurūte |
T16n2959u_001:5375: guhyasamāje coktam- svacittaṁ cittanidhyaptau sarvadharmāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5376: khavajrasthā hyamī dharmā na dharmā na ca dharmatā ||
T16n2959u_001:5379: na ca tadānīṁ ko'pi samāropito dharmaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5380: yathā kaścid bālaḥ citravicitrapuṣpavṛkṣaiḥ paripūrṇe udyāne śobhanatāmaśobhanatāṁ ca nāvagacchati |
T16n2959u_001:5381: śabarīpādo'pi yathā-sarvanadīnāṁ jalaṁ sāgare nipatya ekībhūtaṁ jāyate tathaiva cittāvalokanena sarvaprajñapticittacaitasikāḥ prabhāsvaracitte śāmyanti |
T16n2959u_001:5382: tilopādo'pi vakti- yathā- ākāśagaṅgāvalokane dṛṣṭireva nirūdhyeta,
T16n2959u_001:5383: tathaiva svacittasya prakṛtya-vasthāvalokanena sarvavikalpā avarūddhāḥ syuḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5384: nīhārameghādayaḥ ākāśe evotpadyante tatraiva ca viśrāmyanti tathaiva vikalpāḥ caitasikāścāpi prabhāsvaracitte samutpadyante tatraiva śāmyantyapi
T16n2959u_001:5385: jñānasiddhāvapi pratyapādi- yathā sāhasikaḥ kukkuraḥ pāṣāṇaṁ parityajya tatprakṣepakamanudhāvati,
T16n2959u_001:5387: yena ca kadāpi pāṣāṇarūpivikalpasya prakṣepaṇaṁ na bhavet |
T16n2959u_001:5388: yathā - loṣṭaśca dhāvati kṣipte nāsau prakṣepakastathā |
T16n2959u_001:5393: vāyurahitadīpaśikhāvad uccākāśe samutpatitagarūḍavad bhūtakalpanaṁ bhaviṣyasya ca vicāraṁ binā kevalaṁ vartamānajñānaprakāśe stheyam |
T16n2959u_001:5395: sarahapādo'pi vakticittacaitasikayorvyāpārāvarodhena vāyurnirūdhyate vāyu-nirodhena ca prabhāsvaraṁ sākṣātkṛtaṁ bhaviṣyati |
T16n2959u_001:5396: evamavalokyate yat prabhāsvarasādhanāyā ekaḥ saralo'pi panthāḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5397: cet sarvādhyātmikacintakairayameva mārgaḥ anvasariṣyata tarhi adyatano'yaṁ samājaḥ atyunnatiṁ prāpsyat |
T16n2959u_001:5399: yad vastu sāralyena labhyate tadavāptuṁ sa necchati |
T16n2959u_001:5403: etasmādeva yatsaralaṁ janmajanmāntarāt svasahaivotpannaṁ tatsamīpatvād-navalokanena bhavacakramidaṁ duḥkhaśāntiśṛṁkhalābaddhamāste |
T16n2959u_001:5404: śaṅpākargyude mahāmudrāmañjūṣākhyagranthe samuktaṁ yad abodhasya caturhetavaḥ 1. asmaccittaṁ dharmakāyādabhinnaṁ,
T16n2959u_001:5409: 4. trikāye svayaṁ prakaṭite satyapi bhadratvād buddhirenaṁ na gṛhṇāti |
T16n2959u_001:5416: ġyeyakośe cāpi proktaṁ cittaprabhāsvarādhigamāya manaścakṣvādīndriyāṇāṁ vāyośca prakṛtisthatvena lalanārasanayoḥ pravahan vāyuḥ madhyamāyāṁ vileṣyati |
T16n2959u_001:5419: rūpādiviṣayāścakṣvādīndriyāṇi atra vilīya samyagantanirodhaprabhāsvareṣu ekarasāni bhūtvā'dvayāni jāyante |
T16n2959u_001:5423: avagaterūdgatiparivartanam paramārthaprabhāsvaraṁ pratilomni ālokopalabdhau prakaṭitāyāṁ caturthaparamārtha-prabhāsvarakramādidaṁ yuganaddhakrame parivartate |
T16n2959u_001:5428: pañcakrame cāpyabhihitam- saṁvṛtiṁ paramārthaṁ ca pṛthag jñātvā vibhāgataḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5431: sādhanā sādhanāyāḥ praśne tu kimidaṁ nocitaṁ yad āgameṣu ( buddhavacaneṣu )
T16n2959u_001:5433: parañca śāstreṣu prathamabhūmi-prāptiṁ yāvadevaitat pratipāditaṁ syāt |
T16n2959u_001:5434: yato hi tattvadarśanasya prathamabhūmeśca prāptyanantaraṁ sādhakaḥ tathāgataiḥ sambandhaṁ sthāpayati dharmañca śṛṇoti |
T16n2959u_001:5437: anyataśca ye nirvikalpajñānaṁ na sākṣātkṛtavantasteṣāṁ svavikalpena nirākaraṇavidhānamasañgatameva |
T16n2959u_001:5439: parañca parampareyaṁ nirmitā yat prathamabhūmimavāpya nirvikalpasthabodhisatvaiḥ kariṣyamāṇeṣvāvaraṇeṣu bhūmiṣu ca pakṣavipakṣakhaṇḍanenāpi pratipādyate |
T16n2959u_001:5441: yuganaddhotthāpanasambandhe āryadevaḥ caryāmelāpake pañcapraśnān utthāpya tannirākaraṇaṁ spaṣṭayati- 1. prathamaṁ tāvat tṛtīyakramasyārthāt cittavivekānantaraṁ māyākāyena caturtha-prabhāsvare sākṣātkṛte sati sāsravamāyākāyasyānto bhaviṣyati na vā ?
T16n2959u_001:5442: etaduttare sāsravamāyākāyāntaḥ svīkṛtaḥ caturthakramānantaraṁ anāsravaprāṇavāyoḥ yuganaddhakāyaḥ prakaṭiṣyati |
T16n2959u_001:5443: 2. mārgagamanakramasambandhe pṛṣṭe sati tatraiva pañcamārgāṇāṁ daśa bhūmīnāṁ ca sambandhe vistareṇa nirdiṣṭam |
T16n2959u_001:5446: etaduttarantu-kleśasya savasanānāśe sati darśanamārgaprāptyanantaraṁ bhavo vyāvartate |
T16n2959u_001:5452: yathā śrāvakayāne śūnyatāsākṣātkārānantaramapi arhat padaprāptiṁ yāvat karmakleśābhyāṁ bhavotpattirna rūdhyate |
T16n2959u_001:5453: pāramitānaye darśanamārgaprāptau satyāṁ śūnyatāsākṣātkāreṇa prajñaptātmadṛṣṭināśāt karmakleśavaśād bhave janmāvarodhastu bhavati parañca sahajātmagrāhyanāśo na jāyate |
T16n2959u_001:5454: mantranaye tu prajñaptasahajobhayātmadṛṣṭyornāśaḥ darśanamārga eva sampadyate |
T16n2959u_001:5455: ete ca bhedāḥ viṣayaśūnyatāyāḥ sākṣātkartrā viṣayijñānabhedād manyante |
T16n2959u_001:5456: parañcedaṁ vicāraṇīyaṁ yat kiṁ viṣayijñānasya tīvratāviśeṣatayoranurūpameva viṣayabodho nāpekṣyate ?
T16n2959u_001:5459: kiṁ viṣayijñānasya niṣprapañcasvarūpameva śūnyatā na vidyate ?
T16n2959u_001:5460: citte ye guṇā utpadyante te śūnyatājñānād notpannāḥ ?
T16n2959u_001:5461: darśanamārgārūdasādhakānāṁ guṇeṣu yo hyalpādhiko bhāvaḥ sa śūnyatājñānād na sañjātaḥ ?
T16n2959u_001:5463: yatkimapi syāt prathamabhūmeranantaram āsravo naśyati anāsravajñānaṁ cotpadyate |
T16n2959u_001:5467: jñānapādāmnāyaḥ guhyasamājasya jñānapādāmnāyānusāraṁ catasro niṣpannakramabhāvanā caturānandabodhaiḥ kramacatuṣṭaye vidhīyate |
T16n2959u_001:5469: jñānapādena mañjuśriyaḥ ādeśād muktitilakaṁ vyaraci yaśca jñānapādāmnāyasya niṣpannakramavidherādhārabhūto granthaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5470: etadanusāramutpattikrame akṣobhyapradhānapañcakulamaṇḍalānāṁ bhāvanānantaraṁ niṣpannakrame hṛdaye anāhatatilakaṁ maṇicakre guhyatilakaṁ,
T16n2959u_001:5471: nāsikāgre nirmāṇatilakaṁ ca bhāvayitvā krameṇa ānandaparamānandādicaturānandānubhavena saha niṣpannakramaḥ sādhyate |
T16n2959u_001:5472: sādhanāvidhiḥ hṛdayakamale utpattikramasadṛśapaddhatyā'nāhatabindau nikhilamaṇḍalaṁ dhyātvā saṁgrahasaṁhāravidhiṁ cānukṛtya tilakaikāgyraprāptiḥ prathamānandaprāptividhirasti |
T16n2959u_001:5473: 2. hṛdayasthatilakaṁ vāyuyogena maṇicakre saṁmanthya tatraiva pūrvavat sampūrṇadevamaṇḍalaṁ bhāvayitvā pradhānadevahṛdayasthaṁ tilakaṁ ca dhyātvā saṁgrahasaṁhāradhyānānuśīlanādeva paramānando labhyate |
T16n2959u_001:5474: 3. ūrdhvanāsikāgre nimittatilakaṁ dhyātvā vajrajāpādivāyubalena sūkṣmavāyutilakamadhikṛtya sarvadharmāṇāṁ māyopamabhāvanā viramānandaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5476: piṇḍānubhedadhyānayogena punaḥ punarabhyāsena ca trijñānalakṣaṇamarīcidhūmādīni utpadyante |
T16n2959u_001:5478: nāgārjunaḥ pitṛtantragranthaguhyasamājamādhārīkṛtyotpattikrame piṇḍīkṛtaṁ niṣpannakrame ca pañcakramaṁ vilikhya sādhanāyāḥ suspaṣṭaṁ vidhiṁ prāstāvīt itthaṁ mātṛtantragrantheṣu na vilikhitam |
T16n2959u_001:5480: teṣu ko'pi grantho viśiṣṭamārgeṣu saṁgrahītuṁ duḥśakyaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5482: yathā ḍombīpādaḥ amṛtasādhanāyāṁ vasantatilakena saha caṇḍālīsādhanāmanuṣṭhātuṁ bhṛśaṁ prairit |
T16n2959u_001:5483: sarorūha-pādenāpi utpattikrame ṣaḍvarṇayogena punaśca varṇānāmanubhedanavidhinā prabhāsvarasya sākṣātkārāyābhihitam |
T16n2959u_001:5485: ayaṁ piṇḍānubhedana-dhyānayogayoḥ balaṁ dattvā yuganaddhāvirbhūtavidhiṁ khyāpayati |
T16n2959u_001:5487: yasya pracāraṁ tibbadeśīyaḥ anuvādakaḥ kargyudasampradāya-saṁsthāpakaśca marapā dharmamatiḥ kṛtavān |
T16n2959u_001:5490: saṁkṣepeṇa paricayaḥ tat prastūyate yato hyayameva prādhānyena mātṛtantrasādhanāvidhiḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5496: cittasthitibodhaṁ binā na sākṣātkartuṁ śakyate tataḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5497: yathā ca dhenoḥ śarīre dugdhantu bhavati parañca śṛṅgābhyāṁ dugdhaṁ dogdhuṁ na śakyate |
T16n2959u_001:5502: praśnaḥ samudeti mahājñānaṁ śarīrasthantu vartate parañca tatpratyakṣaṁ kathaṁ ?
T16n2959u_001:5503: “samyagvāg“ granthe kathitaṁ evaṁ kāyasya nābhikṣetre sthitam |
T16n2959u_001:5506: etad vyākhyāyamānaḥ ācāryaṅotonaḥ vakti - jāgradavasthāyāṁ cittarājo nābhau tiṣṭhati svapne ca kaṇṭhacakre nidrāvasthāyāṁ hṛdaye samāpattyavasthāyāṁ coṣṇīṣe bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:5507: jāgradavasthāyāṁ cittaṁ nābhikṣetre anekavikalpākārasaṁjñābhiḥ saṁkulaṁ bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:5508: svapne cittaṁ kaṇṭhacakre vāyunā spandite asti-nāsti svarūpe tiṣṭhati |
T16n2959u_001:5511: yataḥ rāgato malinamidaṁ cittaṁ malinarūpeṇa avatiṣṭhate svanirmalasvarūpaṁ ca vismarati |
T16n2959u_001:5514: jāgradavasthāyāṁ lalanārasanā'vadhūtīnāṁ saṅgame aplutākārajñānāgniṁ prajvālya caṇḍālī-sādhanayā svapne kaṇṭhacakramāśritya svapna-sādhanayā nidrāyāṁ prabhāsvara-sādhanayā samāpattāvapi caṇḍālīsādhanayā ca cittaṁ pariśodhyate |
T16n2959u_001:5515: yato hi atrendriyāṇāṁ viṣayapravartanāvasare ekatastu samāpattiḥ saṁkramate,
T16n2959u_001:5518: caṇḍālīsādhanayā yadyapi sarvafalavāptisthāpi pramukhatayā dharmakāyaṁ ca pradadātīyam |
T16n2959u_001:5519: svapnasādhanayā saṁbhogakāyasya māyākāyena nirmāṇakāyasya prabhāsvareṇa ca mahāsukhakāyasya siddhirbhavati |
T16n2959u_001:5520: caṇḍālī ityasyārthaḥ skandhāyatanadhātūnāṁ sarvadharmāṇāṁ ca nirākartrī bhakṣikā nirvikalpasvarūpā sarvajinānāṁ mātā vajrabhaṭṭārikaiva caṇḍālī vartate |
T16n2959u_001:5521: hevajratantraṭīkāyāṁ canḍālī “caṇḍā prajñā kleśopakleśanikṛntane caṇḍasvabhāvatvādālivajrasatvaḥ caṇḍālīśabdenocyate “ ityādi kathitam |
T16n2959u_001:5526: sādhanā caṇḍālī sādhanāyā vidhidvayaṁ pūrvakarmavidhiḥ maulavidhiśca |
T16n2959u_001:5529: tadagre śarīraṁ kiñcidiṣṭadevatvena bhāvayitvā nāḍīcakrāṇi spaṣṭarūpeṇa dhyāyyante |
T16n2959u_001:5530: abhyāsāya madhyamānāḍyā atisūkṣmakeśasadṛśīṁ sthūlasumerūparvatasadṛśīṁ bhāvanāṁ vidhāya nāḍīcakrajñānamavāpyate |
T16n2959u_001:5531: nāḍīmārgapariśodhanāya lalanārasanābhyam ālikālyoḥ kramaśo nāsikāgrataḥ praveśasya guhyendriyāt nirgamanasya ca dhyānaṁ kriyate |
T16n2959u_001:5533: śukraśoṇitayo sthitiṁ tadvāyusambandhādikaṁ ya samyak parijñāya maulacaṇḍālī sādhyate |
T16n2959u_001:5535: parañcaitadartham utpatti-kramavidhinā bhāvite kaśmiṁścidiṣṭadeve svaparivartanaṁ vidheyam |
T16n2959u_001:5536: atra ca hevajre ātmānaṁ parivartya pitṛdevoṣṇīṣakamalādārabhya nābheścaturaṅgulamadhaḥsthaṁ nāḍīcakraṁ bhāvyate |
T16n2959u_001:5542: hṛdaye tu tathā caiva padyamaṣṭadalaṁ smṛtam ||
T16n2959u_001:5544: caṇḍālībhāvanā prāyaḥ hevajravarṇitānusāraṁ hṛsvaplutākārasya 'a' ityasya bhāvanāmanuṣṭhāyaiva kriyate |
T16n2959u_001:5546: svayaṁ hevajrayuganaddhabhāvanā nābhistha-catuṣṣaṣṭidalīyakamalamadhye kṛṣṇapītaraśmivata ūrdhvamukhasya bījasya 'a' ityasya hṛdayasthāṣṭadalakamalamadhye nīlavarṇavajrarāhusvabhāvasya 'hū' ityasya ,
T16n2959u_001:5548: sīmnaścaturnāḍīdaleṣu adhomukhena' evaṁ mayā ' ityetasya ca bhāvanā'nuṣṭhīyate |
T16n2959u_001:5549: kaṇṭhasthaṣoḍaśadalacakramadhye raktavarṇasūryasvabhāvasya om ityetasya caturdikṣu raktavarṇādhomukhatilakanādena vibhūṣitasya 'haṁ ' ityetasya bhāvanā kriyate |
T16n2959u_001:5555: tadanu mātṛdevaprabhāyāṁ vilīne candramasi ' aṁ ' ityasmin tataśca nābhicakrabīje ' aṁ ' ityasmin vilīya jñānāgniṁ prajvālayati |
T16n2959u_001:5556: ayamagniḥ ūrdhvaṁ saṁvardhya hṛdayacakraṁ prāpya pañcatathāgatān ,
T16n2959u_001:5558: yathā ca hevajratantre - caṇḍālī jvalitā nābhau,
T16n2959u_001:5562: abhidhyānottaratantre caṇḍālī jñānāgnitvena vajramālāyāmagnitvena mahāmudrā-tilake ca karmavāyutvena cakrasaṁvare ca tilakatvenābhihitā |
T16n2959u_001:5563: saṁvṛtau tilakameva kathayituṁ śakyam yasya ca agnivat svarūpam |
T16n2959u_001:5564: caṇḍālyāḥ pūrvakarmaṇi nābhi-cakrāccaturaṅgulamadho lalanā-rasanā-madhyamānāḍīnāṁ melanasthāne ' a ' plutākāre citraikāgyraṁ vidhāya kumbhakaprāṇāyāmo'nuṣṭhīyate
T16n2959u_001:5565: atra prajvalitāgnivad etad dhyātvā nābhau pañcāśataśaḥ kumbhakaṁ kriyate |
T16n2959u_001:5566: krameṇordhvagatikaḥ hṛdayaṁ kaṇṭhaṁ cāntataḥ uṣṇīṣaṁ prāpnoti cāgniḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5567: uṣṇīṣaṁ prāpya sampūrṇāṅgapratyaṅgāni jñānāgninā pūritāni bodhicittaṁ ca śukrābhinnaṁ bhavati,
T16n2959u_001:5569: kālacakraprabhṛtyadvayatantragranthānusāreṇa sampūrṇaśarīre anāsravasukhena vyāpte sati śarīrasthāsravatilakaṁ nāśayati |
T16n2959u_001:5570: yathā lauhasthaḥ pāradaḥ lauhaṁ prajvālya nāśayati,
T16n2959u_001:5572: sādhakasya ṣaḍdhātuvinirmitamidaṁ śarīraṁ indradhanuṣasadṛśaṁ māyākāyaṁ prāpnoti,
T16n2959u_001:5574: nābhicakrāt kramaśaḥ ūrdhvagatitaḥ uṣṇīṣaṁ yāvat punaścoṣṇīṣacakrānnābhicakraṁ yāvad adhogaterabhyāsa evānanda-paramānanda-viramānanda-sahajānandānāṁ prāptividhiḥ vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:5575: evaṁ dhyānena ānandacatuṣṭayānubhūtistadaiva sambhāvyate yadā ca sarvaprāṇavāyavaḥ caṇḍālīsādhanābalena madhyamāṁ praviśya avatiṣṭharen yataśca jñānāgnirmadhyamāntaḥ praviśan cakreṣu praviśya tad bhinatti |
T16n2959u_001:5579: nābhito hṛdayaparyantaṁ prāptau viṣayātiśūnyaviṣayiviramānandaḥ kaṇthāduṣṇīṣaṁ yāvat prāptikāle viṣayisahajānandaśca labhyate |
T16n2959u_001:5582: ānandastu vicitrakṣaṇamucyate yataśca bāhyapratyayamudrām ābhyantarapratyayavāyuyogaṁ caṇḍālīyogaṁ vāśritya etat sākṣātkriyate |
T16n2959u_001:5598: caṇḍalīsādhanāyāṁ samutpannaguṇadoṣāṇāṁ vistareṇa pratipādanaṁ tilopā-samyag vāg kape ḍachī jamapala pāao dvārā viracite caṇḍālībhāvnāavidhau padyākarapo-srefo ityatra ca kṛtamāste |
T16n2959u_001:5599: māyākāyaḥ hevajre pratipāditam- ātmā jīvaṁ ca sattvaṁ ca kālaḥ pudgala eva ca |
T16n2959u_001:5604: yathā pañcakrame trijñānā-nantaram upamāprabhāsvareṇotthāpitaṁ māyākāyam aśuddhamāyākāyena caturthaprabhāsvara-vāyuyogena ca madhyamānāḍyāṁ praveśya sarvaśūnyatvasākṣātkārānantaraṁ pratilomni sūkṣmavāyau spandite sati sa viśuddhamāyākāyo nigadyate |
T16n2959u_001:5605: mātṛtantre caṇḍālīṁ dhyātvā vāyuṁ madhyamāyāṁ praveśya bodhicittaṁ srāvayitvā ca caturānandaiḥ śūnyatāmavabuddhya sahajānandānantaraṁ māyākāyotthāpanaṁ jāyate |
T16n2959u_001:5612: prabhāsvarānantaraṁ prakaṭitayuganaddhamāyākāyasya viśuddhamāyākāyasya sarvadharmāṇāṁ ca māyasvapnavadavabodhaḥ aśuddhamahākāyaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5613: pañcakrame paramārthamanu śuddhamāyākāyāt pūrvamapi upamāprabhāsvarādāvirbhūtaḥ aśuddhamāyākāyaḥ niṣpannakramo manyate |
T16n2959u_001:5614: pitṛtantre vāyuṁ madhyamāyāṁ praveśya trijñānena prabhāsvaraḥ sākṣāt kriyate kintu mātṛtantre vāyormadhyamāyāṁ praveśastu mānyo'sti parañcālambanarūpeṇa caṇḍālyāḥ 'evaṁ' bindorvā grahaṇena pṛthak prabhāsvaramāyākāyādibhyaḥ svatantrakramasya pratipādanamaparihāryaṁ nāsti |
T16n2959u_001:5616: tadapi cittasya nidrākālāvasthāṁ sāmānyamāyārūpaṁ ca tvaritaṁ vijñātuṁ pṛthak sādhanāvidhirapyupalabhyate |
T16n2959u_001:5621: svapnāvasthāyāṁ jāgradavasthāyāṁ vā sarvaṁ dharmacitta eva sthitamasti |
T16n2959u_001:5624: yathā ca - tathaiva dhātvāyatanendriyādau jñānadvaye tatra susaṁhate'smin |
T16n2959u_001:5625: śūnye mahattve sati yaḥ prasuptaḥ svapnaṁ prapaśyet khalu vātasaṁśrayāt |
T16n2959u_001:5626: supte prabuddhe na ca nānyabhedaḥ saṁkalpayet svapnafalābhilāṣī |
T16n2959u_001:5629: viṣayaviṣayisarvadharmāṇāmidameva prabhāsvaratvaṁ yaśca jāgradavasthāyāṁ bāhyārthe nidrāyāṁ ca vāyunā spandanena svapnarūpeṇa avalokyate |
T16n2959u_001:5630: ataścittaṁ svapne vijñātuṁ jāgradavasthāyāṁ caṇḍālībhāvanāvat svapna-sādhanā kriyate |
T16n2959u_001:5632: caṇḍālīmāyākāyayoḥ dākṣyamavāptuṁ jāgrati svapne ca samabhāvaścaiva bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:5634: sādhanā sādhakaḥ śayanakāle sampūrṇanāḍīcakrasaṁvalite svadehe iṣṭadevaṁ bhāvayet |
T16n2959u_001:5635: kaṇṭhacakre 'aḥ' ityakṣare yaśca sarvatathāgatānāṁ vāksvarūpaḥ pañcaprabhāmayaścāste,
T16n2959u_001:5637: iti vicintya nidrāṁ prāpnuyāt yena ca svapne'pi svapno bhavati iti parijñātaṁ bhavet |
T16n2959u_001:5639: tathaiva kaṇṭhacakre eva vajrajāpaṁ bhāvayitvā tacca prabhāsvare samāhitya niṣprapañce samasthitireva svapnasādhanā'sti |
T16n2959u_001:5640: svapne svapno vartate iti parijñāya yathā jāgrada-vasthāyāṁ dhyānayogādayaḥ kriyante tathaiva svapne'pi bhāvanīyam |
T16n2959u_001:5641: evaṁ svapnasādhanā-yāmabhyastasādhakasya kṛte niśādivasayorantaraṁ na bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:5643: prabhāsvaraḥ mātṛtantre prabhāsvarasādhanāvidhiḥ pitṛtantrasadṛśa eva yaśca pūrvamabhihito'sti |
T16n2959u_001:5644: sāmānyato nāḍapādasya ṣaḍdharmayogaḥ sarvānuttaratantrāṇāṁ niṣpannakramasādhanāyāḥ saṁgraharūpo manyate |
T16n2959u_001:5647: vajraḍākārṇava-saṁvarodayābhyāṁ svapnāntarābhavau gṛhītau sampuṭodbhavacatuṣpīṭhābhyāṁ ca saṁkramaṇamuddhṛtam |
T16n2959u_001:5650: ata eva tibbatasya sampradāyacatuṣṭayena kathaṁcidrūpeṇa ṣaḍyogasādhanāvidhiḥ samullikhito'sti |
T16n2959u_001:5651: yadyapyayaṁ nikhilānuttaratantrāṇāṁ sādhanāvidhistathāpi ṣaḍyogakendraṁ marma vā caṇḍālīyoga ucyate yaśca mātṛtantrasyāsāmānyaḥ sādhanāvidhiḥ
T16n2959u_001:5653: pitṛtantre vāyutrijñānaparamārthaprabhāsvarāṇi viśeṣeṇa vivecitāni mātṛtantre ca caṇḍālīcaturānandādīni viśleṣitāni |
T16n2959u_001:5656: atra nidrāyāṁ prabhāsvarasākṣātkārāya svapnasadṛśaḥ sādhanāvidhiḥ pratyapādyata |
T16n2959u_001:5657: yathā nidrāgamanapūrvaṁ śayanakāle suṣuptau prabhāsvaraparijñānāya iṣṭadevaṁ samprāthyaṁ svayamiṣṭadeve pariṇatena satā hṛdayakamalasya dalacatuṣṭayasya madhye śyāmavarṇe hūṁ padyadaleṣu ca nīlavarṇe 'anuttaram' iti caturakṣaraṁ dhyeyam yacca pañcajñānaṁ pañcabuddhasvarūpaṁ cāste |
T16n2959u_001:5659: praśvāse pañcaraśmibhiḥ nikhilaṁ brahyāṇḍaṁ parivyāptaṁ punaḥ śvāsāvadhau etanmantreṣu vyalīyata itthaṁ bahuśo dhyātavyam |
T16n2959u_001:5660: kadācit praśvāsakāle pañcaraśmibhiḥ sarvabhājanalokāḥ sattvalokāśca vyāptāḥ śvāsakāle ca ete sarve mantrāḥ mantramatyadhikaṁ prabhāmayaṁ vidadhatu,
T16n2959u_001:5667: huṁ ityasya nāde nāditilake ca vilayaṁ kṛtvā tatraiva samāhitena bhāvyam |
T16n2959u_001:5668: itthaṁ prabhāsvaraṁ bhāvayatā nidrāmupagatya suṣuptau tatpravāhabalābhyāṁ prabhāsvaraḥ sākṣātkartuṁ śakyate |
T16n2959u_001:5669: antarābhavaḥ sāmānyataḥ prāṇī ajñānād bhramitvā bhavacakrāduparyyutthāya yāvad jñānaṁ na prāpturmahati tāvān kālaḥ antarābhavasya |
T16n2959u_001:5670: etasya prakṛtyutpatti-antarābhāvaḥ 2. mṛtyuduḥ khāntarābhavaḥ 3. dharmadhātu-antarābhāvaśca iti bhedatrayaṁ vidhātuṁ śakyam |
T16n2959u_001:5672: avasthānusāreṇa etasya naike bhedā vidhātuṁ śakyante,
T16n2959u_001:5677: antarābhava eva yuganaddhakāyasya arthāt paramārthaprabhāsvarasya māyākāyasya cābhinnarūpeṇa bodhi jāyate |
T16n2959u_001:5679: trikāyavyavasthayā pratīyate yadyekajīvana eva samyaksambodhiḥ prāptavyaḥ cettarhi sa ca antarābhava eva sambhāvyate na tu jīvitāvasthāyām,
T16n2959u_001:5680: yataśca etadvipākakāyasya parityāgaṁ binā prabhāsvarasya sūkṣmamāyākāyasya ca yuganaddharūpeṇa utthānaṁ kadāpi na sambhāvyate |
T16n2959u_001:5682: kāraṇantvatredameva yat pāramitāyāninaḥ mantrayāninaśca buddhamakaniṣṭhabhuvane ādāveva bodhiprāptammanyante |
T16n2959u_001:5683: śākyamuniprabhṛtinte nirmāṇakāyatvenāṅgīkurvanti parañcādvayatantrakālacakre etad-vipākaśarīrasyāsravaskandham anāsravamahāsukhatilakadvārā bhakṣitvā indradhanuṣasadṛśa-nūtanaśarīrāvāptimabhimanyante |
T16n2959u_001:5685: kālacakre samabhihitam- tasmān niḥspandasaukhyaṁ kṣaṇamiha sahajaṁ dharmadhāturdadāti prāṇenākṛṣya sarvān rasagatiṣu gatān kleśamārān nihatya
T16n2959u_001:5686: ṛddhiṁ sarvajñabhūmiṁ tribhuvanagurūtāṁ yogināṁ janmanīha mṛtyuṁ mārgapraviṣṭo vrajati yadi tadā tadgrahādanyajātyā ||
T16n2959u_001:5688: arthāt jīvanakāle paramapadaṁ prāptuṁ nāśaknot tarhi aparajanmani kiṁ prāpsyati |
T16n2959u_001:5689: mātṛtantre antarābhavasādhanāyāḥ svīyammahattvamāste yato hi avastheyameva atyantaṁ sūkṣmā balaśālinī ca bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:5695: sāmānyāntarābhavasādhanāyāṁ sādhako mṛtyukāle pañcaskandhadhātucatuṣṭayasya ṣaḍāyatana-pañcaviṣayāṇāṁ pañcāśrayajñānānāṁ pañcaviṁśatitattvānāṁ layavidhau utpatsyamānaṁ lakṣaṇaṁ pitṛtantrapaddhatyā parijñeyam |
T16n2959u_001:5696: yathā hi rūpaskandhāśrayikādarśajñāna- kṣitidhātu-cakṣurindriya-rūpādiviṣayāṇāṁ kṣayānantaramantaścitte marīcipratibhāsaḥ bāhyakāyadīptiśca viluptā'spaṣṭā ca dṛśyate |
T16n2959u_001:5697: dharmakāyasya mārgīkaraṇam bāhyasthūladhātorābhyantarasūkṣmavikalpānāñca kṣayānantaram ālokā'lokabhāsālokopalabdhīnāmantaram uṣṇīṣakamalāt pitṛlabdhaṁ śvetaśukraṁ nābhicakrasyādho mātṛlabdhaṁ raktaṁ cordhvagatiṁ vidadhat hṛdayakamale caikarasaṁ sambhūya sarvaśūnyena sārdhaṁ prabhāsvareṇādvayaṁ jāyate |
T16n2959u_001:5698: tatkṣaṇaṁ jīvanakāle kṛtāṁ tatsadṛśīṁ bhāvanāmāśritya tadbalena ca parijñāya tadavasthitireva dharmakāyasya ekā sthitiḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5699: prabhāsvarasyādvayarūpeṇa sthiteyāmavasthā prabhāsvaramātrā saha sādhakaputrasya melanamapyucyate |
T16n2959u_001:5702: āśraya eva mārgaḥ mārga eva ca falaṁ yaccāsaṁhāryamāste |
T16n2959u_001:5703: atredaṁ nūnaṁ jñeyaṁ yathā āśrayamārgafalānyavasthābhedena pṛthak vartante parañca tathatā tvekaiva tathaivāsyāmavasthāyāṁ dharmakāya eva sambhogakāyaḥ sambhogakāyaścaiva nirmāṇām,
T16n2959u_001:5705: nedaṁ bodhyaṁ yad dharmakāye sthitatvena sambhogakāyastatra nāpekṣyeta |
T16n2959u_001:5711: tadavasthāyāṁ bodhicittavān-karūṇāvān bahurūpavān veti bhedā na yojyāḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5712: imā avasthā dharmakāyasya bodhicittasya karūṇāyāśca nigadyante |
T16n2959u_001:5713: tasmādeva pūrvaṁ niṣpannakramasya sāmānyārthe'pi pratipāditaṁ vajrayāne bodhicittaṁ sādhanāmātramasat sādhyatvamāpadyate idamevautkṛṣṭyaṁ vajrayānasya
T16n2959u_001:5714: sambhogakāyaḥ cetsādhakaḥ dharmakāyasthito na bhavitumaśaknot tarhi saḥ prabhāsvare samutthāpitaḥ san ālokābhāsanantaram antarābhavasatve prakaṭiṣyati yaśca sūkṣmakāya ucyate |
T16n2959u_001:5715: tadānīṁ sampāditasādhanābalena sambhogakāye tathaivotthāpito bhaviṣyati yathā jalād matsyo'pi uttiṣṭhati |
T16n2959u_001:5717: nirmāṇakāyaḥ sambhogakāye utthāpanaṁ na syāttarhi prāṇyantarābhavasattvo bhaviṣyati |
T16n2959u_001:5720: ato mṛtakasya śrāddhādikarma ūnapañcāśaddināni yāvadeva kriyate |
T16n2959u_001:5721: satvaḥ pūrvapuṇyabalena sukhāvtīprabhṛtiśuddhe kṣetre janma labhate yathecchaṁ vā māturgabhaṁ praviśya janma labdhvā krameṇa samyaksambodhiṁ prāpnoti |
T16n2959u_001:5723: sāratastu dharmakāya-sambhogakāya-nirmāṇakāyānāṁ prāptividhimatra svajīvanakāle eva mṛtyukāle svajīvanasya paristhityā sārdhaṁ tat saṁyojya vāyau madhyamānāḍyāṁ praviṣṭe sati prakaṭitāni lakṣaṇānyādhārīkṛtya dharmakāyasya prāptividheḥ punarbhāvanameva dharmakāyasya mārgīkaraṇamucyate
T16n2959u_001:5724: itthaṁ trikāyasya mārgīkaraṇāya pūrvaṁ vāstavike mṛtyukāle trikāyasya prakaṭīkaraṇavidhiḥ parijñeyaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5725: sādhanāprayojanaṁ hi jīvanakāle mṛtyuṁ parijñāya jīvanmuktireva kathyate |
T16n2959u_001:5726: atra praśno'pi sambhāvyate- mṛtyukāle evaṁ parijñānaṁ na sambhaviṣyati yato hi mṛtyustu,
T16n2959u_001:5727: ekā tīvrā nidrāvasthā'sti vastutastu nijacittasya pravāhamayasantateḥ vibhinnā avasthāḥ santi |
T16n2959u_001:5728: ato'ntarābhave'pi sambhogakāye yathecchaṁ vā sukhāvatīprabhṛtikṣetre janma sambhāvyate |
T16n2959u_001:5730: purā duṣṭaṁ janaṁ sthānaṁ vā naikavarṣānantaraṁ vayaṁ paricinumaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5731: yathā kumbhakārasya ekadā cālitaṁ cakraṁ sahasā svapravāhe bhramati kumbhakāraśca ghaṭān nirmāti,
T16n2959u_001:5732: tathaiva sādhako'pi mṛtyukāle utpadyamānāni lakṣaṇāni parijñāyamānaḥ mārgīkaraṇasya falamavāptumarhati |
T16n2959u_001:5733: saṁkramaṇam saṁkramaṇamutkrāntiṁ vā sāmānyaśabdeṣu satataṁ pravāhayuktatvena gatiśīlatvena cābhidhātuṁ śaknumo vayam |
T16n2959u_001:5734: ataḥ prabhāsvaracittasya pravāhātmakaṁ kṣaṇikatvaṁ dīpaśikhāvat pratikṣaṇaṁ parivartanaśīlaṁ ca sadapi nirantaraṁ gatiśīlamapi vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:5735: evaṁ sadapi tat svaprabhāsvarasvabhāve'nabhilāpyaṁ tathatātmakaṁ cāpi jāyate |
T16n2959u_001:5738: yathā mahāsāgaramadhye vāyuyānena uḍḍayamānaḥ khagaḥ bhramitvā tatraiva parāvartiṣyate tathaiva vayaṁ vibhinno-pāyānāśritya ante ca tasminneva kendre sthāsyāmaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5741: pramukhaṁ balavacca saṁkramaṇaṁ śuddhakṣetre ca cittasaṁkramaṇaṁ,
T16n2959u_001:5744: eṣā saṁkramaṇasādhanā vineyajanānanugrahītuṁ tāṁśca samyagmārge praveśayituṁ svayaṁ parakāyapraveśāya pārthivaśuddhakṣetrādau saṁkramaṇāya ca vidyate |
T16n2959u_001:5745: sādhanā utkrānteḥ saṁkramaṇasya ca sādhanā sampuṭodbhavatantre aṣṭamakalpasya tṛtīyaprakaraṇe vistareṇa vivecitā |
T16n2959u_001:5746: saṁvarodayatantrasya ūnaviṁśatitame mṛtyunimittadarśanotkrānti-yogapaṭale mṛtyupūrvāṇi lakṣaṇāni darśayitvā mṛtyukāle hṛdayakamalasthaṁ nijacittaṁ ( sūkṣmaprāṇacittaṁ )
T16n2959u_001:5747: madhyamānāḍīmārgeṇa ūrdhvagatyā uṣṇīṣato bahirniṣkāsya śuddhakṣetra-sthāmitābhabuddhasya svoṣṇīṣe bhāvitavajradharasya vā cittena sākaṁ ekarasānvayavidhiḥ pratyapādyata |
T16n2959u_001:5755: itthaṁ mṛtyukāle vāyorathavā bījamantrebhyo'nyāni netrakarṇamukhanāsikāprabhṛtīni dvārāṇi pidhāya vāyuvegena sārdhaṁ cittameva bījasthaṁ vidhāya ūrdhvaṁ prati agresāryya saṁkramaṇaṁ kriyate |
T16n2959u_001:5756: cecchidramanyacchidrebhyo nirgacchati tarhi evaṁ mṛtyuprāptaḥ sādhako vibhinnayoniṣu janmāvāpnoti |
T16n2959u_001:5757: yathā ca saṁvarodayatantre- uttamādhamabhedena kathyate śṛṇu guhyaka |
T16n2959u_001:5763: cakṣurbhyāṁ yadi gate devi nararājo bhaviṣyati |
T16n2959u_001:5769: ato jīvanakāle sādhakaḥ svayamiṣṭadevaṁ bhāvayitvā vāyuyogena sārdhaṁ cittaṁ hrīṁ iti bīje saṁsthāpya taduccārayan madhyamānāḍītaḥ uṣṇīṣaparyantaṁ,
T16n2959u_001:5770: punaśca 'ka' ityākāre 'ka' ityuccārayan hṛdaye nāḍīcakramadhaḥ paryantamānīya sthiratvaṁ vidadhyāt |
T16n2959u_001:5772: sādhakaścittotkrāntau dākṣyamavāpnuyāttarhi parakāye'pi praveṣṭumarhatyayam janāntarasya sthūlaśarīre mṛte satyapi cettasya ābhyantarīyatrijñānaṁ naṣṭaṁ na syāttarhi svasādhanābalena mṛtakasya cittaṁ śuddhakṣetrādiṣu saṁkramayitumarhati |
T16n2959u_001:5773: ata evaṁ sādhakaḥ imāṁ bhāvanāṁ vinaiva mokṣamārgaṁ pratyapādayat |
T16n2959u_001:5774: yataśca mṛtakasya sūkṣmaśarīraṁ sukhāvatīprabhṛtikṣetreṣu janmāvāpya tataḥ samyaksambodhimavāpnoti |
T16n2959u_001:5776: itthaṁ nāḍapādasyāyaṁ ṣaḍdharmayogaḥ yadyapi sarvānuttaratantrāṇāṁ sārabhūtasthāpi ṣaḍyogasādhanāyāḥ pramukhaḥ ādhāraḥ caṇḍālīyoga evāsti |
T16n2959u_001:5779: niṣpannakramasādhanāvidhiḥ ṣaḍaṅgayogasya sāmānyaparicayaḥ sāmānyataḥ kālacakra-niṣpannakramasyādhāro'pyanyānuttaratantravad vajradeha evāsti
T16n2959u_001:5780: nāḍīṣu pradhānībhūtā lalanārasanāvadhūtāstisraḥ sūryacandrarāhu nāmnā paricīyante |
T16n2959u_001:5785: lalāṭe ca ṣoḍaśa dalāni kaṇṭhe dvātriṁśad dalāni,
T16n2959u_001:5786: hṛdaye aṣṭadalaṁ nābhau catuṣṣaṣṭifalāni guhyasthāneṣu ca dvātriṁśad nāḍīdalacakrāṇi varṇitāni |
T16n2959u_001:5791: praġyāsaṁġye'cyutaṁ yad bhavati khalu mahāsādhanaṁ sūkṣmayogāt ||
T16n2959u_001:5793: niṣpannakramasādhanā ṣaḍaṅgayoge niyatā'sti yato hi prāpyapadani-kāyavajravāg-vajracittavajrāṇi trīṇi |
T16n2959u_001:5794: pratyāhāraḥ samādhiśca yasya kāyasya siddhirnābhūt tasya lakṣaṇānuvyaṅjanaiḥ siddhiṁ kārayati |
T16n2959u_001:5795: prāṇāyāmadhāraṇābhyāṁ vāṅmūlakāraṇībhūtaṁ vāyu-madhikṛtya sādhakaḥ sarvajñavācaṁ ṣaṣṭibrahyasvaraṁ vā niṣpādayati |
T16n2959u_001:5797: ācāryacoṅkhāpāmahodayaḥ ṣaḍaṅgayogakramavidhiṁ suspaṣṭayan akathayat falamahāsukhaśūnyatābhinnādvayarūpaprāptiḥ sajātīyahetunaiva kriyate,
T16n2959u_001:5799: ataḥ svataḥ śūnyarūpeṇābhāsiteṣṭadevasya mātṛpitṛyuganaddha-rūpeṇa prakaṭitamātṛdevasyānurāgapūrṇe svacitte sthitirevākṣārasukhaprāptirdhyānayogo vā'sti |
T16n2959u_001:5800: anusmṛtisādhanākāle caṇḍālyā bodhicittaṁ nigīrya uṣṇīṣanmaṇi-cakraparyantaṁ prāptyā caturānandaprāptirbhavati |
T16n2959u_001:5802: tatkāle eva nābhau caṇḍālyā prajvalane yogī devabimbaṁ sākṣātkurūte tatra cānurāgasukhamutpadyate |
T16n2959u_001:5804: anusmṛtyutpatyai dhāraṇayā madhyamānāḍyāṁ vāyumacalatvena saṁsthāpya caṇḍālī prajvālanīyā |
T16n2959u_001:5806: dhāraṇāvasthāprāptyai prāṇāyāmena lalanārasanayoḥ pravahan vāyuḥ madhyamāyāṁ praveṣṭavyo bhavati,
T16n2959u_001:5808: madhyamānāḍyāḥ paricayaḥ pratyāhārayogavidhinā aharniśi udeṣyamāṇaikādaśalakṣaṇānāṁ siddhyanantarameva sambhāvyate |
T16n2959u_001:5809: pratyāhāreṇaikādaśalakṣaṇeṣu sākṣātkṛteṣu satsu samādhiyogena tāni dārdyamavāpnuvanti |
T16n2959u_001:5811: kālacakre ṣaḍaṅgayogakramaḥ - pratyāhāro daśānāṁ viṣayaviṣḥayiṇāmapravṛttiḥ śarīre |
T16n2959u_001:5815: caṇḍālyālokanaṁ yad bhavati khalu tanau cāmbare'nusmṛtiḥ syāt prajñopāyātmakenākṣaraṇasukhavaśājjñānabimbe samādhiḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5816: etanmṛdvādibhedaistrividhamapi bhavet sādhanaṁ viśvabharttustisro mudrāstrimātrāstrividhagativaśāt karmasaṁkalpadivyāḥ ||
T16n2959u_001:5818: ṣaḍañgayogasya viśiṣṭaḥ paricayaḥ pūrvamatra ṣaḍaṅgayogavidhiḥ saṁkṣepeṇa vivecito'dhunā ca tadviśiṣṭaḥ paricayo'tra yathākramaṁ prastūyate
