T16n2959u_001:5820: pṛthagjānāṁ cakṣurādivijñānāni svasvendriyadvāraiḥ rūpagandharasādiviṣayeṣu pravartante yathā ca madhumakṣikāḥ puṣparasamanubhavanti |
T16n2959u_001:5824: pañcendriyāṇāṁ pañcaviṣayebhyaḥ sambandhaṁ vicchidya vijñāne tatsaṁhṛtya jñānasvabhāvātmakapañcendriyāṇāṁ pañcaprabhāsvarasvabhāvaviṣaye praveśīkaraṇameva pratyāhāraḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5834: sādhanāvidhiḥ kālacakratantre pratyāhāro jinendro bhavati daśavidhaḥ evaṁ ca - pratyāhāro daśānāṁ viṣayaviṣayiṇāmapravṛttiḥ śarīre |
T16n2959u_001:5835: pratyāhāreṇa yogī viṣayavirahito'dhiṣṭhyate sarvamantraiḥ ityādivacobhiḥ pratyāhārasādhanāvidhiḥ pratyapādyata |
T16n2959u_001:5836: saṁkṣepeṇa viṣayaviṣayiṇoḥ rūpagrahaṇādisambandhaṁ vicchidya cittasya śūnyatāyāṁ pravartanameva pratyāhārasādhanā |
T16n2959u_001:5837: yathā - nāpaneyamataḥ kiñcit prakṣeptavyaṁ na kiñcana |
T16n2959u_001:5840: etadvacanānusāram apaneyaprakṣeptavyābhyāṁ rāhityaṁ sad citte yathābhūtasthitireva pratyāhārasādhanā |
T16n2959u_001:5841: yathā'thavā janaḥ svarūpamevādarśe paśyati tathaiva svacittarūpyādarśe iṣṭadevarūpaṁ dhyātvā cittasya bāhyaviṣayapravartanādavarodhāvasthitireva pratyāhārasādhanā |
T16n2959u_001:5842: uktasthitayoḥ kramaśaḥ rātreḥ dhūmādicatvāraḥ divasasya ca jvālādiṣaḍlakṣaṇāni prakaṭībhavanti |
T16n2959u_001:5843: yathā kālacakre pratipāditam- ākāśāsaktacittairanimiṣanayanair vajramārgaṁ praviṣṭaiḥ śūnyāddhūmo marīciḥ prakaṭavimalakhadyota eva pradīpaḥ
T16n2959u_001:5844: jvālācandrārkavajrāṇyapi paramakalā dṛśyate bindukaśca tanmadhye buddhabimbaṁ viṣayavirahitānekasambhogakāyam ||
T16n2959u_001:5846: atredamapi pratipāditaṁ lakṣaṇamadhye pratibimbitaḥ sambhogakāyaḥ kimapi bahirvastu nāsti kintu svīyameva cittam |
T16n2959u_001:5847: tasyāṁ sarvajñabimbaṁ payasi ravirivānāvilaṁ viśvavarṇam sarvākāraṁ svacittaṁ viṣayavirahitaṁ nāparaṁ cittameva ||
T16n2959u_001:5849: śūnyatāyā viṣayādilakṣaṇeṣu prakaṭiteṣu gurūpadeśānusāraṁ devapratibimbaṁ bhāvyate |
T16n2959u_001:5850: etena ca nāḍīcakraprāṇāyāmādīni dārdyaṁ prāpnuvanti ante ca kramaśo bodhicittamapi susthiraṁ jāyate tacca mahāsukhāptikāraṇaṁ bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:5851: kālacakre'pyuktam- śūnye dhūmādimārgaṁ gurūniyamavaśād bhāvayed viśvasīmno nāḍīcakreṣu tasmāt sthiramapi kurūte prāṇamāpānavāyum |
T16n2959u_001:5852: paścādindornirodhaṁ graha iva kurūte bodhicittasya yogī tasmādyatkiñcidiṣṭaṁ katipayadivasaiḥ prāpyate janmanīha ||
T16n2959u_001:5858: guhyasamājottaratantre cāpi- kalpanaṁ dhyānamucyeta taddhayānaṁ pañcadhā bhavet |
T16n2959u_001:5864: kālacakre'pyuktam- prajñā tarko vicāro ratiracalasukhaṁ dhyānamapyekacittam ||
T16n2959u_001:5869: śūnyasvarūpalakṣaṇajñānasya kevalaṁ cittena vicāraṇameva nāpitu tasyānubhavo'rthāt viṣayaviṣayirahitaniścayātma-kānubhavavidhānameva vitarkaḥ ( mīmāṁsā) |
T16n2959u_001:5870: dhyānānuprāṇite sati bāhyaśarīre ābhyantaracitte ca yaḥ sukhānubhavaḥ sā ca prathamā ratiḥ ( prītiḥ) |
T16n2959u_001:5874: atra kālacakrānusāreṇa 'tanmadhye buddhabimbaṁ viṣayavirahitānekasambhogakāyam ' etena ca samādherasāmānyalakṣaṇabhūtaḥ sambhogakāyaḥ prādurbhavati,
T16n2959u_001:5876: kālacakre- pañcābhijñānalābhī bhavati narapate dhyānayogena śudhāḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5880: kālacakre nāgādyān sādhayitvā pravarasuranarā yoginā sādhanīyāḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5886: pratyāhāreṇa samādhinā ca śūnyatārūpimahāmudrāyāḥ pratibhāsanantaraṁ prāṇāyāmena mṛtyurjīyate,
T16n2959u_001:5888: vajradehe kramaśaḥ tilakamadhikṛtya sahajasukhāptireva prāṇāyāmasya mukhyaṁ prayojanam |
T16n2959u_001:5889: vajradehasya dīrghāyuṣyasya ca prāptiṁ binā jīvane'smin paramapadamavāptuṁ na śakyate |
T16n2959u_001:5891: ādau saṁrakṣaṇīyā sakalajinatanurmantriṇāṁ siddhihetoḥ kāyābhāve na siddhirna ca paramasukhaṁ prāpyate janmanīha |
T16n2959u_001:5892: tasmāt kāyārthahetoḥ pratidinasamaye bhāvayennāḍiyogaṁ kāye siddhe'nyasiddhistribhuvananilaye kiṅkaratvaṁ prayāti ||
T16n2959u_001:5895: kālacakre'pi- prāṇāyāmo dvimārgaḥ skhalanamapi bhavenmadhyame prāṇaveśaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5897: rasanāyāṁ pravahamānānāṁ pṛthvyādhdhātunāṁ pañcaviṣayāṇāṁ ca vilīnatvāt te daśākārā bhavanti |
T16n2959u_001:5899: kālacakre prāṇāyāmavidhiḥ - ghrāṇe randhradvayena tvapi pihitamukhe bāhyavātaḥ samastaḥ prāṇenākṛṣya vegāt taḍidanalanibho ghaṭṭito'pānavāyuḥ
T16n2959u_001:5900: kālenābhyāsayogād vrajati samarasaṁ candrasūryāgnimadhye annādyaṁ kṣutpipāsāmapaharati tanau cāmaratvaṁ dadāti ||
T16n2959u_001:5902: prāṇāyāmasādhanāṁ pañcakrame cāpi nāgārjunaḥ samājottaratantre 'caturdevī paripṛcchā vyākhyātantre' vajramālādi tantrāṇi samuddhṛtya spaṣṭīkṛtavān
T16n2959u_001:5904: etadgranthābhiprāyo'yameva yat pañcaprabhāmayavāyūn dvādaśāṅgulād ṣoḍaśāṅgulaparyantamākṛṣya nāsikāgre sthāpayet |
T16n2959u_001:5905: nābhikṣetre śvāsasthitau satyām apanavāyuṁ balādupari samākṛṣya prāṇāyāme caikīkṛtya kumbhakaṁ vidheyam |
T16n2959u_001:5909: pūrṇataḥ praśvāsaparityāgāt kumbhakaṁ cirakālaṁ na sthātumarhati |
T16n2959u_001:5910: śvāse om kumbhake ca hū praśvāse ca āḥ ityeteṣu cittamavadheyam |
T16n2959u_001:5911: ataḥ aoṁ hūṁ āḥ iti prāṇāyāmasyāṅgam |
T16n2959u_001:5912: kvacit kumbhake āḥ praśvāse hūṁ śvāse ca om athavā mahāmāyātantre praśvāse om kumbhake hū śvāse ca āḥ ityeteṣu cittamavadheyaṁ bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:5914: śvāsapraśvāsāvadhau nāsikāyāṁ laghuvastrasthāpanena hastasthāpanena vā svālambane smṛtistiṣṭhati |
T16n2959u_001:5917: prāṇāyāma-sādhanāvidhiḥ kālacakre itthaṁ suspaṣṭīkṛto'sti - dṛṣṭe bimbe prakuryāt pratidinasamaye prāṇavāyornirodhaṁ yāvadvai bhrāmyamāṇaṁ svatanuparivṛtaṁ dṛśyate raśmicakram |
T16n2959u_001:5918: ṣaṇmāsaiḥ sparśahīnaṁ vrajati samasukhaṁ mārgacittaṁ yatīnāṁ rāgārāgāntamādyaṁ kṣaṇamapi ca vibhorvadhate śvāsasaṁkhyam ||
T16n2959u_001:5920: pratyāhāreṇa samādhinā ca devarūpapratibimbanānantaraṁ prāṇāyāmābhyāsastāvad vidheyo yāvacca svaśarīrāntaḥ prabhāmayaṁ vāyucakraṁ paribhramat sandṛṣṭaṁ na syāt |
T16n2959u_001:5921: etadabhyāsena prāṇāyāmamelanena cāgnerūtpattiḥ sampūrṇe śarīre sūkṣmanāḍīnāṁ tatra ca saṁcaritasya vāyoḥ śukraśoṇitādīnāṁ ca suspaṣṭaṁ darśanaṁ jāyate |
T16n2959u_001:5922: evamābhāsodbhavānantaraṁ ṣaṇmāsaparyantaṁ prāṇāyāmānuṣṭhānena śukraśoṇitādīni suspaṣṭāni dṛśyante ,
T16n2959u_001:5924: tadanu ca indriyadvayāliṅganaṁ vinaiva yogī akṣaramahāsukhamārgeṇa śūnyatārūpeṇa praveṣṭumarhati |
T16n2959u_001:5925: kālacakratantre-nigaditam- yā śaktirnābhimadhyād vrajati parapadaṁ dvādaśāntaṁ kalāntaṁ sā nābhau saṁnirūddhā taḍidanalanibhā daṇḍarūpotthitā ca |
T16n2959u_001:5926: cakāccakrāntaraṁ vai mṛdulālitagatiścālitā madhyānāḍyāṁ yāvaccoṣṇīṣarandhre spṛśati haṭhatayā sūcivad bāhyacarma ||
T16n2959u_001:5929: uṣṇīṣaṁ bhedayitvā vrajati varapuraṁ vāyuyugme nirūddhe ||
T16n2959u_001:5934: śaktirarthāt prāṇavāyuḥ pṛthvidhātutaḥ dvādaśāṅgulātmake vistāre jalaṁ ( dhātutaḥ )
T16n2959u_001:5935: trayodaśāṅgulavistāre agnidhātuḥ caturdaśāṅgulātmake vistāre vāyudhātutaḥ pañcadaśāṅgulātmakavistāre ākāśadhātuśca ṣoḍaśoṅgulamātraṁ vistāre huṅkārasvarūpaṁ svanāsikāmādhyamena lalanārasanayoḥ sakāśāt vahatoḥ prāṇāpānayormadhyamāyāṁ praviṣṭayoḥ vidyudiva nirmalā bhavanti,
T16n2959u_001:5936: nābhicakrāt kramaśo haṭhayogena ūrdhvagatiṁ kurvāṇāḥ sarvanāḍīgranthīn saṁbhedya uṣṇīṣaparyantaṁ prāpnuvanti |
T16n2959u_001:5939: brahyarandhraṁ yāvat prāptyantaraṁ sādhakaḥ punaḥ mahāsukhaṁ saṁsrāvya adhogatiṁ vidadhānaḥ maṇicakrakendraṁ praviśati |
T16n2959u_001:5940: kālacakratantre suvyaktam - vātaiḥ saṁghaṭṭamānaistaḍidanalaśikhā drāvayenmūrdhni candraṁ yo yo bindurdruto'smād galahṛdayagato nābhiguhye nirūddhaḥ
T16n2959u_001:5941: bindoḥ spandadravaṁ yat kuliśamaṇigataṁ saṁnirūddhaṁ dhvajāgre prajñājñānakṣaṇaṁ tad yadi dadati sukhaṁ bindumālācyutena ||
T16n2959u_001:5943: ūrdhvādhogatayorayaṁ vidhiranyagrantheṣu ānandacatuṣṭayasya kṣaṇacatuṣṭayasya ca saṁjñayopakṛto'sti |
T16n2959u_001:5944: brahyarandhrāt prāṇavāyuṁ bahirniṣkāsya sādhako mṛtyumapi prāptumarhati |
T16n2959u_001:5947: kālacakre- praṇāyāmaḥ samantāt samasukhafalado mastake yāvadiṣṭastasmādūrdhvaṁ hyaniṣṭo maraṇabhayakaraḥ skandhanirnāśahetuḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5948: uṣṇīṣaṁ bhedayitvā paramasukhapade yo vrajan vai niyojyaḥ skandhābhāve'pi yogī viśati samasukhaṁ kintu loke prasiddhaḥ ||
T16n2959u_001:5951: viṣaye'sminnapi tatraiva- madhye prāṇapraveśaḥ saraviśaśigaterbandhanaṁ savyavāme cittaṁ mudrāprasaṅge paramasukhagataṁ vajrasambodhanaṁ ca
T16n2959u_001:5952: padye vajradhvanirvā svakarasalilajollālanaṁ saukhyahetor bījātyāgaḥ sasaukhyau maraṇabhayaharaḥ śrīgurorvaktrametat ||
T16n2959u_001:5954: prāṇāyāme siddhe sati bodhisattvaiḥ sādhakaḥ pūjayiṣyate |
T16n2959u_001:5958: kālacakre viṣaye'sminnapi- tasmānniḥ spandasaukhyaṁ kṣaṇamiha sahajaṁ dharmadhāturdadāti |
T16n2959u_001:5959: prāṇenākṛṣya sarvān rasagatiṣu gatān kleśamārān nihatya |
T16n2959u_001:5961: mṛtyuṁ mārgapraviṣṭo vrajati yadi tadā tadgrahādanyajātyā ||
T16n2959u_001:5965: samānyataḥ pañcasu cāthavā ṣaḍnāḍī-cakreṣu vāmadakṣiṇayoḥ uparyadhaśca pravahadvāyoḥ madhyānāḍyāṁ sthite tilake'vasthitirhi dhāraṇākhyaṁ yogāṅgamasti
T16n2959u_001:5967: sekoddeśaṭīkāyamapi - svamantraṁ hṛdaye dhyātvā prāṇabindugate nyaset |
T16n2959u_001:5970: prāṇāpānayornābhicakre saṁmiśraṇaṁ yāvat hṛdayadyanyacakreṣu kumbhakabhāvanā na sambhāvayte |
T16n2959u_001:5971: ataḥ prāṇāyāmadvārā nābhikṣetre prāṇāpānamelanena guhyalakṣaṇānāmāvirbhāvānantarameva dhāraṇā sādhanīyā |
T16n2959u_001:5972: prāṇāyāmena kramaśaḥ nābhicakrahṛdayacakrakaṇṭhacakreṣu vāyuṁ gamanāgamanavirahitaṁ kṛtvā lalāṭasthatilake tad vilayakaraṇameva dhāraṇā |
T16n2959u_001:5973: kālacakratantre'pyuktam- kṛtvā paryaṅkabandhaṁ vikasitavadano'nyonyadantaṁ spṛśenna ākṛṣṭo bāhyavātastadamṛtaśaito nābhimadhye praviṣṭaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5974: saṁtāpaṁ kṣutpipāsāṁ harati varatanau saṁnirūddho viṣaṁ ca śveto bindurlalāṭe svaparikarito muñcamāno'mṛtaṁ ca ||
T16n2959u_001:5976: guhyasamājottaratantre cāpyuktam- svamantraṁ hṛdaye dhyātvā prāṇabindugataṁ nyaset |
T16n2959u_001:5979: anusmṛtiḥ pratyāhārāṅgadvārā bhāvitaṁ śūnyarūpaṁ dhyānāṅgena paripoṣyate |
T16n2959u_001:5980: prāṇāyāmena nāḍī-vāyutilakāni niyantrya dhāraṇayā tilakaṁ madhyamāyāṁ sthirīkriyate |
T16n2959u_001:5981: pratyāhāradhyānābhyāṁ dṛdīkṛtaṁ śūnyarūpamākāśavad tadanusmṛtikaraṇameva anusmṛtyākhyaṁ yogāṅgamāste |
T16n2959u_001:5982: guhyasamājottaratantre- vibhāvya yadanusmṛtyā tadākāraṁ tu saṁsmaret |
T16n2959u_001:5985: sekoddeśaṭīkāyāmapi matamidaṁ suspaṣṭīkṛtam- pratyāhāradhyānābhyāṁ sthirī-kṛta-tridhātupratibhāsātmakasaṁvṛtisatyasya saṁsfaraṇamarthāt tasya nikhilākāśe vyāpti-vidhānamevānusmṛtiḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5986: bustonaḥ anusmṛtilakṣaṇaṁ suspaṣṭayan akathayat- dhāraṇāṅgasya sādhanābalena nābhikṣetre caṇḍālīṁ prajvālya caṇḍālīsvabhāve pratibimbasadṛśa-nirvikalpatridhātukātmakasveṣṭadevasya ābhāsasthitirevānusmṛtiḥ |
T16n2959u_001:5987: kālcakratantre cāpi- caṇḍālyālokanaṁ yad bhavati khalu tanau cāmbare'nusmṛtiḥ syāt |
T16n2959u_001:5989: sumeroḥ kaṇasadṛśānanta-mahāmudrābhiḥ sākaṁ samāhitatvavidhāyakaḥ uttamaḥ jñānātmakamahāmudrayā saha madhyamaḥ karmamahāmudrayā saha samāhitaḥ sādhakaśca mṛdurasti |
T16n2959u_001:5993: sādhanāsthalaṁ kālacakre itthaṁ suspaṣṭīkṛtam - etā mudrāścatasro'kṣarasukhafaladā yoginā bhāvanīyāḥ |
T16n2959u_001:6000: prāṇāyāmena ca vāyuṁ niyantrya vāgvajrasādhanā kriyate dhāraṇayā ca tatra dārdyaṁ sampādyate tathaivānusmṛtyā cittavajraḥ sādhyate samādhinā ca tad dārdyaṁ prāpya paramapadamavāpyate |
T16n2959u_001:6001: kālacakre pitṛtantramātṛtantrābhyāṁ bhinnaṁ uṣṇīṣakaṇṭhahṛdayeṣu nāḍīcakre ca pṛthak pṛthak caturbindūnāmastitvamurarīkṛtam |
T16n2959u_001:6002: ete bindavaḥ jāgradādicaturavasthāsu vāyunā spanditāḥ santaḥ nānābhramān janayanti |
T16n2959u_001:6006: svapnāvasthāyāmapi ūrdhvavāyavaḥ kaṇṭhacakre adhobhāgīyāśca guhyendriye saṁgṛhītāḥ śabdamātraṁ vāgbhrāntiṁ cotpādayanti |
T16n2959u_001:6007: suṣuptau ūrdhvabhāgīyāḥ sarvavāyavaḥ hṛdayacakre adhobhāgīyāśca maṇicakre ekatrībhūya nirvikalpā asfuṭāḥ santo bhrāntimutpādayanti |
T16n2959u_001:6008: purūṣastriyoḥ samāpatyavasthāyām ūrdhvabhāgīyāḥ sarvavāyavo nābhicakre adhovāyavaśca guhyendriyāgrabhāge saṁgṛhītāḥ sukhānubhūtiṁ srāvaṁ cotpādayanti
T16n2959u_001:6009: etatpariśuddhyaivābhāsamātraṁ śabdamātraṁ nirvikalpamātraṁ sukhānubhūtīnāṁ vistāreṇa kramaśaḥ kāyavākcittāni jñānavajraśca prāpyante |
T16n2959u_001:6010: anusmṛsādhanā karmamudrā-jñānamudrā-muhāmudrābhiḥ saha samāhitatvaṁ vidhāya caṇḍālīyogenānuṣṭhīyate |
T16n2959u_001:6011: kālacakre- vātaiḥ saṁghaṭṭamānaistaḍidanalaśikhā drāvayenmūrdhni cakraṁ yo yo bindurdruto'smād galahṛdayagato nābhiguhye nirūddhaḥ |
T16n2959u_001:6012: bindoḥ spandadravaṁ yat kuliśamaṇigataṁ saṁnirūddhaṁ dhvajāgre prajñājñānakṣaṇaṁ tadyadi dadati sukhaṁ bindumālācyutena ||
T16n2959u_001:6015: trividhaḥ sādhakaḥ svasāmarthyānusāreṇa mudrayā sārdhaṁ samāhito bhavati,
T16n2959u_001:6016: pratyāhāradhyānābhyāṁ bhāviteṣṭadevā-nusmṛtiṁ kurvāṇaḥ tanmahāsukhādabhinnatāṁ sthāpayitvā dhyānaṁ kurūte |
T16n2959u_001:6017: cakracatuṣṭaye yadā kramaśaḥ tilakam avatiṣṭhate tadā ānandaparamānandaviramānandasahajānandākṣarasukha-prāptirbhavati |
T16n2959u_001:6019: uttamaḥ sādhakaḥ svaprajñaptidhātukātmakamahāmudrayā sākaṁ samāhitaḥ san anusmṛtiṁ bhāvayati |
T16n2959u_001:6020: kālacakre'pyuktam - na dhyānaṁ mantrajāpaḥ karaṇamapi mahāmaṇḍalānyāsanāni |
T16n2959u_001:6021: homo mantrapratiṣṭhā rajasi jinakulāvāhanaṁ preṣaṇaṁ ca |
T16n2959u_001:6023: tasmāt tad bhāvanīyaṁ pratidinasamaye yoginā mokṣahetoḥ ||
T16n2959u_001:6025: mūrcchāṁ nidrāṁ praviṣṭaṁ bhavati narapate niḥsvabhāvaṁ svacittaṁ |
T16n2959u_001:6026: jāgrāyāṁ sasvabhāvaṁ prakaṭayati na tat prāṇināṁ mokṣamārgam |
T16n2959u_001:6027: bhāvābhāvairvibhinnaṁ na hi samasukhadaṁ yogināṁ cittavajram |
T16n2959u_001:6028: svaprajñāliṅgitaṁ yat sahajasukhagataṁ mokṣadaṁ tat svacittam ||
T16n2959u_001:6030: sarvavidhakṛtrimopāyān parityajya sahajasukhasvarūpacittātmakeṣṭadevaṁ tridhātu-kāyātmakasvaprajñayā āliṅgya caturānandānubhavaṁ yaḥ kurūte,
T16n2959u_001:6032: madhyendriyaḥ sādhakaḥ kālacakrayuganaddhadevarūpeṇa bhāvanāṅkurūte tathā ca jñānamayamātāpitrorlalāṭe candramasi śvetavarṇe,
T16n2959u_001:6033: om kaṇṭhe sūryopari raktavarṇe 'āḥ' citte ca rāhorūpari kṛṣṇavarṇe haṁ nābhau agnau pītavarṇe ho guhyendriye jñānopari nīlavarṇe 'svā' śīrṣe cākāśopari śyāmavarṇe 'hā' ityakṣarāṇi nyasti |
T16n2959u_001:6035: adhamendriyaḥ sādhakaḥ caṇḍālīyogena ānandacatuṣṭayaṁ sākṣātkṛtya mahāsukhaṁ cānubhūya taddārdyamavāptumasamartho'sti,
T16n2959u_001:6037: kālacakre samuktam- sevyā''dau karmamudrā jinasahajasukhasyāsya vṛddhyarthahetoḥ |
T16n2959u_001:6038: madhye prāṇapraveśaḥ saraviśaśigaterbandhanaṁ savyavāme cittaṁ mudrāprasaṅge paramasukhagataṁ vajrasambodhanaṁ ca |
T16n2959u_001:6039: padye vajradhvanirvā svakarasalilajollālanaṁ saukhyahetor bījātyāgaḥ sasaukhyo maraṇabhayaharaḥ śrīgurorvaktrametat ||
T16n2959u_001:6041: ato'yaṁ sādhakaḥ karmamudrāṁ saṁsevya vāyuṁ ca madhyamāmārge baddhvā punarmudrāyogena ānandānubhūtiṁ prāpnoti |
T16n2959u_001:6043: lalāṭācca kaṇṭhaṁ hṛdayaṁ ca yāvatprāptiḥ paramānandaḥ tataśca guhyendriyaṁ yāvat prāptirviramānandaḥ tadagre ca vajramaṇiparyantaprāptiḥ sahajānando'sti
T16n2959u_001:6048: vipākakāyaṁ ca dharmadhātau pariśodhya viṣayaviṣayyadvayajñānakāyasya prāptikaraṇam |
T16n2959u_001:6049: prajñāmahāsukhasya sarvākāravaropetajñānasya ca dvaitābhāsarahitayuganaddhānubhūtireva samādheḥ svarūpam |
T16n2959u_001:6055: ato'nusmṛteḥ sādhakānāṁ bhedatrayamiva samādherapi bhedatrayaṁ bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:6056: sādhakaḥ karmamudrā-jñānamudrā-mahāmudrābhiḥ sārdhaṁ samāpattau sthitvā anusmṛtiyogena sākṣātkṛtākṣara-sukhasya vistāraṁ labhate |
T16n2959u_001:6057: yathā yathākṣarasukhadṛdatāprāptistadvistāraśca prāpyate tathā tathā sūkṣmavikalpānāṁ kṣayo jāyate,
T16n2959u_001:6059: asmādeva cāśuddhatilakaṁ kṣīyate vipākakāyasya ca pariśuddhyā idamevaṁ śarīraṁ iṣṭadevakālacakre jñānamaye parivartate |
T16n2959u_001:6062: atrāpi karmamudrāṁ saṁsevya jñānamudrāṁ ca saṁsevya mahāmudrāyāṁ samāhitya sādhanā kriyate |
T16n2959u_001:6063: anusmṛtyā yanmahāsukhaṁ sādhakaḥ prāpnoti tatra samādhiyogena dṛdatā prāpyate |
T16n2959u_001:6064: karmamudrāsevanena samādhisādhanāviṣaye uttarakālacakre pratipāditam- varṣārdhe śvetakuṣṭhaṁ harati varatanau mantriṇāṁ kiṁ tadanyat prajñāsaṅge svacittaṁ skhalitamapi sadā prāṇavāyornirodhāt |
T16n2959u_001:6065: saptayabdāṁ jarāṁ vai harati sapalitāṁ cārdhavarṣaprapūrṇe ( ca dvivarṣaprapūrṇe )
T16n2959u_001:6068: jñānamudrāsevanasya sādhanā sādhanāpaṭale itthaṁ varṇitā- mudrā māyānurūpā manasi ca gagane rūpavad darpaṇe ca trailokyaṁ bhāsayantī taḍidanilanibhānekaraśmīn sfurantī |
T16n2959u_001:6069: bāhye deheṣvabhinnā viṣayavirahitā māsamātrāmbarasthā cittaṁ cetomayālliṅgayati ca jagato'nekarūpasya saikā ||
T16n2959u_001:6071: mahāmudrayā sākaṁ sādhanāvidhirapi tatraivopadiṣṭa- tyaktvemāṁ karmamudrāsakaluṣahṛdayāṁ kalpitāṁ jñānamudrāṁ samyaksambodhihetorjinavarajananīṁ bhāvayed divyamudrām |
T16n2959u_001:6072: nirlepāṁ nirvikārāṁ khasamahatatamāṁ vyāpinīṁ yogagamyāṁ kūṭasthāṁ jñātejāṁ bhavakaluṣaharāṁ kālacakrānuviddhām ||
T16n2959u_001:6075: etad vaiśiṣṭyaṁ yadatrānusmṛtyaṅgena parijñāte yuganaddhatatve dṛdatā prāptavyā |
T16n2959u_001:6077: itthaṁ ṣaḍaṅgayogasyāṅgatrayaṁ kāyavākcittāni vajradehaṁ ca prāpayati |
T16n2959u_001:6079: śarīre'smin advayatantrasādhakaḥ yuganaddhakālacakre pariṇataḥ san paramapade avatiṣṭhate |
T16n2959u_001:6081: uparyukta-pramāṇairidaṁ spaṣṭaṁ yat bustonena svayogavidhisamarthane kālacakratantra-samājottaratantra-sekoddeśaṭīkāśca sarvatroddhṛtāḥ santi
T16n2959u_001:6082: itthamatra pradhānataḥ bustona dvārā pratipāditaṁ ṣaḍaṅgayogavidhimādhārīkṛtya varṇitam |
T16n2959u_001:6083: etadvistarastu kālacakraṭīkāvimalaprabhāyāḥ sādhanāpaṭale jñānapaṭale ca vyadhīyata |
T16n2959u_001:6085: śamakaparamparā etatparamparāyāḥ sādhanāpaddhateḥ sūtrapātaḥ ḥ āryadevenākāri,
T16n2959u_001:6086: parañcāsyāḥ pracārasya śreyaḥ sarvaprathamaṁ dakṣiṇabhāratasya vidarbhacarasiṁhākhyaprāntotpannasya narasiṁhasyaiva ( jedima pāgyagaravā ) jāyate
T16n2959u_001:6090: tibbatadeśe nyavasat tatra cāsya dharmapracārakendraṁ dīṅrīprānta eva |
T16n2959u_001:6091: mṛtyukāle'pi ayaṁ dīṅarīvāsinaḥ sambodhayan śataṁ ślokān samupādiśat |
T16n2959u_001:6097: tibbatasya labchīnāmakasthāne etadutpannatvāt svakṣetra-nāmnā etannāma labchīpradīpaḥ ( macīga labaḍona )
T16n2959u_001:6099: macīgalabaḍonaḥ trayoviṁśativarṣāvasthāyāṁ bhāratasya kosalapradeśāt tibbatadeśaṁ prāpa,
T16n2959u_001:6100: ācāryagurūbhadreṇa sākaṁ vivāhito'bhūt yaśca buddhakapālasādhaka āsīt |
T16n2959u_001:6101: asya vistṛtaḥ jīvana-paricayaḥ aṣṭasaptaticchedakavivṛttināmake granthe samupalabhyate |
T16n2959u_001:6104: asamasamamantraḥ sarvaduḥkhapraśamanamantraḥ“ ityasmin praśamanaśabdasyaiva śamakaparamparā susthāpitā'bhavat |
T16n2959u_001:6105: āryadevaḥ prajñāpāramitāhṛdayasūtramādhārīkṛtya pañcāśatślokeṣu āryaprajñāpāramitopadeśanāmakārikāṁ viracayya śamakaparamparāṁ pracārayāmāsa
T16n2959u_001:6106: atra ca bhāvanāvidhiviṣaye suspaṣṭīkṛtaṁ- cakṣurādīndriyāṇi balād nāvaroddhavyāni |
T16n2959u_001:6109: prajñāpāramitāprāptirbahirna bhavati sā tu bhāvābhāvarahitā nirlakṣaṇā prakṛtiprabhāsvarā svacittarūpaiva |
T16n2959u_001:6110: śūnyakāśo yāvadvyāptaḥ tāvadeva svacittaṁ vyāpya sthāpanīyam |
T16n2959u_001:6111: svacittasya yathārthyabodhe sati tattaraṅgarūpirāgadveṣādicaitasikaguṇānāṁ prahāṇasyāvaśyakatā na bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:6113: yathā prāṇeṣu nāśiteṣu satsu anyendriyāṇāṁ nāśasyāvaśyakatā na jāyate |
T16n2959u_001:6117: duḥkhatrayasyābhighātāya śamanāya ca nirāvaraṇagaganasadṛśe svacitte stheyam |
T16n2959u_001:6118: svarūpataḥ sakalajagataḥ ādito'nutpannaprabhāsvarasvarūpatve satyapi ajñānarūpivāyunā bhramitvā sattvo duḥkhabhāg bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:6119: ataḥ ajñānarūpivāyupravāhaṁ prabhāsvare vinilīyādvayatattve samavasthitireva śamakabhāvanāyāstattvam |
T16n2959u_001:6120: yoginīmacīgalabaḍonaḥ acakathat yaccharīraṁ śavasamaṁ mattvā cittasya nirāvṛttagaganasadṛśasthāpanenaiva tattvaṁ sākṣātkriyate |
T16n2959u_001:6122: yathā bodhisattvamāninaḥ bodhicittaprābalyaṁ dyotayanti tathā ca tadvicāra-dṛṣṭi-vyavahārādayo bodhicittāt preritā bhavanti,
T16n2959u_001:6128: yato hyahaṅkārabhāvanodayena sahasā madgṛhamatparivāraprabhṛtyagrahāṇāṁ vistāro bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:6129: tadarthaṁ vibhinnakarmāṇi kurūte bhavacakre ca badhyate |
T16n2959u_001:6130: etatpratipakṣe yatra pāramitānaye yuktiprayogeṇa niṣprapañcasya pratipādanaṁ kriyate tatraiva mantranaye sthāvarajaṅgamayoḥ rūpaṁ parivartya utpattiniṣpannakramau bhāvyete |
T16n2959u_001:6132: sahaiva ca svaśariratvacaṁ svarṇadīpaṁ hastāpādyādyaṅgāni jambvādicaturdvīpān rūdhiram aṣṭaguṇairyuktaṁ jalaṁ māsaṁ cāṣṭamāṅgalikaṁ cihnaṁ pṛṣṭhāsthi sumerūparvataṁ cakṣuṣī ca sūryacandropame mattvā bhāvanayā etān sarvāniṣṭadevāya samarpayanti sādhakāḥ |
T16n2959u_001:6133: ananta-bhavacakrasyaitat śṛṅkhalāyām evaṁ ko'pi prāṇī nāvaśiṣyate yaḥ kiñcidayonau svayaṁ mātvaṁ pitvaṁ ca nālabhata |
T16n2959u_001:6134: sarveṣāṁ ṛṇamasmadupari bhavati tat ṛṇarāhitatyāya chedaka-paramparāsādhakaḥ cetanaśarīrāt sthūlaśarīrametat pṛthak kṛtvā prāṇināmicchānurūpaṁ māṁsarūdhirādīnāsravānāsravadravyeṇa bhāvayitvā prāṇibhyaḥ samarpayati |
T16n2959u_001:6135: chedakaparamparāyāḥ sādhakaḥ śmaśānajalasroto anyatra vā gatvā sādhanāṅkurūte |
T16n2959u_001:6136: śarīraṁ pratyabhiniveśasya prahāṇāya śmaśānaṁ gatvā svaśarīraṁ māṁsarūdhirayoḥ piṇḍarūpeṇa dhyātvā bhūtapretapiśācādibhyaḥ samarpayati |
T16n2959u_001:6137: siddhamilārasapāmahodayaḥ chedakaparamparāṁ suspaṣṭayan kathayati-śmaśānaikāntajalasrota ādiṣu kṛtā sādhanā bāhyachedikā śarirāṅgapratyaṅgānāṁ prāṇibhyo bhojanarūpeṇa samarpaṇam,
T16n2959u_001:6140: sārūpeṇedaṁ vaktuṁ śakyaṁ śatrurbahirna bhavati tattu svacittasyaiva śatrutvam |
T16n2959u_001:6142: tatsarvasya nāśaḥ sarvasya pūrṇataḥ tāṭasthyena nirdvandvātmakanirvikalpātmakatayā darśanameva sarvasādhanānāṁ lakṣyam |
T16n2959u_001:6145: arthāt bauddhadharmasya sarvayānānāṁ vikāsaḥ cet kutrāpi jātastarhi sa tibbatadeśe eva |
T16n2959u_001:6146: tibbate sarvaprathamaṁ bauddhadharmapraveśaḥ samrāṭ sroṅcanagonpomahodayasya ( 615 ī 0 )
T16n2959u_001:6149: tadā ratnabhadramarapādharmamatyādayo naike vidyārthinaḥ bhāratavarṣamāgatya adhyayanādhyāpanaṁ ca kṛtvā tatra punaḥ bauddhadharmaṁ prācārayan
T16n2959u_001:6150: itthaṁ tibbatadeśe bauddhadharmasya dve parampare pracalite'bhūtām |
T16n2959u_001:6156: itthamaneke tantragranthāḥ yeṣāṁ kevalaṁ ñiṅmāsampradāye pracalanamabhavat ye ca ñiṅmāgyudabumanāmake saṁgrahe ṣaṭcatvāriṁśadgranthiṣu ( 46
T16n2959u_001:6161: sampradāye'smin naike suvikhyātā anuvādakā siddhapurūṣāśca abhūvan |
T16n2959u_001:6162: viśeṣeṇa aoḍiyānetyasyācāryaḥ padyasambhavaḥ mahāmahopādhyāyaḥ śāntarakṣitaśca tibbatadeśīya-ṭhīsroṅcanadehucana ( 815 ī 0 )
T16n2959u_001:6164: etaddvayasya mārgadarśane samrāṭ samayasanāmakaṁ vihāraṁ nirmitavān atraiva ca ( kaṁgyura-taṁgyura)
T16n2959u_001:6167: ācāryapadyasambhavaḥ pañcaviṁśatisaṁkhyakān jevaṅa ñeraṅamahodayādīn vajrayāne abhyaṣiṁcat ye cāgre siddhimāpnuvan |
T16n2959u_001:6168: tasyāmeva paramparāyāṁ naike sādhakā ācāryā guptasthānād dharmaśāstragrahītāraḥ aṣṭottaraśataṁ siddhā ājagmuḥ |
T16n2959u_001:6172: tibbatadeśe sarvādhikāḥ siddhapurūṣāḥ etasminneva sampradāye samabhavan |
T16n2959u_001:6182: atra saṁkṣepeṇa etāni yānāni vimṛśyante yena ca tibbatasya etatprācīnaparamparāsādhanā prakāśitā bhavet |
T16n2959u_001:6185: atra pratipāditāni yānāni kramaśaḥ asmān ūrdhvaṁ nayanti |
T16n2959u_001:6187: 1. śrāvakayānam dharmātmakau grāhyagrāhakau paramārthe nirūpya svayaṁ mokṣaprāptyāśayena aṣṭavidha-prātimokṣe ekaprakārakaṁ kimapi śīlaṁ saṁgṛhya duṣcaryāmapahāya samādhinā cittaṁ karmayogyaṁ vidhāya caturāryasatyasya ṣoḍaśākāreṇa prajñābhāvanayā tatsākṣātkurūte yastasya falarūpeṇa srotāpatteḥ arhatpadaprāptimārgaḥ śrāvakayānaṁ nigadyate |
T16n2959u_001:6188: 2. pratyekabuddhayānam atra kṣaṇamātraṁ vijñānaṁ paramārthe dṛṣṭvā ṣoḍaśākāreṣu caturāryasatyabhāvanā śrāvayānena samaṁ vidhīyate |
T16n2959u_001:6189: parañcātra tadbhāvanayā sārdhaṁ gambhīrapratītyasamutpādasya samanvayātmikā bhāvanā svapṛthageva vaiśiṣṭyamādhatte |
T16n2959u_001:6190: itthaṁ pratyekabuddhayāne falarūpeṇa pratyekabuddhaḥ arhatpadaṁ samavāpya kāyasaṁketaiḥ dharmaṁ diśati |
T16n2959u_001:6191: 3. bodhisattvayānam etadyānasya sādhako nikhiladharmeṣu nairātmyaṁ nirūpya paropakārabhāvanāyāṁ daśapāramitāścatuḥsaṁgrahavastūni ca samācaryya nirvikalpasamādhinā śaikṣamārge saptatriṁśad (37)
T16n2959u_001:6193: 4. kriyātantrayānam etatsādhakaḥ kalaśamukuṭābhiṣekātparam ātmathatāṁ paramārthataḥ catuṣkoṭirahitāṁ viśuddhāṁ jñātvā devatathātādiṣaṭtattvaiḥ svayaṁ samayotpattidevasya sammukhaṁ jñānadevaṁ samāmantrya tat svāminaḥ svayaṁ ca dāsasya rūpeṇa samālokayati |
T16n2959u_001:6196: ayaṁ prādhānyena bāhyasnānena śucicaryayā ca trikulavajradharabhūmiṁ prāpnoti |
T16n2959u_001:6197: 5. upāyayānamarthāt caryātantrayānam etatsādhakaḥ kalaśamukuṭābhiṣekābhyāṁ saha aṣṭamaṅgalacihnaṁ nāmābhiṣekamapi gṛhṇāti |
T16n2959u_001:6200: anusāreṇa ācāryya svayaṁ samayotpattidevasya sammukhaṁ jñānasattvadeve bandhuṁ mitrasamaṁ mattvā japasamādhī ca paripoṣya caturthakulavajradharabhūmivāpnoti
T16n2959u_001:6201: 6. yogatantrayānam atra sādhakaḥ vajraśiṣyābhiṣekeṇa sahācāryābhiṣekamapi gṛhṇāti paramārthataśca animittadharmatādhiṣṭhānaṁ saṁvṛtivajradhātudevatvena dṛṣṭvā pañcābhisambodhibhiḥ pratihāryya-catuṣṭayena ca svayaṁ devabhāvanāṁ vidhāya jñānasattvadevāvāhanena sākaṁ tacca svayamātmani vilīya caturmudrāyāṁ baddhvā pūjārcanāntaraṁ visarjanaṁ sampādya āntarikasamādhi-caryāyāḥ śucyādibāhyacaryāyāḥ sevanena falarūpākaniṣṭhabhūmau paramapadaṁ samavāpnoti
T16n2959u_001:6202: 7. mahāyogatantrayānam etadayānasya sādhakaścaturvidhābhiṣekebhyaḥ saṁgṛhītānuśaṁsā-sāmarthyaṁ gambhīrābhiṣekeṇopacitya mauladarśane ( vāstavikasādhanāyāṁ
T16n2959u_001:6203: nikhiladharmān cittaprabhāsvara-śūnyatābhinnamahādharmakāye buddhvā mārge utpattikrama-niṣpannakramayorguhyābhiṣekaṁ samavāpya vāyutilakasya yuganaddhakramasya cābhyāsaṁ kurvāṇaḥ ekasminneva janmani anuttarabodhiṁ labhate |
T16n2959u_001:6205: darśane samastabhavān nirvāṇadharmāṁśca ādikālatī buddhasvabhāve nirūpya cittavargopadeśanihitacaryāśca vidadhāti |
T16n2959u_001:6206: sarvasādhyaniṣedhebhyaḥ prahāṇagrahaṇebhyaśca uccatamaḥ san sa mārgācaraṇaṁ kurvan samantabhadrabuddhapadamadhigacchati |
T16n2959u_001:6207: etāni nava yānāni yadi mārgāvasthāntargatāni nirdhāryyante tadā tu yānatraya eva samāviśanti |
T16n2959u_001:6213: upasaṁhāraḥ vastuvādivicārakānatiricyānyasarvadharmadarśanānāṁ vicārakāśced dārśanikānāṁ zhaṁzhāvāteṣu na nipatanti tarhi tattvaviṣaye sarve sthitimekāṁ prāpnuvanti |
T16n2959u_001:6214: yathā bauddha-vijñānavādinaḥ viśvaṁ svacittasya vistāraṁ mattvā cittasvarūpammanyante kimidameva cittaṁ sṛṣṭikartu nābhavat ?
T16n2959u_001:6215: mādhyamikāḥ vastutaḥ sarvatattvānāmekātāmaṅgīkurvanti kinta-deva cittaṁ sṛṣṭerādhārabhūtaṁ na sambhāvyate ?
T16n2959u_001:6217: caturviṁśātipīṭhasthānānāṁ daśabhūmīnāṁ ca vyavasthā'pi etasminneva kāye bhavati yacca svayameva sṛṣṭikāraṇaṁ jāyate |
T16n2959u_001:6219: sarve'pi etat prabhāsvaracittaṁ yacca catuṣkoṭivinirmuktaṁ niṣprapañcatattvaṁ vartate,
T16n2959u_001:6220: tasya bhinnanāmabhiḥ etasyaiva tattvasya vyākhyāṁ svapaddhatyā kurvanti |
T16n2959u_001:6221: cittaśamanāvasthāyām atra ko'pi bhedo na vidhātuṁ śakyate |
T16n2959u_001:6222: tenaiva sarvadharmeṣu siddhamahāpurūṣāḥ samupalabhyante iti dṛśyate'smābhiḥ |
T16n2959u_001:6223: abhisamayālaṅkāre maitreyanāthaḥ prāvocat - nāpaneyamataḥ kiñcit prakṣeptavyaṁ na kiñcana |
T16n2959u_001:6226: pratyekaṁ janaḥ svasvayogyatayā pariśrameṇa copalabdhavibhinnatattvāni nirvahan vyavahāre dhyānakṣetre ca ślokasyāsyārthānusaraṇaṁ vidadhyāttarhi sukhī bhavitumarhati |
T16n2959u_001:6227: janaḥ sukhī bhavettarhi rāṣṭraṁ viśvaṁ cāpi sukhi bhavitumarhati |
T16n2959u_001:6229: vartamāne śobhane sati bhaviṣyamapi samīcīnaṁ bhavati |
T16n2959u_001:6230: nātra saṁśitileśaḥ cejjīvanamidaṁ sukhamayaṁ etatkramaśca sukhamayo varteta tahryagre kā'vaśyakatā nirvāṇasya |
T16n2959u_001:6231: āvaśyakaṁ cedameva yadasīmitam akhaṇḍam agocaraṁ ca tattvaṁ,
T16n2959u_001:6232: tat svabuddhiviṣayaṁ na kuryāt nāpi ca tatra bāhyavyavasthāmādhārīkṛtya bhedaṁ kuryāt |
T16n2959u_001:6233: akhaṇḍatayā samabhāvena tāṭasthyena nirvikalpabhāvena ca pravartanādeva vajrayānasya vāstavikaṁ darśanaṁ tattvaṁ ca jñātuṁ śakyate, nānyathā
T16n2959u_001:6234: vajrayānīyaparamparā viṣaye'smin cirakālaṁ prāyatanta pratyakṣānubhūtiṁ cākārṣuḥ |
T16n2959u_001:6235: naitāvadevāpi tu jīvane'sminneva sthitimimāmanubhūya nijacaramotkarṣasādhanāvidhiṁ vyakasiṣuḥ |
T16n2959u_001:6236: sampradāyagatabheda-buddhimapahāya nirapekṣabhāvena cenmūlyāṅkanaṁ vidhīyeta tarhi nūnameva mānavahitaṁ setsyatyasmāt |
T16n2959u_001:6240: grantharacanājanyapuṇyānubhāvenāpi prāṇinaḥ samyaksambodhiṁ prāpnuyuriti pariṇāmanāṁ vidadhāmi |
T16n2959u_001:6246: vaṅchukadorjenegī bhikṣuṇā praṇītā bhāratīyasaṁskṛtapaṇḍitadharmadattacaturvedena ca sampāditā vajrayānadarśanamīmāṁsākhyā kṛtiriyaṁ paripūrṇatāmagāt
